Bɛŋwaanɩ nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ wʋbʋŋa tɩgɩ mʋ.
Ba zwa dɩ ma kwarɩmɩ, yɩ ba daarɩ ba pu ba yiǝ, sɩ ba yiǝ yɩ zaŋɩ ya na, sɩ ba zwa yɩ zaŋɩ ya ni, sɩ ba wʋbʋŋa yɩ zaŋɩ ya lwarɩ Wɛ taanɩ dɩm kuri.
Kʋ na daɩ kʋntʋ, ba ya wʋ́ pipiri ba sɛ amʋ Wɛ yɩ a pa-ba yazurǝ.» Pooli laan ma ta o wǝli da o wɩ: «Á nan taá ye nɩ Wɛ pɛ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ mʋ lwarɩ DƖ na wʋ́ joŋi-ba DƖ yagɩ te tɩn.
Bantʋ nan wʋ́ sɛ DƖ kwǝrǝ kam.» [ O na tagɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, Zwifǝ bam ma nuŋi o tee nɩ.
Ba na maa viiri tɩn, ba ma tiini ba magɩ kantɔgɔ daanɩ.]
Pooli dɛɛn kɩ bɩna yale mʋ jǝgǝ kam kʋntʋ nɩ, yɩ o zʋʋrɩ mɛ o na ŋwɩ sɩ o taa tigi da tɩn.
O maa yǝni o jeeri nɔɔna balʋ maama na tui o te sɩ ba na-o tɩn.
O maa yǝni o brɩ Wɛ paarɩ dɩm cɩga kam, yɩ o tɔɔlɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi kwǝrǝ.
O dɛɛn ŋɔɔnɩ dɩ baarɩ mʋ, yɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ wʋ cɩgɩ o yigǝ.
Tɔnɔ kʋlʋ Pooli na pʋpʋnɩ o pa Rom tiinǝ tɩn na brɩ dɩbam kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ Pooli dɛɛn pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ o pa Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ Rom nɩ tɩn mʋ.
Nɔɔna badaara ya maŋɩ ba brɩ-ba Wɛ cɩga kam.
Pooli nan lagɩ sɩ o dɩ yi ba te, sɩ o pa ba na baarɩ mʋ, sɩ o laan daarɩ o kɛ o vu yigǝ.
Tɔnɔ kʋntʋ wʋnɩ o brɩ o zaasɩm dɩm maama na yɩ te tɩn: Nɔɔnʋ maama kɩ lwarɩm mʋ, yɩ Wɛ nan soe ba maama, kʋ na yɩ Zwifǝ naa dwi-gɛ tiinǝ dɩ.
Ba maama wʋ́ wanɩ ba na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ, dɩ ba na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi wʋlʋ na tɩgɩ ba ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Kʋntʋ nan yɩ Wɛ pɛɛrɩ mʋ.
Wʋlʋ maama na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn wʋ́ na vrɩm lwarɩm dɩ tʋʋnɩ wʋnɩ.
Ba laan wʋ́ ta ŋwɩ dɩ ba Yuutu Zezi, yɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm zǝni-ba .
Pooli ta ma brɩ Zwifǝ balʋ na vɩn Zezi dɩ zɩm maama tɩn woŋo.
O brɩ nɩ ba bá wanɩ ba vɩn Wɛ maŋa maama, Wɛ zaanɩ dɩm na waɩ woŋo maama tɩn ŋwaanɩ .
Kʋ nan na yɩ lele kʋntʋ, Wɛ na kɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ maama lanyɩranɩ te tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba kwe ba tɩtɩ ba pa Zezi, sɩ ba taa ŋwɩ dɩ wʋ-poŋo, sɩ kʋ poli Wɛ wʋ .
Tɔnɔ kʋm tiim jǝgǝ nɩ, Pooli brɩ nɩ o lagɩ sɩ o vu Rom mʋ, sɩ bantʋ dɩ laan wanɩ ba zǝn-o sɩ o kɛ o vu Ɛsɩpanyɩ.
O laan ma daarɩ o jɔɔnɩ nɔɔna balʋ maama o na ye yɩ ba wʋ Rom nɩ tɩn .
Amʋ Pooli wʋlʋ na yɩ Zezi Krisi gamba-sono tɩn mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ.
Wɛ mʋ kuri-nɩ sɩ a taa yɩ Zezi tɩntʋŋnʋ, sɩ a taa tɔɔlɩ o kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam.
Faŋa faŋa tɩn Wɛ maŋɩ DƖ pa DƖ nijoŋnǝ bam mʋ pʋpʋnɩ DƖ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ, nɩ DƖ goni ni sɩ DƖ pa nɔɔna lwarɩ DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ.
-DƖ kwǝrǝ kam kʋntʋ nan yɩ DƖ Bu wʋm taanɩ mʋ, wʋlʋ na yɩ dɩbam Yuutu Zezi Krisi tɩn.
Wʋntʋ na jigi nabiinu tɩn, ba lʋg-o Pɛ Davididwi tiinǝ bam wʋnɩ mʋ.
Wɛ Jorokʋm nan wʋ o tee nɩ dɩ dam, yɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ o yɩ Baŋa-Wɛ Bu mʋ maŋa kalʋ o na bi o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ tɩn.
Wʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ Wɛ kɩ dɩbam yu-yoŋo lanyɩranɩ, yɩ DƖ pa dɩ́ yɩ Zezi tɩntʋŋna sɩ dɩ́ vu dwi maama tiinǝ te dɩ́ pa ba sɛ o kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam, sɩ ba daarɩ ba kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩd-o, yɩ kʋntʋ wʋ́ pa Zezi Krisi na zulǝ.
Abam dɩ tɔgɩ á yɩ balʋ Wɛ na kuri sɩ á taá yɩ Zezi Krisi nɔɔna tɩn mʋ.
A pʋpʋnɩ a pa abam balʋ na wʋ Rom nɩ yɩ Wɛ soe abam yɩ DƖ kuri abam sɩ á taá yɩ DƖ nɔɔna tɩn mʋ.
Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo.
Pooli bʋŋɩ sɩ o vu o na Rom tiinǝ bam Dayigǝ woŋo yɩ, amʋ lagɩ a tɔgɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ mʋ a kɩ a Yuutu Wɛ le abam maama ŋwaanɩ, dɩ nɔɔna na tɛ abam taanɩ je maama nɩ á kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn.
Amʋ yǝni a loori Wɛ abam ŋwaanɩ maŋa maama, yɩ Wɛ dɩlʋ a na tʋŋɩ a paɩ dɩ a wʋ maama dɩ a na tɔɔlɩ DƖ Bu Zezi kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩn ye nɩ amʋ tɛ cɩga mʋ.
A ta yǝni a loori-DƖ sɩ DƖ pa-nɩ cwǝŋǝ, sɩ a laan wanɩ a ba abam te.
Abam fra tiini ya jɩgɩ amʋ.
A lagɩ sɩ a na abam, sɩ Wɛ Jorokʋm laan wanɩ kʋ tɔgɩ amʋ kʋ zǝni abam dɩ Wɛ-pɛɛrɩ dɩlʋ na wʋ́ pa á zɩgɩ lanyɩranɩ tɩn.
A na lagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ dɩ́ na baarɩ da-tee nɩ, dɩbam maama na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
A ko-biǝ-ba, á taá ye nɩ a kwaanɩ kuni zanzan mʋ sɩ a na nɛ cwǝŋǝ sɩ a ba a na abam, yɩ a daa ta wʋ nɛ cwǝŋǝ dɩ zɩm maama.
A lagɩ sɩ a ba sɩ a wanɩ a tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋɩ dɩlʋ na wʋ́ ja kuri tɩn mʋ abam tɩtarɩ nɩ, nɩ a na maŋɩ a kɩ te dwi tiinǝ badonnǝ dɩ tɩtarɩ nɩ tɩn.
Kʋ yɩ fɩfɩʋn mʋ sɩ a tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam a brɩ nɔɔna maama, yɩ kʋ nyɩ nɩ jɩm mʋ te a yuu nɩ, kʋ na yɩ balʋ yi na pʋʋrɩ, naa balʋ yi na wʋ pʋʋrɩ tɩn, dɩ swan tiinǝ dɩ balʋ na yǝri kʋlʋkʋlʋ tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ amʋ tiini a lagɩ sɩ a ba a tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam a brɩ abam balʋ na wʋ Rom nɩ tɩn dɩ.
Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam na jɩgɩ dam te tɩn Amʋ ba kwarɩ cavɩɩra sɩ a brɩ nɔɔna Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam.
Taanɩ dɩm kʋntʋ mʋ jɩgɩ dam, yɩ Wɛ ma-dɩ DƖ vrɩ nɔɔna balʋ maama na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ tɩn, kʋ puli dɩ Zwifǝbam mʋ, yɩ kʋ laan ba kʋ wǝli dwi-gɛtiinǝ dɩ da.
Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam mʋ brɩ nɔɔna DƖ na wʋ́ pa ba na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ te tɩn.
Kʋ maama nan zɩgɩ ba na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm maŋɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ: «Wʋlʋ maama na jɩgɩ cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ tɩn, oó na ŋwɩa cɩga cɩga.» Nabiinǝ maama na gɛ bʋra Wɛ tee nɩ te tɩn Baŋa-Wɛ nan brɩ nɔɔna DƖ banɩ na zaŋɩ dɩ ba ba lwarɩm dɩ ba kǝm-lwaanʋ tɩm maama ŋwaanɩ.
Ba na kɩ wo-lwaanʋ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ pa ba yǝni ba cɩ cɩga kam nɔɔna tee nɩ.
Wɛ nan vaŋɩ ba zwa, bɛŋwaanɩ DƖ maŋɩ DƖ pa nɔɔna cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba lwarɩ DƖ cɩga kam.
Wɛ tɩtɩ brɩ-ba DƖ cɩga kam jaja yɩ ba wʋ sɛ.
Nabiinǝ warɩ ba naɩ Baŋa-Wɛ dɩ ba yiǝ.
Kʋ nan na zɩgɩ DƖ na kɩ lʋgʋ baŋa tɩn, nabiinǝ sɩɩnɩ ba naɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ DƖ na kɩ tɩn.
Kʋ ma pa ba wanɩ ba lwarɩ lanyɩranɩ nɩ DƖ yɩ Wɛ cɩga cɩga, yɩ DƖ jɩgɩ dam dɩlʋ na ba jɩgɩ tiim tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ nabiinǝ bá wanɩ ba na bʋra Wɛ tee nɩ dɩ ba na wʋ sɛ-DƖ tɩn.
Ba maŋɩ ba ye Wɛ na yɩ wʋlʋ tɩn, yɩ ba nan ba zuli-DƖ nɩ ba Wɛ, naa ba taa kɩ-DƖ le.
Kʋ maa pa ba wʋbʋŋa tɩ, yɩ ba bɩcara yam laan yɩ lim, yɩ ba yǝri woŋo kʋlʋ na lana tɩn.
Ba maa paɩ ba jɩgɩ swan mʋ, yɩ ba laan yɩ jwǝǝru.
Ba ba sɛ sɩ ba taa zuli Ŋwɩa Tu Baŋa-Wɛ, yɩ ba daarɩ ba zuli wǝǝnu tɩlʋ ba tɩtɩ na mɔɔnɩ dɩ ba jɩa tɩn.
Wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ mʋ nyɩ dɩ nabiinǝ balʋ na tʋ tɩn, dɩ zunǝ dɩ vara dɩ tɩga wo-vǝǝlu.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ Wɛ yagɩ-ba, sɩ ba taa tɔgɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ ba tɩtɩ fra na zʋʋrɩ tɩn.
Ba maa yǝni ba kɩ wo-digiru, yɩ ba tɔgɩ boorim kikiǝ yalʋ na yɩ ba cavɩɩra tɩn.
Ba maa vɩn Wɛ cɩga kam, yɩ ba daarɩ ba tɔgɩ vwan.
Ba maa yǝni ba zuli wǝǝnu tɩlʋ Wɛ na kɩ tɩn, yɩ ba tɔgɩ-tɩ nɩ tɩ yɩ Wɛ mʋ te.
Ba daarɩ ba yagɩ wʋlʋ tɩtɩ na yɩ tɩ maama Kǝru tɩn.
Wʋntʋ nan mʋ maŋɩ sɩ o joŋi zulǝ sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.
Amina.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ Wɛ yagɩ-ba, yɩ ba kɩ wo-digiru kikiǝ yalʋ ba fra na zʋʋrɩ yɩ ya jɩgɩ cavɩɩra tɩn.
Kaana ma yǝni ba yagɩ ba banna, yɩ ba daarɩ ba tigi dɩ ba donnǝ kaana, nɩ baarʋ dɩ o kaanɩ na tigi daanɩ te tɩn.
Kʋ yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ dɩ baara dɩ.
Ba dɩ ba lagɩ kaana, yɩ ba daarɩ ba paɩ ba fra zʋʋrɩ ba donnǝ baara ba ma tigi dɩ ba, yɩ kʋ ya wʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba taa kɩ kʋntʋ.
Baara yǝni ba kɩ cavɩɩra kǝnǝ yantʋ doŋ mʋ daanɩ, yɩ kʋ pa ba na cam dɩlʋ na maŋɩ dɩ ba lwarɩm kikiǝ yam tɩn.
Nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ nan bʋŋɩ nɩ Wɛ cɩga kam ba jɩgɩ kuri mʋ sɩ ba taa jɩgɩ-ka ba wʋbʋŋa nɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ Wɛ yagɩ-ba, sɩ ba taa tɔgɩ ba wʋbʋŋ-yɔɔrʋ tɩm kwaga, yɩ ba kɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ ba ya na wʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba kɩ tɩn.
Ba wʋbʋŋa maa su dɩ wo-balwaarʋ tɩlʋ na ba tɔgɩ cɩga kam cwǝŋǝ tɩn, dɩ kǝm-lwaanʋ dwi maama.
Ba yi maa zʋ wǝǝnu zanzan.
Ba tiini ba jɩgɩ pu-sɩŋa, yɩ ba jɩgɩ wʋ-gʋʋ.
Ba ma lagɩ nɔɔna gʋm, yɩ ba kwǝri ba jaanɩ daanɩ, yɩ ba daarɩ ba ganɩ ba donnǝ.
Ba maa bʋŋɩ wo-balwaarʋ ba paɩ ba donnǝ, yɩ ba yɩ bɩbarɩ-nyɩna.
Ba maa ŋɔɔnɩ ba cɔgɩ ba donnǝ yum.
Ba maa culi Wɛ, yɩ ba twɩ ba donnǝ.
Ba ta kwǝri ba yɩ banɩ-nyɩna, yɩ ba brɩ ba tɩtɩ nɔɔna yigǝ nɩ.
Ba ta ma tiini ba bʋŋɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ wʋbʋŋa, yɩ ba ba nɩgɩ ba tiinǝ balʋ na lʋgɩ-ba tɩn.
Ba yǝri kʋlʋ na wʋ maŋɩ tɩn.
Ba maa jɩgɩ niǝ yale yale.
Ba ma ba soe ba donnǝ, yɩ ba ba jɩgɩ ba ŋwaŋa dɩ.
Ba nan maŋɩ ba ye Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam na brɩ kʋlʋ, nɩ balʋ na kɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩntʋ doŋ tɩn maŋɩ sɩ ba tɩ mʋ.
Nan dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, ba ta yǝni ba kɩ-tɩ mʋ, yɩ ba tɛ dɩ balʋ na kɩ lwarɩm tɩn dɩ, nɩ kʋ lana.
Wɛ tɔgɩ cɩga mʋ DƖ maa di nabiinǝ sarɩya Nmʋ wʋlʋ na co n donnǝ tɩn, kʋ yɩ nmʋ tɩtɩ mʋ n coǝ, bɛŋwaanɩ nmʋ tɩtɩ dɩ kɩ wo-lwaanʋ tɩm kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, n bá wanɩ n na bʋra Wɛ tee nɩ.
Dɩ́ nan ye nɩ Wɛ wʋ́ di nɔɔna balʋ na kɩ wo-lwaanʋ tɩm kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn taanɩ dɩ cɩga mʋ.
Nmʋ wʋlʋ na co n donnǝ kikiǝ yɩ nmʋ tɩtɩ dɩ kɩ-ya mʋ tɩn, kʋntʋ nmʋ bʋŋɩ nɩ nń wanɩ n lu Wɛ sarɩya yam wʋnɩ mʋ na?
Wɛ nan tiini DƖ jɩgɩ nɔɔna ŋwaŋa dɩ ban-pʋnʋ dɩ wʋ-zuru.
Nmʋ nan paɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ yɩ kafɛ mʋ na?
Ta n ye nɩ, Wɛ na jɩgɩ nmʋ ŋwaŋa tɩn, kʋ yɩ sɩ kʋ pa nmʋ wanɩ n lǝni n wʋ mʋ n yagɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ.
Nmʋ nan tiini n kʋ n bɩcarɩ mʋ yɩ n vɩn sɩ n lǝni n wʋ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ wʋ́ pa n cam dɩm tiini dɩ puli dɛ dɩm Wɛ na wʋ́ ba DƖ brɩ DƖ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋm yɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ di nabiinǝ sarɩya dɩ cɩga tɩn.
Wɛ laan wʋ́ pa nɔɔnʋ maama na o nyɩm sɩ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ o tɩtʋŋa yam na yɩ te tɩn.
Nɔɔna badaara yǝni ba vɔ ba wʋrʋ mʋ yɩ ba kɩ wo-laarʋ, sɩ kʋ pa ba na paarɩ dɩ zulǝ dɩ ŋwɩa kalʋ na ba cɔgɩ tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ.
Wɛ nan wʋ́ pa bantʋ ŋwɩa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.
Nɔɔna badaara nan wʋra ba na lagɩ bam tɩtɩ yɩranɩ zǝnǝ mʋ.
Ba maa vɩn Wɛ cɩga kam, yɩ ba daarɩ ba tɔgɩ wo-balwaarʋ kǝnǝ.
Wɛ cam dɩm dɩ DƖ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋm nan wʋ́ ba bantʋ baŋa.
Nabiinǝ balʋ maama na kɩ wo-balwaarʋ tɩn wʋ́ na yaara dɩ cam, kʋ na puli dɩ Zwifǝ bam, sɩ kʋ vu kʋ yi dwi-gɛ tiinǝ dɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ, balʋ maama na kɩ kǝm-laarʋ tɩn, Wɛ wʋ́ pa-ba paarɩ dɩ zulǝ dɩ ywǝǝni, kʋ na puli dɩ Zwifǝ bam sɩ kʋ vu kʋ yi dwi-gɛ tiinǝ dɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ tɔgɩ cɩga mʋ dɩ DƖ na kɩ nɔɔna maama te tɩn, sɩ DƖ ba kuri-ba daanɩ.
Balʋ na kɩ lwarɩm yɩ ba yǝri Wɛ cullu tɩlʋ DƖ na kɩ Moyisijɩŋa nɩ tɩn, baá cɔgɩ mʋ yɩ kʋ daɩ DƖ cullu tɩm ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ, balʋ na ye Wɛ cullu tɩm na kɩ ba cɔgɩ, Wɛ wʋ́ tɔgɩ DƖ cullu tɩm kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ ma di ba taanɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, kʋ daɩ nɔɔna balʋ na cǝgi Wɛ cullu tɩm tɩn mʋ wʋ́ na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ, kʋ yɩ balʋ na sɛ ba kɩ DƖ cullu tɩm na wɩ te tɩn mʋ wʋ́ na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ.
Dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam nan yǝri Wɛ cullu tɩm sɩ ba taa tɔgɩ-tɩ.
Ba tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa nan na paɩ ba tɔgɩ cɩga kalʋ Wɛ cullu tɩm na brɩ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ ba maŋɩ ba ye kʋlʋ na maŋɩ sɩ ba taa kɩ tɩn mʋ, yɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm ta tǝri ba tee nɩ.
Ba tɩtʋŋa yam brɩ nɩ cɩga kalʋ Wɛ cullu tɩm na brɩ tɩn tigi ba bɩcara nɩ.
Ba wʋbʋŋa na paɩ ba tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ kalʋ tɩn dɩ brɩ nɩ kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ ba wʋbʋŋa waɩ ya brɩ-ba nɩ ba kɩ ba cɔgɩ, naa ya brɩ-ba nɩ ba jɩgɩ cɩga.
Kʋʋ́ ta yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ Wɛ sarɩya dɛ dɩm nɩ.
Baŋa-Wɛ wʋ́ da Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ DƖ bʋrɩ nɔɔna maama wʋbʋŋa yalʋ na sǝgi tɩn, nɩ amʋ na brɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam te tɩn.
Wɔɔ mʋ yɩ Zwifu cɩga cɩga Wɛ yigǝ nɩ?
Kʋ daarɩ nmʋ wʋlʋ na brɩ n tɩtɩ nɩ n yɩ Zwifu tɩn, nmʋ yǝni n dalɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm yɩra nɩ mʋ, yɩ n kɩ tɩɩra dɩ n Wɛ tɔga kam.
Nmʋ maŋɩ n ye Wɛ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ sɩ n kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn.
Nmʋ na zaasɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm tɩn mʋ pɛ n lwarɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn.
Nmʋ bʋŋɩ nɩ n jɩgɩ Wɛ pooni mʋ n paɩ balʋ ta na wʋ lim wʋnɩ tɩn, yɩ n nyɩ dɩ lilwe vaŋɩnʋ na lagɩ sɩ o pa nɔɔna tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ te tɩn.
Nmʋ maa n bʋŋɩ nɩ n jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ n brɩ balʋ na ba jɩgɩ yǝno tɩn, sɩ n daarɩ n zaasɩ balʋ wʋbʋŋa ta na wʋ bɩgɩ tɩn.
Wɛ cullu tɩm na brɩ-m cɩga dɩ yǝno maama tɩn mʋ paɩ n bʋŋɩ kʋntʋ.
Nmʋ nan na yǝni n zaasɩ n donnǝ tɩn, bɛɛ mʋ kɩ yɩ n ba zaasɩ n tɩtɩ?
Nmʋ yǝni n brɩ nɔɔna nɩ ba yɩ taa ŋɔna, yɩ nmʋ tɩtɩ ŋɔnɩ mʋ.
N tɛ nɩ ba yɩ kɩ boorim, yɩ nmʋ tɩtɩ boori mʋ.
Nmʋ culi jwǝnǝ, yɩ n laan daarɩ n di nyɔɔrɩ ya baŋa nɩ.
Nmʋ jɩgɩ tɩɩra dɩ Wɛ na kɩ DƖ cullu tɩm n jɩŋa nɩ tɩn, yɩ n laan daarɩ n kɩ n cɔgɩ Wɛ yɩrɩ dɩ n na ba sɛ DƖ cullu tɩm na brɩ te tɩn.
Kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Kʋ yɩ abam Zwifǝ bam kikiǝ ŋwaanɩ mʋ paɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ ŋɔɔnɩ ba cɔgɩ Wɛ yɩrɩ.» Abam yǝni á goni á bǝkǝri sɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ á yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna mʋ.
Á nan na kwaanɩ á sɛ Wɛ cullu tɩm, á bǝkǝrigonim dɩm jɩgɩ kuri.
Kʋ daarɩ, á na cɔgɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm, á bǝkǝri sɩm gwǝŋǝ yɩ kafɛ mʋ.
Dwi-gɛ tiinǝ nan ba goni ba bǝkǝri.
Ba wʋ nɔɔnʋ dɩdʋa nan na tɔgɩ cɩga kalʋ Wɛ cullu tɩm na brɩ tɩn, kʋntʋ tu nyɩ dɩ wʋlʋ na goni sɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ o yɩ Wɛ nɔɔnʋ tɩn mʋ.
Dwi-gɛ tiinǝ wʋ́ brɩ nɩ abam Zwifǝ bam ba jɩgɩ bʋra.
Bɛŋwaanɩ á jɩgɩ Wɛ cullu tɔnɔ kʋm á jɩŋa nɩ, yɩ á goni á bǝkǝri.
Nan dɩ kʋ dɩ, á ta yǝni á cɔgɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm mʋ.
Bantʋ nan ba goni ba bǝkǝri, yɩ ba nan tɔgɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm.
Kʋ daɩ wʋlʋ na brɩ o tɩtɩ nɩ o yɩ Zwifu tɩn mʋ sɩɩnɩ o yɩ Zwifu cɩga cɩga Wɛ yigǝ nɩ.
Kʋ nan ta daɩ nɩ wʋlʋ na goni tɩn mʋ sɩɩnɩ o yɩ Wɛ nɔɔnʋ.
Wɛ yigǝ nɩ, Zwifu cɩga cɩga yɩ wʋlʋ Wɛ na lǝni o bɩcarɩ tɩn mʋ.
Wʋlʋ bɩcarɩ na fɔgɩ dɩ kwɛ tɩn mʋ nyɩ dɩ o goni mʋ cɩga cɩga.
Wɛ cullu tɔnɔ kʋm bá wanɩ kʋ kwɛ nɔɔnʋ bɩcarɩ, kʋ nan yɩ Wɛ Jorokʋm mʋ waɩ kʋ kwɛ nɔɔnʋ bɩcarɩ.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋntʋ doŋ naɩ zulǝ Wɛ tee nɩ mʋ, sɩ kʋ daɩ nabiinǝ tee nɩ.
Zwifu dwe dwi-gɛ tu Wɛ yigǝ nɩ na?
Zwifǝ nan jɩgɩ yu-yoŋo ba dwe dwi-gɛtiinǝ na?
Zwifǝ na goni ba bǝkǝritɩn, kʋ jɩgɩ zǝnǝ kʋ pa-ba na?
Ɛɛn, kʋ tiini kʋ jɩgɩ kuri.
Bɛŋwaanɩ dayigǝ tɩn, Zwifǝ bam mʋ yɩ balʋ Wɛ na kwe DƖ ni-bɩtarɩ sɩm DƖ kɩ ba jɩŋa nɩ tɩn.
Ba badaara nan wʋ kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ.
Kʋntʋ nan bá wanɩ kʋ pa Wɛ kwanɩ DƖ ni-taanɩ dɩm.
Nɔɔna maama na maŋɩ ba yɩ vwa-nyɩna, Wɛ ta yɩ cɩga tu mʋ.
Kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Nmʋ Wɛ jɩgɩ cɩga dɩ nmʋ na ŋɔɔnɩ taanɩ dɩlʋ maama tɩn.
Nɔɔna na maŋɩ ba co nmʋ dɩ, nmʋ ta yɩ cɩga tu mʋ.» Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, dɩbam na kɩ lwarɩm dɩlʋ tɩn ta na brɩ nɩ Wɛ yɩ cɩga tu mʋ, dɩ́ wʋ́ ta nɩ bɛɛ?
Kʋntʋ wʋ́ pa nɔɔna taa tɛ nɩ, Wɛ na pɛ ba na cam ba lwarɩm ŋwaanɩ tɩn, DƖ wʋ kɩ cɩga na?
Kʋ nan daɩ kʋntʋ.
Wɛ ya na daɩ cɩga tu, DƖ wʋ́ kɩ ta mʋ DƖ di nabiinǝ taanɩ?
Nɔɔna ta waɩ ba tɛ ba wɩ: «Amʋ na yǝni a fɔ vwan tɩn, kʋ pɛ nɔɔna lwarɩ jaja nɩ Wɛ tiini DƖ yɩ cɩga tu, yɩ DƖ na zulǝ kʋ ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ na yɩ kʋntʋ, bɛɛ mʋ yɩ a maŋɩ sɩ a na cam a kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩm ŋwaanɩ?» Kʋntʋ ya na yɩ cɩga, dɩ́ ya wʋ́ wanɩ dɩ́ ta dɩ́ wɩ: «Pa-na dɩ́ taá tʋŋɩ lwarɩm, sɩ kʋʋ́ ja lanyɩranɩ kʋ ba.» Nɔɔna badonnǝ yǝni ba fɔ vwan ba pa amʋ ba wɩ, amʋ tɛ kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ.
Ba nan lagɩ sɩ ba cɔgɩ amʋ yɩrɩ mʋ.
Ba nan wʋ́ na cɔgɩm sɩ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ ba tɩtʋŋa na yɩ te tɩn.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ tǝrǝ o na jɩgɩ cɩga Wɛ yigǝ nɩ Kʋ brɩ nɩ dɩbam Zwifǝ bam garɩ dwi-gɛtiinǝ bam mʋ na?
Awo.
A ya maŋɩ a ta nɩ nɔɔna maama wʋ lwarɩm gambɛɛm wʋnɩ mʋ, kʋ na yɩ Zwifǝ naa dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam dɩ, nɩ kʋ na pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ tǝrǝ o na jɩgɩ cɩga Wɛ yigǝ nɩ, dɩ nɔɔnʋ dɩdʋa dɩ.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ tǝrǝ o na ye kʋlʋ na maŋɩ tɩn.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ tǝrǝ o na lagɩ sɩ o lwarɩ Wɛ.
Ba maama mɛ ba kwaga mʋ ba ya Wɛ, yɩ ba maama tusi.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ tǝrǝ o na kɩ lanyɩranɩ, dɩ nɔɔnʋ dɩdʋa dɩ.
Ba niǝ maa ŋɔɔrɩ nɩ yibeelǝ niǝ na pʋrɩ te tɩn.
Ba maa maɩ ba dindǝlimǝ ba ma ganɩ daanɩ.
Ba niǝ ma cana nɩ bɩsankwɩ na jɩgɩ vɩan sɩ gʋɩ nɔɔna te tɩn.
Ba maa sɔɔlɩ wo-balwaarʋ ba pa nɔɔna.
Ba ma tiini ba duri lɩla ba ve ba gʋɩ nɔɔna.
Ba na dɛ jǝgǝ kalʋ maama tɩn, ba yǝni ba cɔgɩ wǝǝnu mʋ yɩ ba ta yaarɩ nɔɔna zanzan.
Ba maa yǝri ywǝǝni cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba tɔgɩ.
Ba maa brɩ ba ba kwarɩ Wɛ.» Dɩ́ nan ye nɩ kʋlʋ maama Wɛ cullu tɔnɔ kʋm na brɩ tɩn, kʋ pʋpʋnɩ kʋ pa balʋ cullu tɩm na te-ba tɩn mʋ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, nabiinǝ maama wʋ́ ba ba zɩgɩ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ sɩ DƖ di ba taanɩ, yɩ ba wʋlʋwʋlʋ bá wanɩ o ni o puri sɩ o ma ŋɔɔnɩ o joŋi o tɩtɩ.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ bá wanɩ o na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ, o na tɔgɩ DƖ cullu tɩm tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ cullu tɩm nan paɩ nabiinǝ mʋ lwarɩ nɩ ba kɩ ba tusi.
Dɩ́ na wʋ́ na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ te tɩn Wɛ laan nan pɛ dɩ́ lwarɩ DƖ na paɩ nɔɔna naɩ cɩga DƖ tee nɩ te tɩn, yɩ kʋ wʋ zɩgɩ cullu tɔgɩm baŋa nɩ.
Wɛ cullu tɔnɔ kʋm dɩ Wɛ nijoŋnǝ bam dɩ nan maŋɩ ba brɩ cwǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ.
Kʋ nan yɩ nɔɔna na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ Wɛ paɩ ba na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ.
Balʋ maama na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn wʋ́ na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ, bɛŋwaanɩ nɔɔna maama yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ.
Nabiinǝ maama kɩ lwarɩm mʋ yɩ ba daa wʋ maŋɩ dɩ Wɛ paarɩ dɩm.
Wɛ nan paɩ nɔɔna na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ zaanɩ mʋ, Zezi Krisi na ŋwɩ ba lwarɩm jɩnɩ o ma joŋi-ba tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ paɩ nɔɔna DƖ zaanɩ dɩm kafɛ mʋ.
DƖ ma pa Zezi ba o ji kaanɩm.
O jana kam nuŋi ka ma vrɩ nɔɔna ba lwarɩm wʋnɩ, dɩ ba na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩd-o tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ kɩ kʋntʋ mʋ sɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ DƖ yɩ cɩga tu mʋ.
Faŋa faŋa tɩn, Wɛ dɛɛn kɩ wʋ-zuru mʋ yɩ DƖ wʋ vaŋɩ balʋ na kɩ lwarɩm tɩn zwa.
Kʋ daarɩ lele kʋntʋ Wɛ pɛ dɩ́ lwarɩ nɩ DƖ yɩ cɩga tu, dɩ DƖ na joŋi nɔɔna ba lwarɩm wʋnɩ tɩn.
Kʋntʋ maa brɩ nɩ Wɛ jɩgɩ cɩga, yɩ DƖ ta paɩ balʋ maama na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn dɩ ta na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ.
Kʋ na yɩ kʋntʋ, dɩ́ wʋ́ magɩ dɩ́ nyɔɔna bɛɛ baŋa nɩ mʋ?
Kʋlʋkʋlʋ tǝrǝ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, kʋ daɩ dɩ́ na tɔgɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm tɩn mʋ pɛ dɩ́ na cɩga, kʋ yɩ dɩ́ na sɛ dɩ́ kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ dɩ́ ye nɩ nɔɔna wʋ́ na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ dɩ ba na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ tɩn mʋ, sɩ kʋ daɩ cullu tɩm tɔgɩm ŋwaanɩ.
Baŋa-Wɛ yɩ Zwifǝ bam yɩranɩ Wɛ mʋ na?
DƖ daɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam dɩ Wɛ na?
Ɛɛn, DƖ yɩ nabiinǝ maama Wɛ mʋ.
Wɛ yɩ dɩdʋa mʋ.
Zwifǝ bam na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ, DƖ wʋ́ pa ba na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ.
Dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam dɩ nan na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ, DƖ wʋ́ pa ba dɩ na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ.
Kʋntʋ nan ba lagɩ kʋ ta nɩ dɩ́ na kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn, DƖ cullu tɩm daa ba jɩgɩ kuri.
Dɩ́ na kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ te tɩn laan paɩ DƖ cullu tɩm tiini tɩ jɩgɩ kuri mʋ.
Abraham na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ yɩ o na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ te tɩn Á pa dɩ́ nii dɩ́ nabaarʋ Abrahamdɛɛn na yɩ te yɩ o na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn.
Wɛ ya na pɛ-o cɩga o na kɩ kǝm-laarʋ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ, o ya wʋ́ ta jɩgɩ woŋo sɩ o magɩ o nyɔɔnɩ kʋ baŋa nɩ.
O nan ba jɩgɩ woŋo sɩ o magɩ o nyɔɔnɩ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ.
Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm nan brɩ dɩbam kʋ wɩ: «Abraham kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ, yɩ Wɛ pa o na cɩga kʋ ŋwaanɩ.» Kʋ nan na yɩ nɔɔnʋ na tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋɩ, o maŋɩ sɩ o joŋi o ŋwɩɩrʋ mʋ o tɩtʋŋɩ dɩm ŋwaanɩ, kʋntʋ nan daɩ pɛɛrɩ mʋ o joŋi.
Kʋ daarɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ, yɩ o ba tɩɩgɩ kǝm-laarʋ tɩlʋ o na kɩ tɩn, Wɛ wʋ́ pa kʋntʋ tu na cɩga dɩ o na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na yagɩ nɔn-balwaarʋ lwarɩm DƖ ma cɛ-ba yɩ DƖ pa ba na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ tɩn.
Pɛ Davididɩ maŋɩ o ta kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ.
O dɛɛn tagɩ o wɩ, nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ Wɛ na pɛ o na cɩga yɩ kʋ daɩ o kǝm-laarʋ ŋwaanɩ tɩn yɩ yu-yoŋo tu mʋ.
Davidi maa wɩ: «Balʋ Wɛ na yagɩ ba wo-balwaarʋ DƖ ma cɛ-ba tɩn jɩgɩ yu-yoŋo, DƖ na saarɩ ba lwarɩm dɩm tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na kɩ lwarɩm yɩ Wɛ yagɩ DƖ ma cɛ-o yɩ DƖ daa ba kɩ-dɩ DƖ bɩcarɩ nɩ tɩn jɩgɩ yu-yoŋo.» Davidi na ŋɔɔnɩ wʋpolo taanɩ dɩm kʋntʋ tɩn, o ŋɔɔnɩ balʋ na goni ba bǝkǝritɩn yɩranɩ ŋwaanɩ mʋ na?
Aye.
O ŋɔɔnɩ balʋ na ba goni ba bǝkǝri tɩn dɩ ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Dɩ́ maŋɩ dɩ́ lwarɩ nɩ: «Abraham kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ mʋ, yɩ Wɛ pa o na cɩga kʋ ŋwaanɩ.» Wɛ na pɛ o na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ yɩ maŋa kalʋ o na goni tɩn mʋ na?
Awo, kʋ yɩ o ta na wʋ goni maŋa kalʋ tɩn mʋ.
Kʋ yɩ kʋ kwaga nɩ mʋ Wɛ pɛ o go sɩ kʋ taa yɩ maana kʋ brɩ nɩ, Wɛ maŋɩ DƖ pa o na cɩga o na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ tɩn ŋwaanɩ, kʋ loori o na wʋ́ go tɩn.
Kʋntʋ, balʋ maama dɩ na wʋ goni yɩ ba kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ yɩ kʋ pa ba na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ tɩn, ba dɩ yɩ Abraham dwi tiinǝ cɩga cɩga mʋ.
Balʋ maama dɩ na goni yɩ ba kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn yɩ Abraham dwi tiinǝ mʋ, yɩ kʋ nan daɩ ba na goni tɩn yɩranɩ má ŋwaanɩ, kʋ yɩ ba na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ, nɩ Abraham dɛɛn na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ kʋ loori o na wʋ́ go maŋa kalʋ tɩn.
Wɛ goni DƖ ni dɩ Abraham, o na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ Kʋ daɩ Abrahamna tɔgɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ pɛ Wɛ go DƖ ni dɩ Abraham dɩ o dwi tiinǝ bam.
Kʋ nan yɩ Abraham na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ yɩ o na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ pɛ Wɛ go ni DƖ wɩ, DƖ wʋ́ pa o ba o taa te lʋgʋ kʋm.
Kʋ nan ya na yɩ balʋ na tɔgɩ cullu tɩm tɩn mʋ wʋ́ ba ba taa te lʋgʋ kʋm, dɩ́ na kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ te tɩn ya daa ba jɩgɩ kuri, yɩ Wɛ ni-gonim dɩm dɩ ya wʋ́ ji kafɛ mʋ.
Wɛ cullu tɩm vɩʋn mʋ paɩ DƖ banɩ zaŋɩ dɩ nɔɔna, ba na cɔgɩ-tɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Cullu nan na tǝrǝ, nɔɔna bá wanɩ ba cɔgɩ-tɩ.
Kʋntʋ, dɩ́ lwarɩ nɩ kʋ yɩ Abraham na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ pɛ Wɛ go ni dɩd-o, sɩ kʋ taa yɩ zaanɩ pɛɛrɩ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, Abraham dwi tiinǝ bam maama wʋ́ sɩɩnɩ ba na wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ Wɛ na goni ni sɩ DƖ pa-ba tɩn.
Kʋ daɩ balʋ na tɔgɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm tɩn yɩranɩ mʋ wʋ́ na-tɩ, kʋ yɩ balʋ dɩ na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ nɩ Abraham dɩ dɛɛn na kɩ te tɩn mʋ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ dɩbam maama wʋ́ wanɩ dɩ́ bǝŋi Abraham nɩ dɩ́ nabaarʋ.
Wɛ dɛɛn tagɩ dɩ Abraham DƖ wɩ: «Amʋ goni a ni sɩ a pa n ji dwi zanzan nabaarʋ mʋ.» Abraham na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn, o sɩɩnɩ o ji dɩ́ nabaarʋ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ.
Kʋ yɩ Wɛ dɩntʋ mʋ bi nɔɔna DƖ pa ba yagɩ tʋʋnɩ, yɩ DƖ pa woŋo maama kɩ maŋa kalʋ kʋlʋkʋlʋ ya ta na tǝrǝ tɩn.
Wɛ dɛɛn na tagɩ dɩ Abraham DƖ wɩ o dwi wʋ́ puli tɩn, Abraham ya yǝri Wɛ na wʋ́ kɩ te DƖ kɩ kʋntʋ.
Dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, o ta jɩgɩ tɩɩna lanyɩranɩ, yɩ o kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ.
Kʋntʋ ma pa o sɩɩnɩ o ji dwi zanzan nabaarʋ, nɩnɛɛnɩ Wɛ na tagɩ nɩ o dwi dɩm wʋ́ puli te tɩn.
Abraham dɛɛn na gɛ fɩɩn sɩ o yi bɩna bi tɩn, o ma na nɩ o tiini o kwɩn zanzan, o daa bá wanɩ bu o lʋ.
O ma na nɩ o kaanɩ Sara dɩ kwɩn zanzan o kɛ lʋra.
Dɩ kʋntʋ maama o dɛɛn ta kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa mʋ dɩ Wɛ.
O maa ba jɩgɩ bʋbwɛa dɩ Wɛ na goni DƖ ni sɩ DƖ pa-o kʋlʋ tɩn.
O na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn, kʋ paɩ o zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ, yɩ kʋ pa Wɛ na zulǝ.
O maa sɩɩnɩ o ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ, Wɛ wʋ́ wanɩ DƖ kɩ kʋlʋ DƖ na goni DƖ ni sɩ DƖ kɩ tɩn.
Kʋ yɩ kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ kʋ pʋpʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Wɛ ma pa o na cɩga dɩ o na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.» Kʋ nan na pʋpʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Wɛ ma pa o na cɩga» tɩn, kʋ daɩ Abraham yɩranɩ ŋwaanɩ mʋ kʋ pʋpʋnɩ kʋntʋ.
Kʋ pʋpʋnɩ dɩbam dɩ ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ wʋ́ pa dɩbam dɩ na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ, dɩ dɩ́ na kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩntʋ mʋ bi dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi DƖ pa o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ.
Wɛ nan mʋ kɩ Zezi nabiinǝ jɩŋa nɩ DƖ pa o tɩ dɩbam lwarɩm ŋwaanɩ.
DƖ ma daarɩ DƖ bi-o DƖ pa o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ o joori o na ŋwɩa, sɩ kʋ pa dɩ́ na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ.
Zezi na fɔgɩ dɩbam dɩ Wɛ daanɩ te tɩn Dɩ́ na kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn mʋ pɛ dɩ́ na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ.
Kʋntʋ, dɩbam dɩ Wɛ fɔgɩ daanɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Zezi mʋ pɛ dɩbam yi Wɛ yigǝ, yɩ Wɛ kɩ dɩbam yu-yoŋo dɩ́ na kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩd-o tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, dɩ́ jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ dɩ́ wʋ́ na paarɩ-zulǝ Wɛ tee nɩ, yɩ kʋ paɩ dɩbam jɩgɩ wʋpolo lanyɩranɩ.
Dɩ́ nan ta jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ́ yaara yam wʋnɩ, bɛŋwaanɩ dɩ́ ye nɩ yaara waɩ ya paɩ dɩ́ fɔgɩ dɩ́ zɩgɩ dɩ pu-dɩa.
Dɩ́ pu-dɩa kam yaara yam wʋnɩ tɩn laan maa pa dɩ́ zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ maŋɩm wʋnɩ.
Dɩ́ na zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ maŋɩm wʋnɩ tɩn laan maa pa dɩ́ jɩgɩ tɩɩna Wɛ tee nɩ.
Dɩ́ na jɩgɩ tɩɩna kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ bá pa dɩ́ na dɩ́ cavɩɩra, bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ tiini DƖ kɩ DƖ sono dɩbam bɩcara nɩ, dɩ DƖ na pɛ DƖ Jorokʋm wʋ dɩbam wʋnɩ tɩn.
Dɩbam na bwǝnǝ yɩ dɩ́ warɩ dɩ́ joŋi dɩ́ tɩtɩ tɩn, mʋ Zezi Krisi tɩga o ma vrɩ dɩbam na yɩ nɔn-balwaarʋ tɩn, maŋa kalʋ Wɛ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ tɩn.
Kʋ cana sɩ nɔɔnʋ sɛ o tɩ o doŋ ŋwaanɩ, dɩ o na wʋ́ tɩ wʋlʋ ŋwaanɩ tɩn na maŋɩ o yɩ cɩga tu te dɩ.
Kʋ nan waɩ kʋ kɩ sɩ nɔɔnʋ bá kwarɩ fʋʋnɩ sɩ o tɩ nɔn-ŋʋm ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ nan na yɩ Baŋa-Wɛ, dɩntʋ brɩ dɩbam DƖ na tiini DƖ soe dɩbam te tɩn, dɩ DƖ na pɛ Zezi Krisi ba o tɩ dɩbam ŋwaanɩ maŋa kalʋ dɩ́ ya ta na yɩ lwarɩm kǝrǝ tɩn.
Zezi na tɩga yɩ o jana kam nuŋi tɩn mʋ pɛ dɩ́ na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ.
Kʋ nan na dwe dɩdɩ tɩn, o laan wʋ́ joŋi dɩbam Wɛ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋm wʋnɩ.
Dɩbam ya yɩ Wɛ dʋna mʋ.
DƖ Bu wʋm tʋʋnɩ dɩm nan mʋ pɛ dɩbam dɩ Wɛ fɔgɩ daanɩ.
Kʋ nan na dwe dɩdɩ, dɩbam laan na jigi Wɛ nɔɔna tɩn, DƖ Bu wʋm wʋ́ vrɩ dɩbam, o na joori o bi o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋlʋ ta na wǝli da tɩn, dɩ́ jɩgɩ wʋpolo lanyɩranɩ dɩ Wɛ, dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi na pɛ dɩbam dɩ Wɛ fɔgɩ daanɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Adam na vɩn Wɛ ni tɩn mʋ pɛ tʋʋnɩ ba, Zezi maa ja ŋwɩa o ba Nabiinu dɩdʋa ŋwaanɩ mʋ pɛ lwarɩm ba lʋgʋ baŋa, yɩ lwarɩm dɩ ja tʋʋnɩ dɩ wǝli da dɩ ba.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, nabiinǝ maama maŋɩ sɩ ba tɩ mʋ, ba maama na kɩ lwarɩm tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ na wʋ́ loori sɩ Wɛ kɩ DƖ cullu tɩm DƖ nɔɔna bam jɩŋa nɩ tɩn, dɩ lwarɩm maŋɩ dɩ wʋ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ mʋ.
Cullu tɩm nan ya ta na tǝrǝ tɩn, Wɛ ba jeeli nɔɔna lwarɩm.
Kʋ na zɩgɩ Adammaŋa kam nɩ sɩ kʋ vu kʋ yi Moyisi maŋa kam tɩn, tʋʋnɩ ya maŋɩ dɩ wʋra mʋ yɩ dɩ waɩ nabiinǝ.
Dɩ maa waɩ balʋ dɩ na kɩ ba tusi, yɩ kʋ daɩ nɩ Adam dɛɛn na kɩ lwarɩm o vɩn Wɛ ni te tɩn.
Adam nan brɩ dɩbam Zezi na lagɩ o ba tɩn nyɩnyʋgʋ mʋ.
Ba nan daɩ bɩdwɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ Adam dɛɛn na kɩ lwarɩm dɩlʋ tɩn daɩ bɩdwɩ dɩ Wɛ na pɛ dɩbam pɛɛrɩ dɩlʋ zaanɩ tɩn.
Nabiinu dɩdʋa kam kʋntʋ lwarɩm dɩm ŋwaanɩ mʋ pɛ nɔɔna zanzan tɩ.
Wɛ zaanɩ dɩm nan dwe kʋntʋ, yɩ DƖ tʋŋɩ nabiinu dɩdʋa, wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi, sɩ o kɩ nɔɔna zanzan yu-yoŋo kʋ ja gaalɩ.
Wɛ na pɛ pɛɛrɩ dɩm nɔɔna zaanɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ daɩ bɩdwɩ nɩ Adam na kɩ lwarɩm te tɩn.
Wʋntʋ na kɩ lwarɩm o vɩn Wɛ ni bɩdwɩ tɩn mʋ pɛ Wɛ di nɔɔna sarɩya.
Kʋ daarɩ nɔɔna zanzan na kɩ ba tusi tɩn, Wɛ pɛɛrɩ dɩm nan pɛ ba lwarɩm zanzan ti yɩ ba na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ.
Nabiinu dɩdʋa kam lwarɩm ŋwaanɩ mʋ pɛ tʋʋnɩ tɔgɩ da dɩ jaanɩ nɔɔna.
Kʋ nan na dwe dɩdɩ tɩn, balʋ maama Wɛ na kɩ-ba yu-yoŋo kʋ ja gaalɩ, yɩ DƖ kwǝri DƖ pa ba na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ tɩn, mʋ wʋ́ ta ŋwɩ Wɛ paarɩ dɩm wʋnɩ nabiinu dɩdʋa wʋlʋ na yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩ́ nan lwarɩ nɩ Adam na kɩ o tusi bɩdwɩ tɩn mʋ pɛ nabiinǝ maama na cɔgɩm Wɛ tee nɩ.
Zezi Krisi yɩranɩ kǝm-laa kʋm dɩ nan mʋ pɛ nɔɔna na cɩga yɩ ba jɩgɩ ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ.
Nabiinu dɩdʋa kam na vɩn Wɛ ni dɩm tɩn mʋ pɛ nɔɔna zanzan yɩ lwarɩm kǝrǝ.
Nɔɔnʋ dɩdʋa kam na yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn nan na sɛ Wɛ ni tɩn dɩ wʋ́ pa nɔɔna zanzan na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ.
Wɛ dɛɛn kɩ DƖ cullu tɩm nɔɔna jɩŋa nɩ, sɩ kʋ pa lwarɩm fɔgɩ dɩ puli.
Lwarɩm nan na puli kʋntʋ tɩn, Wɛ na kɩ nɔɔna zaanɩ te tɩn wʋ́ tiini kʋ puli zanzan kʋ dwǝni.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, lwarɩm tɔgɩ tʋʋnɩ ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ maa te nɔɔna.
Wɛ zaanɩ dɩm nan tɔgɩ DƖ na paɩ nɔɔna cɩga te tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ maa di paarɩ nɔɔna tɩtarɩ nɩ, sɩ ba taa jɩgɩ ŋwɩa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩ́ na jɩgɩ Wɛ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ te tɩn Dɩ́ nan wʋ́ ta nɩ bɛɛ mʋ?
Dɩ́ wʋ́ ta kɩ lwarɩm mʋ, sɩ kʋ wanɩ kʋ pa Wɛ zaanɩ dɩm tiini dɩ puli dɩ́ tee nɩ na?
Aye, dɩ́ bá ta kɩ kʋntʋ doŋ.
Kʋ na yɩ dɩ lwarɩm jǝgǝ nɩ, dɩbam nyɩ dɩ twa mʋ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, dɩ́ daa wʋ́ kɩ ta mʋ dɩ́ taá ŋwɩ lwarɩm wʋnɩ?
Abam yǝri nɩ, dɩbam balʋ maama ba na miisi na wʋnɩ Zezi Krisi yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ dɩ́ tɔgɩ dɩ́ wǝli dɩd-o o tʋʋnɩ dɩm wʋnɩ mʋ na?
Kʋntʋ, ba na miisi dɩbam na wʋnɩ tɩn, kʋ nyɩ dɩ dɩ́ tɩgɩ dɩd-o mʋ yɩ ba kɩ dɩbam dɩd-o.
Kʋntʋ ma pa dɩ́ tɔgɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi dɩ́ ŋwɩ Wɛ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam, nɩ dɩ́ Ko Wɛ na mɛ DƖ paarɩ dam dɩm DƖ ma bi Zezi DƖ pa o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ yɩ o na ŋwɩa te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ, dɩbam na tɔgɩ dɩ Zezi dɩ́ tɩ tɩn, dɩ́ laan jigi woŋo dɩdʋa mʋ dɩd-o, yɩ dɩ́ daa ta wʋ́ tɔgɩ dɩd-o dɩ́ bi dɩ́ yagɩ tʋʋnɩ.
Dɩ́ ye nɩ, ba na pagɩ Zezi tʋʋn-dagarakam baŋa nɩ ba gʋ tɩn, dɩbam lwarɩm ŋwɩ-doŋǝ kam dɩ tɔgɩ ka tɩ mʋ, kʋ pa lwarɩm daa warɩ dɩbam.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, dɩ́ laan te dɩ́ tɩtɩ mʋ lwarɩm jɩŋa nɩ, bɛŋwaanɩ lwarɩm daa bá wanɩ dɩ taa te wʋlʋ na tɔgɩ dɩ Zezi o tɩ tɩn.
Dɩ́ na tɔgɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi dɩ́ tɩ tɩn, dɩ́ jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ dɩ́ wʋ́ tɔgɩ dɩd-o dɩ́ na ŋwɩa.
Bɛŋwaanɩ dɩ́ ye nɩ Zezi Krisi bi o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ yɩ o daa bá joori o tɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ tʋʋnɩ daa ba jɩgɩ dam o baŋa nɩ.
Zezi na tɩgɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ yɩ sɩ o cɔgɩ lwarɩm dam mʋ.
O tɩgɩ bɩdwɩ yɩranɩ mʋ o ma kweeli.
O laan nan na ŋwɩ tɩn, o ŋwɩa kam zuli Wɛ mʋ.
Kʋ yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ dɩ abam dɩ.
Kʋ na yɩ dɩ lwarɩm jǝgǝ nɩ, lwarɩ-na nɩ á nyɩ dɩ twa mʋ te.
Kʋ nan na yɩ abam dɩ Wɛ laŋa nɩ, á ŋwɩ mʋ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ abam daa yɩ pa lwarɩm di dam á yɩra yalʋ na tʋ tɩn baŋa nɩ.
Á nan yɩ sɛ á pa wo-balwaarʋ tɩlʋ á fra na zʋʋrɩ tɩn wanɩ abam.
Yɩ sɛ-na á pa lwarɩm taa te abam sɩ kʋ pa á taá kɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ.
Nan kwe-na á tɩtɩ á kɩ Wɛ jɩŋa nɩ, sɩ á nyɩ nɩ balʋ na tɩgɩ yɩ Wɛ pa á joori á bi á na ŋwɩa tɩn mʋ.
Kwe-na á maama á pa Wɛ, sɩ DƖ ma tʋŋɩ kʋlʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn.
Lwarɩm daa ba te abam, bɛŋwaanɩ á na jɩgɩ ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn, kʋ daɩ sɩ á taá ŋwɩ DƖ cullu tɩm tɔgɩm ŋwaanɩ, kʋ yɩ DƖ zaanɩ dɩm ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá kɩ lanyɩranɩ mʋ maŋa maama Kʋ nan brɩ dɩbam nɩ bɛɛ mʋ?
Dɩ́ na jɩgɩ ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ DƖ zaanɩ dɩm ŋwaanɩ yɩ kʋ daɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá ŋwɩ DƖ cullu tɩm tɔgɩm ŋwaanɩ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ dɩ́ taá kɩ lwarɩm mʋ na?
Awo, kʋ daɩ kʋntʋ.
Á ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ, á na kwe á tɩtɩ á kɩ nɔɔnʋ jɩŋa nɩ sɩ á taá yɩ o gambɛ yɩ á sɛ o ni, á sɩɩnɩ á yɩ á na sɛ wʋlʋ tɩn gambɛ mʋ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, á na yɩ lwarɩm gambɛ, tʋʋnɩ laan mʋ wʋ́ ba dɩ ja abam.
Á nan daa na yɩ balʋ na sɛ Wɛ ni tɩn, á wʋ́ na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ.
A nan kɩ Wɛ le, dɩ abam dɛɛn ya na yɩ lwarɩm gambɛ yɩ á laan kwe á tɩtɩ á pa Wɛ cɩga kam zaasɩm yɩ á sɛ-ka dɩ á wʋ maama tɩn.
Wɛ mʋ vrɩ abam lwarɩm jɩŋa nɩ, yɩ á laan ji DƖ cɩga kam tɩntʋŋna.
Abam wʋbʋŋa ta na wʋ bɩgɩ tɩn mʋ pɛ a kwe nabiinǝ mɩmaŋa a ma maŋɩ a brɩ abam kʋntʋ doŋ.
Abam dɛɛn kwe á maama mʋ á pa wo-digiru dɩ lwarɩm kikiǝ yɩ á yɩ tɩ gambɛ, yɩ á tʋŋɩ wo-lwaanʋ kʋ ja gaalɩ.
Lele kʋntʋ, á laan nan maŋɩ sɩ á kwe á maama mʋ á pa Wɛ cɩga kam, sɩ á taá yɩ ka gambɛ sɩ á taá ŋwɩ dɩ wʋ-poŋo.
Abam dɛɛn na yɩ lwarɩm gambɛ tɩn, Wɛ cɩga kam ya ba te abam.
Abam na kɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ tɩn dɛɛn jɩgɩ bɛɛ nyɔɔrɩ mʋ tɩ pa abam?
Tɩ laan nan jɩgɩ cavɩɩra mʋ dɩ abam.
Wǝǝnu tɩntʋ kweelim je nan yɩ tʋʋnɩ mʋ.
Kʋ daarɩ lele kʋntʋ Wɛ vrɩ abam lwarɩm gambɛɛm wʋnɩ, yɩ á laan yɩ DƖ gambɛ-sonnu mʋ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ á jɩgɩ nyɔɔrɩ dɩ á na ŋwɩ dɩ wʋ-poŋo tɩn, yɩ kʋ kweelim je nɩ á wʋ́ na ŋwɩa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ.
Lwarɩm ŋwɩɩrʋ yɩ tʋʋnɩ mʋ.
Kʋ daarɩ Wɛ pɛɛrɩ dɩlʋ DƖ na pɛ dɩbam zaanɩ tɩn mʋ yɩ ŋwɩa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ, dɩ́ na ŋwɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Cullu tɩm daa ba te dɩbam A ko-biǝ-ba, á maama ye cullu laŋa na yɩ te.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ á ye nɩ cullu na te nɔɔnʋ, kʋ yɩ sɩ kʋ taa ve o tʋʋnɩ mʋ.
O nan na tɩga, tɩ daa ba te-o.
Kʋ nyɩ nɩ kaanɩ na zʋ barʋ te tɩn mʋ.
Culu brɩ nɩ o barʋ wʋm ta na ŋwɩ maŋa kalʋ tɩn, o ba jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ o yagɩ o barʋ wʋm.
O barʋ wʋm nan na tɩga, o laan jɩgɩ ni sɩ o zʋ barʋ wʋdoŋ, culu daa wʋ vɔgɩ-ba daanɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, o barʋ wʋm ta na ŋwɩ, yɩ kaanɩ wʋm na ve o zʋ barʋ wʋdoŋ, o cɔgɩ mʋ.
O barʋ wʋm nan na tɩga, culu kʋm daa wʋ vɔgɩ-ba daanɩ.
O laan na zʋ barʋ wʋdoŋ, o daa wʋ cɔgɩ.
A ko-biǝ-ba, kʋ yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ dɩ abam dɩ.
Kʋ na yɩ cullu tɩm laŋa nɩ, abam maama nyɩ dɩ twa mʋ te, Zezi Krisi na tɩgɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋntʋ ma pa dɩ́ yigǝ lɩ cullu tɩm wʋnɩ, yɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ dɩ́ kɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋdoŋ jɩŋa nɩ, wʋntʋ yɩ Zezi wʋlʋ na bi o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ tɩn.
Kʋ maa paɩ dɩ́ tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna dɩ́ pa Wɛ.
Dɩ́ dɛɛn kɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ dɩ́ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ tɩn.
Wɛ cullu tɩm nan brɩ dɩbam kʋlʋ na yɩ lwarɩm tɩn, yɩ dɩ́ fra ta yǝni ya zʋʋrɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ.
Kʋ dɛɛn ma pa dɩ́ kɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩlʋ na jɩgɩ dɩbam tɩ ve tʋʋnɩ tɩn.
Cullu tɩm dɛɛn tiini tɩ pɩɩnɩ dɩbam mʋ dɩ dam.
Lele kʋntʋ tɩ nan daa ba te dɩbam, dɩ́ na tɔgɩ dɩ Zezi dɩ́ tɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, dɩ́ na tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam te tɩn, kʋ yɩ DƖ Jorokʋm na wʋ dɩ́ bɩcara nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Dɩ́ laan tɔgɩ cwǝ-dʋŋa kam kʋntʋ, sɩ kʋ daɩ cwǝ-doŋǝ kalʋ na yɩ cullu tɩlʋ na pʋpʋnɩ tɩ tiŋi tɔnɔ wʋnɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ cullu tɩm brɩ dɩbam lwarɩm na yɩ te tɩn Bɛɛ mʋ dɩ́ nan wʋ́ ta cullu tɩm laŋa nɩ?
Tɩ yɩ lwarɩm mʋ na?
Aye, kʋ daɩ kʋntʋ.
Wɛ cullu tɩm nan mʋ pɛ a lwarɩ lwarɩm na yɩ te tɩn.
Tɩ ya na wʋ brɩ nɩ: «Yɩ pa n yi zʋ n donnǝ wǝǝnu», a ya bá ta ye nɩ a yi na zʋ a donnǝ wǝǝnu, kʋ yɩ lwarɩm mʋ.
Culu kʋm kʋntʋ nan mʋ pɛ lwarɩm na cwǝŋǝ dɩ zʋ a wʋbʋŋa kʋ pa a yi zʋ wǝǝnu zanzan.
Cullu nan na tǝrǝ, lwarɩm bá ta jɩgɩ dam.
A dɛɛn ya ta na yǝri Wɛ cullu tɩm tɩn, a ŋwɩ mʋ a ya ba liǝ.
A laan nan na tu a lwarɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm na brɩ kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ pɛ lwarɩm jɩgɩ dam a baŋa nɩ, yɩ a nyɩ nɩ a tɩgɩ mʋ te.
Wɛ cullu tɩlʋ ya na maŋɩ sɩ tɩ pa nɔɔna ŋwɩa tɩn laan pɛ tʋʋnɩ mʋ ja-nɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, a na ni cullu tɩm tɩn mʋ pɛ lwarɩm laan na cwǝŋǝ dɩ ganɩ-nɩ, yɩ dɩ tɔgɩ cullu tɩm ŋwaanɩ dɩ pa tʋʋnɩ ja-nɩ.
Kʋntʋ nan brɩ nɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm ba jɩgɩ lwarɩm mʋ.
Ni dɩlʋ maama Wɛ na pɛ dɩbam tɩn ba jɩgɩ lwarɩm.
Dɩ yɩ lanyɩranɩ mʋ yɩ dɩ jɩgɩ cɩga.
Kʋntʋ nan brɩ nɩ Wɛ cullu tɩlʋ na lana tɩn mʋ jaanɩ a tʋʋnɩ dɩm dɩ ba na?
Awo.
Kʋ yɩ lwarɩm mʋ dɛ Wɛ cullu tɩm dɩ pa tʋʋnɩ ja-nɩ.
Kʋntʋ kɩ sɩ nɔɔna mʋ wanɩ ba lwarɩ lwarɩm na sɩɩnɩ dɩ yɩ te tɩn.
Cullu tɩm ma pa lwarɩm tiini dɩ puli dɩ brɩ dɩ na yɩ balɔrɔ te tɩn.
Lwarɩm dam na tʋŋɩ nabiinǝ wʋnɩ te tɩn Dɩ́ ye nɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm tɔgɩ DƖ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn mʋ.
Amʋ nan yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nabiinu mʋ, yɩ a yɩ lwarɩm gambaa.
A nan yǝri woŋo kʋlʋ a na kɩ tɩn kuri.
Amʋ yǝni a ba kɩ kʋlʋ a na lagɩ tɩn, yɩ a laan daarɩ a kɩ kʋlʋ a na culi tɩn.
A na yǝni a kɩ kʋlʋ a na ba lagɩ sɩ a kɩ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ a sɛ nɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm yɩ cɩga mʋ.
Kʋntʋ, kʋ daɩ nɩ a tɩtɩ mʋ paalɩ a kɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ, kʋ nan yɩ lwarɩm dɩlʋ na wʋ a wʋnɩ tɩn mʋ pa a kɩa.
A nan ye nɩ lanyɩranɩ tǝri a wʋnɩ, dɩ a na yɩ nabiinu yɩ a fra zʋʋrɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩn.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, a na yǝni a jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ a kɩ lanyɩranɩ, a ta warɩ lanyɩranɩ wʋm a kɩ.
A yǝni a ba kɩ lanyɩranɩ nɩ a wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn, yɩ a laan daarɩ a kɩ wo-balwaarʋ tɩlʋ a na ba lagɩ sɩ a kɩ tɩn.
A na yǝni a kɩ kʋlʋ a wʋbʋŋa na ba lagɩ sɩ a kɩ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ kʋ daɩ a tɩtɩ mʋ paalɩ a kɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ, kʋ yɩ lwarɩm dɩlʋ na wʋ a wʋnɩ tɩn mʋ paɩ a kɩa.
A nan lwarɩ kʋ na yǝni kʋ kɩ amʋ te tɩn: A na yǝni a bʋŋɩ sɩ a kɩ kʋlʋ na lana tɩn, kʋ yɩ lwarɩm yɩranɩ mʋ aá kɩ.
A tiini a jɩgɩ wʋpolo a bɩcarɩ nɩ dɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm.
A nan ye nɩ dam dɩdoŋ mʋ wʋ amʋ wʋnɩ, kʋ na lagɩ sɩ kʋ pa a taa tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ kalʋ na ba lana tɩn.
Dam dɩm kʋntʋ maa lagɩ sɩ dɩ cɔgɩ a wʋbʋŋa yam na lagɩ sɩ ya da cwǝ-ŋʋŋa kalʋ tɩn.
Kʋntʋ maa pɩɩnɩ amʋ, yɩ lwarɩm dɩlʋ na wʋ a wʋnɩ tɩn paɩ a ta tɔgɩ lwarɩm cwǝŋǝ.
Lɛɛrʋ maa jɩgɩ-nɩ, lwarɩm dɩlʋ na wʋ a wʋnɩ tɩn na lagɩ sɩ dɩ pa tʋʋnɩ ja-nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɔɔ mʋ wʋ́ wanɩ o vrɩ-nɩ o yagɩ?
Amʋ kɩ Wɛ le dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ.
Wʋntʋ mʋ wʋ́ joŋi-nɩ.
Kʋ na yɩ a wʋbʋŋa yam wʋnɩ, a sɛ Wɛ cullu tɩm mʋ.
A nan na yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nabiinu tɩn mʋ paɩ a tɔgɩ lwarɩm cwǝŋǝ.
Wɛ Joro kʋm na paɩ dɩ́ ŋwɩ dɩ Wɛ te tɩn Kʋntʋ tɩn, balʋ na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn, Wɛ daa bá di ba taanɩ sɩ DƖ cɔgɩ-ba.
Wɛ Jorokʋm mʋ paɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ Joro kʋm dam dɩm mʋ pɛ dɩ́ na vrɩm lwarɩm dɩ tʋʋnɩ jɩŋa nɩ.
Dɩbam na yɩ nabiinǝ yɩ dɩ́ bwǝnǝ tɩn mʋ paɩ dɩ́ warɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm dɩ́ da.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ dɩ́ daa bá wanɩ dɩ́ na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ DƖ cullu tɩm tɔgɩm ŋwaanɩ.
Woŋo kʋlʋ cullu tɩm na wʋ wanɩ tɩ kɩ tɩn, Wɛ mʋ kɩa, dɩ DƖ na tʋŋɩ DƖ tɩtɩ Bu sɩ o ba o ji nabiinu, yɩ o nyɩ dɩ nabiinǝ balʋ lwarɩm na waɩ-ba tɩn.
O ma ba o tɩ nabiinǝ lwarɩm ŋwaanɩ, sɩ o ma cɔgɩ lwarɩm na jɩgɩ dam dɩlʋ nabiinǝ baŋa nɩ tɩn.
Wɛ kɩ kʋntʋ sɩ kʋ pa dɩ́ na cɩga mʋ DƖ tee nɩ, sɩ dɩ́ na cwǝŋǝ dɩ́ kɩ kʋlʋ maama Wɛ cullu tɩm na brɩ nɩ kʋ maŋɩ tɩn.
Bɛŋwaanɩ dɩbam yɩ balʋ na tɔgɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm cwǝŋǝ tɩn mʋ, sɩ dɩ́ daa ba tɔgɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ nabiinǝ fra na zʋʋrɩ tɩn.
Balʋ nan na tɔgɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩm kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn tiini ba kwe ba wʋbʋŋa ba tiŋi wǝǝnu tɩlʋ nabiinǝ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ tɩn baŋa nɩ mʋ.
Kʋ daarɩ balʋ na tɔgɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm cwǝŋǝ kam tɩn kwe ba wʋbʋŋa ba tiŋi wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ Wɛ Joro kʋm wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ tɩn baŋa nɩ mʋ.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋbʋŋa na tɔgɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ nabiinǝ fra na zʋʋrɩ tɩn, tʋʋnɩ wʋ́ ja kʋntʋ tu.
Wʋlʋ wʋbʋŋa nan na tɔgɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm cwǝŋǝ kam tɩn wʋ́ na ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ dɩ wʋ-zuru.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, nɔɔnʋ na tɔgɩ nabiinǝ wʋbʋŋ-yɔɔrʋ tɩm, o yɩ Wɛ dʋm mʋ, o ba kɩ kʋlʋ Wɛ niǝ yam na brɩ tɩn, o nan warɩ-ya dɩ o sɛ.
Balʋ maama na tɔgɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ nabiinǝ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ tɩn bá wanɩ ba pa Wɛ wʋ poli.
Abam nan ba tɔgɩ nabiinǝ wʋbʋŋ-yɔɔrʋ na lagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn.
Á tɔgɩ Wɛ Jorokʋm na lagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ, kʋ na wʋ á bɩcarɩ nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Zezi Krisi Joro kʋm nan na tǝri nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ bɩcarɩ nɩ tɩn, o daɩ Zezi nɔɔnʋ.
Zezi Krisi na wʋ á bɩcara nɩ tɩn, o Joro kʋm mʋ paɩ á ŋwɩ dɩ Wɛ, á na nɛ cɩga DƖ tee nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Á yɩra yam nan maŋɩ sɩ ya tɩ mʋ lwarɩm dɩm ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ mʋ bi Zezi DƖ pa o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, DƖ Joro kʋm na sɩɩnɩ kʋ wʋ á bɩcara nɩ, Wɛ wʋ́ pa abam yɩra yalʋ na maŋɩ sɩ ya tɩ tɩn joori ya na ŋwɩa, DƖ Joro kʋm na wʋ á bɩcara nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋntʋ, a ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá ŋwɩ nɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm na lagɩ te tɩn mʋ, sɩ kʋ daɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá tɔgɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ nabiinǝ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ tɩn.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, á na tɔgɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ nabiinǝ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ tɩn, tʋʋnɩ wʋ́ ja abam.
Kʋ daarɩ, á nan na tɔgɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm dam ŋwaanɩ á cɩ á tɩtɩ dɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩlʋ á fra na zʋʋrɩ tɩn, á wʋ́ na ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ.
Balʋ maama na paɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm brɩ-ba cwǝŋǝ tɩn yɩ Wɛ biǝ mʋ.
Joro kʋlʋ Wɛ na kɩ á bɩcara nɩ tɩn ba paɩ fʋʋnɩ jɩgɩ abam daga nɩ gambɛ te.
Wɛ Joro kʋm nan paɩ á yɩ Wɛ biǝ mʋ.
Kʋ maa paɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ dɩ́ bǝŋi Wɛ nɩ Dɩ́ Ko Baba.
Wɛ Joro kʋm mʋ paɩ dɩbam jwǝǝru tɩm lwarɩ nɩ dɩ́ sɩɩnɩ dɩ́ yɩ Wɛ biǝ mʋ.
Dɩ́ na yɩ Wɛ biǝ tɩn, dɩ́ wʋ́ ba dɩ́ na wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ maama DƖ na tiŋi sɩ DƖ pa DƖ biǝ bam tɩn.
Dɩ́ wʋ́ tɔgɩ dɩ DƖ Bu Zezi Krisi dɩ́ joŋi kʋlʋ maama Wɛ na tiŋi sɩ DƖ pa-o tɩn.
Dɩ́ na tɔgɩ dɩ Zezi dɩ́ na yaara, dɩ́ laan wʋ́ ba dɩ́ tɔgɩ dɩd-o dɩ́ na paarɩ zulǝ.
Dɩ́ jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ dɩ́ wʋ́ na paarɩ-zulǝ Wɛ tee nɩ Amʋ ye nɩ dɩ́ na jɩgɩ yaara yalʋ lele tɩn bá wanɩ ya taa maɩ dɩ paarɩ-zulǝ yalʋ dɩ́ na wʋ́ na Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn.
Wɛ na kɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama tɩn tiini tɩ lagɩ sɩ tɩ na dɛ dɩm Wɛ na wʋ́ ba DƖ brɩ DƖ biǝ bam paarɩ-zulǝ jaja tɩn.
Wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama Wɛ na kɩ tɩn tu tɩ daa ba jɩgɩ kuri.
Kʋ nan daɩ wǝǝnu tɩm tɩtɩ mʋ lagɩ kʋntʋ.
Kʋ yɩ Wɛ mʋ pɛ tɩ ji kafɛ, yɩ DƖ nan paɩ tɩ ta jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ, wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama DƖ na kɩ tɩn wʋ́ ba tɩ na vrɩm, sɩ tɩ daa yɩ cɔgɩ nɩ tɩ zɩm na yǝni tɩ cɔgɩ te tɩn.
Wɛ wʋ́ fɔgɩ DƖ kwɛ-tɩ sɩ tɩ laan ba tɩ taa jɩgɩ lam DƖ tee nɩ, sɩ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ DƖ biǝ bam na wʋ́ na paarɩ-zulǝ yalʋ tɩn.
Dɩ́ nan ye nɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama Wɛ na kɩ tɩn jɩgɩ cam mʋ dɩ zɩm maama, nɩ kaanɩ na vri pugǝ yɩ o kʋnɩ te tɩn.
Kʋ nan daɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ yɩranɩ, kʋ yɩ dɩ dɩbam balʋ Wɛ na kɩ DƖ Jorokʋm dɩ́ bɩcara nɩ tɩn dɩ mʋ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ Wɛ dayigǝ pɛɛrɩ dɩlʋ na brɩ nɩ dɩ́ wʋ́ ba dɩ́ na DƖ wo-laarʋ tɩm maama.
Dɩbam dɩ nan kʋnɩ mʋ, yɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ tɩɩna dɩ́ cǝgi maŋa kam Wɛ na wʋ́ pa dɩ́ ji DƖ tɩtɩ sɔŋɔ biǝ, sɩ DƖ vrɩ dɩ́ yɩra yam yaara maama wʋnɩ.
Wɛ na vrɩ dɩbam tɩn mʋ paɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ dɩ́ wʋ́ na kʋlʋ DƖ na wʋ́ pa dɩbam tɩn.
Dɩ́ ya na maŋɩ dɩ́ na kʋlʋ dɩ́ na jɩgɩ tɩɩna kʋ ŋwaanɩ tɩn, dɩ́ ya daa bá ta jɩgɩ kʋ tɩɩna.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ ba ta tɩɩnɩ kʋlʋ o na maŋɩ o na tɩn.
Dɩ́ nan ta jɩgɩ tɩɩna sɩ dɩ́ wʋ́ na Wɛ wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ dɩ́ ta na wʋ nɛ tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ zuri dɩ́ yɩra dɩ́ cǝgi tɩ maŋa kam.
Wɛ Joro kʋm dɩ nan wǝli dɩbam, dɩ́ na bwǝnǝ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩbam yǝri dɩ́ na wʋ́ loori Wɛ te sɩ kʋ maŋɩ tɩn.
DƖ Joro kʋm nan loori-DƖ kʋ pa dɩbam dɩ ŋwana yalʋ na bá wanɩ ya ta dɩ nabiinǝ bɩtarɩ tɩn.
Wɛ nan ye dɩ́ bɩcara na yɩ te tɩn, yɩ DƖ kwǝri DƖ ye DƖ Joro kʋm dɩ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm tɔgɩ Wɛ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn mʋ, yɩ kʋ loori Wɛ kʋ pa dɩbam balʋ na yɩ DƖ nɔɔna tɩn.
Dɩ́ ye nɩ balʋ na soe Wɛ yɩ DƖ bǝŋi-ba nɩ DƖ na maŋɩ DƖ lɩ wʋbʋŋa te tɩn, DƖ kɩ-ba lanyɩranɩ woŋo maama wʋnɩ.
Wɛ dɛɛn maŋɩ DƖ jɩgɩ bantʋ wʋbʋŋa DƖ bɩcarɩ nɩ faŋa faŋa mʋ, yɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ kuri-ba sɩ ba laan ba ba taa nyɩ nɩ DƖ Bu wʋm na yɩ te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ma wʋ́ pa Wɛ Bu Zezi na nyaana zanzan, balʋ dɩ na yɩ Wɛ biǝ yɩ ba saŋɩ o kwaga tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ nan na maŋɩ DƖ kuri balʋ tɩn mʋ DƖ bǝŋi sɩ ba taa yɩ DƖ nɔɔna.
DƖ na bǝŋi-ba kʋntʋ tɩn, DƖ ma pa ba na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ.
Balʋ DƖ na pɛ ba na cɩga kam tɩn mʋ DƖ pɛ ba na paarɩ-zulǝ DƖ tee nɩ.
Wɛ sono kʋm na tiini kʋ dagɩ te tɩn Kʋ na yɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, dɩ́ wʋ́ ta nɩ bɛɛ mʋ?
Wɛ na wʋra dɩ dɩbam tɩn, nɔɔnʋ wɔɔ mʋ wʋ́ wanɩ o cɔgɩ dɩbam?
Wɛ nan wʋ vɩn sɩ DƖ tɩtɩ Bu wʋm na yaara, yɩ DƖ sɛ DƖ kɩ-o nabiinǝ jɩŋa nɩ sɩ o tɩ dɩbam maama ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ na pɛ dɩbam DƖ Bu wʋm kʋntʋ tɩn, DƖ ta wʋ́ kwe wo-laarʋ maama DƖ pa dɩbam zaanɩ DƖ wǝli da.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ bá wanɩ o co dɩbam balʋ Wɛ na kuri tɩn DƖ yigǝ nɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ yɩ Wɛ tɩtɩ mʋ pɛ dɩ́ na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ bá wanɩ o pa dɩ́ ga bʋra Wɛ tee nɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩtɩ mʋ tɩgɩ dɩbam ŋwaanɩ, yɩ o joori o bi o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ o jɩgɩ ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ.
O laan maa je Wɛ jazɩm nɩ yɩ o loori Wɛ o pa dɩbam.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ bá wanɩ o cɔgɩ dɩbam dɩ Zezi Krisi sono kʋm daanɩ.
Yaara mʋ wʋ́ wanɩ ya cɔgɩ dɩbam dɩ Zezi Krisi sono kʋm na?
Wʋ-cɔgɔ mʋ naa, bɛɛsa mʋ naa, kana mʋ naa, yinigǝ mʋ naa, cam dɩlʋ na wʋ́ ba tɩn mʋ naa, naa tʋʋnɩ mʋ?
Awo, tɩ bá wanɩ tɩ cɔgɩ dɩbam dɩ Zezi Krisi sono kʋm daanɩ.
Kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Dɩbam na yɩ nmʋ Wɛ nɔɔna tɩn mʋ paɩ dɩ́ tɔgɩ tʋʋnɩ wʋ dɩ́ kɛ dɛ maama.
Ba kwe dɩbam ba ma ji nɩ peeni sɩlʋ ba na jɩgɩ ba ve ba gʋ te tɩn mʋ.» Wɛ nan na soe dɩbam tɩn, DƖ tiini DƖ paɩ dɩbam wɔnɔ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ maama wʋnɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ amʋ ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ tǝrǝ kʋ na wʋ́ wanɩ kʋ cɔgɩ dɩbam dɩ Wɛ sono kʋm daanɩ.
Kʋ na yɩ tʋʋnɩ naa ŋwɩa, naa kʋ na yɩ malɛsɩ naa wɛyuu tɩlampolo dɩdɛɛra bam maama, naa kʋ na yɩ zɩm wǝǝnu naa jwa wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na bɩɩnɩ tɩn, naa wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama na jɩgɩ dam nabiinǝ baŋa nɩ tɩn, kʋ na yɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na jɩgɩ dam wɛyuu tɩlampolo nɩ dɩ tɩlʋ na jɩgɩ dam tɩga kuri nɩ tɩn, naa wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama Wɛ na kɩ tɩn, tɩntʋ maama wʋnɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ bá wanɩ kʋ cɔgɩ dɩbam dɩ Wɛ sono kʋm daanɩ, bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ yɩ sono kʋlʋ Wɛ na jɩgɩ dɩ dɩbam dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ tɩn mʋ.
Wɛ na kuri balʋ sɩ ba taa yɩ DƖ nɔɔna tɩn Amʋ na yɩ Zezi Krisi nɔɔnʋ tɩn, a ŋɔɔnɩ cɩga mʋ sɩ kʋ daɩ vwan.
Wɛ Jorokʋm na wʋ a bɩcarɩ nɩ tɩn mʋ paɩ a ye nɩ kʋ sɩɩnɩ kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ, dɩ a na brɩ nɩ a wʋ tiini kʋ cɔgɩ yɩ a jɩgɩ liǝ maŋa maama amʋ tɩtɩ dwi tiinǝ bam ŋwaanɩ dɩ ba na wʋ sɛ Zezi Krisi tɩn.
A ya wʋ́ ta lagɩ sɩ Wɛ cɔgɩ amʋ tɩtɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ pɔɔrɩ-nɩ Zezi Krisi tee nɩ, dɩ kʋ na wʋ́ wanɩ kʋ pa a ko-biǝ Zwifǝ bam na vrɩm.
Ba yɩ Yisɩrayɛlɩdwi tiinǝ mʋ.
Kʋ yɩ bantʋ mʋ Wɛ dɛɛn pɛ ba ji DƖ biǝ, yɩ DƖ pa-ba DƖ paarɩ-zulǝ yam.
DƖ ma go ni nɩ DƖ wʋ́ ta wʋra dɩ ba, yɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ kɩ DƖ cullu tɩm ba jɩŋa nɩ.
DƖ ma brɩ-ba ba na maŋɩ sɩ ba taa zuli-DƖ te tɩn.
DƖ ma daarɩ DƖ go niǝ dɩ ba.
Ba dwi dɩm kuri nuŋi dɩbam nabaarʋ Abrahamdwi dɩm wʋnɩ mʋ.
Ba na lʋgɩ Zezi Krisi lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ tɩn, kʋ yɩ bantʋ dwi dɩm wʋnɩ mʋ ba lʋg-o.
Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ wǝǝnu maama Tu.
O maa yɩ Wɛ yɩ o maŋɩ dɩ zulǝ sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.
Amina.
A nan ba lagɩ a ta nɩ Wɛ na goni DƖ ni sɩ DƖ kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn jigi kafɛ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ daɩ nɩ Yisɩrayɛlɩ dwi tiinǝ bam maama mʋ sɩɩnɩ ba yɩ Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ cɩga cɩga Wɛ yigǝ nɩ.
Abraham dwi tiinǝ bam maama nan daɩ o biǝ cɩga cɩga Wɛ yigǝ nɩ.
Wɛ dɛɛn tagɩ dɩ Abraham DƖ wɩ: «Nmʋ bu Yizakɩ dwi dɩm yɩranɩ mʋ wʋ́ ta yɩ n dwi tiinǝ cɩga cɩga.» Kʋ brɩ nɩ Wɛ tee nɩ, kʋ daɩ biǝ balʋ maama Abraham na lʋgɩ tɩn mʋ yɩ Wɛ biǝ cɩga cɩga.
Kʋ nan yɩ biǝ balʋ Wɛ na goni ni ba ŋwaanɩ tɩn mʋ sɩɩnɩ ba yɩ DƖ biǝ cɩga cɩga.
Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ dɛɛn goni ni DƖ wɩ: «Maŋa kam kʋntʋ na joori ka yi, amʋ wʋ́ joori a ba dɩ Saralʋgɩ bǝkǝrǝ.» Kʋ dɛ kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ dɩbam nabaarʋ Yizakɩ kaanɩ Rabɛka dɛɛn ja pugǝ o lʋ yiywa bale.
-Maŋa kam Rabɛka ta na wʋ lʋgɩ o biǝ bale bam yɩ ba daa ta yǝri lanyɩranɩ naa balɔrɔ tɩn, Wɛ dɛɛn tagɩ dɩd-o DƖ wɩ: «Nakwɩ wʋm mʋ wʋ́ ta yɩ o nyaanɩ wʋm tɩntʋŋnʋ.» Kʋ kɩ kʋntʋ sɩ Wɛ na kuri-ba daanɩ te tɩn mʋ tɔgɩ DƖ na maŋɩ DƖ lɩ wʋbʋŋa te tɩn.
Kʋ brɩ nɩ Wɛ kurim dɩm tɔgɩ DƖ na bǝŋi wʋlʋ sɩ o taa yɩ DƖ nɔɔnʋ tɩn mʋ, sɩ kʋ daɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋm tɩtʋŋa ŋwaanɩ, nɩ kʋ daa ta na pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Amʋ soe Zakɔbɩ, yɩ a daarɩ a yagɩ Ezayu.» Dɩ́ nan wʋ́ ta nɩ bɛɛ mʋ?
Dɩ́ bá wanɩ dɩ́ ta nɩ Wɛ ba jɩgɩ cɩga dɩ DƖ na kɩ te tɩn.
Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ dɛɛn tagɩ dɩ Moyisi DƖ wɩ: «Amʋ wʋ́ ja nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ ŋwaŋa a na lagɩ tɩn mʋ, yɩ a daarɩ a duri nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ yibwǝnǝ a na lagɩ tɩn.» Kʋntʋ brɩ nɩ kʋ maama tɔgɩ Wɛ na jɩgɩ nɔɔna ŋwaŋa te tɩn mʋ, sɩ kʋ daɩ nabiinǝ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn naa ba tɩtʋŋa na yɩ te tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ, nɩ Wɛ dɛɛn tagɩ dɩ Ezipipa-farʋ wʋm DƖ wɩ: «Amʋ pɛ n di paarɩ sɩ a wanɩ a tɔgɩ nmʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ a brɩ nɔɔna amʋ dam dɩm na maɩ te tɩn, sɩ kʋ pa nɔɔna taa zǝŋi amʋ yɩrɩ dɩm lʋgʋ baŋa maama nɩ.» Kʋ brɩ nɩ Wɛ duri balʋ ŋwaŋa DƖ na lagɩ tɩn mʋ, yɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ pa badonnǝ ta kʋ ba wʋrʋ nɩ DƖ na lagɩ te tɩn.
Wɛ jɩgɩ ni sɩ DƖ kɩ DƖ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn Abam wʋ dɩdʋa waɩ o bwe amʋ nɩ: «Kʋ na yɩ kʋntʋ, bɛɛ mʋ yɩ Wɛ nan brɩ nɩ nɔɔna kɩ ba cɔgɩ?
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ nan bá wanɩ o vɩn kʋlʋ Wɛ na lagɩ sɩ o kɩ tɩn.» Nabiinu yɩ wɔɔ mʋ sɩ o wanɩ o magɩ kantɔgɔ dɩ Wɛ?
Kʋntʋ tɩn, kamɔgɔ wʋ́ wanɩ kʋ bwe kʋ mɔrʋ wʋm nɩ: «Bɛɛ mʋ yɩ n mɔ-nɩ tɩntʋ doŋ» na?
Bɛŋwaanɩ kamɔ-mɔrʋ wʋm jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ o kwe dɔgɔ o ma mɔ kamwarʋ tɩlʋ dwi maama o na lagɩ tɩn.
O waɩ o cɛ dɔgɔ kʋm kʋntʋ o maa mɔɔnɩ kamɔgɔ sɩ kʋ taa yɩ lʋnnɩ nyɩm, yɩ o daarɩ o mɔɔnɩ kʋdoŋ sɩ kʋ taa yɩ tɩtʋŋa nyɩm.
Kʋ nan yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ dɩ Wɛ.
DƖ na lagɩ sɩ DƖ brɩ nɔɔna DƖ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋm dɩ DƖ dam dɩm na maɩ te tɩn, DƖ jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ DƖ kɩ kʋntʋ.
DƖ nan pɩɩnɩ DƖ banɩ mʋ dɩ balʋ na pɛ DƖ banɩ zaŋɩ yɩ ba maŋɩ dɩ cɔgɩm tɩn, sɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ pa nɔɔna balʋ DƖ na jɩgɩ ba ŋwaŋa tɩn tɔgɩ ba na DƖ paarɩ dɩm na tiini dɩ jɩgɩ zulǝ te tɩn.
Bantʋ mʋ yɩ balʋ DƖ na maŋɩ DƖ lɩ sɩ ba zʋ DƖ paarɩ zulǝ yam wʋnɩ tɩn.
Kʋ nan yɩ dɩbam mʋ kʋntʋ.
Wɛ mʋ kuri dɩbam nabiinǝ dwi maama wʋnɩ, yɩ kʋ daɩ Zwifǝ dwi dɩm yɩranɩ má wʋnɩ, nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Oze tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ te tɩn.
Wɛ dɛɛn tagɩ DƖ wɩ: «Nɔɔna balʋ ya na daɩ amʋ nɔɔna tɩn, mʋ a laan wʋ́ bǝŋi-ba nɩ amʋ nɔɔna.
Dwi tiinǝ balʋ amʋ ya na ba soe tɩn, mʋ a laan wʋ́ bǝŋi-ba nɩ amʋ nɔn-sonnu.» «Je sɩlʋ nɩ nɔ́ɔ Wɛ ya na tagɩ dɩ ba DƖ wɩ, ba daɩ DƖ nɔɔna tɩn, kʋ yɩ dáanɩ mʋ ba laan wʋ́ bǝŋi-ba nɩ Ŋwɩa Tu Baŋa-Wɛ biǝ.» Ezayidɩ dɛɛn tagɩ Yisɩrayɛlɩtiinǝ bam taanɩ o wɩ: «Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam na maŋɩ ba tiini ba daga nɩ bugǝ ni kasʋllʋ na daga te tɩn, ba fɩnfɩɩn yɩranɩ mʋ wʋ́ na vrɩm.
Bɛŋwaanɩ Yuutu Baŋa-Wɛ bá daanɩ sɩ DƖ kɩ kʋlʋ maama DƖ na maŋɩ DƖ lɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ DƖ kɩ tɩn lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ.» Kʋ ta yɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ Ezayi na maŋɩ o ta te o wɩ: «Dam-fɔrɔ Tu Baŋa-Wɛ ya na wʋ daarɩ dɩbam biǝ badaara DƖ yagɩ, sɩ kʋ pa dɩ́ dwi dɩm toŋi, dɩ́ ya wʋ́ ti mʋ, nɩ Sodɔmdɩ Gomɔɔrɩ tiinǝ bam dwi dɩm dɛɛn na ti te tɩn.» Dɩ́ nan wʋ́ ta nɩ bɛɛ mʋ?
Dwi-gɛtiinǝ balʋ ya na ba kwaanɩ sɩ ba na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn laan mʋ tu ba na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ, ba na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ, Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam na tiini ba kwaanɩ sɩ ba na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ DƖ cullu tɩm tɔgɩm ŋwaanɩ tɩn, ba wʋ nɛ.
Bɛɛ mʋ yɩ ba nan wʋ nɛ cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ?
Bantʋ ya bʋŋɩ sɩ ba na cɩga ba kǝm-laarʋ tɩm ŋwaanɩ mʋ, yɩ kʋ daɩ nɩ ba kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ.
Ba na vɩn sɩ ba sɛ Wɛ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ maa nyɩ dɩ ba magɩ ba naga mʋ dɩ kandwɛ dɩlʋ na paɩ nɔɔna tri ba tʋɩ tɩn, nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Nii-na, amʋ Wɛ lagɩ a cwi kandwɛ mʋ Siyɔnnɩ.
Dɩ maa yɩ kandwɛ dɩlʋ nɔɔna na wʋ́ magɩ ba tɩtɩ dɩ dɩ ba tʋ tɩga nɩ tɩn.
Kʋ daarɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ wʋlʋ na yɩ kandwɛ dɩm kʋntʋ tɩn, cavɩɩra bá fɔgɩ ya ja kʋntʋ tu.»
A ko-biǝ-ba, amʋ tiini a laga sɩ Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam na vrɩm, yɩ a yǝni a loori Wɛ a pa-ba kʋ ŋwaanɩ.
Amʋ wʋ́ wanɩ a pa cɩga nɩ ba tiini ba lagɩ sɩ ba tʋŋɩ ba pa Wɛ, ba nan yǝri cwǝŋǝ kalʋ ba na maŋɩ sɩ ba tɔgɩ tɩn mʋ.
Ba maa yǝri cwǝŋǝ kalʋ Wɛ na pɛ sɩ nabiinǝ tɔgɩ da ba ma na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ tɩn.
Ba maa tiŋi ba tɩtɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba maa na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ, yɩ ba ba sɛ sɩ ba taa tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ kalʋ Wɛ na tiŋi tɩn.
Zezi Krisi mʋ pɛ Wɛ cullu tɩm tɔgɩm cwǝŋǝ kam laan ba ka kweeli, kʋ ma pa balʋ maama na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩd-o tɩn laan na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ maama na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn wʋ́ na vrɩm Moyisi dɛɛn pʋpʋnɩ nɔɔnʋ na wʋ́ kɩ te sɩ o ma na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ DƖ cullu tɩm tɔgɩm ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
O pʋpʋnɩ o wɩ: «Wʋlʋ na kɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm na wɩ te tɩn wʋ́ na ŋwɩa kʋ ŋwaanɩ.» Kʋ nan daa na yɩ nɔɔnʋ na wʋ́ kɩ te sɩ o ma na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ o na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ tɩn ŋwaanɩ, kʋ pʋpʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Yɩ zaŋɩ n bwe n tɩtɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ, wɔɔ mʋ wʋ́ wanɩ o di Wɛ-sɔŋɔ?» Kʋ lagɩ kʋ ta nɩ, sɩ o pa Zezi Krisi tu o ba o zǝni dɩbam.
«Nan yɩ bwe n tɩtɩ nɩ, wɔɔ mʋ wʋ́ wanɩ o tu curu?» Kʋ lagɩ kʋ ta nɩ, sɩ o pa Zezi bi o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ sɩ o joori o ba.
Kʋ nan maŋɩ kʋ pʋpʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Wɛ taanɩ dɩm daɩ yigǝ yigǝ dɩ nmʋ, dɩ wʋ nmʋ ni nɩ dɩ n bɩcarɩ nɩ.» Kwǝrǝ kam kʋntʋ mʋ dɩbam tɔɔlɩ dɩ́ brɩ nɔɔna sɩ ba kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi.
Kʋ tagɩ kʋ wɩ, nmʋ na tagɩ dɩ n ni nɩ Zezi mʋ yɩ woŋo maama Yuutu, yɩ nmʋ na sɛ n bɩcarɩ nɩ, sɩ Wɛ sɩɩnɩ DƖ bi-o DƖ pa o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ, Wɛ wʋ́ vrɩ-m. Bɛŋwaanɩ, kʋ yɩ nmʋ bɩcarɩ nɩ mʋ nń sɛ dɩ n wʋ-dɩdʋa yɩ n na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ, yɩ nmʋ wʋ́ ma n ni mʋ n ta jaja nɩ Zezi mʋ yɩ Yuutu, sɩ n ma n na vrɩm.
Kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Wʋlʋ maama na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩd-o tɩn, cavɩɩra bá ja kʋntʋ tu.» Kʋntʋ, kʋ yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ dɩ nɔɔna maama, kʋ na yɩ Zwifǝ dɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam dɩ.
Ba maama Yuutu yɩ dɩdʋa mʋ, yɩ wʋntʋ mʋ yǝni o paɩ balʋ maama na loor-o tɩn zǝnǝ zanzan.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, «wʋlʋ maama na loori zǝnǝ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ tɩn wʋ́ na vrɩm.» Kʋ nan na yɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, nɔɔna wʋ́ kɩ ta mʋ ba loori zǝnǝ o tee nɩ, yɩ ba wʋ kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩd-o?
Ba nan wʋ́ kɩ ta mʋ ba kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩd-o, yɩ ba wʋ ni o kwǝrǝ?
Ba nan wʋ́ kɩ ta mʋ ba ni o kwǝrǝ yɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ wʋ tɔɔlɩ-ka o brɩ-ba?
Nɔɔnʋ nan wʋ́ kɩ ta mʋ o vu o tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam o brɩ-ba dɩ ba na wʋ tʋŋ-o?
Kʋ nan pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Balʋ na beeri ba tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam ba brɩ nɔɔna tɩn vǝŋǝ jɩgɩ wʋpolo mʋ.» Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ nɔɔna maama mʋ sɛ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam.
Ezayidɛɛn tagɩ o wɩ: «Yuutu Baŋa-Wɛ, wɔɔ mʋ joŋi dɩbam ni-taanɩ dɩm?» Kʋntʋ ma brɩ nɩ nɔɔna zwa na ni kʋlʋ tɩn, mʋ ba kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ kʋ.
Taanɩ dɩlʋ ba nan na wʋ́ ni tɩn mʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝrǝ kam.
Amʋ lagɩ a bwe a nii, Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam wʋ ni Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam mʋ na?
Kʋ yɩ cɩga ba ni-ka, nɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm na tagɩ kʋ wɩ: «Ba tɔɔlɩ o kwǝrǝ kam lʋgʋ baŋa je maama, yɩ ba ni-taanɩ jagɩ dɩ yi je maama.» Amʋ ta lagɩ a bwe a nii, Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam sɩɩnɩ ba wʋ ni Wɛ taanɩ dɩm kuri mʋ na?
Ba niǝ.
Dayigǝ tɩn, Wɛ dɛɛn tɔgɩ Moyisiŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ ta dɩ ba DƖ wɩ: «Amʋ wʋ́ pa abam taá jɩgɩ wʋ-gʋʋ dɩ dwi tiinǝ balʋ na daɩ amʋ nɔɔna tɩn.
Amʋ wʋ́ pa abam bana zaŋɩ dɩ nɔɔna balʋ na yǝri kʋlʋkʋlʋ tɩn.» Kʋntʋ kwaga nɩ Ezayi dɛɛn nɛ baarɩ yɩ o ta o wɩ: «Nɔɔna balʋ ya na ba bʋŋɩ sɩ ba ba ba sɛ amʋ Wɛ tɩn, bantʋ laan mʋ tu ba sɛ amʋ.
Amʋ pɛ balʋ na maŋɩ ba wʋ bwe amʋ bwiǝ tɩn mʋ ba ba lwarɩ amʋ.» Kʋ nan na yɩ Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam, Wɛ tagɩ DƖ wɩ: «Dɛ maama wʋnɩ amʋ te a jɩa sɩ a ma joŋi abam, yɩ á vɩn sɩ á ba amʋ te.»
Wɛ wʋ yagɩ Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam Kʋntʋ tɩn, amʋ ta lagɩ a bwe a nii, Wɛ vɩn DƖ tɩtɩ nɔɔna Yisɩrayɛlɩtiinǝ bam mʋ na?
Aye!
Kʋ daɩ kʋntʋ.
Amʋ tɩtɩ dɩ yɩ Yisɩrayɛlɩ dwi tu mʋ.
A yɩ Abrahamnaa mʋ, yɩ a nuŋi Bɛnzamɛndwi dɩm wʋnɩ.
Wɛ wʋ vɩn DƖ nɔɔna balʋ DƖ na maŋɩ DƖ kuri pulim nɩ tɩn.
Abam nan maŋɩ á ye Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm na tagɩ Eli taanɩ te, dɩ o na warɩ Wɛ o ta Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam na kɩ te yɩ kʋ wʋ maŋɩ tɩn.
O dɛɛn warɩ Wɛ o wɩ: «Yuutu Baŋa-Wɛ, ba gʋ nmʋ nijoŋnǝ bam maama, yɩ ba daarɩ ba cɔgɩ nmʋ kaanɩm bimbinǝ yam.
Kʋ laan daarɩ amʋ yɩranɩ mʋ, yɩ ba kwaanɩ sɩ ba gʋ amʋ dɩ.» Wɛ nan lǝr-o DƖ wɩ bɛɛ mʋ?
DƖ dɛɛn wɩ: «Amʋ lɩ nɔɔna mʋrr-tɩrpɛ mʋ , sɩ ba taa yɩ amʋ tɩtɩ nɔɔna.
Bantʋ ta wʋ fɔgɩ ba kuni doonǝ ba zuli Baalɩ.» Kʋ nan ta yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ dɩ zɩm maama.
Nɔɔna fɩnfɩɩn ta mʋ daarɩ, Wɛ na tɔgɩ DƖ zaanɩ dɩm ŋwaanɩ DƖ kuri-ba tɩn.
Wɛ dɛ DƖ zaanɩ dɩm ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ kuri-ba, sɩ kʋ daɩ ba tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ ya na yɩ ba tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna ŋwaanɩ mʋ Wɛ kuri-ba, kʋ ya daa bá ta yɩ DƖ zaanɩ dɩm DƖ na pɛ-ba tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ brɩ nɩ Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam wʋ nɛ cɩga kalʋ ba na kwaanɩ sɩ ba na Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn.
Nɔɔna balʋ Wɛ na kuri tɩn nan mʋ nɛ-ka.
Balʋ na daarɩ tɩn bɩcarɩ digili.
Kʋ maa kɩ-ba nɩ kʋ na pʋpʋnɩ te Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Wɛ mʋ pɛ ba wʋbʋŋa tɩ, yɩ ba daa ba ni kʋlʋkʋlʋ kuri.
Dɩ zɩm maama, ba yiǝ ta ba naɩ, yɩ ba zwa dɩ kwarɩmɩ dɩ Wɛ cɩga kam.» Davididɩ dɛɛn tagɩ ba taanɩ o wɩ: «Wɛ wʋ́ pa ywǝǝni dɩlʋ ba na bʋŋɩ sɩ ba di tɩn pipiri dɩ ji woŋo kʋlʋ na wʋ́ ja-ba kʋ cɔgɩ, nɩ cɩkʋ na jaanɩ-ba te tɩn.
Kʋ maa wʋ́ pa Wɛ pa ba na cam yɩ ba tʋ tɩga nɩ.
Wɛ wʋ́ pa ba yiǝ dwe yɩ ba daa bá ta naɩ.
DƖ maa wʋ́ pa ba yɩra cɛ dɩ yaara taan, maŋa maama.» Amʋ ta lagɩ a bwe a nii, Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam na tri ba tʋ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ ba daa bá wanɩ ba zaŋɩ ba joori ba fɔgɩ dɩ Wɛ mʋ na?
Aye!
Bantʋ na vɩn Wɛ cɩga kam te tɩn mʋ pɛ dwi-gɛtiinǝ wanɩ ba na vrɩm Wɛ tee nɩ.
Wɛ kɩ kʋntʋ sɩ kʋ pa Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam mʋ taa jɩgɩ wʋ-gʋʋ dɩ ba.
Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam na kɩ ba cɔgɩ tɩn mʋ pɛ nabiinǝ maama wanɩ ba na zǝnǝ lanyɩranɩ Wɛ tee nɩ.
Bantʋ na gɛ kʋlʋ ba na maŋɩ sɩ ba na tɩn mʋ pɛ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ na cwǝŋǝ ba joŋi Wɛ zǝnǝ yam.
Kʋ brɩ nɩ Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ kɔgɔ kʋlʋ na wʋ́ ba tɔgɩ Wɛ tɩn na puli kʋ ti, kʋʋ́ pa nɔɔna na Wɛ zǝnǝ zanzan kʋ ja gaalɩ.
Wɛ na vrɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ te tɩn Kʋ yɩ dɩ abam dwi-gɛtiinǝ mʋ a lagɩ a ta taanɩ dɩntʋ.
Amʋ na yɩ Zezi tɩntʋŋnʋ sɩ a taa tɔɔlɩ o kwǝrǝ kam a brɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ tɩn, a brɩ nɩ kʋ tiini kʋ yɩ tɩtʋŋ-kamunu mʋ.
Amʋ kwaanɩ a tʋŋɩ sɩ kʋ pa wʋ-gʋʋ mʋ ja a donnǝ Yisɩrayɛlɩtiinǝ bam, sɩ kʋ wanɩ kʋ pa Wɛ vrɩ ba badonnǝ amʋ tɩtʋŋa yam ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ na yagɩ bantʋ tɩn, kʋ pɛ lʋgʋ baŋa dwi tiinǝ maama laan ba ba fɔgɩ dɩ Wɛ.
Kʋ daarɩ maŋa kalʋ Wɛ na wʋ́ joori DƖ joŋi-ba tɩn, kʋʋ́ ta nyɩ dɩ twa na joori ba na ŋwɩa te tɩn mʋ.
Dɩ́ ye nɩ, nmʋ na dɛ yigǝ n fɔ dɩpɛ n tiŋi Wɛ ŋwaanɩ, dɩlʋ maama na daarɩ tɩn daa ta yɩ Wɛ nyɩm mʋ.
Tiu kuri na yɩ Wɛ nyɩm, kʋ nɛ sɩm maama dɩ yɩ Wɛ nyɩm mʋ.
Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam nyɩ dɩ Olivitiu ba na jǝri gaarɩ wʋnɩ te tɩn mʋ.
Kʋ yɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ Wɛ mʋ goni tiu kʋm kʋntʋ nɛ sɩdaara DƖ yagɩ, yɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ kwe Olivi tiu kʋlʋ na wʋ gaa wʋnɩ tɩn nɛ DƖ toŋi DƖ gwaanɩ nɛ sɩdonnǝ sɩm wʋnɩ.
Abam balʋ na yɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ tɩn nyɩ dɩ nɛ sɩlʋ ba na toŋi tɩn mʋ.
Sɩ laan ma wǝri yɩ sɩ tɔgɩ sɩ naɩ tiu kʋm kugu kʋm nyʋa kam.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, nmʋ yɩ ta n gooni nɛ sɩlʋ ba na goni ba yagɩ tɩn.
Nmʋ na brɩ n tɩtɩ kʋntʋ, ta n ye sɩ kʋ daɩ nmʋ mʋ paɩ tiu kʋm kugu kʋm zɩga.
Kʋ yɩ kugu kʋm mʋ jɩgɩ nmʋ.
Nmʋ nan waɩ n tɛ nɩ: «Wɛ goni nɛ sɩm kʋntʋ DƖ yagɩ, kʋ daarɩ sɩ amʋ mʋ na jǝgǝ a toŋi tiu kʋm yɩra nɩ.» Kʋ sɩɩnɩ kʋ kɩ kʋntʋ mʋ.
Wɛ nan goni nɛ sɩm kʋntʋ DƖ yagɩ, ba na wʋ kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Nmʋ nan na wanɩ n toŋi tiu kʋm yɩra nɩ tɩn, kʋ yɩ n na kɩ n wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Nan yɩ zaŋɩ n ta n kɩ kamunni, za n ta n kwarɩ Wɛ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, Wɛ na wʋ sɛ sɩ DƖ yagɩ tiu kʋm tɩtɩ nɛ sɩm sɩ je nɩ tɩn, nmʋ dɩ na ba jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ, DƖ bá yagɩ-m da.
Kʋ maama nan brɩ Wɛ na kɩ nɔɔna lanyɩranɩ te, yɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ vaŋɩ nɔɔna zwa te tɩn mʋ.
Kʋ na yɩ balʋ na kɩ ba cɔgɩ tɩn, DƖ vaŋɩ ba zwa mʋ.
Kʋ daarɩ, nmʋ nan na wʋ yagɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam tɔgɩm, DƖ wʋ́ ta kɩ nmʋ lanyɩranɩ.
Nmʋ nan na yagɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam, DƖ laan wʋ́ go nmʋ dɩ DƖ yagɩ mʋ nɩ tiu naga te.
Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam nan na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa ba sɛ Wɛ, baá joori ba na ba jǝgǝ kam.
Wɛ wʋ́ wanɩ DƖ joori DƖ toŋi-ba da.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, nmʋ wʋlʋ na yɩ dwi-gɛ tu tɩn nyɩ dɩ naga kalʋ Wɛ na goni Olivi tiu kʋlʋ na wʋ gaa wʋnɩ tɩn yɩra nɩ mʋ.
DƖ ma pa nmʋ toŋi Olivi tiu kʋlʋ na wʋ gaarɩ wʋnɩ tɩn yɩra nɩ, yɩ kʋ daɩ nɩ nɔɔna na yǝni ba kɩ te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ kʋ bá ta cana dɩ Wɛ sɩ DƖ joori DƖ toŋi nɛ sɩlʋ DƖ ya na goni tɩn sɩ tɩtɩ kugu kʋm je nɩ.
Wɛ jɩgɩ nɔɔna maama ŋwaŋa sɩ DƖ vrɩ-ba A ko-biǝ-ba, amʋ lagɩ sɩ á lwarɩ Wɛ cɩga kalʋ dɛɛn na sǝgi tɩn mʋ.
Abam na sɩɩnɩ á lwarɩ kʋntʋ, á daa bá ta bʋŋɩ nɩ á yɩ swan tiinǝ.
Kʋ na yɩ te tɩn, lele kʋntʋ Yisɩrayɛlɩtiinǝ badaara wʋrʋ digili yɩ ba warɩ Wɛ cɩga kam kuri ba ni.
Kʋ nan wʋ́ ta yɩ kʋntʋ, sɩ kʋ vu kʋ yi maŋa kam dwi-gɛtiinǝ balʋ na sɛ Wɛ tɩn kɔgɔ kʋm na wʋ́ puli kʋ ti tɩn.
Kʋntʋ, Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ kɔgɔ kʋm maama laan wʋ́ na vrɩm, nɩ kʋ na pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Wʋlʋ na paɩ nɔɔna na vrɩm tɩn wʋ́ nuŋi Siyɔnnɩ o ba, yɩ oó pa Zakɔbɩdwi tiinǝ bam lwarɩm dɩm ti.
Amʋ Wɛ wʋ́ go ni dɩntʋ a pa-ba, nɩ amʋ wʋ́ saarɩ ba lwarɩm dɩm a yagɩ.» Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam na vɩn Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩn, ba jigi Wɛ dʋna mʋ, yɩ kʋntʋ laan pa abam dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam na vrɩm Wɛ tee nɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ, kʋ na yɩ Wɛ na kuri nɔɔna sɩ ba taa yɩ DƖ nɔɔna te tɩn laŋa nɩ, DƖ soe Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam, DƖ dɛɛn na goni ni dɩ ba nabaara bam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ nan ba kɩ a ya na maanɩ, dɩ DƖ na kuri nɔɔna yɩ DƖ kɩ-ba lanyɩranɩ te tɩn.
Abam dwi-gɛ tiinǝ dɛɛn ya vɩn Wɛ mʋ, yɩ á laan ba á lwarɩ DƖ yibwǝn-durǝ kam, Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam na vɩn Wɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Bantʋ dɩ laan tu ba vɩn Wɛ ni, yɩ abam na Wɛ yibwǝnǝ kam, sɩ kʋ wanɩ kʋ pa bantʋ dɩ laan ba ba lwarɩ DƖ yibwǝn-durǝ kam na yɩ te tɩn.
Wɛ nan pɛ nɔɔna maama nyɩ nɩ ba wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ mʋ te, ba na vɩn DƖ ni tɩn ŋwaanɩ, sɩ DƖ laan wanɩ DƖ duri ba maama yibwǝnǝ.
Maanɩ-na á nii Wɛ zaanɩ dɩm na tiini dɩ dagɩ te.
Wɛ wʋbʋŋa dɩ DƖ yǝno kʋm dɩ ma tiini kʋ lirǝ.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ bá wanɩ o lwarɩ DƖ na lɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ DƖ kɩ te tɩn, naa o lwarɩ cwe sɩlʋ DƖ na tɔgɩ tɩn, nɩ kʋ na pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ bá wanɩ o lwarɩ Baŋa-Wɛ wʋbʋŋa, naa o brɩ-DƖ DƖ na wʋ́ kɩ te tɩn.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ bá wanɩ o kwe o woŋo o jɩnɩ Wɛ.» Bɛŋwaanɩ wǝǝnu maama nuŋi Wɛ te mʋ, yɩ dɩntʋ mʋ nii tɩ maama baŋa nɩ, yɩ tɩ maama yɩ dɩntʋ nyɩm mʋ.
Wɛ maŋɩ dɩ zulǝ mʋ, sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.
Amina.
Wɛ nɔɔna na maŋɩ sɩ ba taa ŋwɩ te tɩn A ko-biǝ-ba, Wɛ na tiini DƖ jɩgɩ abam ŋwaŋa kʋntʋ tɩn, a loori abam sɩ á kwe á tɩtɩ á pa Wɛ nɩnɛɛnɩ ba na mɛ woŋo ba kɩ kaanɩm ba pa Wɛ tɩn, sɩ á taá ŋwɩ dɩ wʋ-poŋo, sɩ kʋ poli Wɛ wʋ lanyɩranɩ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ zulǝ yalʋ na maŋɩ sɩ á pa Wɛ tɩn.
Á yɩ pa á wʋbʋŋa taa tɔgɩ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn cwe sɩm.
Kwaanɩ-na sɩ Wɛ pa á taá jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-dʋʋra, sɩ kʋ lǝni á ŋwɩa kam maama.
Abam laan wʋ́ ba á lwarɩ Wɛ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ sɩ á kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, yɩ á wʋ́ lwarɩ nɩ kʋ tiini kʋ lana cɩga cɩga yɩ kʋ poli DƖ wʋ.
Wɛ na kɩ-nɩ yu-yoŋo sɩ a taa yɩ DƖ tɩntʋŋnʋ tɩn, a lagɩ a ta dɩ abam maama sɩ á yɩ taá bʋŋɩ kamunni á pa á tɩtɩ, nɩ á dwe á na maŋɩ á yɩ te tɩn.
Á nan taá jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-ŋʋna, sɩ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ Wɛ na pɛ abam dɩdʋa dɩdʋa pɛɛrɩ te á na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Nabiinu yɩra yɩ woŋo dɩdʋa mʋ, yɩ ya laan pɔɔrɩ je dwi tǝri tǝri.
Jǝgǝ maama nan jɩgɩ ka tɩtʋŋa mʋ yɩra yam wʋnɩ.
Kʋ nan yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ dɩ dɩbam balʋ dɩ na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn.
Dɩ́ tiini dɩ́ daga, yɩ dɩ́ nan yɩ kɔgɔ dɩdʋa mʋ.
Dɩbam maama dɩdʋa dɩdʋa maa tʋŋɩ dɩ́ wǝli daanɩ, nɩ yɩra yam je sɩm dwi tǝri tǝri na tʋŋɩ sɩ zǝni daanɩ te tɩn.
Wɛ-pɛɛra yalʋ DƖ na pɛ dɩbam tɩn yɩ dwi tǝri tǝri mʋ, nɩ DƖ na pɛ dɩbam zaanɩ te tɩn.
Wɛ na pɛ wʋlʋ waɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ yiyiu-ŋwɛ tɩn, kʋntʋ tu maŋɩ sɩ o taa tɔgɩ o na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ te tɩn mʋ o ma ŋɔɔnɩ-sɩ.
Wɛ na pɛ wʋlʋ waɩ o tʋŋɩ o wǝli o donnǝ tɩn, kʋntʋ tu maŋɩ sɩ o taa tʋŋɩ kʋntʋ mʋ.
Wʋlʋ Wɛ na pɛ o waɩ o brɩ o donnǝ Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn, sɩ o dɩ kwaanɩ o taa brɩ-ka.
Wɛ na pɛ wʋlʋ waɩ o kwe nɔɔna sɩ ba na baarɩ tɩn maŋɩ sɩ o taa kɩ kʋntʋ mʋ.
Wʋlʋ dɩ na cɛ o wǝǝnu o maa zǝni o donnǝ tɩn maŋɩ sɩ o ma o wʋ-yoŋo mʋ o wǝli-ba lanyɩranɩ.
Wʋlʋ nan na yɩ nɔɔna yigǝ tu tɩn maŋɩ sɩ o kwaanɩ o taa brɩ-ba cwǝŋǝ lanyɩranɩ.
Wʋlʋ nan na duri o donnǝ yibwǝnǝ tɩn maŋɩ sɩ o taa kɩ-kʋ dɩ wʋpolo mʋ.
Á taá soe daanɩ dɩ cɩga.
Á taá culi wo-lwaanʋ dwi maama, sɩ á daarɩ á taá kɩ kʋlʋ maama na lana tɩn.
Á na yɩ ko-biǝ daanɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ tɩn, á taá soe daanɩ dɩ á wʋrʋ maama, sɩ á taá nɩgɩ daanɩ lanyɩranɩ.
Á na tʋŋɩ á pa Wɛ te tɩn, á yɩ pa yawɔrɔ zʋ abam.
Kwe-na á bɩcara maama á taá maa tʋŋɩ á pa dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm.
Á na jɩgɩ tɩɩna dɩ Wɛ te tɩn, á taá jɩgɩ wʋpolo kʋ ŋwaanɩ.
Yaara na yi abam, sɩ á vɔ pu-dɩa.
Kwaanɩ-na á taá loori Wɛ maŋa maama.
Cɛ-na á wǝǝnu á ma zǝni balʋ na yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna yɩ yinigǝ jɩgɩ-ba tɩn.
Á taá jeeri vǝrǝ lanyɩranɩ á sam nɩ.
Kʋ na yɩ balʋ na jɩgɩ abam ba bɛɛsɩ tɩn, sɩ á taá loori Wɛ sɩ DƖ kɩ-ba lanyɩranɩ.
Á nan yɩ sɔɔlɩ á cɔgɩ-ba.
Kɩ-na wʋpolo dɩ balʋ na jɩgɩ wʋpolo tɩn, sɩ á daarɩ á wǝli dɩ balʋ na keeri tɩn á keeri.
Á taá jɩgɩ-na wʋbʋŋ-dɩdwɩ.
Á yɩ taá kɩ kamunni.
Tu-na á tɩtɩ sɩ á taá tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋ-balɛ dɩ.
Á yɩ taá bʋŋɩ á pa á jɩgɩ swan.
Nɔɔnʋ na kɩ abam lwarɩm, á dɩ daa yɩ joori á kɩ-o lwarɩm á ma ŋwɩ.
Nan kwaanɩ-na sɩ á taá kɩ kʋlʋ na lana tɩn nɔɔna maama yigǝ nɩ.
Kwaanɩ-na lanyɩranɩ sɩ á taá zʋʋrɩ dɩ ywǝǝni nɔɔna maama tɩtarɩ nɩ, nɩ á na waɩ te tɩn.
A badon-sonnu-ba, á yɩ taá bʋŋɩ sɩ á kɩ balʋ na kɩ abam lwarɩm tɩn dɩ lwarɩm.
Nan yagɩ-na, sɩ Wɛ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋm wʋ́ ba ba baŋa.
Bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ, nɩ Baŋa-Wɛ tagɩ DƖ wɩ: «Amʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na wʋ́ cɔgɩ nɔɔna dɩ ba kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩn.
Amʋ wʋ́ pa ba joori ba na kʋlʋ na maŋɩ dɩ ba tɩn.» Kʋ nan ta pʋpʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Nmʋ dʋm kana na wɔɛ, sɩ n pa-o wʋdiu sɩ o di.
Na-nyɔm na jɩg-o, sɩ n pa-o na sɩ o nyɔ.
N na kɩ kʋntʋ, kʋʋ́ pa cavɩɩra tiini ya ja-o.» Abam nan yɩ pa lwarɩm wanɩ abam.
Á taá kɩ kǝm-laarʋ sɩ tɩ wanɩ lwarɩm dam tɩ cɔgɩ.
Dɩ́ na maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ sɛ dɩ́ lʋgʋ kʋm yigǝ tiinǝ te tɩn Abam maama maŋɩ sɩ á sɛ dɩdɛɛra balʋ na te á tɩɩnɩ dɩm tɩn ni, bɛŋwaanɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ ba jɩgɩ dam sɩ o taa te o doŋ yɩ Wɛ wʋ pɛ kʋ tu cwǝŋǝ.
Dɩdɛɛra balʋ na wʋra tɩn yɩ Wɛ mʋ tiŋi-ba.
Wʋlʋ maama na vɩn dɩdɛɛra bam kʋntʋ ni tɩn, kʋ tu vɩn cwǝŋǝ kalʋ Wɛ na tiŋi tɩn mʋ.
Balʋ na kɩ kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn wʋ́ na cam.
Dɩdɛɛra bam nan ba paɩ fʋʋnɩ jɩgɩ balʋ na kɩ kǝm-laarʋ tɩn.
Fʋʋnɩ jɩgɩ balʋ na kɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩn mʋ.
Nmʋ na ba lagɩ sɩ fʋʋnɩ taa jɩgɩ-m dɩ dɩdɛɛra bam, n maŋɩ sɩ n ta n kɩ kǝm-laarʋ mʋ sɩ kʋ pa n na zulǝ ba tee nɩ.
Wɛ nan tiŋi dɩdɛɛra bam sɩ ba taa tʋŋɩ ba pa-DƖ abam zǝnǝ ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Abam nan na kɩ wo-balwaarʋ, á maŋɩ sɩ á taá kwarɩ fʋʋnɩ, bɛŋwaanɩ dɩdɛɛra bam sɩɩnɩ ba jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba pa nɔɔna na cam.
Bantʋ mʋ yɩ balʋ Wɛ na tiŋi sɩ ba tɔgɩ DƖ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋm ŋwaanɩ ba ma pa balʋ na kɩ lwarɩm tɩn na cam.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ á maŋɩ sɩ á sɛ ba ni.
Kʋ daɩ ba na wʋ́ pa á na cam tɩn yɩranɩ ŋwaanɩ.
Á sɛ-ba, bɛŋwaanɩ á ye á bɩcara nɩ, nɩ á maŋɩ sɩ á tɔgɩ cɩga cwǝŋǝ mʋ.
Kʋ ta yɩ kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ á maŋɩ sɩ á taá ŋwɩ lampoo.
Bɛŋwaanɩ dɩdɛɛra bam tʋŋɩ ba pa Wɛ mʋ, dɩ ba na kwaanɩ ba tʋŋɩ te tɩn.
Nan taá ŋwɩ kʋlʋ maama ba na maŋɩ sɩ ba joŋi á tee nɩ tɩn á pa-ba.
Kʋ na yɩ wʋlʋ na joŋi á yuu lampoo tɩn, naa wʋlʋ dɩ na joŋi á wǝǝnu lampoo tɩn, sɩ á ŋwɩ á lampoo maama á pa-ba.
Kʋ na yɩ wʋlʋ na maŋɩ sɩ á taá kwar-o tɩn, sɩ á taá kwar-o.
Kʋ na yɩ wʋlʋ na maŋɩ dɩ zulǝ tɩn, sɩ á taá zul-o.
Dɩ́ na maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá soe dɩ́ donnǝ te tɩn Abam nan yɩ taá jɩgɩ-na nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ woŋo jɩnɩ, jɩnɩ dɩlʋ á na wʋ́ taá jɩgɩ tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ á taá soe á donnǝ.
Wʋlʋ maama na soe o doŋ tɩn sɩɩnɩ o tɔgɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm dɩ DƖ niǝ yam mʋ.
Wɛ cullu tɩm brɩ nɩ: «Yɩ kɩ boorim, yɩ gʋ nɔɔnʋ, yɩ ŋɔnɩ, yɩ pa n yi zʋ n donnǝ wǝǝnu.» Cullu tɩm kʋntʋ dɩdaanɩ Wɛ niǝ yam maama nan tɔgɩ ni dɩdʋa mʋ.
Ni dɩntʋ nan mʋ wɩ: «Ta n soe n doŋ nɩ n tɩtɩ te.» Nmʋ na soe n doŋ, n daa n bá wanɩ n kɩ-o balɔrɔ.
Wʋlʋ na soe o doŋ tɩn sɩɩnɩ o kɩ Wɛ niǝ yam na brɩ kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ.
Dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ ti dɩ́ yigǝ mʋ dɩ́ cǝgi Zezi Krisi tum Á taá kɩ-na kʋntʋ, sɩ abam ye maŋa kalʋ wʋnɩ dɩ́ na wʋra tɩn.
Maŋa yi sɩ á zaŋɩ á yagɩ dɔɔm.
Maŋa kalʋ Wɛ na wʋ́ ba DƖ vrɩ dɩbam tɩn daarɩ fɩɩn sɩ ka yi, yɩ kʋ daa daɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ maŋa kalʋ dɩ́ dɛɛn na puli dɩ́ kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn.
Maŋa kam daarɩ fɩɩn sɩ ka yi, nɩ tɩga na lagɩ ka pʋʋrɩ te tɩn.
Tɩtɩɩ dɩm lagɩ dɩ kɛ sɩ wɩa pooni ba.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, á pa dɩ́ yagɩ kikiǝ yalʋ maama na yɩ lim nyɩm tɩn, sɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ ma Wɛ dam dɩm dɩ́ cɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ, sɩ dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ tɔgɩ pooni cwǝŋǝ kam.
Pa-na dɩ́ tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ balʋ na wʋ pooni wʋnɩ te tɩn.
Á nan pa-na dɩ́ yagɩ nɔn-kwǝlim dɩ sa-nyɔrɩ dɩ boorim dɩ wo-digiru kikiǝ maama.
Á yɩ taá jaanɩ daanɩ naa á taá kɩ wʋ-gʋʋ daanɩ.
Pa-na abam ŋwɩa kam dɩdaanɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi ŋwɩa kam taa yɩ bɩdwɩ.
Nan yɩ pa-na á wʋbʋŋa taa tɔgɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ á fra na zʋʋrɩ tɩn.
Dɩ́ wʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá co daanɩ Joŋi-na nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ wʋbʋŋa ta na wʋ bɩgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ tɩn lanyɩranɩ.
Á nan yɩ magɩ kantɔgɔ dɩ o na bʋŋɩ te tɩn.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋra o wʋbʋŋa na bɩga Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ, kʋ ma pa o ba culi kʋlʋkʋlʋ dim.
Kʋ daarɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋdoŋ wʋra o wʋbʋŋa na wʋ bɩgɩ yɩ kʋ pa o culi nwam.
Wʋlʋ nan na waɩ o di woŋo maama tɩn yɩ zaŋɩ o gooni wʋlʋ wʋm o na ba di woŋo maama tɩn.
Wʋlʋ dɩ nan na ba di woŋo maama tɩn yɩ zaŋɩ o co wʋlʋ na di woŋo maama tɩn, bɛŋwaanɩ o dɩ yɩ Wɛ nɔɔnʋ mʋ.
Nmʋ yɩ wɔɔ mʋ sɩ n co nɔɔnʋ wʋdoŋ tɩntʋŋnʋ?
Kʋ yɩ o tɩtɩ yuutu wʋm mʋ maŋɩ sɩ o nii o kɩ cɩga naa o wʋ kɩ.
Wʋlʋ na yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nɔɔnʋ tɩn kɩ lanyɩranɩ mʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm wʋ́ wanɩ o pa o taa kɩ lanyɩranɩ.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋra o na lɩ dɛ o pa dɩ dwe da yadonnǝ yam.
Kʋ daarɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋdoŋ dɩ maa wʋra o na ba kuri da yam daanɩ.
Nɔɔnʋ maama nan maŋɩ sɩ o kɩ kʋlʋ o na ye o bɩcarɩ nɩ nɩ kʋ maŋɩ tɩn.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na kuri dɛ sɩ dɩ taa yɩ da-kamunu tɩn yǝni o kɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Wʋlʋ na di woŋo maama tɩn kɩ kʋntʋ o ma zuli dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm mʋ, o na yǝni o kɩ Wɛ le wʋdiu kʋm baŋa nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wʋlʋ dɩ nan na ba di woŋo maama tɩn dɩ kɩ kʋntʋ o ma zuli dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm mʋ, yɩ o dɩ kɩ Wɛ le kʋ ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩbam wʋlʋwʋlʋ ba ŋwɩ o tɩtɩ yɩranɩ ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩ́ wʋlʋ nan na tɩgɩ dɩ, kʋ ta daɩ o tɩtɩ yɩranɩ ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩ́ zɩ na ŋwɩ, dɩ́ ŋwɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Dɩ́ nan zɩ na tɩgɩ dɩ, kʋ ta yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, dɩ́ na ŋwɩ naa dɩ́ na tɩga, dɩ́ ta yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nɔɔna mʋ.
Zezi Krisi tɩgɩ yɩ o joori o bi o na ŋwɩa, sɩ o taa yɩ twa dɩ naŋʋna Yuutu mʋ.
Kʋ na yɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, bɛɛ mʋ yɩ n co n ko-bu?
Sɩ nmʋ dɩ, bɛɛ mʋ yɩ n gooni n ko-bu?
Dɩbam maama nan lagɩ dɩ́ ba dɩ́ zɩgɩ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ mʋ, sɩ DƖ di dɩbam taanɩ.
Kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ, nɩ Baŋa-Wɛ tagɩ DƖ wɩ: «Amʋ na yɩ ŋwɩa tu tɩn, kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ nɩ, nɔɔna maama wʋ́ ba ba kuni doonǝ amʋ yigǝ nɩ, yɩ bá ta dɩ ba niǝ jaja, nɩ amʋ mʋ yɩ Baŋa-Wɛ.» Kʋntʋ brɩ nɩ dɩbam maama lagɩ dɩ́ ba dɩ́ zɩgɩ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ mʋ, sɩ nɔɔnʋ maama ta kʋlʋ o na kɩ tɩn.
Dɩ́ wʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ pa dɩ́ ko-bu tusi Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ Kʋntʋ tɩn, dɩ́ daa yɩ ta co dɩ́ donnǝ.
Nan lɩ-na wʋbʋŋa sɩ á yɩ kɩ kʋlʋ na wʋ́ pa á ko-bu tusi naa o yagɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm tɩn.
Amʋ na ŋwɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn, amʋ ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ wʋdiu tǝrǝ kʋ tɩtɩ na yɩ wo-digiru Wɛ yigǝ nɩ.
Nɔɔnʋ nan na pɛ woŋo kʋlʋ yɩ culu, kʋ sɩɩnɩ kʋ yɩ culu mʋ kʋ pa nɔɔnʋ wʋm kʋntʋ.
Nmʋ nan na pɛ n ko-bu wʋ cɔgɩ dɩ n na di wʋdiu kʋlʋ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ n daa n ba tɔgɩ sono cwǝŋǝ mʋ.
Yɩ pa nmʋ na di wʋdiu kʋlʋ tɩn cɔgɩ nɔɔnʋ dɩ Wɛ daanɩ, yɩ o yɩ wʋlʋ Zezi Krisi na tɩgɩ o ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Yɩ pa nɔɔna na cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba co woŋo kʋlʋ na lana dɩ nmʋ tɩn.
Dɩbam na yɩ Wɛ paarɩ dɩm nɔɔna te tɩn ba tɔgɩ wʋdiiru dim ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ nan tɔgɩ dɩ́ na kɩ cɩga Wɛ yigǝ nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ, dɩ wʋ-zuru dɩ wʋpolo, nɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm na paɩ dɩbam te tɩn.
Wʋlʋ maama nan na tʋŋɩ o pa Zezi Krisi kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn, kʋntʋ tu wʋ́ poli Wɛ wʋ, yɩ nɔɔna dɩ wʋ́ pa-o cɩga.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, pa-na dɩ́ kwaanɩ dɩ́ taá kɩ kʋlʋ maama na paɩ nɔɔna jɩgɩ ywǝǝni daanɩ yɩ kʋ zǝni-ba sɩ ba bɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ tɩn.
Yɩ pa wʋdiiru dim cɔgɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa.
Wʋdiiru maama maŋɩ dim mʋ.
Nmʋ nan na di kʋlʋ na wʋ́ pa n doŋ wʋ cɔgɩ kʋ ŋwaanɩ tɩn, sɩ n yagɩ kʋ dim.
Kʋ lana sɩ n yɩ kɩ kʋlʋ maama na wʋ́ pa n ko-bu tusi Wɛ cwǝŋǝ nɩ tɩn, kʋ na yɩ nwana dim naa sana nyɔm naa kʋlʋ maama dɩ.
Nmʋ na ye kʋlʋ n wʋbʋŋa nɩ kantʋ laŋa nɩ tɩn, ta n jɩgɩ-kʋ nmʋ dɩ Wɛ laŋa nɩ.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na ye kʋlʋ na lana sɩ o kɩ yɩ o ba jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋa yale kʋ baŋa nɩ tɩn, kʋntʋ tu jɩgɩ yu-yoŋo.
Kʋ daarɩ, nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na jɩgɩ bʋbwɛa dɩ o na di wʋdiu kʋlʋ tɩn, kʋntʋ tu bá na bʋra Wɛ tee nɩ.
Kʋ brɩ nɩ o ba jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa o dim dɩm wʋnɩ.
Woŋo kʋlʋ maama nmʋ na wʋ́ kɩ yɩ n ba jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa tɩn, kʋ yɩ lwarɩm mʋ.
Dɩ́ na maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá kɩ te dɩ dɩ́ donnǝ tɩn Dɩbam balʋ wʋbʋŋa na bɩgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ tɩn maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá wǝli balʋ wʋbʋŋa ta na wʋ bɩgɩ tɩn mʋ, ba wʋbʋŋa ta na bwǝnǝ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩ́ wʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá kɩ kʋlʋ na poli dɩbam yɩranɩ wʋrʋ tɩn.
Dɩbam maama nan maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá kɩ kʋlʋ na wʋ́ poli dɩ́ donnǝ wʋrʋ tɩn mʋ, dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ kɩ-ba lanyɩranɩ mʋ sɩ kʋ pa ba fɔgɩ ba bɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ.
Zezi Krisi dɛɛn nan wʋ kɩ kʋlʋ na poli o yɩranɩ wʋ tɩn, nɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm na tagɩ te kʋ wɩ: «Trʋ tɩlʋ nɔɔna na twɩ nmʋ Baŋa-Wɛ tɩn mʋ joori tɩ tʋ amʋ yuu nɩ.» Kʋlʋ maama dɛɛn na pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn yɩ sɩ kʋ taa brɩ dɩbam Wɛ cɩga kam mʋ, sɩ kʋ pa dɩ́ na pu-dɩa dɩ baarɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ tɩɩna Wɛ tee nɩ.
Wɛ mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na paɩ nɔɔna pu-dɩa dɩ baarɩ tɩn, yɩ dɩntʋ wʋ́ pa á taá jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-dɩdwɩ nɩ Zezi Krisi na lagɩ te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ, kʋʋ́ pa abam maama sɛ daanɩ yɩ á taá jɩgɩ ni dɩdwɩ á ma zuli Wɛ dɩlʋ na yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi Ko tɩn.
Joŋi-na daanɩ lanyɩranɩ nɩ Zezi Krisi na joŋi abam te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ wʋ́ pa Wɛ na zulǝ.
Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam yɩ dwi maama nyɩm mʋ Amʋ nan lagɩ a ta abam nɩ Zezi Krisi tu sɩ o tʋŋɩ o pa Zwifǝbam mʋ, sɩ kʋ pa Wɛ na goni ni dɩ ba nabaara bam te tɩn sɩɩnɩ kʋ kɩ, sɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ Wɛ yɩ cɩga tu.
O tum dɩm ta yɩ sɩ kʋ pa dwi-gɛtiinǝ bam dɩ mʋ ba ba zuli Wɛ DƖ na jɩgɩ ba yibwǝnǝ tɩn ŋwaanɩ, nɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm na tagɩ te kʋ wɩ: «Amʋ wʋ́ wǝli dɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam a zuli nmʋ, yɩ a leeni a tee nmʋ yɩrɩ.» Kʋ ta pʋpʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Abam dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam wǝli-na dɩ Wɛ nɔɔna bam maama á taá kɩ wʋpolo.» Kʋ ta wɩ: «Abam dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam maama taá zuli-na Yuutu Baŋa-Wɛ.
Pa-na lʋgʋ baŋa dwi maama taa tee-DƖ.» Ezayidɩ dɛɛn tagɩ o wɩ: «Zesedwi dɩm tu dɩdʋa wʋ́ zaŋɩ o ba sɩ o taa te lʋgʋ baŋa dwi tiinǝ maama, yɩ bantʋ wʋ́ ta jɩgɩ tɩɩna o ŋwaanɩ.» Wɛ dɩlʋ na paɩ á jɩgɩ tɩɩna tɩn wʋ́ pa á tiini á taá jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ wʋ-zuru, á na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ Joro kʋm dam laan wʋ́ pa á na jɩgɩ tɩɩna dɩ Wɛ te tɩn fɔgɩ kʋ puli kʋ ja gaalɩ.
Pooli na ŋɔɔnɩ o tɩtʋŋa yam woŋo te tɩn A ko-biǝ-ba, amʋ tɩtɩ ye nɩ abam kɩ kǝm-laarʋ zanzan mʋ, yɩ á tiini á jɩgɩ yǝno kʋ paɩ á waɩ á brɩ daanɩ dɩ Wɛ cɩga kam.
Amʋ pʋpʋnɩ wǝǝnu tɩdonnǝ dɩ baarɩ mʋ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ wʋnɩ, sɩ a maa guli abam wǝǝnu tɩlʋ á na maŋɩ á zaasɩ tɩn.
Amʋ pʋpʋnɩ kʋntʋ dɩ Wɛ na pɛ-nɩ yu-yoŋo, sɩ a taa yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ dwi-gɛtiinǝ bam ŋwaanɩ tɩn mʋ.
Amʋ na tʋŋɩ a pa Wɛ te tɩn yɩ sɩ a yǝni a tɔɔlɩ DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam mʋ, sɩ a wanɩ a joŋi dwi-gɛ tiinǝ a kɩ-ba Wɛ jɩŋa nɩ, sɩ ba pa DƖ wʋ poli, DƖ Jorokʋm na fɔgɩ kʋ kwɛ ba bɩcara tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋntʋ, amʋ na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ, a kɩ wʋpolo dɩ a na tʋŋɩ a pa Wɛ te tɩn.
Amʋ nan ba jɩgɩ baarɩ sɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ, kʋ na daɩ Zezi Krisi na mɛ amʋ o kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn yɩranɩ.
Kʋ yɩ Zezi mʋ pɛ kʋ tɔgɩ dɩ a ni-taanɩ dɩ a tɩtʋŋa yɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam sɛ Wɛ.
Ba ma sɛ Wɛ dɩ DƖ na dɛ DƖ Joro kʋm dam ŋwaanɩ DƖ pa ba na wo-kɩnkagɩla dɩ maana yalʋ na brɩ DƖ dam tɩn.
Kʋ yɩ kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ amʋ zɩgɩ Zeruzalɛm nɩ a tʋlɩ je sɩm maama a vu a yi Yiliiri, yɩ a brɩ Wɛ cɩga kalʋ maama na yɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam nyɩm tɩn.
Maŋa maama amʋ lagɩ sɩ a kwaanɩ a taa tɔɔlɩ Zezi kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam je sɩlʋ nɩ, ba daa ta na wʋ ni Zezi Krisi taanɩ dɩm da tɩn mʋ.
Amʋ ba lagɩ sɩ a tɔɔlɩ-ka je sɩlʋ nɩ, ba na maŋɩ ba ni-ka tɩn, sɩ kʋ yɩ taa nyɩ nɩ, nɔɔnʋ wʋdoŋ kǝbrǝ yuu nɩ mʋ amʋ tu a lɔ, nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ te kʋ wɩ: «Ba ta na wʋ tɔɔlɩ o kwǝrǝ ba brɩ balʋ tɩn laan wʋ́ ba ba lwarɩ-ka.
Balʋ ta na wʋ ni o ŋwa tɩn laan wʋ́ ba ba ni o cɩga kam kuri.» Pooli na bʋŋɩ sɩ o vu o na Rom tiinǝ bam te tɩn Mʋ kʋ kuri amʋ gɛ laŋa kuni zanzan sɩ a ba abam te.
Kʋ daarɩ lele kʋntʋ, je sɩm kʋntʋ nɩ jǝgǝ daa tǝrǝ ba na wʋ ni Zezi kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam da.
Abam fra na maŋɩ ya jɩgɩ amʋ bɩna zanzan sɩ a ba a na abam tɩn, amʋ laan bʋŋɩ sɩ a ba maŋa kalʋ a na lagɩ a zaŋɩ a vu Ɛsɩpanyɩ tɩn.
Amʋ lagɩ sɩ a tɔgɩ abam te, sɩ a wanɩ a kɩ wʋpolo dɩ abam maŋa fɩnfɩɩn, sɩ á laan wanɩ á wǝli-nɩ sɩ a kwe cwǝŋǝ a kɛ.
Kʋ daarɩ lele kʋntʋ amʋ lagɩ a vu Zeruzalɛm mʋ, sɩ a tʋŋɩ a wǝli Zezi nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ dáanɩ tɩn.
Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ Masɩdʋanɩ dɩ Akayi tɩɩnɩ dɩm nɩ tɩn mʋ mɛ ba wʋbʋŋa ba la sǝbu, sɩ ba ma wǝli Zezi nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ Zeruzalɛm nɩ yɩ yinigǝ jɩgɩ-ba tɩn.
Kʋ yɩ ba tɩtɩ mʋ mɛ ba wʋbʋŋa ba kɩ kʋntʋ.
Kʋ nan maŋɩ sɩ ba wǝli-ba kʋntʋ doŋ, bɛŋwaanɩ Zwifǝ bam ya maŋɩ ba kwe wǝǝnu tɩlʋ Wɛ Jorona pɛ-ba tɩn mʋ ba cɛ dɩ dwi-gɛtiinǝ bam.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam maŋɩ sɩ ba dɩ daa wǝli Zwifǝ bam dɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na yɩ ba yɩra zǝnǝ nyɩm tɩn.
Amʋ na ti tɩtʋŋɩ dɩntʋ yɩ a kwe sǝbu kʋm maama a kɩ nɔɔna bam jɩŋa nɩ, amʋ laan wʋ́ tɔgɩ abam te, yɩ a daarɩ a kɛ a vu Ɛsɩpanyɩ.
Amʋ nan ye nɩ, a na tu abam te, Zezi Krisi wʋ́ kɩ abam lanyɩranɩ kʋ ja gaalɩ.
A ko-biǝ-ba, amʋ nan lagɩ a loori abam dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ, dɩ sono kʋlʋ Wɛ Joro kʋm na pɛ dɩbam tɩn ŋwaanɩ, sɩ á tɔgɩ á wǝli-nɩ á taá tiini á loori Wɛ á pa-nɩ a tɩtʋŋ-cɛɛra yam wʋnɩ.
Loori-na Wɛ, sɩ DƖ joŋi-nɩ balʋ na wʋ Zude nɩ yɩ ba vɩn Zezi tɩn jɩŋa nɩ, sɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ pa Zezi nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ Zeruzalɛm nɩ tɩn joŋi kʋlʋ amʋ na wʋ́ pa-ba tɩn dɩ wʋpolo.
Wɛ na sɛ, amʋ laan wʋ́ wanɩ a ba abam te dɩ wʋpolo, yɩ a di ywǝǝni dɩ abam.
Bɩcarɩ-zuru Tu Baŋa-Wɛ wʋ́ ta wʋ abam tee nɩ.
Amina.
Pooli jɔɔnɩ nɔɔna balʋ maama o na ye tɩn Amʋ nan lagɩ a brɩ abam dɩ́ ko-bu Feebe na yɩ wʋlʋ tɩn mʋ.
Wʋntʋ yɩ kaanɩ wʋlʋ na tʋŋɩ o wǝli Zezi kɔgɔ kʋlʋ na wʋ Sankrɩ nɩ tɩn mʋ.
Abam nan maŋɩ sɩ á joŋ-o lanyɩranɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ, nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ sɩ Wɛ nɔɔna taa kɩ te tɩn.
Á taá wǝl-o dɩ kʋlʋ maama o na lagɩ abam tee nɩ tɩn, bɛŋwaanɩ o tɩtɩ dɩ zǝni nɔɔna zanzan, kʋ na dwe dɩdɩ dɩ amʋ dɩ.
Jɔɔnɩ-na Prisili dɩ Akwila á pa-nɩ.
Bantʋ mʋ tɔgɩ dɩ amʋ yɩ dɩ́ tʋŋɩ dɩ́ pa Zezi Krisi.
Ba ya gɛ fɩɩn sɩ ba tɩ amʋ ŋwaanɩ.
Amʋ nan kɩ-ba le, kʋ nan daɩ amʋ yɩranɩ, kʋ yɩ dwi-gɛtiinǝ balʋ maama na tu ba sɛ Zezi tɩn dɩ mʋ kɩ-ba le.
Jɔɔnɩ-na Zezi kɔgɔ kʋlʋ na jeeri ba sɔŋɔ kʋm nɩ tɩn á pa-nɩ.
Jɔɔnɩ-na amʋ ciloŋ-sono Yipayinɛtɩ á pa-nɩ, wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na dɛ yigǝ o sɛ Zezi Krisi Azi tɩɩnɩ dɩm maama wʋnɩ tɩn.
Jɔɔnɩ-na Mari wʋlʋ na tiini o tʋŋɩ o pa abam tɩn dɩ.
Jɔɔnɩ-na amʋ dwi tiinǝ Andronikusi dɩ Zuniyasɩ.
Bantʋ mʋ ya tɔgɩ ba wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ dɩ amʋ.
Ba yɩ balʋ na jɩgɩ yɩr-ŋʋm Zezi tɩntʋŋna bam wʋnɩ, yɩ bantʋ sɛ Zezi Krisi ba loori amʋ.
Jɔɔnɩ-na Ampiliatusi wʋlʋ na yɩ a ciloŋ-sono dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ tɩn á pa-nɩ.
Jɔɔnɩ-na Yuribɛn wʋlʋ na tɔgɩ dɩ dɩbam o tʋŋɩ Zezi Krisi tɩtʋŋa tɩn, dɩdaanɩ amʋ ciloŋ-sono Sɩtakisi dɩ.
Jɔɔnɩ-na Apeeli wʋlʋ na brɩ nɩ o yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ cɩga cɩga tɩn á pa-nɩ.
Jɔɔnɩ-na Arisobuli sɔŋɔ tiinǝ bam dɩ.
Jɔɔnɩ-na amʋ dwi tu Erodiyɔn á pa-nɩ.
Jɔɔnɩ-na balʋ na yɩ Narisisi sɔŋɔ tiinǝ yɩ ba yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nɔɔna tɩn á pa-nɩ.
Jɔɔnɩ-na Trifɛnɩ dɩ Trifɔsɩ, bantʋ mʋ yɩ kaana balʋ na tiini ba tʋŋɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩtʋŋa yam tɩn.
Jɔɔnɩ-na a ko-bu-sono Pɛɛrsidi, wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ kaanɩ wʋlʋ dɩ na tiini o tʋŋɩ o pa dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm.
Jɔɔnɩ-na Rufusi wʋlʋ na yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩntʋŋ-ŋʋm tɩn, dɩ o nu wʋlʋ na kɩ amʋ lanyɩranɩ nɩ o tɩtɩ bu te tɩn.
Jɔɔnɩ-na Asɩnkriti dɩ Filigon dɩ Ɛrmɛsɩ dɩ Patrobasɩ dɩ Ɛrmasɩ, dɩdaanɩ dɩ́ ko-biǝ balʋ maama na wʋ ba tee nɩ tɩn.
Jɔɔnɩ-na Filologi dɩ Zuli, dɩ Neere dɩ o nakɔ, dɩ Olimpa, dɩdaanɩ Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ maama na wʋ ba tee nɩ tɩn.
Á na jeeri daanɩ, sɩ á taá jɔɔnɩ daanɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ sono dɩ wʋ-poŋo.
Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm na wʋ je sɩlʋ maama nɩ tɩn dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam.
A ko-biǝ-ba, a nan loori abam sɩ á fɔgɩ á cɩ á tɩtɩ dɩ balʋ na jaanɩ kampwara ba tui nɔɔna tɩtarɩ, yɩ ba paɩ ba tusi Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ tɩn.
Bantʋ mʋ jɩgɩ zaasɩm dɩlʋ ba na brɩ abam tɩn ba yáala.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ ja-na á tɩtɩ dɩ ba.
Nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ doŋ ba kɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi na lagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, ba tɔgɩ ba tɩtɩ fra na zʋʋrɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ tɩn mʋ.
Ba yǝni ba ŋɔɔnɩ bɩtar-ywe mʋ, yɩ ba ma ni-sʋŋɩ ba ma ganɩ balʋ na ba va ni tɩn ba pa ba wʋbʋŋa lǝni.
Nɔɔna maama ye abam na tɔgɩ Wɛ lanyɩranɩ te tɩn, kʋntʋ mʋ paɩ amʋ tiini a jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ abam.
Amʋ nan lagɩ sɩ abam taá jɩgɩ swan mʋ sɩ á taá kɩ kʋlʋ na lana tɩn, sɩ á daarɩ á taá ye á tɩtɩ sɩ lwarɩm yɩ cɔgɩ abam.
Wɛ dɩlʋ na paɩ nɔɔna wʋ-zuru tɩn bá daanɩ DƖ cɔgɩ sʋtaanɩdam, yɩ DƖ laan pa á nɔ-dɩ dɩ á nɛ.
Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi wʋ́ pa abam yu-yoŋo.
Timoti wʋlʋ na tɔgɩ dɩ amʋ o tʋŋɩ tɩn dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam.
Amʋ dwi tiinǝ Lukiyusi dɩ Zazɔn dɩ Sosipatɛɛrɩ dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam.
Amʋ Tɛrɩtiyusi mʋ pʋpʋnɩ Pooli ni-taanɩ dɩntʋ yɩ o pa abam, amʋ dɩ nan jɔɔnɩ abam dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ.
Gayusi wʋlʋ amʋ Pooli na zʋʋrɩ o sɔŋɔ nɩ yɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm dɩ jeeri da tɩn jɔɔnɩ abam.
Erasɩtɩ wʋlʋ na yɩ tɩʋ kʋm sǝbu-tiŋnu tɩn, dɩdaanɩ dɩ́ ko-bu Kwatusi dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam.
[ Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam maama yu-yoŋo.
Amina.]
Pooli na kɩ Wɛ le te o ma guri tɩn Dɩ́ kɩ Wɛ le, dɩntʋ dam dɩm mʋ paɩ á fɔgɩ á zɩgɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ á na sɛ DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kalʋ amʋ na tɔɔlɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Kʋntʋ mʋ abam laan tu á lwarɩ Wɛ cɩga kalʋ dɛɛn ya na sǝgi faŋa faŋa tɩn.
Lele kʋntʋ Wɛ tɔgɩ DƖ nijoŋnǝ bam dɛɛn na pʋpʋnɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ ba tiŋi tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ, DƖ pa DƖ cɩga kam kʋntʋ ba ka lwarɩ jaja.
Wɛ dɩlʋ na jɩgɩ ŋwɩa sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn laan mʋ pɛ ni, sɩ lʋgʋ baŋa dwi maama na cwǝŋǝ ba lwarɩ DƖ cɩga kam, sɩ ba daarɩ ba kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ ba sɛ DƖ ni.
Dɩntʋ yɩranɩ mʋ yɩ swan maama tu, yɩ DƖ ba jɩgɩ doŋ.
Dɩntʋ mʋ maŋɩ dɩ zulǝ sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn Zezi Krisi yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ.
Amina.
Dayigǝ tɔnɔ kʋlʋ Pooli na pʋpʋnɩ o pa Korɛntɩ tiinǝ tɩn na brɩ dɩbam kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ Pooli dɛɛn pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ o pa Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ Korɛntɩ nɩ tɩn mʋ.
Pooli tɩtɩ dɛɛn mʋ puli Wɛ tɩtʋŋa dáanɩ, yɩ o zʋ da bɩm dɩ cicoro .
Korɛntɩ ya yɩ tʋ-kamunu kʋlʋ na jɩgɩ jɩjɩgɩrʋ zanzan, kʋ na jɩgɩ nabwǝǝru zɩgɩm je sɩle yɩ ba kɩ pipiu da tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Nɔɔna zanzan dɛɛn wʋra ba na jɩgɩ yǝno dɩ cullu dwi tǝri tǝri.
Ba maa kɩ boorim dɩ lwarɩm zanzan, kʋ pa kʋntʋ woŋo dɩ loŋi Wɛ nɔɔna bam.
Ka maŋa nɩ Pooli nan daa tǝri ba tee nɩ, yɩ o laan ni ba ŋwa nɩ kampwara dɩ wo-balwaarʋ tɩdonnǝ mʋ zʋ ba tɩtarɩ.
Kʋ ma pa-o liǝ, yɩ o laan pʋpʋnɩ twaanʋ o pa-ba.
O twaanʋ tɩm wʋnɩ tɩntʋ tɩle mʋ tɔgɩ tɩ zʋ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋ, sɩ dɩbam dɩ wanɩ dɩ́ lwarɩ, cam na yi dɩbam, dɩ́ na wʋ́ kɩ te, sɩ dɩ́ ma kwɛ-dɩ tɩn.
Pooli nan kaanɩ-ba, sɩ ba yagɩ kampwara , dɩ boorim kikiǝ , sɩ ba daa yɩ taa ve nɔɔna balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn te sɩ bantʋ di ba taanɩ .
O brɩ-ba nɩ ba maŋɩ sɩ ba ma ba yɩra yam ba tʋŋɩ ba pa Wɛ mʋ .
O laan ma lǝri ba na bwe-o bwiǝ yalʋ tɩn, kʋ na yɩ kadri laŋa nɩ , naa nwana yalʋ ba na mɛ ba kaanɩ jwǝnǝ tɩn laŋa nɩ , naa Zezi tʋʋnɩ gulim wʋdiu laŋa nɩ , dɩ Wɛ Joro pɛɛra yam laŋa nɩ , dɩ twa biim woŋo .
Tɔnɔ kʋm tiim nɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ sǝbu-lɩʋ Wɛ-di sɩm na wʋra ba kɩ tɩn woŋo, dɩ o tɩtɩ na lagɩ sɩ o kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, yɩ o laan jɔɔnɩ-ba .
Tɔnɔ kʋntʋ wʋnɩ Pooli brɩ nɩ, Wɛ pɛɛra yam maama wʋnɩ, sono mʋ yɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na dwe maama tɩn, sɩ dɩ́ ma tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam .
Amʋ Pooli wʋlʋ Wɛ na kuri dɩ DƖ tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ a taa yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ tɩn mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ, yɩ dɩ́ ko-bu Sositɛnɩ dɩ tɔgɩ o wǝli-nɩ.
Dɩ́ pʋpʋnɩ sɩ dɩ́ pa abam balʋ na yɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm wʋ nɔɔna yɩ á zʋʋrɩ Korɛntɩ nɩ tɩn mʋ.
Abam mʋ yɩ balʋ Wɛ na kuri sɩ á taá yɩ DƖ nɔɔna Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
DƖ ma lɩ abam sɩ á taá yɩ DƖ nɔɔna, kʋ wǝli dɩ balʋ na wʋ je maama yɩ ba zuli Zezi Krisi tɩn.
Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ bantʋ dɩ dɩbam maama Yuutu.
Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo.
Maŋa maama a yǝni a kɩ Wɛ le abam ŋwaanɩ, dɩ DƖ na pɛ abam yu-yoŋo Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Abam na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi tɩn, Wɛ sɩɩnɩ DƖ pa abam yu-yoŋo woŋo maama wʋnɩ, sɩ á taá ye DƖ cɩga kam maama, sɩ á kwǝri á taá waɩ á ŋɔɔnɩ DƖ taanɩ dɩm.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, dɩ́ dɛɛn na tɔɔlɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝrǝ kam dɩ abam tɩn, ka tiini ka ja kuri abam tee nɩ.
Á nɛ Wɛ pɛɛra yalʋ maama á na lagɩ tɩn, yɩ á cǝgi dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi sɩ o joori o ba sɩ dɩ́ na-o.
Wʋntʋ mʋ wʋ́ pa á taá zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ sɩ kʋ vu yi tiim maŋa, sɩ á yɩ taá jɩgɩ wo-lɔŋɔ dɛ dɩm o na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn nɩ.
Wɛ yɩ cɩga tu, yɩ dɩntʋ mʋ kuri abam sɩ á taá ŋwɩ dɩ DƖ Bu Zezi Krisi, o na yɩ dɩbam Yuutu tɩn.
Korɛntɩ tiinǝ ya na pɔɔrɩ daanɩ te tɩn A ko-biǝ-ba, a loori abam dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ sɩ á taá jɩgɩ ni-mɔrɔ, sɩ á yɩ taá pɔɔrɩ daanɩ.
Á nan kwaanɩ-na á kɩ á wʋbʋŋa daanɩ, sɩ á kɩ ni dɩdwɩ.
A tagɩ kʋntʋ, Klowe-ba sɔŋɔ tiinǝ na tagɩ dɩ amʋ ba wɩ á magɩ kantɔgɔ mʋ daanɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Abam badaara wɩ, á tɔgɩ Pooli mʋ.
Abam badonnǝ maa wɩ, á tɔgɩ Apolɔsɩ mʋ.
Badonnǝ maa wɩ, ba tɔgɩ Pɩyɛɛrɩ mʋ.
Babam dɩ maa wɩ, ba tɔgɩ Zezi Krisi mʋ.
Abam bʋŋɩ nɩ Zezi Krisi pɔɔrɩ yɩra yɩra mʋ na?
Amʋ Pooli mʋ tɩgɩ tʋʋn-dagarakam baŋa nɩ abam ŋwaanɩ na?
Ba miisi abam na wʋnɩ amʋ yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ mʋ na?
A kɩ Wɛ le, bɛŋwaanɩ amʋ wʋ miisi abam wʋlʋwʋlʋ na wʋnɩ, kʋ na daɩ Krisipu dɩ Gayusi yɩranɩ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ bá wanɩ o ta nɩ a miisi abam na wʋnɩ amʋ yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ.
Ah, a guli a ta na miisi Sɩtefanasɩ dɩ o sɔŋɔ tiinǝ dɩ, kʋ daarɩ kʋntʋ kwaga nɩ, wʋlʋ na wǝli da, a daa wʋ guli.
Zezi Krisi tʋŋɩ-nɩ sɩ a taa tɔɔlɩ o kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam mʋ a brɩ nɔɔna, sɩ o wʋ tʋŋɩ-nɩ sɩ a taa miisi nɔɔna na wʋnɩ.
A na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam te tɩn, kʋ daɩ dɩ lʋgʋ baŋa swan mʋ a maa tɔɔlɩ-ka.
A ya na tɔɔlɩ-ka dɩ lʋgʋ baŋa swan mʋ, Zezi tʋʋnɩ dɩm dagara kam baŋa nɩ tɩn ya bá ta jɩgɩ kuri kʋ paɩ nabiinǝ.
Wɛ swan na garɩ nabiinǝ swan te tɩn Bɛŋwaanɩ Zezi tʋʋnɩ dɩm dagara kam baŋa nɩ tɩn taanɩ dɩm yɩ jwǝrim mʋ balʋ yigǝ na tǝrǝ dɩ Wɛ tɩn tee nɩ.
Kʋ nan na yɩ dɩbam balʋ Wɛ na vrɩ lwarɩm wʋnɩ tɩn, taanɩ dɩntʋ yɩ Wɛ tɩtɩ dam mʋ dɩ dɩbam.
Kʋ nan maŋɩ kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Amʋ Baŋa-Wɛ wʋ́ cɔgɩ swan tiinǝ wʋbʋŋa, yɩ a daarɩ a pa yi-pʋrɩ-nyɩna yi-pʋrʋ kʋm yáalɩ.» Swan tiinǝ swan yam daa jɩgɩ kuri na?
Tɔn-yeenǝ dɩ nɔɔna balʋ na ye ŋwaŋa tɩn yi-pʋrʋ kʋm jɩgɩ kuri na?
Wɛ nan brɩ dɩbam nɩ lʋgʋ baŋa swan yam maama yɩ jwǝrim mʋ.
Wɛ swan yam ŋwaanɩ nabiinǝ bá wanɩ ba ma ba tɩtɩ swan ba lwarɩ-DƖ.
Wɛ nan lɩ DƖ wʋbʋŋa sɩ DƖ tɔgɩ kwǝrǝ kalʋ dɩ́ na brɩ nɔɔna yɩ ba paɩ ka yɩ jwǝrim tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ, DƖ ma vrɩ balʋ na sɛ kwǝrǝ kam tɩn DƖ yagɩ.
Zwifǝ bam lagɩ sɩ ba na wo-kɩnkagɩla yalʋ na brɩ Wɛ dam tɩn mʋ.
Grɛkɩ tiinǝ maa lagɩ sɩ ba cǝgi taanɩ dɩlʋ na wʋ́ brɩ-ba swan tɩn.
Kʋ nan na yɩ dɩbam, dɩ́ tɔɔlɩ Zezi Krisi wʋlʋ na tɩgɩ tʋʋn-dagarabaŋa nɩ tɩn kwǝrǝ mʋ.
Kwǝrǝ kam kʋntʋ maa yɩ ta-balɔrɔ mʋ Zwifǝ bam tee nɩ, yɩ ka yɩ jwǝrim mʋ dɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam dɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ dɩbam balʋ Wɛ na kuri tɩn, kʋ na yɩ Zwifǝ bam naa dwi-gɛ tiinǝ dɩ, taanɩ dɩm kʋntʋ mʋ pɛ dɩ́ lwarɩ nɩ Zezi Krisi yɩ Wɛ swan yam dɩ DƖ dam tu.
Woŋo kʋlʋ nɔɔna na paɩ kʋ yɩ jwǝrim Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn garɩ nabiinǝ swan maama, yɩ kʋlʋ na bwǝmmǝ DƖ tee nɩ tɩn dana kʋ dwe nabiinǝ dam maama.
A ko-biǝ-ba, á bʋŋɩ á dɛɛn na yɩ te yɩ Wɛ laan ba DƖ kuri abam tɩn.
Kʋ daɩ á zanzan yi dɛɛn mʋ pʋʋrɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ nabiinǝ na lagɩ yi-pʋrʋ kʋlʋ tɩn.
Kʋ daɩ á zanzan mʋ yɩ dɩdɛɛra, naa á zanzan mʋ nuŋi nadunǝ sam.
