Wɛ nan kuri balʋ nabiinǝ na paɩ ba yɩ jwǝǝru tɩn mʋ, sɩ DƖ ma pa cavɩɩra di swan tiinǝ.
DƖ ma kuri balʋ nabiinǝ na paɩ ba yɩ nabwǝnǝ tɩn, sɩ DƖ ma pa cavɩɩra di dam tiinǝ.
DƖ ma daarɩ DƖ kuri balʋ nabiinǝ na gooni yɩ ba ba nɩgɩ tɩn, sɩ DƖ ma pa wǝǝnu tɩlʋ nabiinǝ na paɩ tɩ jɩgɩ kuri tɩn ji kafɛ.
Wɛ kuri nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ, sɩ nabiinǝ yɩ zaŋɩ ba wanɩ ba tee ba tɩtɩ DƖ yigǝ nɩ.
Wɛ nan mʋ pɛ abam ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ swan yalʋ Zezi na joŋi Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn laan jigi dɩbam swan.
Wʋntʋ mʋ paɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ.
O maa paɩ dɩ́ yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna.
O ma kwe o tɩtɩ ŋwɩa o ma vrɩ dɩbam lwarɩm wʋnɩ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋlʋ na pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn yɩ cɩga mʋ, dɩ kʋ na wɩ: «Wʋlʋ na lagɩ sɩ o kɩ wʋpolo tɩn, sɩ o pa kʋ taa yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ.»
Pooli na tɔɔlɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam te tɩn A ko-biǝ-ba, amʋ dɛɛn na tu abam te tɩn, a wʋ ŋɔɔnɩ swan naa yiyiu-ŋwɛ zanzan dɩ abam, dɩ a na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam a brɩ abam te tɩn.
A wʋ kɩ a wʋbʋŋa nɩ sɩ a brɩ abam woŋo kʋdoŋ, kʋ na daɩ Zezi Krisi taanɩ dɩm yɩranɩ dɩ o tʋʋnɩ dɩm dagara kam baŋa nɩ tɩn.
A na wʋ abam tee nɩ maŋa kalʋ tɩn, a bwǝnǝ, yɩ fʋʋnɩ dɩ jɩgɩ-nɩ, yɩ a yɩra saɩ.
A taanɩ dɩm dɩ a na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam te tɩn, kʋ daɩ nabiinǝ swan mʋ a ma a tɔɔlɩ-ka sɩ a pa á sɛ.
Kʋ yɩ Wɛ Jorokʋm dam mʋ pɛ abam lwarɩ nɩ taanɩ dɩm yɩ cɩga.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, á na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn, kʋ yɩ Wɛ dam dɩm ŋwaanɩ mʋ, sɩ kʋ daɩ nabiinǝ swan ŋwaanɩ.
Baŋa-Wɛ swan na yɩ te tɩn Dɩbam nan yǝni dɩ́ brɩ balʋ wʋbʋŋa na bɩgɩ tɩn mʋ swan, ya nan daɩ nabiinǝ swan naa lʋgʋ baŋa dɩdɛɛra bam swan.
Bantʋ wʋ́ ba ba cɔgɩ dɩ ba dam dɩm maama.
Dɩbam na brɩ swan yalʋ tɩn yɩ Wɛ nyɩm mʋ.
Nabiinǝ nan yǝri ya ni nɩ, ya na sǝgi dɩ ba tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ dɛɛn maŋɩ DƖ kɩ DƖ wʋbʋŋa nɩ mʋ kʋ loori lʋgʋ pulim, sɩ DƖ swan yam kʋntʋ pa dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ na zulǝ DƖ tee nɩ.
Lʋgʋ baŋa dɩdɛɛra bam wʋlʋwʋlʋ nan wʋ lwarɩ ya kuri.
Ba ya na ye, ba ya bá ja Wɛ-sɔŋɔ paarɩ tu Zezi ba pa tʋʋn-dagarabaŋa nɩ ba gʋ.
Kʋ nan kɩ nɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm na tagɩ kʋ wɩ: «Wɛ fɔgɩ DƖ kɩ wo-laarʋ DƖ tiŋi sɩ DƖ pa balʋ na so-DƖ tɩn.
Nabiinǝ yi wʋ nɛ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ doŋ, yɩ ba zwa wʋ ni tɩ ŋwa, yɩ ba ba jɩgɩ tɩ wʋbʋŋa dɩ.» Wɛ nan tagɩ DƖ Jorokʋm ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ ma pa dɩ́ lwarɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ.
Wɛ Joro kʋm ye woŋo maama kuri, yɩ kʋ ye Wɛ wʋbʋŋa maama dɩ.
Wɔɔ mʋ wʋ́ wanɩ nabiinu wʋbʋŋa o lwarɩ, kʋ na daɩ o tɩtɩ joro?
Kʋ nan yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ dɩ Wɛ dɩ, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yǝri Wɛ wʋbʋŋa, kʋ na daɩ DƖ tɩtɩ Joro kʋm yɩranɩ.
Joro kʋlʋ Wɛ na kɩ dɩbam bɩcara nɩ tɩn daɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nyɩm.
Kʋ nuŋi Wɛ te mʋ, sɩ kʋ pa dɩ́ lwarɩ wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ DƖ na pɛ dɩbam zaanɩ tɩn.
Dɩ́ na yǝni dɩ́ brɩ nɔɔna cɩga kam yɩ dɩ́ ŋɔɔnɩ taanɩ dɩlʋ tɩn daɩ nabiinǝ swan taanɩ.
Kʋ yɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm mʋ brɩ dɩbam taanɩ dɩlʋ na maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá ŋɔɔnɩ tɩn.
Dɩbam tɛ cɩga kalʋ na yɩ Wɛ Joro nyɩm tɩn mʋ dɩ́ brɩ balʋ DƖ Joro kʋm na wʋ ba bɩcara nɩ tɩn.
Wɛ Joro kʋm na tǝri wʋlʋ bɩcarɩ nɩ tɩn ba sɛ sɩ o joŋi cɩga kalʋ Wɛ Joro kʋm na brɩ tɩn.
Ka yɩ wo-jwǝǝru mʋ o tee nɩ.
O bá wanɩ o lwarɩ ka kuri, bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ yɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm mʋ brɩ ka kuri cɩga cɩga.
Wʋlʋ maama Wɛ Joro kʋm na wʋ o bɩcarɩ nɩ tɩn mʋ waɩ o ye woŋo maama kuri.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ nan bá wanɩ o na kʋntʋ tu wo-lɔŋɔ o ta.
Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm tagɩ kʋ wɩ: «Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ bá wanɩ o lwarɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm wʋbʋŋa, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ nan bá wanɩ o brɩ-o o na wʋ́ kɩ te tɩn.» Wɛ nan na pɛ dɩbam DƖ Joro kʋm tɩn mʋ pɛ dɩbam dɩ jɩgɩ Zezi Krisi wʋbʋŋa yam.
Wɛ tɩntʋŋna na tʋŋɩ ba pa Wɛ te tɩn A ko-biǝ-ba, a dɛɛn na wʋ abam tee nɩ tɩn, a warɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ taanɩ dɩm dɩ abam nɩ Wɛ Jorokʋm na wʋ balʋ tee nɩ tɩn.
A dɛɛn ŋɔɔnɩ dɩ abam nɩnɛɛnɩ á yɩ balʋ lʋgʋ baŋa wǝǝnu fra na jɩgɩ-ba tɩn, yɩ á ta nyɩ nɩ bu-balwa mʋ te Zezi Krisi cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ.
A dɛɛn na brɩ abam wo-mwaalʋ tɩlʋ tɩn nyɩ dɩ a pɛ abam nayɩla mʋ sɩ á nyɔ.
A dɛɛn wʋ pɛ abam wʋdiu kʋlʋ na duunǝ tɩn, á dɛɛn na wʋ yi kʋ dim tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩ zɩm dɩ, á daa ta wʋ yi wʋdiu dim, bɛŋwaanɩ á ta yɩ balʋ lʋgʋ baŋa wǝǝnu fra na jɩgɩ tɩn mʋ.
Abam jɩgɩ wʋ-gʋʋ yɩ á magɩ kantɔgɔ daanɩ.
Kʋntʋ brɩ nɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wo-yɔɔrʋ fra mʋ taa jɩgɩ abam, yɩ á kɩ nɩ balʋ ta na yǝri Wɛ tɩn mʋ te.
Kʋ yɩ vwan mʋ a fɔgɩ na?
Abam wʋ nɔɔna badonnǝ na tɛ ba wɩ, bam tɔgɩ Pooli mʋ, yɩ badonnǝ dɩ wɩ, ba tɔgɩ Apolɔsɩ mʋ tɩn, kʋ daɩ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn kikiǝ mʋ kʋntʋ na?
Wɔɔ mʋ yɩ Apolɔsɩ?
Wɔɔ mʋ yɩ amʋ Pooli?
Dɩbam maama yɩ Wɛ tɩntʋŋna balʋ abam na dɛ dɩbam jɩŋa á kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn mʋ.
Dɩbam maama tʋŋɩ kʋlʋ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm na pɛ dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ tʋŋɩ tɩn mʋ.
Dɩbam nyɩ nɩ vala mʋ te, amʋ Pooli mʋ jǝri wǝǝnu yɩ Apolɔsɩ yagɩ na.
Kʋ daarɩ kʋ yɩ Wɛ mʋ paɩ tɩ bɩra.
Mʋ kʋ kuri wʋlʋ na jǝri dɩ wʋlʋ na yagɩ na da tɩn maama daɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ.
Wɛ yɩranɩ mʋ waɩ DƖ paɩ DƖ taanɩ dɩm kɩ dam nɔɔna bɩcara nɩ.
Wʋlʋ na jǝri dɩ wʋlʋ na yagɩ na tɩn maama yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ.
Wɛ wʋ́ pa ba maama joŋi ba ŋwɩɩrʋ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ ba na tʋŋɩ te tɩn mʋ.
Dɩbam maama wǝli daanɩ mʋ dɩ́ tʋŋɩ dɩ́ pa Wɛ.
Abam nyɩ dɩ Wɛ kara kalʋ dɩ́ na tʋŋɩ ka wʋnɩ tɩn mʋ.
Abam daa ta nyɩ dɩ digǝ kalʋ Wɛ na wʋra DƖ lɔ tɩn mʋ.
Wɛ na pɛ amʋ pɛɛrɩ dɩlʋ sɩ a ma tʋŋɩ tɩn, kʋ yɩ sɩ amʋ cwi digǝ kam kuri mʋ lanyɩranɩ nɩ lwar-ŋʋm te.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋdoŋ dɩ maa wʋra o lɔ o daŋɩ da.
Wʋlʋ maama nan na lagɩ sɩ o lɔ o daŋɩ da tɩn maŋɩ sɩ o taa ye o na lɔ te tɩn mʋ.
Wɛ maŋɩ DƖ pa digǝ kam kuri cwi, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ daa bá wanɩ o cwi ka kuri dɩdoŋ.
Kuri dɩm kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi.
Balʋ nan na lɔ ba daŋɩ da tɩn badaara maɩ sǝbu-sɩŋa naa can-na naa kandwa-ŋʋna, naa dɛ naa gaarʋ naa kasʋrʋ mʋ ba maa lɔa.
Nɔɔnʋ maama na tʋŋɩ kʋlʋ tɩn nan wʋ́ ba kʋ lwarɩ jaja dɛ dɩm Zezi Krisi na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn, mini mʋ wʋ́ brɩ nɔɔnʋ maama tɩtʋŋa na yɩ te.
Balʋ na lɔgɩ dɩ wo-laarʋ yɩ mini dɩm wʋ wanɩ dɩ di tɩn wʋ́ joŋi ba ŋwɩɩrʋ.
Kʋ daarɩ, balʋ mini dɩm na wanɩ dɩ di ba lɔɔm dɩm tɩn, ba bá na kʋlʋkʋlʋ Wɛ tee nɩ.
Wɛ za wʋ́ vrɩ ba tɩtɩ DƖ yagɩ.
Ba nan wʋ́ ta nyɩ dɩ mini na di nɔɔnʋ yɩ o wǝri te tɩn mʋ.
Abam yǝri nɩ, Wɛ Joro kʋm na wʋ abam bɩcara nɩ tɩn, á nyɩ dɩ Wɛ tɩtɩ digǝ mʋ DƖ na zʋʋrɩ ka wʋnɩ na?
Wʋlʋ nan na cɔgɩ Wɛ digǝ kam tɩn, Wɛ wʋ́ cɔgɩ kʋntʋ tu dɩ mʋ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ digǝ kam yɩ DƖ tɩtɩ di-laa mʋ.
Abam tɩtɩ nan mʋ yɩ DƖ digǝ kam kʋntʋ.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o ganɩ o tɩtɩ.
Abam wʋlʋ na bʋŋɩ nɩ o jɩgɩ swan nɩ zɩm lʋgʋ baŋa swan na yɩ te tɩn, kʋntʋ tu maŋɩ sɩ o joori o ji joro mʋ, sɩ o laan wanɩ o na swan cɩga cɩga.
Bɛŋwaanɩ lʋgʋ baŋa swan yɩ jwǝrim mʋ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ.
Kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Wɛ vugimi swan tiinǝ swan DƖ pa ya joori ya ja-ba.» Kʋ nan daa ta pʋpʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Yuutu Baŋa-Wɛ ye nɩ swan tiinǝ wʋbʋŋa maama yɩ kafɛ mʋ.» Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o magɩ o nyɔɔnɩ o ta o wɩ: «Amʋ tɔgɩ wʋntʋ mʋ.» Sɩ woŋo maama yɩ abam mʋ te.
Kʋ na yɩ amʋ Pooli dɩ Apolɔsɩ dɩ Pɩyɛɛrɩ, dɩbam dɩ yɩ abam nɔɔna mʋ.
Kʋ nan na yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa dɩ ŋwɩa dɩ tʋʋnɩ dɩ zɩm dɩ jwa dɩ, abam mʋ te tɩ maama.
Zezi Krisi nan mʋ te abam, yɩ Wɛ dɩ te Zezi Krisi tɩtɩ dɩ.
Pooli-ba na tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam te tɩn Kʋntʋ tɩn, abam maŋɩ sɩ á taá ye nɩ dɩbam yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋna mʋ.
Wɛ nan kwe DƖ cɩga kalʋ ya na sǝgi nabiinǝ yigǝ nɩ tɩn DƖ kɩ dɩbam jɩŋa nɩ mʋ, sɩ dɩ́ ta-ka dɩ́ brɩ nɔɔna.
Ba nan na kwe woŋo ba kɩ nɔɔnʋ jɩŋa nɩ, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa nii kʋ baŋa nɩ dɩ cɩga mʋ.
-Kʋ nan na yɩ amʋ, abam naa nabiinǝ balʋ maama na di amʋ taanɩ te dɩ te tɩn, kʋ ba kɩ amʋ kʋlʋkʋlʋ.
Amʋ bɩcarɩ nɩ a ye nɩ, kʋlʋkʋlʋ tǝrǝ a na kɩ a cɔgɩ.
Nan dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, a bá wanɩ a pa a tɩtɩ bʋra, a na bá wanɩ a di a tɩtɩ taanɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wʋlʋ yɩranɩ na wʋ́ wanɩ o di amʋ taanɩ tɩn mʋ yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o wuuri o di o doŋ taanɩ, kʋ loori maŋa kalʋ Wɛ na lɩ tɩn, sɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm na tuǝ, oó ja pooni o ba o pa woŋo kʋlʋ maama na sǝgi lim wʋnɩ tɩn taa naɩ jaja.
Wʋntʋ wʋ́ pa nɔɔna wʋbʋŋa yalʋ na sǝgi tɩn lwarɩ jaja.
Maŋa kam kʋntʋ nɩ mʋ Wɛ wʋ́ pa nɔɔnʋ maama na zulǝ yalʋ na maŋɩ dɩd-o tɩn.
A ko-biǝ-ba, kʋ yɩ abam ŋwaanɩ mʋ a kwe a tɩtɩ dɩdaanɩ Apolɔsɩ a ma maŋɩ a brɩ abam, sɩ á wanɩ á nii dɩbam, á ma lwarɩ á na wʋ́ taá kɩ te tɩn, sɩ á yɩ zaŋɩ á gaalɩ kʋlʋ na pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn, sɩ abam dɩdʋa dɩdʋa yɩ zaŋɩ o kɩ kamunni o zuli nɔɔnʋ wʋdoŋ o daarɩ o gooni o doŋ.
Wɔɔ mʋ wɩ, nmʋ dwe n doŋ?
Bɛɛ mʋ n jɩga yɩ n wʋ joŋi-kʋ Wɛ tee nɩ?
Nmʋ nan na joŋi-kʋ Wɛ tee nɩ mʋ tɩn, bɛɛ mʋ kɩa yɩ n magɩ n nyɔɔnɩ kʋ baŋa nɩ, nɩ nmʋ tɩtɩ mʋ mɛ n dam dɩ n swan n ma n na-kʋ te?
Abam bʋŋɩ nɩ á maŋɩ á jɩgɩ kʋlʋ maama á na lagɩ tɩn, á kwǝri á yɩ nadunǝ, yɩ á ta bʋŋɩ nɩ abam di paarɩ á daarɩ dɩbam.
Kʋ ya lana sɩ á sɩɩnɩ á di paarɩ, sɩ dɩbam dɩ taá tɔgɩ dɩ́ di paarɩ dɩ abam.
Amʋ na bʋŋɩ te tɩn, kʋ nyɩ dɩ Wɛ pɛ dɩbam balʋ na yɩ DƖ tɩntʋŋna tɩn ji kwaga tiinǝ mʋ nɔɔna bam maama wʋnɩ, nɩnɛɛnɩ balʋ ba na di ba taanɩ ba lagɩ ba gʋ-ba te tɩn.
Dɩbam nyɩ dɩ nɔn-mwaanʋ mʋ lʋgʋ kʋm nɔɔna bam dɩ malɛsɩdɩ yibiyǝ nɩ.
Dɩbam jigi jwǝǝru mʋ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ, abam nan pa á yɩ swan tiinǝ mʋ Zezi Krisi tɔgɩm dɩm wʋnɩ.
Dɩbam yɩ nabwǝnǝ mʋ, abam maa paɩ á yɩ dɩdɛɛra.
Nɔɔna zuli abam, yɩ ba daarɩ ba gooni dɩbam.
Dɩ zɩm maama dɩ, kana dɩ na-nyɔm jɩgɩ dɩbam, yɩ gwaarʋ muri dɩbam.
Nɔɔna maa bɛɛsɩ dɩbam, yɩ dɩ́ ba jɩgɩ cirigim jǝgǝ.
Dɩbam maɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ jɩa mʋ dɩ́ tiini dɩ́ tʋŋa, sɩ dɩ́ ma wanɩ dɩ́ na dɩ́ ni wʋdiu.
Nɔɔna na twɩ dɩbam, dɩ́ ta yǝni dɩ́ loori Wɛ mʋ sɩ DƖ kɩ-ba lanyɩranɩ.
Nɔɔna na bɛɛsɩ dɩbam, dɩ́ ta yǝni dɩ́ sɛ bɛɛsa yam mʋ.
Nɔɔna na ŋɔɔnɩ wo-lwaanʋ ba pa dɩbam, dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ joori dɩ́ lǝri-ba lanyɩranɩ mʋ.
Dɩbam nyɩ dɩ lʋgʋ baŋa weeru mʋ.
Dɩ zɩm maama, dɩ́ nyɩ dɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ mʋ nɔɔnʋ maama tee nɩ.
A na pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ tɩn, a pʋpʋnɩ sɩ a ma kwe abam mʋ, á na yɩ amʋ bu-sonnu tɩn ŋwaanɩ, sɩ kʋ daɩ nɩ a lagɩ sɩ a kɩ abam cavɩɩra mʋ.
Abam ya na maŋɩ á jɩgɩ karanyɩna tiinǝ mʋrr-fugǝ mʋ ba na brɩ abam Zezi Krisi cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ, á ko yɩ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ.
Amʋ yɩ á ko, dɩ a na brɩ abam Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam yɩ á na ŋwɩ-dʋŋa Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Mʋ kʋ kuri a loori abam sɩ á taá lwǝni amʋ na kɩ te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ a tʋŋɩ Timoti á tee nɩ.
Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ a bu-sono Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ, yɩ o tɔgɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi dɩ cɩga.
Wʋntʋ wʋ́ guli abam amʋ ŋwɩa kam na yɩ te Zezi Krisi cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ, sɩ kʋ maŋɩ nɩ amʋ na yǝni a brɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm je maama nɩ te tɩn.
Abam badaara paɩ á tɩtɩ kamunni mʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ á daa ba bʋŋɩ nɩ amʋ wʋ́ joori a ba abam te.
Wɛ nan na sɛ, aá ba abam te lele.
A na tuǝ, a laan wʋ́ wanɩ a lwarɩ kamun-nyɩna bam kʋntʋ na jɩgɩ dam dɩlʋ ba ma kɩ tɩn, yɩ kʋ daa daɩ ba ni-ŋwaŋa yɩranɩ má.
Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ paarɩ dɩm paɩ dɩbam dam mʋ, sɩ dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ ma kɩ kʋlʋ na maŋɩ tɩn, sɩ kʋ daɩ ni-ŋwaŋa yɩranɩ má.
Abam lagɩ sɩ a ba abam te a vaŋɩ á zwɛ mʋ naa á lagɩ sɩ a brɩ abam sono dɩ wʋ-bono mʋ?
Korɛntɩ tiinǝ bam wʋ nɔɔnʋ dɩdʋa na kɩ wo-balɔrɔ te tɩn Amʋ nan ni abam labaarɩ nɩ nɔɔnʋ dɩdʋa mʋ karɩ o boorǝ.
Ba wɩ, abam wʋnɩ baarʋ dɩdʋa mʋ tigi dɩ o ko kaanɩ.
Balʋ na ba tɔgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɩn dɩ maŋɩ ba ba sɛ ba kɩ wo-zɔɔna yantʋ doŋ.
O na kɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, bɛɛ mʋ yɩ á taá paɩ á tɩtɩ kamunni?
Kʋ ya maŋɩ sɩ á pa á wʋrʋ cɔgɩ kʋ ŋwaanɩ, sɩ á daarɩ á lɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na kɩ kǝm dɩm kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn á wʋnɩ.
Amʋ tɩtɩ mʋ tǝri abam tee nɩ, sɩ a wʋbʋŋa maama wʋra dɩ abam.
Kʋntʋ, a maŋɩ a van baarʋ wʋm kʋntʋ bʋra o cɔgɩm dɩm ŋwaanɩ, nɩ a wʋ abam tee nɩ mʋ te.
-Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ a lagɩ a ta sɩ, á na jeeri daanɩ, amʋ wʋbʋŋa wʋra dɩ abam nɩ a wʋ á tɩtarɩ mʋ te, sɩ á ma dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi dam dɩm á ma kwe nɔɔnʋ wʋntʋ á kɩ sʋtaanɩ jɩŋa nɩ, sɩ dɩntʋ wanɩ dɩ cɔgɩ o yɩra dɩ wo-zɔɔna fra yalʋ na jɩg-o tɩn.
Á na kɩ kʋntʋ, o joro kʋm laan wʋ́ wanɩ kʋ na vrɩm dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tum dɛ dɩm nɩ.
Abam na kɩ kamunni te tɩn, kʋ wʋ maŋɩ.
Á ye nɩ dabɩlɩ fɩnfɩɩn na wʋ dɩpɛ muni dɩlʋ ba na viiri tɩn wʋnɩ, kʋ laan wʋ́ pa dɩ maama fʋlɩ mʋ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, lɩ-na kǝm-lɔŋɔ kʋm kʋntʋ kʋ na nyɩ nɩ dabɩlɩ-doori te tɩn á wʋnɩ, sɩ kʋ yɩ loŋi á maama.
Kʋntʋ á laan wʋ́ taá yɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ dɩpɛ muni dɩlʋ ba na wʋ kɩ dabɩlɩ dɩ wʋnɩ tɩn.
Á nan maŋɩ á yɩ nɔn-ŋʋna mʋ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ, Baŋa-Wɛ Pǝlbu Zezi Krisi na kwe o tɩtɩ o ma kaanɩ Wɛ sɩ DƖ yagɩ á lwarɩm mʋ DƖ ma cɛ abam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Pa-na dɩ́ di candiǝ nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ te tɩn, sɩ dɩ́ lɩ lwarɩm dɩdaanɩ tɩtʋŋ-balwaarʋ tɩlʋ maama na nyɩ nɩ dabɩlɩ-doori te tɩn dɩ́ wʋnɩ, sɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo dɩ cɩga, nɩ dɩpɛ dɩlʋ na ba jɩgɩ dabɩlɩ dɩ wʋnɩ te tɩn.
Amʋ dɛɛn na dɛ yigǝ a pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋlʋ a pa abam tɩn, a tagɩ dɩ abam sɩ á yɩ taá tɔgɩ dɩdaanɩ balʋ na karɩ ba boori tɩn.
Amʋ na kaanɩ abam kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ daɩ nɩ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ yɩ ba boori tɩn, naa ba yɩ wo-swǝn-nyɩna naa ŋwɩɩna naa jwǝ-kaana tɩn taanɩ mʋ a tɛa.
Abam bá wanɩ á pwɛ á tɩtɩ dɩ nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ kʋ na daɩ nɩ á yagɩ lʋgʋ baŋa.
Amʋ nan na pʋpʋnɩ kʋlʋ tɩn kuri mʋ yɩ sɩ á yɩ taá tɔgɩ dɩ wʋlʋ maama na brɩ nɩ o yɩ á ko-bu Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ yɩ o boorǝ, naa o yɩ wo-swǝn-nyɩm naa jwǝ-kaanʋ naa nɔn-twɩɩnʋ naa sa-nyɔrʋ, naa o yɩ ŋwɩɩnʋ tɩn.
Wʋlʋ na yɩ kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn, sɩ á pwɛ á tɩtɩ dɩd-o, sɩ á brɩ á yɩ di wʋdiu dɩd-o dɩ.
-Kʋ na yɩ balʋ na daɩ dɩ́ ko-biǝ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ tɩn, kʋ daɩ amʋ wʋ́ di bantʋ taanɩ.
Kʋ yɩ Wɛ mʋ wʋ́ di ba taanɩ.
Abam nan maŋɩ sɩ á di balʋ na wʋ á kɔgɔ kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn taanɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Zǝli-na nɔn-balɔrɔ kʋm á wʋnɩ.»
Wɛ nɔɔna wʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba saŋɩ da balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn tee nɩ Abam wʋlʋ na jɩgɩ taanɩ dɩ o doŋ yɩ á yɩ ko-biǝ daanɩ Zezi ŋwaanɩ tɩn, kʋ wʋ maŋɩ sɩ n ja-o n vu sarɩya-dirǝ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn te, sɩ ba di abam taanɩ dɩm.
Kʋʋ́ ta yɩ cavɩɩra mʋ kʋ pa-m, bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ ya maŋɩ sɩ Wɛ nɔɔna bam mʋ di á taanɩ dɩm.
Abam yǝri nɩ Wɛ nɔɔna bam mʋ wʋ́ ba ba di nabiinǝ maama taanɩ na?
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, bɛɛ mʋ kɩa yɩ á tɩtɩ warɩ á kwɛ wo-balwa balʋ na wʋ á tɩtarɩ nɩ tɩn?
Abam yǝri nɩ dɩbam mʋ wʋ́ di malɛsɩsɩm taanɩ na?
Kʋ nan na yɩ kʋntʋ, dɩ́ bá wanɩ zɩm lʋgʋ kʋntʋ taanɩ dɩ́ di na?
Abam nan na jɩgɩ taanɩ dɩntʋ doŋ á tɩtarɩ nɩ, á wʋ maŋɩ sɩ á ja á vu balʋ na tɔgɩ ba tǝri Zezi nɔɔna bam wʋnɩ tɩn te.
A tagɩ kʋntʋ sɩ cavɩɩra mʋ ja abam.
Kʋntʋ, swan tu dɩ dɩdʋa tǝri abam wʋnɩ sɩ o wanɩ o fɔgɩ abam balʋ na yɩ ko-biǝ Zezi ŋwaanɩ tɩn daanɩ na?
Abam na kɩ te tɩn wʋ maŋɩ, abam na yǝni á saŋɩ daanɩ sarɩya-dirǝ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn tee nɩ yɩ ba di á taanɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Abam na saŋɩ daanɩ tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ á tusi mʋ.
N ko-bu na kɩ-m lwarɩm, naa o na ŋɔgɩ-m, kʋ ya lana sɩ n yagɩ n ma n cɛ-o mʋ.
Abam nan ba kɩ kʋntʋ, abam tɩtɩ joori á kɩ balʋ na yɩ á ko-biǝ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ tɩn wo-lwaanʋ mʋ, yɩ á kwǝri á ŋɔnɩ-ba.
Abam yǝri nɩ balʋ na ba tɔgɩ cɩga tɩn bá na jǝŋǝ je Wɛ paarɩ dɩm wʋnɩ na?
Yɩ zaŋɩ-na á ganɩ á tɩtɩ.
Balʋ na boori tɩn, naa jwǝ-kaana naa ka-lagɩna, naa baara balʋ na tigi dɩ ba donnǝ ba maa jiri kaana tɩn, naa ŋwɩɩna naa wo-swǝn-nyɩna, naa sa-nyɔra naa nɔn-twɩɩna naa vɩnvɩrna bá na jǝŋǝ je Wɛ paarɩ dɩm wʋnɩ.
Abam badaara dɛɛn yɩ kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ.
Wɛ nan yagɩ á lwarɩm DƖ ma cɛ abam.
DƖ ma pa á ji DƖ nɔɔna yɩ á jɩgɩ cɩga DƖ tee nɩ.
Wɛ dɛ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi dɩ DƖ Jorokʋm dam ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ kɩ kʋntʋ DƖ pa abam.
Dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ kwe dɩ́ yɩra yam dɩ́ maa tʋŋɩ dɩ́ pa Wɛ mʋ Abam badaara tɛ á wɩ, á jɩgɩ ni sɩ á kɩ kʋlʋ maama á na lagɩ tɩn.
Amʋ nan lagɩ a ta abam nɩ, kʋ daɩ woŋo maama mʋ jɩgɩ zǝnǝ kʋ pa abam.
Amʋ dɩ jɩgɩ ni sɩ a kɩ kʋlʋ maama a na lagɩ tɩn, a nan bá sɛ sɩ a pa a ji kʋlʋkʋlʋ gambaa.
Abam yǝni á tɛ á wɩ, Wɛ kɩ wʋdiu kana ŋwaanɩ mʋ, yɩ DƖ kɩ kana dɩ wʋdiu ŋwaanɩ.
Maŋa nan wʋ́ ba, yɩ Wɛ cɔgɩ wʋdiu dɩ kana maama.
Wɛ nan wʋ kɩ dɩbam yɩra yam sɩ dɩ́ ta maa kɩ boorim.
Wɛ mɔɔnɩ dɩ́ yɩra yam sɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi mʋ taa te-ya, sɩ dɩ́ ta maa tʋŋɩ dɩ́ pa-o.
Wɛ mʋ bi dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi DƖ pa-o o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ.
Maŋa nan wʋ́ ba, yɩ DƖ ma DƖ dam dɩm DƖ bi dɩbam dɩ DƖ pa dɩ́ yagɩ tʋʋnɩ.
Abam yǝri nɩ á yɩra yam yɩ Zezi Krisi yɩra yam daa dɩdʋa mʋ na?
Abam yɩra yam dɩ Zezi yɩra yam na yɩ bɩdwɩ tɩn, á yɩ zaŋɩ á kwe-ya á ma pǝni dɩ ka-tʋla, sɩ yaá ji yɩra dɩdʋa dɩdaanɩ ka-tʋla kam yɩra yam.
Á brɩ á yɩ zaŋɩ á kɩ kʋntʋ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, wʋlʋ na pǝni dɩ ka-tʋla tɩn, o dɩ ka-tʋla kam maama laan jigi yɩra dɩdʋa mʋ.
Á yǝri kʋntʋ na?
Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm tagɩ kʋ wɩ: «Baarʋ dɩ kaanɩ wʋ́ wǝli daanɩ sɩ ba ji nɔɔnʋ dɩdʋa mʋ.» Wʋlʋ nan na ŋwɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn, o joro dɩ Zezi Joro maama yɩ woŋo dɩdʋa mʋ.
Á nan yagɩ boorim kǝm dwi maama.
Kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩlʋ maama nɔɔnʋ na wʋ́ kɩ tɩn, o bá kɩ o yagɩ o yɩra wʋnɩ.
Nɔɔnʋ nan na boori, kʋntʋ yɩ kǝm-balɔrɔ kʋlʋ o na kɩ o yagɩ o yɩra wʋnɩ tɩn mʋ.
Abam yǝri nɩ á yɩra yam nyɩ dɩ Wɛ tɩtɩ digǝ mʋ DƖ Jorokʋm na zʋʋrɩ ka wʋnɩ na?
Wɛ kɩ DƖ Joro kʋm á bɩcara nɩ mʋ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ kʋ daa daɩ abam tɩtɩ mʋ te á yɩra yam.
Á yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna mʋ.
DƖ yǝgi abam dɩ yǝlo kʋlʋ na cana tɩn mʋ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, kwe-na á yɩra yam á maa tʋŋɩ sɩ kʋ pa Wɛ na zulǝ.
Pooli na brɩ Korɛntɩ tiinǝ kadiri woŋo te tɩn A lagɩ a lǝri á na pʋpʋnɩ á bwe amʋ taana yalʋ tɩn mʋ a pa abam.
Kʋ ya lana dɩ baarʋ na wʋ di kaanɩ.
Kʋ nan ba lana sɩ baara dɩ kaana taa lagɩ daanɩ yɔɔ yɔɔ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ baarʋ maama taa jɩgɩ o tɩtɩ kaanɩ, sɩ kaanɩ maama dɩ taa jɩgɩ o tɩtɩ barʋ.
Baarʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o vɩn sɩ o taa wʋra dɩ o kaanɩ.
Kaanɩ dɩ nan yɩ zaŋɩ o vɩn sɩ o taa wʋra dɩ o barʋ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ kaanɩ ba te o tɩtɩ yɩra, kʋ yɩ o barʋ mʋ te-ya.
Barʋ dɩ nan ba te o tɩtɩ yɩra, kʋ yɩ o kaanɩ dɩ mʋ te-ya.
Yɩ zaŋɩ-na á vɩn sɩ á taá wʋra daanɩ, kʋ na daɩ nɩ á maama mʋ sɛ sɩ á lɩ pwǝlǝ á yagɩ da-pwǝgǝ maŋa fɩnfɩɩn, sɩ á wanɩ á nywanɩ á yigǝ á loori Wɛ, sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ á na lagɩ tɩn.
Kʋntʋ kwaga nɩ, sɩ á joori á taá wʋra daanɩ.
Kʋ na daɩ kʋntʋ, sʋtaanɩ wʋ́ sʋgɩ abam dɩ pa á tusi dɩ á na warɩ á tɩtɩ á ja tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Amʋ na pʋpʋnɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, a tagɩ sɩ kʋ wǝli abam mʋ, sɩ kʋ daɩ nɩ a lagɩ a fɩn abam.
Amʋ ya wʋ́ ta lagɩ sɩ nɔɔnʋ maama taa yɩ nɩ amʋ na yɩ badǝm te tɩn.
Wɛ-pɛɛra nan yɩ tǝri tǝri mʋ yɩ DƖ pa nɔɔnʋ maama o nyɩm.
Kʋ daarɩ abam balʋ na yɩ badǝnǝ dɩ kadǝnǝ tɩn, a lagɩ a ta dɩ abam nɩ kʋ lana sɩ á taá yɩ á yɩranɩ kʋntʋ, nɩ amʋ na yɩ te tɩn.
Á nan na warɩ á tɩtɩ á ja, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á di kaana naa á zʋ banna mʋ.
Kʋntʋ garɩ á na paɩ ka-laga fra tiini ya jɩgɩ abam.
-Kʋ daarɩ kʋ na yɩ banna dɩ ba kaana, kʋ yɩ fɩfɩʋn mʋ sɩ kaanɩ yɩ yagɩ o barʋ, naa barʋ dɩ yɩ vɩn o kaanɩ.
Kʋntʋ daɩ amʋ tɩtɩ ni, kʋ yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi mʋ pɛ culu kʋntʋ.
Kaanɩ nan na maŋɩ o yagɩ o barʋ, o maŋɩ sɩ o taa wʋra o yɩranɩ mʋ, naa o joori o vu o barʋ wʋm te mʋ sɩ ba fɔgɩ daanɩ, o daa wʋ maŋɩ sɩ o zʋ barʋ wʋdoŋ.
Kʋ daarɩ, baarʋ wʋlʋ na tɔgɩ Zezi tɩn na jɩgɩ kaanɩ, yɩ kaanɩ wʋm na ba tɔgɩ Zezi yɩ o sɛ sɩ ba taa zʋʋrɩ daanɩ, kʋntʋ tu yɩ zaŋɩ o vɩn o kaanɩ wʋm.
Kʋ yɩ amʋ mʋ pɛ ni dɩm kʋntʋ sɩ kʋ daɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi.
Kaanɩ wʋlʋ dɩ nan na tɔgɩ Zezi yɩ o barʋ na ba tɔgɩ Zezi, yɩ o barʋ wʋm na sɛ sɩ ba taa zʋʋrɩ daanɩ, sɩ o yɩ zaŋɩ o yagɩ o barʋ wʋm.
Barʋ wʋlʋ na wʋ kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn batwarɩ dɩ Wɛ, o kaanɩ wʋm na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kaanɩ wʋlʋ dɩ na wʋ kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn batwarɩ dɩ Wɛ, o barʋ wʋm na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ ya na daɩ kʋntʋ, ba biǝ wʋ́ ta yɩ nɩ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn biǝ, yɩ ba laan yagɩ ba batwarɩ dɩ Wɛ.
Wʋlʋ nan na ba tɔgɩ Zezi tɩn na bʋŋɩ sɩ o viiri, kʋ na yɩ kaanɩ wʋm naa barʋ wʋm dɩ, sɩ á yag-o sɩ o viiri.
Wʋlʋ na daarɩ yɩ o tɔgɩ Zezi tɩn laan wʋ́ ta te o tɩtɩ.
Wɛ na bǝŋi dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ taá tɔgɩ-DƖ tɩn, kʋ yɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá zʋʋrɩ daanɩ dɩ ywǝǝni mʋ.
Kaanɩ, nmʋ na tɔgɩ Zezi tɩn, nń kɩ ta mʋ n lwarɩ nɩ nń wanɩ n pa n barʋ wʋm sɛ Zezi naa n bá wanɩ n pa o sɛ?
Barʋ, nmʋ dɩ wʋ́ kɩ ta mʋ n lwarɩ nɩ nń wanɩ n pa n kaanɩ wʋm sɛ Zezi naa n bá wanɩ n pa o sɛ?
Abam dɛɛn na yɩ te yɩ Wɛ bǝŋi abam sɩ á taá tɔgɩ-DƖ tɩn, á ta taá yɩ kʋntʋ, sɩ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm na pɛ abam ŋwɩa kalʋ tɩn.
Mʋ kʋlʋ a na brɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm jǝgǝ maama nɩ tɩn.
Wɛ na bǝŋi abam tɩn, abam wʋlʋ dɛɛn na maŋɩ o go nɩ Zwifǝ bam cullu tɩm na brɩ te tɩn, kʋntʋ tu daa yɩ ta sǝgi o tɩtɩ o na goni tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ, wʋlʋ dɛɛn nan na maŋɩ o wʋ goni tɩn, o daa yɩ ta kwaanɩ sɩ o go.
N na gonǝ naa n zɩ wʋ goni dɩ, kʋ daɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ.
Woŋo kʋlʋ na jɩgɩ kuri tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ nɔɔnʋ maama kwaanɩ o sɛ Wɛ niǝ yam lanyɩranɩ.
Nɔɔnʋ maama dɛɛn na yɩ te yɩ Wɛ bǝŋ-o tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ o ta taa yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ.
N dɛɛn na yɩ gambaa mʋ yɩ Wɛ bǝŋi-m sɩ n ta n tɔgɩ-DƖ, yɩ ta n kɩ liǝ kʋ ŋwaanɩ.
N nan na nɛ cwǝŋǝ sɩ n ta n te n tɩtɩ, sɩ n sɛ sɩ kʋ ji kʋntʋ.
Wʋlʋ maama dɛɛn na yɩ nɔɔnʋ gambaa yɩ Wɛ bǝŋ-o sɩ o taa tɔgɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn, kʋntʋ tu daa daɩ sʋtaanɩgambaa, dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm na vrɩ-o tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wʋlʋ dɩ dɛɛn na te o tɩtɩ yɩ Wɛ bǝŋ-o sɩ o taa tɔgɩ-DƖ tɩn, kʋntʋ tu laan sɛ Zezi Krisi ni, nɩ o yɩ o gambaa mʋ te.
Á yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna mʋ.
DƖ yǝgi abam dɩ yǝlo kʋlʋ na cana tɩn mʋ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, yɩ zaŋɩ á sɛ sɩ á ji nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ gambaa.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, a ko-biǝ-ba, abam maama dɛɛn na yɩ te yɩ Wɛ bǝŋi abam sɩ á taá tɔgɩ-DƖ tɩn, á ta taá yɩ kʋntʋ DƖ yigǝ nɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ, a laan lagɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ balʋ na wʋ zʋ banna dɩ balʋ na wʋ di kaana tɩn woŋo mʋ.
Kʋ daɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi mʋ pɛ-nɩ ni dɩntʋ, kʋ yɩ amʋ tɩtɩ na bʋŋɩ te tɩn mʋ, yɩ á wʋ́ taá jɩgɩ amʋ cɩga, dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm na wʋra dɩ amʋ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Amʋ bʋŋɩ nɩ, yaara yalʋ na wʋ dɩbam baŋa nɩ lele kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋʋ́ ta lamma sɩ nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o di kaanɩ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, wʋlʋ na maŋɩ o jɩgɩ kaanɩ, o daa yɩ zaŋɩ o yag-o.
Wʋlʋ nan na ba jɩgɩ kaanɩ, o daa yɩ zaŋɩ o taa kwaanɩ sɩ o di kaanɩ.
Kʋ daɩ nɩ, n na di kaanɩ, n ga n kɩ wo-lɔŋɔ.
Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ, bukɔ na zʋ barʋ, o kɩ wo-lɔŋɔ.
Banna dɩ ba kaana nan bá lu lʋgʋ baŋa yaara yam wʋnɩ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ a ba lagɩ sɩ abam dɩ tɔgɩ á na yaara yam kʋntʋ doŋ.
A ko-biǝ-ba, woŋo kʋlʋ na pɛ a ta kʋntʋ tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ maŋa kam daa mʋ ba tiini ka daga, sɩ dɩ́ maa tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam.
Kʋ na zɩgɩ lele kʋntʋ sɩ kʋ ta maa ve tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ balʋ na jɩgɩ kaana tɩn taa tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam nɩ ba wʋ di kaana mʋ te.
Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ balʋ wʋrʋ na cɔgɩ tɩn taa tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam nɩ ba wʋrʋ wʋ cɔgɩ mʋ te, sɩ balʋ wʋrʋ na poli tɩn taa tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam nɩ ba wʋrʋ wʋ poli mʋ te, sɩ balʋ na yǝgi wǝǝnu tɩn taa tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam nɩ ba ba te wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ mʋ te.
Kʋ daarɩ sɩ balʋ na tʋŋɩ lʋgʋ baŋa tɩtʋŋa tɩn taa tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam nɩ ba ba jɩgɩ lʋgʋ baŋa tɩtʋŋa mʋ te.
Bɛŋwaanɩ lʋgʋ kʋm lagɩ kʋ ti mʋ dɩ kʋ wǝǝnu tɩm maama.
Amʋ ba lagɩ sɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ liǝ taa jɩgɩ abam.
Wʋlʋ na ba jɩgɩ kaanɩ tɩn yǝni o kwe o wʋbʋŋa maama o pa dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩtʋŋa yam yɩranɩ má ŋwaanɩ mʋ, yɩ o kwaanɩ sɩ o taa tʋŋɩ o poli o wʋ.
Wʋlʋ nan na jɩgɩ kaanɩ tɩn yǝni o kwe o wʋbʋŋa o kɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wǝǝnu wʋnɩ mʋ, yɩ o kwaanɩ sɩ o taa tʋŋɩ o poli o kaanɩ wʋ.
Kʋ ma brɩ nɩ o wʋbʋŋa yam cɛ kuni bɩle mʋ.
Kʋ yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ dɩ bukɔ naa kaanɩ wʋlʋ na ba jɩgɩ barʋ tɩn dɩ.
Wʋntʋ kwe o wʋbʋŋa maama mʋ o pa dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩtʋŋa yam ŋwaanɩ, o na lagɩ sɩ o yɩra dɩ o joro maama taa yɩ Wɛ nyɩm tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ kaanɩ wʋlʋ na jɩgɩ barʋ tɩn kwe o wʋbʋŋa o kɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wǝǝnu wʋnɩ mʋ, yɩ o kwaanɩ sɩ o taa tʋŋɩ o poli o barʋ wʋ.
Amʋ nan tɛ bɩtarɩ sɩntʋ sɩ kʋ wǝli abam mʋ.
Kʋ daɩ nɩ a lagɩ sɩ a fɩn abam.
A nan lagɩ sɩ a pa á taá tɔgɩ cwǝ-laa mʋ lanyɩranɩ, sɩ á nywanɩ á yigǝ á taá tʋŋɩ á pa dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi, sɩ á yɩ taá jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋa yale yale.
Kʋ daarɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na bʋŋɩ nɩ o wʋ kɩ o katɔgɔ lanyɩranɩ o na wʋ di-o tɩn ŋwaanɩ, yɩ o fra na tiini ya zʋ o katɔgɔ kʋm kʋ pa o daa warɩ o tɩtɩ o ja, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ o di-o mʋ nɩ o na bʋŋɩ te tɩn.
O na kɩ kʋntʋ, o wʋ kɩ wo-lɔŋɔ.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ nan na lɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ o yɩ di o katɔgɔ kʋm yɩ o waɩ o tɩtɩ o jaana, sɩ o daa yɩ di kaanɩ tɩn, o kɩ lanyɩranɩ mʋ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, wʋlʋ na di kaanɩ tɩn kɩ lanyɩranɩ.
Wʋlʋ nan na wʋ di kaanɩ tɩn mʋ tiini o kɩ lanyɩranɩ o dwǝni.
Kaanɩ na jɩgɩ barʋ, yɩ o barʋ wʋm ta na ŋwɩ, o ba jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ o yag-o.
O barʋ wʋm nan na tɩga, o laan jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ o zʋ o na lagɩ wʋlʋ tɩn.
O nan maŋɩ sɩ o zʋ wʋlʋ dɩ na sɛ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn mʋ.
Amʋ nan bʋŋɩ nɩ o na je o yɩranɩ, oó ta jɩgɩ wʋpolo zanzan kʋ dwe o daa na zʋ barʋ.
Wɛ Jorokʋm dɩ wʋ amʋ tee nɩ, yɩ a bʋŋɩ nɩ kʋntʋ mʋ pɛ-nɩ wʋbʋŋa yam kʋntʋ.
Pooli na ŋɔɔnɩ jwǝnǝ nwana woŋo te tɩn A laan lagɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ jwǝnǝ nwana taanɩ mʋ dɩ abam.
Kʋ yɩ cɩga, dɩ́ maama jɩgɩ yǝno, nɩ abam na tɛ te tɩn.
Nan taá ye-na nɩ, nɔɔnʋ na jɩgɩ yǝno, kʋ pa-o kamunni mʋ.
Nɔɔnʋ nan na jɩgɩ sono, kʋ jɩgɩ zǝnǝ kʋ paɩ o ve yigǝ mʋ.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na bʋŋɩ nɩ o jɩgɩ yǝno, kʋ brɩ nɩ o ta yǝri kʋlʋ na maŋɩ sɩ o taa ye tɩn mʋ.
Wʋlʋ nan na soe Wɛ tɩn, Wɛ ye kʋntʋ tu.
Kʋ na yɩ jwǝnǝ nwana yam dim taanɩ, dɩ́ ye nɩ jwǝnǝ ba ŋwɩ, Baŋa-Wɛ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ wʋra.
Balʋ na ba tɔgɩ Wɛ tɩn jɩgɩ wǝǝnu tɩdonnǝ mʋ ba maa bǝ ba wa.
Wǝǝnu dwi zanzan mʋ nɔɔna bǝ-tɩ nɩ ba wa dɩ ba yuu tiinǝ, kʋ na yɩ tɩga baŋa wǝǝnu dɩ wɛyuu wǝǝnu.
Kʋ nan na yɩ dɩbam, dɩ́ ye nɩ Wɛ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ wʋra.
Dɩntʋ mʋ yɩ dɩbam Ko wʋlʋ na kɩ woŋo maama, yɩ dɩntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ ŋwɩ.
Dɩ́ ta ye nɩ, dɩbam Yuutu yɩ dɩdʋa mʋ, wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi wʋlʋ Wɛ na tagɩ o ŋwaanɩ DƖ kɩ woŋo maama tɩn, yɩ wʋntʋ mʋ paɩ dɩbam ŋwɩa.
Kʋ nan daɩ nɔɔnʋ maama mʋ ye nɩ jwǝnǝ ba jɩgɩ dam.
Nɔɔna badaara dɛɛn ŋwɩ dɩ jwǝnǝ kaanɩm mʋ, yɩ ba laan ba ba sɛ Wɛ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ ba kwarɩ fʋʋnɩ yɩ ba bʋŋɩ nɩ, ba na di jwǝni wʋdiu, kʋʋ́ ta nyɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ ba joori ba sɛ jwǝnǝ kaanɩm mʋ.
Ba wʋbʋŋa ta na wʋ bɩgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ tɩn, ba bʋŋɩ nɩ ba kɩ ba cɔgɩ mʋ.
Wʋdiu dim nan bá wanɩ kʋ pa dɩ́ twɛ Wɛ.
Dɩ́ na culi wʋdiiru naa dɩ́ zɩ ba culǝ dɩ, kʋ ba zǝni dɩbam dɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ naa dɩ́ ga kʋlʋkʋlʋ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ kʋ ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ abam balʋ na ye nɩ á jɩgɩ ni sɩ á di kʋlʋ maama á na lagɩ tɩn, á nan cʋ-na á tɩtɩ sɩ á yɩ pa balʋ wʋbʋŋa na wʋ bɩgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ tɩn tusi.
Nmʋ wʋlʋ na paɩ n jɩgɩ yǝno tɩn na ve n zʋ jwǝni digǝ n tɔgɩ n di dɩ wʋdiu kʋm, yɩ n ko-bu wʋlʋ wʋbʋŋa na wʋ bɩgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ tɩn na nɛ-m, kʋntʋ wʋ́ wanɩ kʋ gan-o sɩ o dɩ vu o tɔgɩ o di.
Kʋntʋ, o na dɛ o di jwǝni wʋdiu kʋm, kʋ brɩ nɩ nmʋ mʋ mɛ n yǝno kʋm n ma n cɔgɩ n ko-bu wʋlʋ wʋbʋŋa ta na wʋ bɩgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ yɩ Zezi Krisi ya tɩ o dɩ ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Nmʋ na kɩ kǝm-balɔrɔ kʋm kʋntʋ doŋ n yagɩ n ko-bu yuu nɩ, yɩ n cɔgɩ o wʋbʋŋa o ta na wʋ bɩgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ n kɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi mʋ te.
Kʋntʋ, wʋdiu dim na lagɩ kʋ pa a ko-bu tusi Wɛ cwǝŋǝ nɩ, a daa bá fɔgɩ a di wʋdiu kʋm kʋntʋ, a na ba lagɩ sɩ a pa a ko-bu tusi Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ tɩntʋŋnʋ na jɩgɩ ni sɩ o kɩ te tɩn Amʋ ba jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ a kɩ a na lagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn na?
Amʋ daɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ na?
Abam bʋŋɩ nɩ a wʋ nɛ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi mʋ na?
Abam mʋ yɩ tɩtʋŋa yalʋ a na tʋŋɩ a pa dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn, á na dɛ amʋ jɩŋa á na vrɩm tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Nɔɔna badaara na maŋɩ ba ba bʋŋɩ nɩ amʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ cɩga cɩga, abam bá wanɩ á vɩn nɩ amʋ daɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ.
Abam na ŋwɩ dɩdaanɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi te tɩn mʋ brɩ nɩ amʋ sɩɩnɩ a yɩ o tɩntʋŋnʋ mʋ.
Nɔɔna na lwɛ amʋ, a na wʋ́ lǝri-ba te tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ: Abam bʋŋɩ nɩ, dɩbam balʋ na yɩ Wɛ tɩntʋŋna tɩn ya ba jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ dɩ́ joŋi dɩ́ ni-wʋdiu dɩ́ tɩtʋŋa yam ŋwaanɩ mʋ na?
Dɩbam ya ba jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ dɩ́ di kaana balʋ na sɛ Zezi tɩn, sɩ dɩ́ taá tɔgɩ daanɩ dɩ́ beerǝ, nɩnɛɛnɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩntʋŋna babam bam dɩ o nyaana dɩ Pɩyɛɛrɩ na yǝni ba kɩ te tɩn na?
Amʋ dɩ Banabasɩ yɩranɩ nan mʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá tʋŋɩ dɩ́ lagɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ ni-wʋdiu na?
Nɔɔnʋ na yɩ pamaŋnʋ, o bá wanɩ o joori o ŋwɩ o tɩtɩ.
Nɔɔnʋ jɩgɩ kara yɩ o ba di ka wǝǝnu na?
Nɔɔnʋ jɩgɩ naanɩ o tɔga yɩ o ba di dɩ nayɩla na?
Kʋ daɩ lʋgʋ baŋa mɩmaŋa yantʋ yɩranɩ mʋ brɩ dɩbam cɩga kam kʋntʋ.
Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm dɩ maŋɩ kʋ brɩ kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ.
Kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ cullu tɩlʋ DƖ na pɛ Moyisitɩn tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Nmʋ na jɩgɩ nabɩa n ma n nwanɩ wo-vaalʋ, yɩ kɩ tampɔgɔ ka ni nɩ.» Wɛ na tagɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ yɩ nabɩa kam yɩranɩ ŋwaanɩ mʋ na?
Aye, kʋ yɩ dɩbam ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na vagɩ dɩ wʋlʋ na wʋra o kɩ faa tɩn maama tɩɩnɩ nɩ baá na ba tǝri mʋ.
Dɩbam na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam dɩ abam tɩn, kʋ nyɩ dɩ dɩ́ dugi Wɛ cɩga kam mʋ á bɩcara nɩ.
Kʋ nan wʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ joŋi dɩ́ ni-wʋdiu abam tee nɩ na?
Abam na paɩ nɔɔna badonnǝ ba ni-wʋdiu tɩn, kʋ ya wʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩbam joŋi dɩ́ dwǝni bantʋ na?
Nan dɩ kʋ dɩ, dɩbam wʋ bwe sɩ dɩ́ joŋi dɩ́ ni-wʋdiu abam tee nɩ, nɩ dɩ́ ya na jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ dɩ́ kɩ te tɩn.
Dɩ́ nan vɔgɩ dɩ́ wʋ mʋ woŋo maama baŋa nɩ, sɩ kʋ yɩ wanɩ kʋ cɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam.
Á tɩtɩ maŋɩ á ye nɩ balʋ na tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa DƖ di-kamunu kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn yǝni ba joŋi ba ni-wʋdiu dáanɩ mʋ.
Balʋ dɩ na joŋi vara ba ma kaanɩ Wɛ tɩn dɩ joŋi ba tǝri kʋ wʋnɩ mʋ.
Kʋ nan yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ dɩ balʋ dɩ na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩn.
Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi pɛ ni nɩ ba dɩ maŋɩ sɩ ba joŋi ba ni-wʋdiu tɩtʋŋɩ dɩm kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Nan dɩ kʋ dɩ, amʋ wʋ bwe sɩ a joŋi kʋlʋkʋlʋ abam tee nɩ.
Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ a pʋpʋnɩ tɩntʋ sɩ a ma joŋi woŋo mʋ abam tee nɩ.
Aá tɩ mʋ, sɩ a bá fɔgɩ a za a na yɩ te tɩn.
A bá sɛ a pa nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ cwǝŋǝ sɩ o cɔgɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na yɩ amʋ wʋpolo nyɩm tɩn.
A bá wanɩ a magɩ a nyɔɔnɩ a na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋntʋ yɩ fɩfɩʋn mʋ sɩ a kɩ.
Amʋ ya na yagɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɔɔlɩm, kʋʋ́ ta yɩ lɛɛrʋ mʋ dɩ amʋ.
Amʋ tɩtɩ mʋ nan ya na lɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ a taa tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam, a ya wʋ́ ta tɩɩnɩ sɩ a joŋi ŋwɩɩrʋ mʋ kʋ ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ nan daɩ a tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa mʋ a kɩa, kʋ yɩ Wɛ mʋ kwe-ka DƖ kɩ amʋ jɩŋa nɩ.
Kʋntʋ, bɛɛ ŋwɩɩrʋ mʋ amʋ wʋ́ joŋi?
Amʋ nyɔɔrɩ mʋ yɩ a na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam zaanɩ, yɩ a ba bwe sɩ a joŋi kʋlʋkʋlʋ kʋ ŋwaanɩ, nɩ a ya na jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ a kɩ te tɩn.
A te a tɩtɩ mʋ, a daɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ gambaa.
Amʋ tɩtɩ nan mʋ pɛ a ji gambaa nɔɔna maama tee nɩ, sɩ a wanɩ a joŋi nɔɔna zanzan a kɩ Wɛ jɩŋa nɩ.
Amʋ na wʋ Zwifǝbam tee nɩ, a yǝni a tɔgɩ a kɩ nɩ Zwifǝ bam na kɩ te tɩn mʋ, sɩ a ma wanɩ a joŋi-ba a kɩ Wɛ jɩŋa nɩ.
Wɛ cullu tɩlʋ DƖ na pɛ Zwifǝ bam tɩn ya ba tɔgɩ tɩ te amʋ.
Amʋ nan na zʋʋrɩ dɩ Zwifǝ tɩn, a dɛ a sɛ-tɩ mʋ, sɩ a wanɩ a joŋi tɩ na te balʋ tɩn a kɩ Wɛ jɩŋa nɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ, a na yǝni a wʋ dwi-gɛtiinǝ balʋ na ba tɔgɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm tɩn tee nɩ, a dɩ tɔgɩ a kɩ nɩ bantʋ na kɩ te tɩn mʋ, sɩ a ma wanɩ a joŋi-ba a kɩ Wɛ jɩŋa nɩ.
Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ a yigǝ tǝrǝ dɩdaanɩ Wɛ niǝ yam, kʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi niǝ yam mʋ te amʋ.
Kʋ daarɩ, kʋ na yɩ balʋ wʋbʋŋa na wʋ bɩgɩ dɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam tɔgɩm tɩn, a yǝni a ji nɩ bantʋ dɩ mʋ te, sɩ a ma wanɩ a joŋi-ba a kɩ Wɛ jɩŋa nɩ.
Amʋ na wʋ nɔɔna balʋ maama tee nɩ, a yǝni a ji nɩ bantʋ mʋ te, yɩ a kwaanɩ a kɩ a na wʋ́ kɩ te sɩ a ma joŋi ba badaara a kɩ Wɛ jɩŋa nɩ.
Amʋ nan kɩ wǝǝnu tɩntʋ maama sɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam mʋ wanɩ ka vu yigǝ, sɩ a dɩ tɔgɩ a na a pɛɛrɩ DƖ wo-laarʋ tɩm wʋnɩ.
Abam ye nɩ, nɔɔna na wʋra ba durǝ, nɔɔnʋ maama mʋ kwaanɩ sɩ o di yigǝ, yɩ ba dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ wʋ́ di o joŋi pɛɛrɩ dɩm.
Nan kwaanɩ-na kʋntʋ doŋ, sɩ á wanɩ á di yigǝ sɩ á joŋi pɛɛrɩ dɩm.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ maama na lagɩ sɩ o duri tɩn yǝni o tiini o kwaanɩ mʋ o kɩ o tɩtɩ o kɩ daanɩ.
Bantʋ nan yǝni ba kwaanɩ kʋntʋ sɩ ba joŋi pɛɛrɩ mʋ, yɩ ba pɛɛrɩ dɩm kʋntʋ bá daanɩ dɩ cɔgɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ dɩbam pɛɛrɩ dɩlʋ dɩ́ na lagɩ dɩ́ joŋi Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn bá fɔgɩ dɩ cɔgɩ maŋa dɩ maŋa.
Kʋntʋ, amʋ ba duri nɩ wʋlʋ na yǝri durim yɩ o duri yɔɔ yɔɔ te tɩn.
A nan ba magɩ jara nɩ wʋlʋ na yǝri jara magɩm yɩ o magɩ yɔɔ yɔɔ te tɩn.
Amʋ nan kwaanɩ a tiini a fɩn a tɩtɩ mʋ, sɩ a pa a yɩra yam lwarɩ nɩ amʋ mʋ te-ya.
A kɩ kʋntʋ sɩ kʋ yɩ pa, a na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam a brɩ nɔɔna badonnǝ tɩn, sɩ amʋ tɩtɩ laan ba a ga pɛɛrɩ mʋ DƖ tee nɩ.
Wɛ nɔɔna wʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba taa zuli jwǝnǝ A ko-biǝ-ba, amʋ lagɩ sɩ á guli kʋlʋ dɛɛn na kɩ dɩ́ kwǝ nakwa balʋ na dɛ Moyisikwaga ba nuŋi Ezipinɩ tɩn woŋo mʋ.
Wɛ dɛɛn pɛ kunkoŋo mʋ kwǝli ba maama, yɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ pɔɔrɩ nɩnɩʋ kʋm na bam kuni bɩle DƖ daarɩ cwǝŋǝ, yɩ ba maama tɔgɩ da ba kɛ.
Kʋntʋ na kɩ tɩn, kʋ nyɩ dɩ bantʋ maama dɛɛn miisi na wʋnɩ mʋ, sɩ ba taa yɩ Moyisi karabiǝ, kunkoŋo kʋm na kwǝli-ba yɩ ba da nɩnɩʋ kʋm wʋ ba kɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ dɛɛn ma pa ba maama di wʋdiu dɩdʋa, yɩ ba daarɩ ba nyɔ na bɩdwɩ.
Na balʋ ba maama dɛɛn na nyɔgɩ tɩn nuŋi piu kʋdoŋ yɩra mʋ, yɩ piu kʋm kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ wo-kɩnkagɩlɩ dɩlʋ Wɛ na kɩa, sɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ Zezi Krisi tɩtɩ mʋ tɔgɩ o wʋ ba tee nɩ.
Nan dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, Wɛ wʋ dɛɛn wʋ poli dɩ nɔɔna zanzan ba wʋnɩ.
DƖ dɛɛn ma pa ba zanzan tɩ ba maŋɩ kagʋa kam wʋnɩ.
Wǝǝnu tɩntʋ maama nan kɩ sɩ tɩ brɩ dɩbam mʋ, sɩ dɩ́ daa yɩ ta pa dɩ́ fra zʋʋrɩ wo-balwaarʋ nɩnɛɛnɩ bantʋ na kɩ te tɩn.
Á yɩ zaŋɩ á zuli jwǝnǝ, nɩ bantʋ badaara dɛɛn na kɩ te tɩn.
Kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam dɛɛn jǝni ba di wʋdiu ba daarɩ ba nyɔ, yɩ ba laan zaŋɩ ba sa ba kwɛɛra.» Á yɩ zaŋɩ á pa dɩ́ taá boorǝ, nɩ bantʋ badaara dɛɛn na kɩ te yɩ ba nɔɔna mʋrr-fiinle-tɩtɔ tɩ dɛ dɩdʋa wʋnɩ tɩn.
Á yɩ pa-na dɩ́ maŋɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Baŋa-Wɛ dam dɩ́ nii, nɩ bantʋ badaara dɛɛn na kɩ te yɩ bɩsankwɩ dʋ-ba sɩ gʋ tɩn.
Á yɩ taá pʋʋnɩ dɩ Wɛ, nɩ bantʋ badaara dɛɛn na kɩ te yɩ tʋʋnɩ malɛka kam gʋ-ba tɩn.
Wǝǝnu tɩntʋ maama dɛɛn nan kɩ dɩ́ kwǝ nakwa bam, sɩ tɩ taa yɩ maana mʋ tɩ pa dɩbam.
Tɩ nan pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ, sɩ kʋ wanɩ kʋ kaanɩ dɩbam balʋ ta na ŋwɩ yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa tiim da yam batwarɩ tɩn mʋ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, wʋlʋ na bʋŋɩ nɩ o zɩgɩ lanyɩranɩ tɩn nan fɔgɩ o yɩrɩ o tɩtɩ sɩ o yɩ tʋ.
Woŋo kʋlʋ maama na maŋɩ abam sɩ á tusi tɩn waɩ kʋ yi nɔɔnʋ maama.
Wɛ nan yɩ cɩga tu mʋ, DƖ bá sɛ sɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na maŋɩ abam tɩn dwǝni abam dam.
DƖ nan wʋ́ pa abam dam, sɩ á wanɩ á na cwǝŋǝ á nuŋi kʋ wʋnɩ maŋa kam kʋntʋ nɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, a badon-sonnu-ba, lɩ-na á tɩtɩ jwǝnǝ kaanɩm wʋnɩ.
Amʋ nan lagɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ dɩ abam nɩ swan tiinǝ mʋ te, sɩ á bʋŋɩ á nii a taanɩ dɩm yɩ cɩga mʋ naa vwan mʋ.
Dɩ́ na yǝni dɩ́ wʋra dɩ́ di Zezi Krisi tʋʋnɩ gulim wʋdiu kʋm, dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ kwe zʋŋa mʋ dɩ ka wʋ wo-nyɔɔrʋ yɩ dɩ́ kɩ Wɛ le tɩ ŋwaanɩ, yɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ nyɔ.
Dɩ́ na kɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ dɩbam maama tɔgɩ dɩ́ sɛ nɩ Zezi Krisi jana kam nuŋi dɩbam ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Dɩ́ daa ta na yǝni dɩ́ kwe dɩpɛ dɩm dɩ́ fɔ fɔ dɩ́ di tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ dɩbam maama tɔgɩ dɩ́ sɛ nɩ o yɩra yam cɔgɩ dɩbam ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Kʋ daɩ kʋntʋ na?
Dɩbam maama na fɔgɩ dɩpɛ dɩdʋa kam dɩ́ di tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ dɩbam maama yɩ nɔɔnʋ dɩdʋa mʋ, dɩ́ ya zɩ maŋɩ dɩ́ daga te maama dɩ.
Nan bʋŋɩ-na Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam na yǝni ba ma wǝǝnu tɩlʋ ba kaanɩ Wɛ yɩ ba daarɩ ba di tɩn woŋo.
Balʋ maama na dɛ ba di tɩn dɩ tɔgɩ ba sɛ kaanɩm dɩm mʋ.
Amʋ na tagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn brɩ bɛɛn?
Kʋ brɩ nɩ wʋdiu kʋlʋ ba na mɛ ba kaanɩ jwǝnǝ tɩn jɩgɩ kuri mʋ na?
Naa kʋ brɩ nɩ jwǝnǝ yam tɩtɩ mʋ jɩgɩ kuri?
Awo, kʋ daɩ kʋntʋ.
Amʋ lagɩ a brɩ abam nɩ, jwǝ-kaana na kaanɩ dɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ tɩn, ba paɩ ciciri mʋ sɩ kʋ daɩ Wɛ.
Amʋ nan ba lagɩ sɩ abam na wǝl-dɔnɔ dɩ ciciri.
Kʋ nan wʋ maŋɩ sɩ á nyɔ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wo-nyɔɔrʋ tɩm, sɩ á kwǝri á vu á nyɔ dɩ ciciri.
Abam nan bá wanɩ á jǝni á di dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tʋʋnɩ gulim wʋdiu kʋm, sɩ á kwǝri á vu á da á di wʋdiu kʋlʋ na wʋ́ pa á taá ŋwɩ dɩ ciciri tɩn.
Á yɩ pa-na dɩ́ kɩ kʋlʋ na wʋ́ zaŋɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm wʋ tɩn.
Abam bʋŋɩ á paɩ dɩbam jɩgɩ dam dɩ́ dwe wʋntʋ mʋ na?
Dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ pa Wɛ na zulǝ mʋ dɩ́ tɩtʋŋa maama wʋnɩ Abam badaara na tɛ á wɩ, á jɩgɩ ni sɩ á kɩ kʋlʋ maama á na lagɩ tɩn, kʋ yɩ cɩga.
Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ woŋo maama mʋ jɩgɩ kuri kʋ pa dɩbam.
Kʋ ta daɩ nɩ woŋo maama mʋ jɩgɩ zǝnǝ.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o taa lagɩ o tɩtɩ zǝnǝ má.
O nan maŋɩ sɩ o taa kɩ lanyɩranɩ o zǝni o donnǝ dɩ mʋ.
Á jɩgɩ ni sɩ á yǝgi nwana yalʋ maama ba na jɩgɩ ba yǝgi yaga nɩ tɩn á di.
Nan yɩ bwe-na á nii ya yɩ jwǝnǝ nwana mʋ na, sɩ kʋʋ́ pa liǝ ja abam kʋ ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Lʋgʋ baŋa dɩ kʋ wǝǝnu maama yɩ Baŋa-Wɛ nyɩm mʋ.» Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na ba tɔgɩ Zezi tɩn na bǝŋi abam sɩ á vu o sɔŋɔ á di wʋdiu dɩd-o, yɩ á na sɛ á vu, o na kwe wʋdiu kʋlʋ maama o pa abam tɩn, sɩ á di.
Á yɩ zaŋɩ-na á bwe kʋ kuri, sɩ kʋʋ́ ta jɩgɩ liǝ dɩ abam.
Nɔɔnʋ nan na tagɩ dɩ abam o wɩ, wʋdiu kʋntʋ yɩ ba mɛ ba kaanɩ jwǝni mʋ, sɩ á daa yɩ zaŋɩ á di, bɛŋwaanɩ liǝ wʋ́ zʋ nɔɔnʋ wʋm kʋntʋ bɩcarɩ.
Kʋ daɩ nɩ á yagɩ kʋ dim liǝ na wʋ́ zʋ abam tɩtɩ bɩcarɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ, kʋ yɩ liǝ na wʋ́ ja wʋlʋ na tagɩ o brɩ abam tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Dɛdoŋ abam waɩ á bwe amʋ á nii, bɛŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ yagɩ dɩ́ na jɩgɩ ni sɩ dɩ́ kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, kʋ yɩ liǝ na wʋ́ zʋ nɔɔna badonnǝ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ?
Abam daa ta waɩ á bwe amʋ nɩ, dɩ́ na kɩ Wɛ le wʋdiu kʋm ŋwaanɩ yɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ di tɩn, nɔɔnʋ daa wʋ́ lwɛ dɩbam bɛɛ ŋwaanɩ mʋ?
Kʋ nan na yɩ te tɩn, woŋo kʋlʋ maama abam na wʋ́ kɩ tɩn, kʋ na yɩ á na wʋ́ di naa á nyɔ naa kǝm dɩlʋ maama á na wʋ́ kɩ tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á taá kɩ kʋlʋ maama na wʋ́ pa Wɛ na zulǝ kʋ ŋwaanɩ tɩn mʋ.
Á yɩ taá kɩ-na kʋlʋ na wʋ́ cɔgɩ nɔɔna wʋbʋŋa tɩn, kʋ ya zɩ yɩ Zwifǝ bam naa dwi-gɛ tiinǝ naa Wɛ nɔn-kɔgɔ kʋm dɩ.
Taá kɩ-na nɩ amʋ na kɩ te tɩn.
Woŋo kʋlʋ maama amʋ na kɩ tɩn, a kwaanɩ sɩ kʋ taa poli nɔɔna maama wʋ mʋ.
Amʋ ba lagɩ a tɩtɩ yɩranɩ zǝnǝ.
A lagɩ sɩ a zǝni nɔɔna maama mʋ, sɩ kʋ wanɩ kʋ pa Wɛ vrɩ-ba DƖ yagɩ.
Taá lwǝni-na amʋ, nɩ amʋ na lwǝni Zezi Krisi te tɩn.
Zezi mʋ yɩ baara dɩ kaana maama yuutu Abam kɩ cɩga lanyɩranɩ dɩdaanɩ á na yǝni á guli amʋ gulǝ, yɩ á kwǝri á sɛ zaasɩm dɩlʋ maama a na brɩ abam tɩn.
Amʋ nan lagɩ sɩ abam lwarɩ nɩ, Zezi Krisi mʋ yɩ nɔɔnʋ maama yuutu.
Kaanɩ dɩ yuutu maa yɩ o barʋ.
Baŋa-Wɛ nan mʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi dɩ yuutu.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, á na jeeri daanɩ sɩ á warɩ Wɛ, yɩ baarʋ na zaŋɩ sɩ o loori Wɛ naa o ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ, yɩ o na mɛ woŋo o kwǝli o yuu, kʋntʋ tu yáalɩ o yuutu wʋm mʋ.
Kaanɩ dɩ nan na zaŋɩ sɩ o loori Wɛ naa o ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ, yɩ o na wʋ mɛ woŋo o kwǝli o yuu, o dɩ yáalɩ o yuutu wʋm mʋ.
O na kɩ kʋntʋ, o dɩ wʋlʋ na ceeri o yuu tɩn maama yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ.
Kaanɩ na wʋ sɛ sɩ o kwǝli o yuu, kʋ ya maŋɩ sɩ o cɔ-kʋ mʋ naa o ceeri-kʋ.
Kʋ nan na jɩgɩ cavɩɩra sɩ kaanɩ kɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa kwǝli-kʋ mʋ.
Baara nan ba jɩgɩ sɩ ba kwǝli ba yuni, bɛŋwaanɩ bantʋ jɩgɩ Wɛ nyɩnyʋgʋ mʋ, yɩ ba brɩ DƖ zulǝ na yɩ te.
Kʋ nan na yɩ kaana, bantʋ mʋ brɩ baara zulǝ na yɩ te.
Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ mɛ baarʋ yɩra mʋ DƖ kɩ kaanɩ, sɩ kʋ daɩ kaanɩ yɩra mʋ DƖ mɛ DƖ kɩ baarʋ.
Kʋntʋ, Wɛ wʋ kɩ baarʋ kaanɩ ŋwaanɩ, DƖ kɩ kaanɩ mʋ baarʋ ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, dɩ Wɛ malɛsɩsɩm ŋwaanɩ, kaana maŋɩ sɩ ba taa kwǝli ba yuni, sɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ ba jɩgɩ ni sɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ kɔgɔ kʋm wʋnɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ, dɩbam balʋ maama na wʋ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn, kaanɩ ba te o tɩtɩ baarʋ tee nɩ, baarʋ dɩ nan ba te o tɩtɩ kaanɩ tee nɩ.
Wɛ sɩɩnɩ DƖ ma baarʋ yɩra mʋ DƖ kɩ kaanɩ, yɩ kaanɩ dɩ nan mʋ lʋrɩ baarʋ.
Woŋo maama nan nuŋi Wɛ te mʋ.
Abam tɩtɩ nan bʋŋɩ-na á nii.
Kaanɩ na zaŋɩ sɩ o loori Wɛ, yɩ o na wʋ kwe woŋo o ma kwǝli o yuu, kʋ lamma na?
Nɔɔna maama ye nɩ, baarʋ yuuywe na tiini sɩ dwara, kʋ yɩ cavɩɩra mʋ kʋ paɩ o tɩtɩ.
Kʋ nan na yɩ kaanɩ, o yuuywe na tiini sɩ nuŋi sɩ daga, kʋ zul-o mʋ.
Kʋ yɩ o dɩ Wɛ pɛɛrɩ mʋ, sɩ sɩ taa daga yɩ sɩ kwǝli o yuu.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ nan na wʋ sɛ amʋ zaasɩm dɩm kʋntʋ yɩ o magɩ kantɔgɔ dɩ baŋa nɩ tɩn, kʋntʋ tu taa ye nɩ dɩbam maama tɔgɩ kantʋ cwǝŋǝ kam mʋ, yɩ Wɛ nɔn-kɔgɔ kʋm je maama nɩ tɩn dɩ tɔgɩ kantʋ mʋ.
Dɩ́ na maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ di Zezi tʋʋnɩ gulim wʋdiu kʋm te tɩn Woŋo kʋlʋ amʋ na lagɩ a ta dɩ abam tɩn, a ba lagɩ a tee abam nɩ á kɩ lanyɩranɩ.
Abam na yǝni á jeeri daanɩ tɩn, á cɔgɩm mʋ dwe á fɔgɩm.
Dayigǝ woŋo, amʋ ni nɩ á na yǝni á jeeri daanɩ sɩ á zuli Wɛ, á jɩgɩ kampwara mʋ daanɩ.
Amʋ bʋŋɩ nɩ kʋ sɩɩnɩ kʋʋ́ ta yɩ cɩga mʋ.
Kʋ nan fɩn mʋ sɩ kampwara taa wʋ abam tɩtarɩ nɩ, sɩ kʋ brɩ balʋ na sɩɩnɩ ba tɔgɩ Zezi dɩ cɩga tɩn.
Abam na yǝni á jeeri daanɩ sɩ á di dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tʋʋnɩ gulim wʋdiu kʋm tɩn, á ba kɩ nɩ á na maŋɩ sɩ á kɩ te tɩn.
Bɛŋwaanɩ nɔɔnʋ maama yǝni o lɔgɩrɩ o di o tɩtɩ wʋdiu kʋm mʋ.
Abam nan na kɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ pɛ kana jɩgɩ badonnǝ, yɩ á badonnǝ nyɔ á su á ja gaalɩ.
Abam ya na lagɩ sɩ á di dim dɩm kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn, á ya wʋ́ di á tɩtɩ sam nɩ mʋ.
Abam lagɩ sɩ á cɔgɩ Wɛ nɔn-kɔgɔ kʋm yuu mʋ na?
Abam lagɩ sɩ á pa cavɩɩra mʋ ja yinigǝ tiinǝ balʋ na wʋ á kɔgɔ kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn na?
Abam lagɩ sɩ amʋ ta bɛɛ mʋ dɩ abam?
Nɩ á kɩ lanyɩranɩ mʋ na?
A bá wanɩ a ta nɩ á kɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ kʋntʋ woŋo.
Cɩga kalʋ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na brɩ-nɩ o tʋʋnɩ gulim wʋdiu kʋm ŋwaanɩ tɩn mʋ a zaasɩ abam, kʋ yɩ sɩ tɩtɩɩ dɩlʋ ba na jaanɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn mʋ o kwe dɩpɛ, yɩ o kɩ Wɛ le dɩ ŋwaanɩ o daarɩ o fɔ fɔ o pa o karabiǝ bam, yɩ o wɩ: «Amʋ yɩra yam mʋ tɩntʋ, ya na lagɩ ya cɔgɩ abam ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Taá kɩ-na kʋntʋ doŋ sɩ á taá ma guli amʋ gulǝ.» Ba na di ba ti tɩn, o daa ma kwe zʋŋa dɩ ka wʋ wo-nyɔɔrʋ yɩ o kɩ Wɛ le tɩ ŋwaanɩ, yɩ o wɩ: «Wo-nyɔɔrʋ tɩntʋ brɩ nɩ Wɛ goni ni-dʋʋrɩ mʋ dɩdaanɩ nabiinǝ amʋ jana kam ŋwaanɩ.
Maŋa kalʋ maama á na lagɩ á nyɔ-tɩ tɩn, sɩ á kɩ-na kʋntʋ á taá ma guli amʋ gulǝ.» Bɛŋwaanɩ, maŋa kalʋ maama á na di dɩpɛ dɩm kʋntʋ yɩ á nyɔ wo-nyɔɔrʋ tɩm kʋntʋ tɩn, á kɩ á ma á brɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tʋʋnɩ dɩm na yɩ te tɩn mʋ, sɩ kʋ vu kʋ yi maŋa kam o na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na di dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tʋʋnɩ gulim dɩpɛ dɩm naa o nyɔ wo-nyɔɔrʋ tɩm, yɩ o kɩ kʋlʋ na wʋ maŋɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩn, kʋntʋ tu kɩ kǝm-balɔrɔ mʋ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm yɩra yam dɩ o jana kam.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, nɔɔnʋ maama maŋɩ sɩ o da yigǝ o taa ye o tɩtɩ mʋ, sɩ o laan di dɩpɛ dɩm o daarɩ o nyɔ wo-nyɔɔrʋ tɩm.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ nan na di dɩpɛ dɩm yɩ o kwǝri o nyɔ wo-nyɔɔrʋ tɩm dɩ goonǝ tɩn wʋ maŋɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm yɩra yam mʋ, kʋntʋ tu vaŋɩ taanɩ mʋ o daŋɩ o tɩtɩ yuu nɩ.
Kʋntʋ nan mʋ paɩ á zanzan ba jɩgɩ yazurǝ, yɩ á badaara bwǝnǝ, yɩ á badonnǝ tʋa.
Dɩbam nan ya na yǝni dɩ́ da yigǝ dɩ́ bwe dɩ́ tɩtɩ dɩ́ nii yɩ dɩ́ lwarɩ dɩ́ na yɩ balʋ tɩn, Wɛ ya daa bá pa dɩ́ na cam.
Dɩ́ Yuutu Wɛ nan yǝni DƖ vaŋɩ dɩbam zwɛ sɩ DƖ pa dɩ́ joori dɩ́ tʋ cwǝŋǝ nɩ mʋ, sɩ maŋa kalʋ DƖ na wʋ́ ba DƖ di nɔɔna maama taanɩ tɩn, sɩ dɩ́ yɩ zaŋɩ dɩ́ ga bʋra DƖ tee nɩ, nɩ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn te.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, a ko-biǝ-ba, á na jeeri daanɩ sɩ á di Zezi tʋʋnɩ gulim wʋdiu kʋm, sɩ á zuri á yɩra á cǝgi daanɩ.
Wʋlʋ kana na wɔɛ tɩn, kʋntʋ tu da yigǝ o di o sɔŋɔ nɩ, sɩ o laan daarɩ o ba, sɩ á yɩ vaŋɩ Wɛ sarɩya á daŋɩ á yuu nɩ maŋa kalʋ á na jeeri daanɩ tɩn.
Kʋ daarɩ, kʋ na yɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na daarɩ tɩn, amʋ na tuǝ, a laan wʋ́ brɩ abam á na wʋ́ kɩ te.
Wɛ Joro kʋm pɛɛra yam na yɩ te tɩn Kʋ daarɩ, a laan lagɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ Jorokʋm pɛɛra yam laŋa nɩ mʋ.
A ko-biǝ-ba, a lagɩ sɩ a pa á lwarɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm na tʋŋɩ te dɩ te tɩn mʋ.
Abam ye nɩ, maŋa kalʋ á dɛɛn ta na wʋ lwarɩ Wɛ tɩn, á dɛɛn tɔgɩ jwǝnǝ yalʋ na yɩ kafɛ tɩn mʋ, yɩ ya ganɩ abam sɩ á taá tɔgɩ cwe sɩlʋ maama ya na lagɩ tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ a lagɩ a pa á lwarɩ nɩ, Wɛ Joro kʋm bá ganɩ abam.
Kʋntʋ, nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na ŋɔɔnɩ dɩ Wɛ Joro dam tɩn bá wanɩ o twɩ Zezi.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ nan bá wanɩ o ta nɩ, Zezi mʋ yɩ o Yuutu, yɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm tǝri o tee nɩ.
Wɛ Joro kʋm pɛɛra yam yɩ dwi tǝri tǝri mʋ, yɩ DƖ Joro kʋm dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ paɩ-ya DƖ nɔɔna.
Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam dɩ yɩ dwi tǝri tǝri mʋ, yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋlʋ dɩ́ na tʋŋɩ dɩ́ pa-o tɩn yɩ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ.
Wɛ na pɛ dɩbam dam sɩ dɩ́ ma tʋŋɩ DƖ tɩtʋŋa te tɩn dɩ yɩ dwi tǝri tǝri mʋ.
Wɛ nan yɩ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ, yɩ dɩntʋ mʋ pɛ dɩbam maama dam dɩm kʋntʋ maama.
Wɛ Joro kʋm nan pɛ nɔɔnʋ maama pɛɛrɩ sɩ o wanɩ o maa zǝni o donnǝ.
Wɛ Joro kʋm paɩ nɔɔna badonnǝ dam sɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ swan taanɩ, yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ ta paɩ nɔɔna badonnǝ dam sɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ yǝno taanɩ dɩ.
Wɛ Joro kʋm nan ta mʋ paɩ nɔɔna badonnǝ dam sɩ ba taa tiini ba jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ, yɩ kʋ ta paɩ badonnǝ dam sɩ ba ta maa paɩ yawɩɩna naɩ yazurǝ.
Kʋntʋ nan ta mʋ paɩ badonnǝ dam sɩ ba ta maa kɩ wo-kɩnkagɩla, kʋ daarɩ sɩ badonnǝ taa waɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ.
Kʋ daa ta maa paɩ nɔɔna badonnǝ waɩ ba pɔɔrɩ kʋlʋ na yɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm nyɩm dɩ kʋlʋ na daɩ kʋ nyɩm tɩn daanɩ.
Kʋ ta paɩ badonnǝ waɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ, yɩ badonnǝ dɩ waɩ ba lwarɩ ta-gɛ sɩm kʋntʋ kuri yɩ ba tɛ ba brɩ ba donnǝ.
Kʋ nan yɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm kʋntʋ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ jɩgɩ pɛɛra yam kʋntʋ dwi tǝri tǝri, yɩ kʋ paɩ nɔɔnʋ maama nɩ kʋ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn.
Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm nyɩ dɩ nɔɔnʋ yɩra na yɩ te tɩn mʋ Nan bʋŋɩ-na á nii nabiinu yɩra na yɩ te tɩn.
Ya yɩ woŋo dɩdʋa mʋ, yɩ ya laan pɔɔrɩ je dwi tǝri tǝri.
Ya pɔɔrɩm dɩm daga zanzan, yɩ ya maama laan yɩ yɩra dɩdʋa mʋ.
Zezi Krisi dɩ o kɔgɔ kʋm maama dɩ nan yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ.
Dɩbam maama na pɛ ba miisi dɩbam na wʋnɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm dɩdʋa dam ŋwaanɩ tɩn, dɩ́ laan jigi nɔɔnʋ dɩdʋa mʋ.
Kʋ na yɩ Zwifǝ naa dwi-gɛ tiinǝ, naa gambɛ naa balʋ na te ba tɩtɩ tɩn maama, Wɛ Joro kʋm kʋntʋ yɩranɩ mʋ wʋ dɩbam maama tee nɩ.
Nabiinu yɩra pɔɔrɩ je tǝri tǝri mʋ, sɩ kʋ daɩ jǝgǝ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ.
Naga na tagɩ ka wɩ, kantʋ daɩ jɩŋa, kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ yɩra yam ba te-ka, kʋntʋ bá sɩɩnɩ kʋ pa ka taa tɔgɩ ka tǝri yɩra yam wʋnɩ.
Zwɛ dɩ nan na wɩ, dɩntʋ daɩ yi, sɩ yɩra yam ba te-dɩ, kʋntʋ bá sɩɩnɩ kʋ pa dɩ taa tɔgɩ dɩ tǝri yɩra yam wʋnɩ.
Yɩra yam maama nan ya na yɩ yi yɩranɩ mʋ, yaá kɩ ta mʋ ya taa ni taanɩ?
Ya nan ya na yɩ zwɛ yɩranɩ mʋ, yaá kɩ ta mʋ ya taa ni lwǝm?
Kʋ nan yɩ Wɛ mʋ kɩ je sɩm dwi tǝri tǝri DƖ kɩ yɩra yam wʋnɩ, kʋ maŋɩ dɩ DƖ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn.
Ya maama nan ya na yɩ yɩra yam jǝgǝ dɩdʋa mʋ, yaá kɩ ta mʋ ya ji yɩra?
Kʋntʋ tɩn, je dwi tǝri tǝri mʋ wʋra, yɩ sɩ maama laan yɩ yɩra dɩdʋa.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, yi bá wanɩ dɩ ta dɩ jɩŋa nɩ dɩ ba lagɩ-ka, naa yuu ta dɩ naga nɩ kʋ ba lagɩ-ka.
A lagɩ a ta cɩga mʋ dɩ abam nɩ, dɩbam yɩra yam je sɩlʋ dɩ́ na bʋŋɩ nɩ sɩ tiini sɩ bwǝnǝ tɩn jɩgɩ kuri zanzan.
Dɩ́ yɩra yam je sɩlʋ dɩ́ na bʋŋɩ nɩ sɩ ba tiini sɩ jɩgɩ kuri tɩn mʋ dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ zuli lanyɩranɩ.
Je sɩlʋ na jɩgɩ cavɩɩra tɩn, mʋ dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ fɔgɩ dɩ́ kwǝli-sɩ lanyɩranɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ ya je sɩlʋ na lana tɩn, dɩ́ daa ba fɔgɩ dɩ́ nii sɩ baŋa nɩ.
Wɛ mʋ kɩ nabiinu yɩra yam je sɩm maama DƖ kɩ daanɩ, yɩ DƖ paɩ je sɩlʋ na gɛ zulǝ tɩn na zulǝ lanyɩranɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ kampwara tǝri yɩra yam wʋnɩ.
Ya je sɩm maama zǝni daanɩ mʋ.
Kʋ na cana yɩra yam daa kalʋ nɩ, yɩra yam maama wʋ́ tɔgɩ ya na cam dɩm kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ.
Kʋ daarɩ daa kalʋ na nɛ zulǝ tɩn, yɩra yam maama dɩ wʋ́ tɔgɩ ya na wʋpolo mʋ.
Abam maama yɩ Zezi Krisi yɩra yam mʋ, yɩ á dɩdʋa dɩdʋa yɩ o je sɩm dwi tǝri tǝri mʋ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm wʋnɩ, Wɛ kɩ nɔɔnʋ maama o jǝgǝ nɩ mʋ.
Dayigǝ tɩn yɩ Zezi tɩntʋŋna bam o tɩtɩ na lɩ tɩn mʋ.
Wɛ nijoŋnǝ bam maa saŋɩ.
Balʋ na kɩ bɩtɔ tɩn maa yɩ balʋ na brɩ Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn.
Kʋ wǝli dɩ balʋ na kɩ wo-kɩnkagɩla tɩn, dɩ balʋ Wɛ na pɛ-ba dam sɩ ba ta maa paɩ yawɩɩna naɩ yazurǝ tɩn, dɩ balʋ na zǝni nɔɔna tɩn, dɩ balʋ na nii Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam baŋa nɩ tɩn, dɩ balʋ Wɛ Joro kʋm na paɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ tɩn.
Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ dɩ́ maama mʋ yɩ Zezi tɩntʋŋna balʋ o tɩtɩ dɛɛn na lɩ tɩn, kʋ daɩ dɩ́ maama mʋ yɩ Wɛ nijoŋnǝ, naa dɩ́ maama mʋ brɩ Wɛ cɩga kam.
Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ dɩ́ maama mʋ waɩ dɩ́ kɩ wo-kɩnkagɩla.
Kʋ nan daɩ dɩ́ maama mʋ Wɛ pɛ dam sɩ dɩ́ taá ma paɩ yawɩɩna naɩ yazurǝ, naa dɩ́ maama mʋ Wɛ Joro kʋm pɛ dɩ́ ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ, naa dɩ́ maama mʋ waɩ dɩ́ lwarɩ sɩ kuri dɩ́ brɩ nɔɔna.
Nan kwaanɩ-na sɩ á joŋi Wɛ-pɛɛra yalʋ na jɩgɩ kuri kʋ ja gaalɩ tɩn.
Kʋ daarɩ, a nan lagɩ a brɩ abam woŋo kʋlʋ na tiini kʋ lana kʋ dwe dɩdɩ tɩn mʋ.
Sono na yɩ te tɩn Amʋ na maŋɩ a waɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ nabiinǝ dwi tǝri tǝri taana, dɩ malɛsɩsɩm taanɩ dɩ, yɩ a na ba jɩgɩ sono, kʋ nyɩ dɩ sɔɔ mʋ a kɩa, nɩnɛɛnɩ ba na magɩ kwaŋa dɩ loŋini yɩ tɩ kɩ sɔɔ te tɩn.
Amʋ na maŋɩ a jɩgɩ Wɛ-pɛɛrɩ dɩlʋ na paɩ a waɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ tɩn, yɩ a jɩgɩ yǝno maama, yɩ a kwǝri a ye cɩga kalʋ maama na sǝgi nabiinǝ yigǝ nɩ tɩn, yɩ a na maŋɩ a jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ sɩ a taa waɩ a paɩ pweeru zaŋɩ tɩ je nɩ tɩ ve tɩ tʋ mɛ a na lagɩ tɩn, yɩ a na ba jɩgɩ sono, kʋ yɩ kafɛ mʋ.
Amʋ na maŋɩ a kwe a jɩjɩgɩrʋ maama a maŋɩ a pa yinigǝ tiinǝ, yɩ a ta kwǝri a sɛ sɩ ba kwe a yɩra yam ba dɩ mini nɩ, yɩ a na ba jɩgɩ sono, kʋ ta maŋɩ kʋ ba jɩgɩ kuri kʋ pa-nɩ.
Sono tu jɩgɩ wʋ-zuru mʋ, yɩ o kɩ nɔɔna lanyɩranɩ.
Sono tu ba jɩgɩ pu-sɩŋa naa o magɩ o nyɔɔnɩ, o nan ba jɩgɩ kamunni dɩ.
Sono tu ba kɩ kʋlʋ na wʋ maŋɩ tɩn, o nan ba beeri o tɩtɩ yɩranɩ zǝnǝ má.
O nan jɩgɩ ban-pʋnʋ.
Nɔɔnʋ na kɩ-o lwarɩm, o ba kwe o kɩ o wʋnɩ.
Sono tu ba kɩ wʋpolo dɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na yɩ balɔrɔ tɩn, o kɩ wʋpolo dɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn mʋ.
Sono tu waɩ o vɔ o wʋ woŋo maama baŋa nɩ, yɩ o jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ tɩɩna dɩ wʋ-zuru woŋo maama baŋa nɩ.
Sono ba tiǝ.
Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ sɩlʋ nɔɔna na ŋɔɔnɩ tɩn wʋ́ ba sɩ kɛ.
Wɛ-pɛɛrɩ dɩlʋ nɔɔna na maa ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ tɩn dɩ wʋ́ ba dɩ kɛ.
Yǝno dɩ wʋ́ ba kʋ kɛ.
Lele kʋntʋ yǝno kʋlʋ dɩbam na jɩgɩ tɩn yɩ cicoro mʋ.
Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ sɩlʋ dɩ́ na ŋɔɔnɩ tɩn dɩ yɩ cicwǝǝru mʋ.
Kʋ daarɩ maŋa kalʋ Wɛ na wʋ́ ba fɔgɩ wǝǝnu maama DƖ pa tɩ maŋɩ fasɩ tɩn, wo-cicwǝǝru tɩm maama laan wʋ́ je mʋ.
Maŋa kalʋ a na yɩ bu tɩn, a dɛɛn ŋɔɔnɩ biim mʋ, yɩ a kwǝri a bʋŋɩ nɩ bu te, yɩ a jeeli nɩ bu te.
Lele kʋntʋ, a na kɩ nɔɔnʋ tɩn, a kwe busɔɔnɩ wǝǝnu tɩm maama a yagɩ mʋ.
Lele kʋntʋ, dɩ́ na lwarɩ Wɛ cɩga kam te tɩn, kʋ taa nyɩ dɩ niu mʋ dɩ́ jɩgɩ dɩ́ nii kʋ wʋnɩ liirǝ liirǝ.
Kʋ daarɩ maŋa kam kʋntʋ na yiǝ, dɩ́ laan wʋ́ ta naɩ jaja mʋ.
Lele kʋntʋ yǝno kʋlʋ a na jɩgɩ tɩn yɩ cicoro mʋ.
Maŋa kam kʋntʋ nɩ, a laan wʋ́ ta ye wǝǝnu maama kuri a tiǝ, nɩ Wɛ na ye amʋ DƖ ti te tɩn.
Kʋ daarɩ wǝǝnu tɩtɔ mʋ wʋ́ ta wʋra maŋa maama.
Wǝǝnu tɩntʋ mʋ yɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ tɩɩna dɩ sono.
Kʋlʋ nan na dwe tɩ maama tɩn mʋ yɩ sono.
Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ sɩm na zǝni nɔɔna te tɩn Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, kwaanɩ-na sɩ á taá jɩgɩ sono, sɩ á daarɩ á kwaanɩ á joŋi Wɛ-pɛɛra yalʋ DƖ Jorokʋm na paɩ nɔɔna tɩn á wǝli da, kʋ na dwe dɩdɩ sɩ á wanɩ á ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ sɩm tɩn ŋɔɔnɩ dɩ Wɛ mʋ, sɩ kʋ daɩ dɩ nabiinǝ, ba na ba ni o taanɩ dɩm kuri tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ Joro kʋm mʋ paɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na sǝgi tɩn.
Kʋ daarɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na waɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ tɩn ŋɔɔnɩ o brɩ nabiinǝ mʋ, sɩ kʋ kwe-ba kʋ daarɩ kʋ zǝni-ba sɩ ba taa fɔgɩ ba zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ dɩ pu-dɩa.
Wʋlʋ na ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ sɩm tɩn, kʋ wǝli o tɩtɩ yɩranɩ mʋ.
Wʋlʋ nan na ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ tɩn, kʋ wǝli Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm maama mʋ.
Amʋ ya lagɩ sɩ abam maama taa waɩ á ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ sɩm, a nan tiini a lagɩ sɩ á taá waɩ á ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ sɩm mʋ á dwe dɩdɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ wʋlʋ na ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ tɩn tiini o jɩgɩ zǝnǝ o dwe wʋlʋ na ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ tɩn, kʋ na daɩ nɩ nɔɔnʋ na wʋra sɩ o wanɩ o pipiri o taanɩ dɩm kuri sɩ kʋ zǝni Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm maama.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, a ko-biǝ-ba, amʋ na tu abam te, yɩ a na ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ yɩranɩ mʋ dɩ abam, bɛɛ nyɔɔrɩ mʋ á lagɩ á na?
Kʋlʋ na wʋ́ wǝli abam tɩn mʋ yɩ a na ŋɔɔnɩ taanɩ dɩlʋ na wʋ́ pa á na vɩɩrɩm, naa dɩ pa á na yǝno, naa a ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ, naa a zaasɩ abam Wɛ cɩga kam.
Dɩ́ nan kwe duduurǝ na yɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na ba jɩgɩ ŋwɩa tɩn dɩ́ ma maŋɩ dɩ́ nii: Nɔɔnʋ na jɩgɩ wuǝ o wui yɔɔ yɔɔ, naa o jɩgɩ kɔnɔ o magɩ yɔɔ yɔɔ, nɔɔna wʋ́ kɩ ta mʋ ba ni kʋ ywǝǝni?
Nɔɔnʋ nan na jɩgɩ jara nabɔnɔ o wui yɔɔ yɔɔ, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ bá wanɩ o lwarɩ nɩ jara mʋ wʋra sɩ o nuŋi o vu.
Kʋ nan yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ dɩ n na ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ yɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ warɩ sɩ kuri o pipiri, nɔɔna wʋ́ kɩ ta mʋ ba lwarɩ n na tɛ kʋlʋ tɩn kuri?
Kʋntʋ nan brɩ nɩ n ŋɔɔnɩ n yagɩ gaa wʋnɩ mʋ.
Taana dwi zanzan mʋ wʋ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ, yɩ taan-taanɩ tǝrǝ dɩ na ba jɩgɩ kuri dɩ pa dɩ tiinǝ.
Nɔɔnʋ nan na ŋɔɔnɩ taanɩ dɩlʋ a na ba ni tɩn dɩ amʋ, kʋntʋ brɩ nɩ dɩbam maama bale yɩ vǝrǝ mʋ da-tee nɩ.
Kʋ nan yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ dɩ abam dɩ, abam na lagɩ sɩ á joŋi pɛɛra yalʋ Wɛ Joro kʋm na paɩ tɩn, á nan kwaanɩ-na á joŋi pɛɛra yalʋ na wʋ́ zǝni Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm sɩ kʋ zɩgɩ lanyɩranɩ tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, abam wʋlʋ na waɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ, sɩ o tiini o loori Wɛ sɩ DƖ pa o taa waɩ sɩ kuri dɩ o tɛa.
Amʋ na mɛ ta-gɛ sɩm a ma a warɩ Wɛ, kʋ yɩ a joro mʋ ŋɔɔna, sɩ amʋ tɩtɩ ba ni sɩ kuri.
Kʋlʋ na maŋɩ sɩ a kɩ tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ a warɩ Wɛ dɩ a wʋbʋŋa maama dɩ a joro maama, sɩ a daarɩ a taa leeni dɩ a wʋbʋŋa maama dɩ a joro maama a taa zuli Wɛ.
Kʋ nan na daɩ kʋntʋ, yɩ n na mɛ ta-gɛ sɩm n ma n zuli Wɛ, yɩ nɔn-gaa na je o cǝgǝ, o bá wanɩ o ni sɩ kuri.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, oó kɩ ta mʋ o tɔgɩ o sɛ nmʋ na zuli Wɛ te tɩn sɩ o dɩ ta nɩ «Amina»?
Nmʋ na zuli Wɛ te tɩn na maŋɩ kʋ lamma te, kʋ bá zǝni nɔɔnʋ wʋm kʋntʋ.
Kʋ na yɩ amʋ, a kɩ Wɛ le dɩ DƖ na pɛ-nɩ dam sɩ a taa ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ sɩm a dwe abam maama tɩn.
Kʋ daarɩ, a na wʋ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm wʋnɩ, a tiini a lagɩ sɩ a taa maɩ taanɩ dɩlʋ ba na ni tɩn mʋ a ma ŋɔɔnɩ a brɩ-ba.
A na ŋɔɔnɩ bɩtarɩ sɩnu má yɩranɩ, kʋ garɩ a na ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ sɩm bɩtarbiǝ mʋrr-fugǝ yɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ ba ni sɩ kuri.
A ko-biǝ-ba, á yɩ taá jɩgɩ bu-balwa wʋbʋŋa.
Kʋ daarɩ kʋ na yɩ lwarɩm jǝgǝ nɩ, sɩ á taá nyɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ bu-sɩsɩn na yǝri lwarɩm kǝm te tɩn, sɩ á pa á wʋbʋŋa bɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ.
Kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Amʋ Baŋa-Wɛ wʋ́ tʋŋɩ vǝrǝ, sɩ ba ba ba ŋɔɔnɩ amʋ ni-taanɩ dɩm dɩ abam.
Baá ŋɔɔnɩ taanɩ dɩlʋ á na ba ni tɩn dɩ abam.
Nan dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, á ta bá sɛ a ni.» Kʋntʋ mʋ Wɛ maɩ ta-gɛ DƖ maa brɩ DƖ dam balʋ na wʋ sɛ-DƖ tɩn tee nɩ, sɩ kʋ daɩ balʋ na sɛ-DƖ tɩn tee nɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ sɩm mʋ brɩ DƖ dam balʋ na sɛ-DƖ tɩn tee nɩ, sɩ kʋ daɩ balʋ na wʋ sɛ-DƖ tɩn tee nɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm maama na jeeri daanɩ, yɩ á maama na wʋra á ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ, yɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na maŋɩ o wʋ ni-sɩ naa balʋ na wʋ sɛ Wɛ tɩn na tu ba zʋ á wʋnɩ yɩ ba ba ni sɩ kuri tɩn, ba bá ta nɩ á co mʋ na?
Abam maama nan na ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ á brɩ daanɩ, yɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋm kʋntʋ doŋ na tu o zʋ á wʋ, wʋntʋ wʋ́ lwarɩ nɩ Wɛ dam mʋ wʋ á tee nɩ.
O na ni kʋlʋ maama tɩn wʋ́ pa o lwarɩ nɩ o ba jɩgɩ bʋra Wɛ tee nɩ, yɩ o kwǝri o lwarɩ nɩ Wɛ lagɩ DƖ di o taanɩ.
Wʋbʋŋa yalʋ maama ya na sǝgi o wʋnɩ tɩn laan wʋ́ ba ya lwarɩ jaja mʋ, yɩ o laan wʋ́ kɩ o yuu tɩga nɩ o zuli Wɛ, yɩ o sɛ nɩ Wɛ sɩɩnɩ DƖ wʋ abam tɩtarɩ nɩ.
Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm na maŋɩ sɩ kʋ taa tʋŋɩ kʋ tɔgɩ cwe sɩlʋ tɩn A ko-biǝ-ba, abam na jeeri daanɩ sɩ á zuli Wɛ, á na maŋɩ sɩ á kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ: Abam dɩdʋa mʋ wʋ́ zaŋɩ o pa lǝŋǝ.
Dɩdʋa dɩ ma zaŋɩ o brɩ Wɛ cɩga kam.
Wʋdoŋ dɩ ma zaŋɩ o ta vɩɩrɩm dɩlʋ Wɛ na brɩ-o tɩn.
Wʋwʋm dɩ ma zaŋɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ, yɩ wʋdoŋ dɩ ma zaŋɩ o ta ta-gɛ sɩm kuri o brɩ á kɔgɔ kʋm.
Wǝǝnu tɩntʋ maama zǝni Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm sɩ kʋ fɔgɩ kʋ zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ.
Abam badaara na lagɩ á ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ sɩm, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á taá yɩ bale naa batɔ yɩranɩ mʋ.
Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á taá zaŋɩ á ŋɔɔnɩ á daarɩ á pa daanɩ mʋ, sɩ á dɩdʋa zaŋɩ o ta ŋwɛ sɩm kuri.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ nan na tǝri á wʋnɩ sɩ o wanɩ o ta ŋwɛ sɩm kuri, balʋ ya na lagɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ-sɩ tɩn maŋɩ sɩ ba yagɩ mʋ, sɩ ba na wʋ ba yɩranɩ, sɩ ba taa ŋɔɔnɩ-sɩ dɩ Wɛ.
Kʋ daarɩ, kʋ na yɩ balʋ na ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ sɩm tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ bale naa batɔ mʋ zaŋɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ dɩdʋa dɩdʋa, sɩ badaara bam taa cǝgǝ, sɩ ba laan bwɛ ba nii sɩ yɩ cɩga mʋ naa vwan mʋ.
Wɛ na vɩɩrɩ nɔɔnʋ dɩdʋa DƖ cɩga kam balʋ na je ba cǝgi tɩn wʋnɩ sɩ o ta o brɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ wʋlʋ na zɩgɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ sɩm tɩn mʋ pu o ni, sɩ o daarɩ sɩ wʋdoŋ wʋm ta-ka.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, abam maama waɩ á ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ sɩm dɩdʋa dɩdʋa, sɩ kʋ pa á zaasɩ Wɛ cɩga kam da-tee nɩ, sɩ á taá fɔgɩ á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ.
Balʋ na joŋi dam Wɛ Jorokʋm tee nɩ sɩ ba taa ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ sɩm tɩn waɩ ba tɩtɩ ba jaana maŋa kalʋ ba na wʋra ba ŋɔɔnɩ-sɩ tɩn.
Wɛ lagɩ sɩ woŋo maama taa tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ mʋ dɩ yazurǝ, sɩ DƖ ba lagɩ yɔɔ yɔɔ kǝm.
Abam na kikili daanɩ sɩ á zuli Wɛ, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ kaana taa je cɩm mʋ sɩ ba taa cǝgǝ.
Mʋ kʋ na yɩ te Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm jǝgǝ maama nɩ.
Ba ba jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba da ba ŋɔɔnɩ.
Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba sɛ baara bam, nɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm na maŋɩ tɩ brɩ te tɩn mʋ.
Ba na lagɩ sɩ ba lwarɩ woŋo kʋlʋ kuri, ba maŋɩ sɩ ba bwe ba banna mʋ sɔŋɔ nɩ, sɩ kʋ wʋ maŋɩ sɩ kaanɩ zaŋɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ á kikilǝ kam wʋnɩ.
Abam bʋŋɩ á paɩ Wɛ taanɩ dɩm nuŋi abam te mʋ na?
Mʋ naa á bʋŋɩ á paɩ abam yɩranɩ mʋ ye Wɛ taanɩ dɩm na?
Abam wʋlʋ na bʋŋɩ nɩ o yɩ Wɛ nijoŋnu naa o joŋi Wɛ Joro kʋm pɛɛrɩ tɩn maŋɩ sɩ o taa ye nɩ, amʋ na pʋpʋnɩ kʋlʋ a pa abam tɩn yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm kwǝrǝ mʋ.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ maama na vɩn amʋ na pʋpʋnɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, Wɛ dɩ wʋ́ vɩn kʋntʋ tu.
Kʋntʋ, a ko-biǝ-ba, kwaanɩ-na sɩ á taá ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ sɩm.
Á nan yɩ zaŋɩ á cɩ balʋ na ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ sɩm Wɛ Joro kʋm na pɛ tɩn.
Nan taá kɩ-na woŋo maama sɩ kʋ taa tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ te tɩn.
Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kalʋ Zezi tɩntʋŋna bam na brɩ tɩn A ko-biǝ-ba, a lagɩ sɩ a pa á guli Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam a na maŋɩ a tɔɔlɩ dɩ abam tɩn mʋ.
Abam maŋɩ á sɛ-ka, yɩ á kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa á fɔgɩ á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ.
Amʋ na pɛ á lwarɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam te tɩn, á na wʋ joori ka kwaga nɩ, Wɛ wʋ́ vrɩ abam DƖ yagɩ kantʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Kʋ na daɩ kʋntʋ, á na sɛ Zezi Krisi te tɩn yɩ kafɛ mʋ.
Wɛ cɩga kalʋ na dwe maama tɩn mʋ yɩ kalʋ amʋ na dɛ yigǝ a joŋi yɩ a laan daarɩ a brɩ abam tɩn.
Kantʋ mʋ tɩntʋ: Zezi Krisi tɩgɩ dɩbam lwarɩm ŋwaanɩ mʋ, nɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm na maŋɩ kʋ ta te tɩn.
Ba ma kɩ-o bɔɔnɩ nɩ.
Da yatɔ dɛ nɩ o ma joori o bi o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ, nɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm na maŋɩ kʋ ta te tɩn.
O na bi tɩn, o ma pa Pɩyɛɛrɩ na-o, yɩ o tɩntʋŋna fugǝ-bale bam maama dɩ na-o.
Kʋntʋ kwaga nɩ, o ma brɩ o tɩtɩ o karabiǝ zanzan bɩdwɩ baŋa nɩ, bantʋ dwe nɩ nɔɔna biǝ yanu .
Nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ badaara zanzan ta ŋwɩ, ba fɩnfɩɩn yɩranɩ mʋ tɩga.
Zakɩ dɩ ma na-o, yɩ o daarɩ o pa o tɩntʋŋna bam maama na-o.
Kʋntʋ kwaga nɩ, o laan ma pa amʋ na nyɩ dɩ bu wʋlʋ ba na lʋga yɩ o lʋra maŋa ta wʋ yi tɩn dɩ na-o.
Bɛŋwaanɩ amʋ tiini a muri Zezi tɩntʋŋna bam maama wʋnɩ.
A ya brɩ a wʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba taa bǝ-nɩ nɩ Zezi tɩntʋŋnʋ, a dɛɛn na bɛɛsɩ Zezi nɔɔna bam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ nan na kɩ-nɩ yu-yoŋo tɩn mʋ pɛ a yɩ a na yɩ wʋlʋ zɩm tɩn.
DƖ na kɩ-nɩ yu-yoŋo te tɩn daɩ kafɛ.
Amʋ tiini a tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam a dwǝni DƖ tɩntʋŋna bam maama.
Kʋ nan daɩ a tɩtɩ dam ŋwaanɩ mʋ a waɩ a tʋŋa.
Kʋ yɩ Wɛ na kɩ-nɩ yu-yoŋo yɩ DƖ dam dɩm wʋ amʋ tee nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Dɩbam balʋ na yɩ Zezi tɩntʋŋna tɩn maama yǝni dɩ́ brɩ cɩga dɩdʋa mʋ.
Kʋ na yɩ amʋ na brɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, naa bantʋ dɩ na brɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, kʋ yɩ cɩga kalʋ abam na sɛ tɩn mʋ.
Twa biim taanɩ Dɩbam maama na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam te tɩn, dɩ́ tɔɔlɩ dɩ́ brɩ nɔɔna nɩ Zezi Krisi bi o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ mʋ.
Bɛɛ nan mʋ yɩ abam badonnǝ tɛ á wɩ, twa biim tǝrǝ?
Kʋ ya na yɩ cɩga nɩ twa biim tǝrǝ, kʋ brɩ nɩ Zezi Krisi tɩtɩ dɩ wʋ bi mʋ.
Wʋntʋ nan ya na wʋ bi, dɩbam kwǝr-tɔɔla kam yɩ kafɛ mʋ, abam dɩ na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ ka te tɩn dɩ ya yɩ kafɛ mʋ, yɩ dɩbam dɩ na brɩ Wɛ cɩga kam te tɩn ya yɩ vwan mʋ, dɩ́ na yǝni dɩ́ brɩ nɔɔna nɩ Wɛ mʋ bi Zezi Krisi DƖ pa o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Twa biim nan ya na sɩɩnɩ dɩ tǝrǝ, kʋ brɩ nɩ Wɛ wʋ bi Zezi mʋ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, twa biim ya na tǝrǝ, kʋ brɩ nɩ Zezi Krisi tɩtɩ dɩ maŋɩ o wʋ bi mʋ.
Wʋntʋ nan ya na wʋ bi o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ, kʋ brɩ nɩ abam na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩd-o te tɩn yɩ kafɛ mʋ, yɩ á lwarɩm dɩm ya ta wʋ á yuu nɩ mʋ.
Kʋ nan ta brɩ nɩ, balʋ na sɛ Zezi Krisi yɩ ba laan tɩ tɩn ya wʋ́ ga ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ.
Kʋ na yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa ŋwɩa kantʋ yɩranɩ, yɩ kʋ daɩ nɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩbam jɩgɩ tɩɩna Zezi Krisi tee nɩ, kʋ brɩ nɩ dɩ́ yɩ balʋ na tiini ba yɩ yinigǝ tiinǝ tɩn mʋ nɔɔna maama tee nɩ.
Kʋ nan sɩɩnɩ kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ: Zezi Krisi bi o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ.
Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na dɛ yigǝ o bi o vu Wɛ te, sɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ balʋ dɩ na tɩgɩ tɩn wʋ́ bi ba yagɩ tʋʋnɩ.
Tʋʋnɩ zɩgɩ nabiinu dɩdʋa yɩra nɩ mʋ dɩ ba lʋgʋ baŋa.
Kʋ nan ta yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ dɩ twa biim dɩ, nabiinu dɩdʋa dɩ mʋ jaanɩ twa biim o ba.
Nabiinǝ maama na yɩ Adambiǝ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ te dɩ́ maama tʋa nɩ wʋntʋ te.
Kʋ nan ta yɩ kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ dɩ balʋ maama na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn, bantʋ dɩ wʋ́ bi ba yagɩ tʋʋnɩ.
Nɔɔnʋ maama dɩ o jǝgǝ mʋ.
Zezi Krisi mʋ dɛ yigǝ o bi o vu Wɛ te.
Kʋ daarɩ balʋ na yɩ o nɔɔna tɩn dɩ wʋ́ bi maŋa kam o na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn mʋ.
Kʋntʋ kwaga nɩ mʋ lʋgʋ baŋa woŋo maama laan wʋ́ ti.
Maŋa kam kʋntʋ nɩ mʋ Zezi Krisi wʋ́ cɔgɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama na jɩgɩ dam nabiinǝ baŋa nɩ tɩn, kʋ na yɩ wɛyuu dɩdɛɛra naa tɩga baŋa dɩdɛɛra maama, oó pa ba dam dɩm laan ti.
O ma wʋ́ daarɩ o kwe woŋo kʋlʋ maama o na di paarɩ kʋ baŋa nɩ tɩn o kɩ o Ko Wɛ jɩŋa nɩ.
Kʋ nan fɩn mʋ sɩ Zezi di paarɩ, sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kam Wɛ na wʋ́ kɩ o dʋna maama o nɛ kuri nɩ tɩn.
Tʋʋnɩ nan mʋ yɩ dʋm wʋlʋ o na wʋ́ cɔgɩ o ma kweeli tɩn.
Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm tagɩ kʋ wɩ: «Wɛ kɩ wǝǝnu maama wʋm nɛ kuri nɩ mʋ sɩ o taa te tɩ maama.» Kʋ nan na wɩ, o taa te wǝǝnu maama tɩn, kʋ daɩ nɩ o te Wɛ tɩtɩ dɩ mʋ o wǝli da.
Kʋ yɩ Wɛ mʋ kwe wǝǝnu tɩm maama DƖ kɩ Zezi dam kuri nɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ maŋa kalʋ Zezi na wʋ́ ba o taa te wǝǝnu maama tɩn, wʋm tɩtɩ na yɩ Wɛ Bu tɩn wʋ́ kwe o tɩtɩ o pa o Ko Wɛ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ yɩ dɩlʋ na maŋɩ DƖ kɩ wǝǝnu maama DƖ Bu wʋm dam kuri nɩ tɩn mʋ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, Wɛ mʋ te wǝǝnu maama dɩ DƖ dam maama.
Á nan bʋŋɩ nɔɔna balʋ na yǝni ba paɩ ba miisi-ba na wʋnɩ ba twa ŋwaanɩ tɩn woŋo á nii.
Ba na ba bʋŋɩ nɩ twa biim wʋra, bɛŋwaanɩ mʋ yɩ ba paɩ ba miisi-ba na wʋnɩ twa bam ŋwaanɩ?
Twa biim nan ya na tǝrǝ, bɛŋwaanɩ mʋ yɩ dɩbam ba kwarɩ fʋʋnɩ sɩ dɩ́ yaarɩ dɩ́ tɩ Wɛ ŋwaanɩ maŋa maama?
A ko-biǝ-ba, dɛ maama amʋ yǝni a tɔgɩ tʋʋnɩ te mʋ a kɛa.
Kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ.
Amʋ tiini a jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ abam á na ŋwɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Mʋ kʋ kuri a tagɩ kʋntʋ.
Efɛɛzɩ nɩ ba kɩ amʋ nɩnɛɛnɩ kagʋ-vara na ciŋi sɩ ba ja nɔɔna te tɩn mʋ.
Amʋ na sɛ sɩ a yaarɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ ya na yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa ŋwɩa kantʋ yɩranɩ má ŋwaanɩ mʋ, bɛɛ nyɔɔrɩ mʋ aá na?
Twa biim nan ya na tǝrǝ, dɩ́ ya wʋ́ ta nɩ nɔɔna badaara na tɛ te ba wɩ: «Pa-na dɩ́ taá di sɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ taá nyɔɛ, sɩ dɩ́ jwa yɩ twa mʋ.» Yɩ pa-na ba ganɩ abam sɩ á tusi.
Kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ nɩ: «Nmʋ na tɔgɩ dɩ nɔn-balwaarʋ, baá sʋgɩ-m ba pa n dɩ kɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ mʋ.» Pa-na á wʋbʋŋa joori ya taa tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ, sɩ á daarɩ á yagɩ kǝm-lwaanʋ tɩm.
Abam badaara ta yǝri Wɛ.
A tagɩ kʋntʋ, sɩ kʋ pa cavɩɩra mʋ zʋ abam.
Nɔɔna na wʋ́ bi ba yagɩ tʋʋnɩ dɩ yɩra yalʋ tɩn Abam dɩdʋa waɩ o bwe nɩ: «Kʋʋ́ kɩ ta mʋ sɩ twa bi?
Ba nan na joori ba bi, ba yɩra wʋ́ ta yɩ tɩta mʋ?» Nmʋ wʋbʋŋa mʋ muri na?
N na kwe woŋo n du tɩga nɩ, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ kʋ puli mʋ kʋ nuŋi, kʋ daarɩ sɩ kʋ bu wʋm pɔ.
Nmʋ na dugi kʋlʋ, dɩ kʋlʋ na wʋ́ puli kʋ nuŋi tɩn ba nyɩ daanɩ.
Nmʋ na kwe kʋlʋ n du tɩn, kʋ na yɩ mɩna naa kʋ zɩ yɩ wo-duuru tɩlʋ dwi maama, tɩ yɩ wo-dwǝ má mʋ n dugǝ.
Wo-dwi dɩm nan na nuŋi, Wɛ mʋ wʋ́ pa-dɩ dɩ yɩra, nɩ DƖ na lagɩ te tɩn.
Wɛ nan ta mʋ paɩ wo-dwi maama nyɩnyʋgʋ, kʋ maŋɩ dɩ wo-dwi dɩm tɩtɩ na yɩ te tɩn.
Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama na ŋwɩ tɩn ya-nwana mʋ yɩ bɩdwɩ.
Nabiinǝ dɩ vara dɩ zunǝ dɩ kale maama jɩgɩ ya-nwana yɩra yɩra mʋ.
Wɛyuu wǝǝnu dɩ wʋra mʋ, yɩ tɩga baŋa wǝǝnu dɩ wʋra.
Wɛyuu wǝǝnu tɩm dɩ jɩgɩ tɩ lam mʋ, yɩ tɩga baŋa wǝǝnu tɩm dɩ jɩgɩ tɩ lam.
Wɩa kam dɩ jɩgɩ ka lam mʋ, yɩ cana kam dɩ jɩgɩ ka lam.
Calɩcwɩ sɩm dɩ maa jɩgɩ sɩ lam, yɩ sɩ lam dɩm nan daɩ bɩdwɩ.
Wǝǝnu tɩntʋ maama nan brɩ twa biim na yɩ te tɩn mʋ.
Nɔɔnʋ na tɩga, o yɩra yam ba na kɩ tɩn yɩ yɩra yalʋ na wʋ́ pɔ tɩn mʋ.
Kʋ daarɩ o yɩra yalʋ na wʋ́ bi ya yagɩ tʋʋnɩ tɩn daa bá pɔ maŋa dɩ maŋa.
Yɩra yalʋ ba na kɩ tɩga nɩ tɩn ba jɩgɩ lam, yɩ yalʋ na wʋ́ bi tɩn wʋ́ ta jɩgɩ lam zanzan.
Yɩra yalʋ ba na kɩ tɩn bwǝnǝ, yɩ yalʋ na wʋ́ bi tɩn wʋ́ ta dana.
Yɩra yalʋ ba na kɩ tɩga nɩ tɩn yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa ŋwɩa kam nyɩm mʋ, kʋ daarɩ yalʋ na wʋ́ bi tɩn yɩ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kalʋ Wɛ Jorokʋm na wʋ́ pa dɩbam tɩn nyɩm mʋ.
Lʋgʋ baŋa yɩra yam na wʋra tɩn, Wɛ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam yɩra yam dɩ wʋra mʋ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Pulim nɩ tɩn Wɛ kɩ Adammʋ DƖ pa o jɩgɩ lʋgʋ baŋa yɩra yɩ o ŋwɩ.» Kʋ daarɩ Zezi mʋ yɩ Adam wʋlʋ na kweeli tɩn, yɩ o jɩgɩ Joro kʋ na paɩ nabiinǝ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa tɩn.
Kʋ nan yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa ŋwɩa kam mʋ tui yigǝ, yɩ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam laan saŋɩ ka ba.
Wɛ mɛ tɩɩrʋ mʋ DƖ kɩ nabiinu wʋlʋ na tu yigǝ tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ wʋntʋ yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nyɩm mʋ.
Kʋ daarɩ nabiinu wʋlʋ nan na tu kwaga tɩn nuŋi Wɛ-sɔŋɔ mʋ.
Lʋgʋ baŋa nɔɔna bam maama nyɩ dɩ Wɛ na mɛ tɩɩrʋ DƖ kɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ dayigǝ tɩn mʋ.
Nɔɔna balʋ maama nan na yɩ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ nyɩm tɩn nyɩ dɩ wʋlʋ na nuŋi Wɛ-sɔŋɔ tɩn mʋ.
Nɩnɛɛnɩ dɩbam na jɩgɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nɔɔnʋ wʋm nyɩnyʋgʋ tɩn, dɛ wʋra dɩ́ wʋ́ ba dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ nɔɔnʋ wʋm dɩ nyɩnyʋgʋ.
A ko-biǝ-ba, a lagɩ a ta a brɩ abam nɩ, dɩ́ lʋgʋ baŋa yɩra yam bá wanɩ ya na jǝŋǝ je Wɛ paarɩ dɩm wʋnɩ.
Yɩra yalʋ na wʋ́ pɔ tɩn bá wanɩ ya maŋɩ dɩ ŋwɩa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.
Fɔgɩ-na á cǝgi, sɩ a ta Wɛ cɩga kalʋ ya na sǝgi tɩn a brɩ abam.
Dɩbam maama bá tɩ dɩ́ ti sɩ Zezi laan ba.
Dɩ́ nan na tɩga naa dɩ́ ta wʋ tɩgɩ dɩ, dɩbam maama yɩra yam wʋ́ lǝni mʋ.
Kʋʋ́ da kʋ kɩ yibʋgɩsa wʋnɩ mʋ, maŋa kam ba na wʋ́ wu kweelim nabɔnɔ kʋm tɩn.
Nabɔnɔ kʋm na wugǝ, twa wʋ́ bi ba zaŋɩ dɩ yɩra yalʋ na ba pɔɛ tɩn, yɩ dɩbam dɩ yɩra wʋ́ lǝni.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, dɩbam yɩra yalʋ na wʋ́ pɔ tɩn maŋɩ sɩ ya lǝni ya ji yalʋ na bá pɔ tɩn mʋ, sɩ dɩ́ yɩra yalʋ tʋʋnɩ na waɩ tɩn lǝni ya ji yalʋ tʋʋnɩ na bá wanɩ tɩn.
Kʋntʋ maama na kɩa, kʋ laan wʋ́ pa kʋlʋ na pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn kɩ, nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ kʋ ta te kʋ wɩ: «Wɛ wanɩ tʋʋnɩ dɩ dɩ dam dɩm maama.» «Tʋʋnɩ, n dam dɩm daa bɛɛ?
N daa n wʋ́ wanɩ n cɔgɩ nɔɔna na?» Kʋ yɩ lwarɩm ŋwaanɩ mʋ tʋʋnɩ jɩgɩ dam sɩ dɩ cɔgɩ nɔɔna.
Lwarɩm dɩ nan nɛ dɩ dam Wɛ cullu tɩm vɩʋn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Dɩ́ nan kɩ Wɛ le dɩ DƖ na paɩ dɩbam wɔnɔ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ sɩ dɩ́ wanɩ tʋʋnɩ dɩ dɩ dam dɩm maama tɩn.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, a ko-bu-sonnu-ba, fɔgɩ á zɩgɩ-na kǝŋkǝŋ dɩ pu-dɩa, sɩ á cɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu tɩtʋŋa yam maŋa maama, dɩ á na ye nɩ tɩtʋŋa yalʋ maama á na tʋŋɩ á pa dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩn na daɩ kafɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Ba na lagɩ sǝbu sɩ ba ma zǝni Wɛ nɔɔna te tɩn Kʋ daarɩ kʋ na yɩ sǝbu kʋlʋ á na laɩ á maa zǝni Wɛ nɔɔna bam tɩn, á taá kɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ amʋ na maŋɩ a brɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋlʋ na wʋ Galatɩ tɩ-niǝ yam nɩ sɩ ba taa kɩ te tɩn.
Siun dɛ maama na yiǝ, sɩ nɔɔnʋ maama lɩ sǝbu kʋlʋ o na nɛ tɩn wʋnɩ o tiŋi, sɩ amʋ na tuǝ, sɩ á daa yɩ taá zɩgɩ á laɩ sǝbu.
Amʋ na tu abam te, abam na lɩ nɔɔna balʋ tɩn, a laan wʋ́ la tɔnɔ a tʋŋɩ-ba dɩ á sǝbu kʋm sɩ ba ja vu Zeruzalɛm.
Kʋ nan daa na maŋɩ sɩ amʋ tɩtɩ mʋ vu, dɩ́ wʋ́ tɔgɩ daanɩ dɩ́ vu.
Pooli na lagɩ sɩ o na Korɛntɩ tiinǝ bam te tɩn A lagɩ sɩ a da Masɩdʋanɩ mʋ, sɩ a laan daarɩ a ba abam te.
A na tu abam te, a lagɩ sɩ a daanɩ fɩɩn mʋ, dɛdoŋ aá ti waarʋ mɩmaŋa kam dáanɩ.
Kʋntʋ kwaga nɩ, á laan wʋ́ wanɩ á zǝni-nɩ sɩ a vu a daa na wʋ́ vu mɛ tɩn.
Amʋ ba lagɩ sɩ a wuuri a ba abam te maŋa fɩnfɩɩn, sɩ a joori a viiri.
Wɛ nan na sɛ, amʋ ya lagɩ sɩ a ba a daanɩ abam tee nɩ mʋ.
A nan lagɩ a maŋɩ Efɛɛzɩ nɩ mʋ sɩ kʋ vu kʋ yi Pantɩkoticandiǝ kam maŋa.
Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ pʋrɩ cwǝŋǝ lanyɩranɩ DƖ pa-nɩ, sɩ a tiini a tʋŋɩ DƖ tɩtʋŋa yo seeni.
Nɔɔna zanzan nan mʋ wʋra ba kwaana sɩ ba cɩ a yigǝ.
Timoti nan na tu abam te, sɩ á jeer-o lanyɩranɩ sɩ kʋ yɩ pa fʋʋnɩ taa jɩg-o.
Bɛŋwaanɩ o dɩ tʋŋɩ dɩ́ Yuutu tɩtʋŋa yam mʋ nɩ amʋ te.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o goon-o.
Kwaanɩ-na sɩ á wǝl-o o cwǝŋǝ kam vǝŋǝ wʋnɩ, sɩ o wanɩ o vu dɩ yazurǝ o ba amʋ te.
Amʋ dɩ dɩ́ ko-biǝ bam nan nii-o cwǝŋǝ nɩ sɩ o ba.
Kʋ nan na yɩ dɩ́ ko-bu Apolɔsɩ, amʋ tiini a loor-o mʋ sɩ o tɔgɩ dɩ dɩ́ ko-biǝ bam o ba abam te.
Nan dɩ kʋ dɩ, o ta wʋ lɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ o ba lele.
O nan na nɛ cwǝŋǝ maŋa kalʋ tɩn, oó ba.
Tiim kwǝrǝ Taá cʋ-na á tɩtɩ, sɩ á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ.
Taá jɩgɩ-na baarɩ dɩ dam.
Á taá kɩ-na woŋo maama dɩ sono.
A ko-biǝ-ba, á maŋɩ á ye Sɩtefanasɩ dɩ o sɔŋɔ tiinǝ na tɔgɩ Wɛ te tɩn.
Bantʋ mʋ dɛ yigǝ ba sɛ Zezi Akayi nɩ, yɩ ba sɛ ba tʋŋɩ ba zǝni Wɛ nɔɔna bam dɩ ba wʋ maama.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, a loori abam sɩ á sɛ nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ dwi ni, dɩdaanɩ balʋ maama na tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam nɩ bantʋ te tɩn.
Amʋ jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ Sɩtefanasɩ dɩ Fɔtunatusi dɩ Akayikusi na tu amʋ te tɩn.
Bantʋ mʋ pɛ a wʋ lwarɩ nɩ abam tǝrǝ.
Bantʋ mʋ pɛ a jɩgɩ wʋ-zuru, nɩ ba na pɛ abam dɩ jɩgɩ wʋ-zuru te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á taá nɩgɩ nɔɔna bantʋ dwi.
Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm maama Azitɩ-niǝ yam wʋnɩ tɩn jɔɔnɩ abam.
Akwila dɩ Prisili dɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋlʋ na jeeri ba sɔŋɔ nɩ tɩn dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam lanyɩranɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩ́ ko-biǝ bam maama dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam.
Á taá jɔɔnɩ daanɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ sono dɩ wʋ-poŋo.
Amʋ Pooli mʋ jɔɔnɩ abam.
A tɩtɩ laan mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɩntʋ dɩ a jɩŋa.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ maama na ba soe dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩn, Wɛ wʋ́ cɔgɩ kʋ tu.
Marana ta!
Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi wʋ́ pa abam yu-yoŋo.
Amʋ soe abam maama dɩ́ na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Tɔnɔ kʋlʋ Pooli na pʋpʋnɩ o pa Korɛntɩ tiinǝ o kɩ bɩle tɩn na brɩ dɩbam kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ Kʋ loori Pooli na pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋm kʋntʋ o pa Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ Korɛntɩ nɩ tɩn, ba wʋ nɔɔna badaara ya cɔgɩ Pooli wʋ, yɩ ba vɩn nɩ Pooli sɩɩnɩ o yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ.
Pooli nan kaanɩ-ba, yɩ o pa ba lwarɩ nɩ o soe-ba yɩ o lagɩ sɩ ba fɔgɩ daanɩ.
O dɛ yigǝ o brɩ o na yaarɩ te, dɩ Wɛ na zǝn-o te tɩn .
O laan ma brɩ cam dɩlʋ na wʋ wʋm dɩ bantʋ tɩtarɩ nɩ tɩn woŋo, dɩ Zezi na pɛ-o ni sɩ o ma kaanɩ-ba te tɩn.
O brɩ-ba kʋntʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ o ya maŋɩ o bwɛ-ba zanzan tɔnɔ kʋdoŋ wʋnɩ, yɩ o nan jɩgɩ wʋpolo zanzan dɩ o bwɛm dɩm na pɛ ba lǝni ba wʋrʋ ba yagɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩn .
Pooli ŋɔɔnɩ sǝbu-lɩʋ woŋo ba na kɩ Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ na zʋʋrɩ Zude nɩ yɩ ba yɩ yinigǝ tiinǝ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
O loori-ba sɩ ba pa dɩ ba wʋ-yoŋo mʋ .
Pooli laan ma bagɩ balʋ na ba sɛ nɩ wʋm yɩ Wɛ tɩntʋŋnʋ tɩn, o brɩ nɩ nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ fɔgɩ vwan mʋ .
Amʋ Pooli wʋlʋ Wɛ na kuri dɩ DƖ tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ a taa yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ tɩn mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ, yɩ dɩ́ ko-bu Timoti mʋ tɔgɩ o wǝli-nɩ.
Dɩ́ pʋpʋnɩ sɩ dɩ́ pa abam balʋ na yɩ Wɛ kɔgɔ kʋm wʋ nɔɔna yɩ á zʋʋrɩ Korɛntɩ nɩ tɩn, kʋ wǝli dɩ Wɛ nɔɔna maama balʋ na zʋʋrɩ Akayi tɩɩnɩ dɩm maama nɩ tɩn.
Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo.
Wɛ na tiini DƖ zǝni dɩbam te tɩn Pa-na dɩ́ kɩ Wɛ le.
Dɩntʋ mʋ yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi Ko, yɩ DƖ yɩ dɩbam Ko wʋlʋ na jɩgɩ dɩbam ŋwaŋa tɩn.
DƖ maa yɩ Wɛ dɩlʋ na zǝni nɔɔna sɩ ba bɩcara taa zurǝ maŋa maama tɩn.
Dɩ́ na wʋ yaara yalʋ maama wʋnɩ, dɩntʋ mʋ yǝni DƖ pa dɩ́ bɩcara zurǝ, sɩ kʋ pa dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ zǝni balʋ dɩ na wʋ yaara dwi maama wʋnɩ tɩn sɩ ba dɩ bɩcara taa zurǝ, nɩ Wɛ na zǝni dɩbam dɩ te tɩn.
Zezi Krisi na yaarɩ zanzan tɩn, dɩbam dɩ tɔgɩ dɩ́ na yaara yantʋ doŋ mʋ.
Dɩ́ nan na ŋwɩ dɩd-o tɩn, dɩ́ ta wʋ́ tɔgɩ dɩ́ na zǝnǝ Wɛ tee nɩ, nɩnɛɛnɩ DƖ na zǝni Zezi Krisi lanyɩranɩ te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, dɩbam na wʋ yaara wʋnɩ, kʋ yɩ sɩ kʋ zǝni abam mʋ sɩ á bɩcara taa zurǝ, sɩ á daarɩ á taá tɔgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ lanyɩranɩ.
Wɛ nan na pɛ dɩbam dɩ bɩcara zurǝ, kʋ yɩ sɩ abam dɩ na zǝnǝ yantʋ doŋ mʋ, sɩ á wanɩ á na dam á vɔ á wʋ á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ yaara yam wʋnɩ, nɩ dɩbam dɩ na nɛ yaara te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ, dɩbam jɩgɩ tɩɩna dɩ abam, bɛŋwaanɩ dɩ́ ye nɩ, abam na tɔgɩ á na dɩbam yaara yam doŋ tɩn, á dɩ wʋ́ tɔgɩ á na zǝnǝ Wɛ tee nɩ.
Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ lagɩ dɩ́ pa abam lwarɩ yaara yalʋ maama dɩ́ na nɛ Azi tɩɩnɩ dɩm nɩ tɩn mʋ.
Dɩ́ na nɛ cam dɩlʋ tɩn tiini dɩ dana dɩ dwe dɩbam, yɩ dɩ́ yaá bʋŋɩ nɩ dɩ́ wʋ́ ga dɩ́ ŋwɩa.
Dɩ́ nan na zɩgɩ tʋʋnɩ yigǝ nɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ yɩ sɩ kʋ pa dɩ́ daa yɩ taá tɩɩgɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ dam mʋ, sɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ dɩlʋ na jɩgɩ dam DƖ paɩ nɔɔna bi ba yagɩ tʋʋnɩ tɩn.
Wɛ nan mʋ vrɩ dɩbam yaara yalʋ na cana nɩ tʋʋnɩ te tɩn wʋnɩ, yɩ DƖ ta wʋ́ vrɩ dɩbam kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ.
Dɩ́ maa jɩgɩ tɩɩna Wɛ tee nɩ, nɩ DƖ ta wʋ́ vrɩ dɩbam tʋʋnɩ jɩŋa nɩ.
Abam nan wʋ́ zǝni dɩbam dɩ á na wʋ́ loori Wɛ á pa dɩbam tɩn.
Kʋntʋ, nɔɔna zanzan na loori Wɛ, kʋ pa dɩ́ na zǝnǝ, kʋ nan wʋ́ pa nɔɔna zanzan dɩ kɩ Wɛ le, dɩ DƖ na joŋi ba loro kʋm ba na loori dɩbam ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Woŋo kʋlʋ ŋwaanɩ Pooli na lǝni o wʋbʋŋa sɩ o daa yɩ ve ba te tɩn Dɩbam na jɩgɩ wʋpolo tɩn, kʋ yɩ sɩ dɩ́ ye dɩ́ bɩcarɩ nɩ, nɩ dɩ́ tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ dɩ wʋ-poŋo mʋ, dɩ dɩ́ na brɩ dɩ́ wʋ dɩ abam te tɩn.
Kʋ nan yɩ Wɛ mʋ zǝni dɩbam yɩ dɩ́ yɩ kʋntʋ.
Kʋ daɩ dɩ nabiinǝ swan, kʋ yɩ Wɛ zaanɩ dɩm ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ kʋntʋ doŋ nɔɔna maama yigǝ nɩ, kʋ na dwe dɩdɩ abam yigǝ nɩ.
Dɩ́ na pʋpʋnɩ kʋlʋ dɩ́ pa abam tɩn ba jɩgɩ wo-sǝgiru.
Á wʋ́ wanɩ á karɩmɩ yɩ á ni tɩ kuri.
Abam nan ni dɩbam na kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn fɩnfɩɩn yɩranɩ mʋ.
Amʋ nan jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ á wʋ́ ba á ni kʋ kuri fasɩ fasɩ, sɩ dɛ dɩm dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn, sɩ abam laan taá jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩbam ŋwaanɩ, nɩ dɩbam dɩ na jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ abam te tɩn.
-Amʋ na tiini a jɩgɩ abam cɩga kʋntʋ tɩn, a ya dɛ yigǝ a bʋŋɩ sɩ a ba abam te mʋ, sɩ a daarɩ a kɛ a vu Masɩdʋanɩ, sɩ a na zɩgɩ da a maa joorǝ, sɩ a daa ta tɔgɩ á te, sɩ kʋ pa á na zǝnǝ kuni bɩle.
Kʋntʋ á laan ya wʋ́ wanɩ á wǝli-nɩ sɩ a kɛ a vu Zude.
Amʋ na bʋŋɩ sɩ a ba yɩ a wʋ wanɩ a na cwǝŋǝ tɩn, á paɩ sɩ amʋ yɩ niǝ yale yale tu mʋ na?
Amʋ na yǝni a bʋŋɩ sɩ a kɩ kǝm dɩlʋ tɩn, á paɩ sɩ kʋ yɩ amʋ tɩtɩ yɩranɩ zǝnǝ ŋwaanɩ mʋ na?
Abam bʋŋɩ nɩ amʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na yǝni o wɩ ɛɛn yɩ o joori o wɩ aye tɩn mʋ na?
Wɛ nan yɩ cɩga tu yɩ DƖ ye nɩ dɩbam na tɛ kʋlʋ dɩ́ brɩ abam tɩn daɩ niǝ yale, nɩnɛɛnɩ ɛɛn dɩ awo na gwaanɩ daanɩ te tɩn.
Dɩbam nan na brɩ abam Wɛ cɩga kam te tɩn, amʋ dɩ Silivɛn dɩ Timoti pɛ á lwarɩ Zezi Krisi wʋlʋ na yɩ Wɛ Bu wʋm tɩn na yɩ te.
Wʋntʋ daɩ niǝ yale yale tu.
Wʋntʋ nan mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na wɩ ɛɛn yɩranɩ tɩn.
Zezi na wɩ ɛɛn tɩn, dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ lwarɩ nɩ Wɛ na goni ni sɩ DƖ kɩ kʋlʋ maama DƖ pa dɩbam tɩn yɩ cɩga mʋ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ, dɩ́ na yǝni dɩ́ warɩ Wɛ, dɩ́ tɔgɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ dɩ́ wɩ «Amina», sɩ kʋ pa Wɛ taa jɩgɩ zulǝ dɩbam tee nɩ.
Kʋ yɩ Wɛ mʋ paɩ dɩbam dɩ abam maama zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ Zezi Krisi tɔgɩm dɩm wʋnɩ.
Kʋ ta yɩ dɩntʋ mʋ kuri dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ taá yɩ DƖ tɩntʋŋna.
Wɛ ma kɩ DƖ Joro kʋm dɩ́ bɩcara nɩ sɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ dɩ́ yɩ DƖ nɔɔna.
DƖ Joro kʋm ma pa dɩ́ da yigǝ dɩ́ lwarɩ nɩ dɩ́ laan wʋ́ ba dɩ́ na Wɛ wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ maama DƖ na tiŋi dɩbam ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Wɛ mʋ yɩ amʋ maana tu.
Amʋ na tɛ kʋlʋ tɩn na yɩ vwan, sɩ DƖ gʋ-nɩ.
Amʋ na joori a lǝni a wʋbʋŋa sɩ a daa yɩ ba abam te Korɛntɩ nɩ tɩn, kʋ yɩ sɩ a yɩ ba a pa á daa na wʋ-cɔgɔ mʋ.
Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ dɩbam yɩ balʋ na wʋ́ fɩn abam dɩ á na maŋɩ sɩ á kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ te tɩn, bɛŋwaanɩ abam maŋɩ á sɛ-DƖ dɩ pu-dɩa.
Dɩ́ nan yɩ balʋ na wʋ́ wǝli dɩ abam dɩ́ tʋŋɩ, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋpolo Wɛ ŋwaanɩ tɩn mʋ.
Mʋ kʋ kuri a joori a bʋŋɩ a wʋnɩ, sɩ a daa yɩ ba abam te, sɩ kʋ yɩ pa wʋ-cɔgɔ daa ta wʋra.
Abam mʋ yɩ balʋ na wʋ́ wanɩ á pa amʋ taa jɩgɩ wʋpolo tɩn.
Kʋntʋ, amʋ na tu abam te, yɩ kʋ pa á wʋ cɔgɩ, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ daa bá ta wʋra o na wʋ́ wanɩ o pa a na wʋpolo.
Kʋ yɩ kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ a ya pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋm a pa abam.
Amʋ dɛɛn ba lagɩ sɩ a ba abam te, sɩ kʋ pa amʋ wʋ cɔgɩ dɩ abam.
Kʋ nan maŋɩ sɩ á taá yɩ balʋ na paɩ amʋ wʋ poli tɩn mʋ.
Amʋ nan jɩgɩ abam cɩga nɩ, amʋ na jɩgɩ wʋpolo abam dɩ jɩgɩ wʋpolo mʋ.
Amʋ dɛɛn na pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋm a pa abam tɩn, a wʋ tiini kʋ cɔgɩ zanzan, yɩ liǝ jɩgɩ-nɩ kʋ pa a yi-na nuŋi zanzan abam ŋwaanɩ.
Amʋ na pʋpʋnɩ te tɩn, kʋ daɩ sɩ kʋ pa á wʋrʋ cɔgɩ.
Kʋ nan yɩ sɩ á wanɩ á lwarɩ amʋ na tiini a soe abam kʋ ja gaalɩ te tɩn mʋ.
Á maŋɩ sɩ á yagɩ á ma cɛ wʋlʋ na kɩ o cɔgɩ tɩn Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na kɩ o cɔgɩ tɩn, kʋ daɩ amʋ yɩranɩ wʋ mʋ cɔgɩ dɩd-o, kʋ yɩ abam maama mʋ, sɩ a nan yɩ zaŋɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ a ja gaalɩ, a ye sɩ abam zanzan wʋrʋ mʋ cɔgɩ.
Abam zanzan na pɛ o na cam tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á laan yag-o mʋ.
Á nan maŋɩ sɩ á yagɩ á maa cɛ-o mʋ, sɩ á daarɩ á taá kɩ-o lanyɩranɩ, sɩ o bɩcarɩ taa zurǝ.
Kʋ na daɩ kʋntʋ, o wʋ na tiini kʋ cɔgɩ, kʋʋ́ pa o wʋbʋŋa vugimi.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ a loori abam sɩ á pa o lwarɩ nɩ á so-o.
Amʋ na pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋm tɩn, kʋ yɩ sɩ a maasɩ abam a nii, á wʋ́ sɛ á tɔgɩ amʋ ni dɩm woŋo maama baŋa nɩ naa á bá sɛ mʋ.
Abam na yagɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ kǝm á ma cɛ-o, amʋ dɩ wʋ́ yagɩ a ma cɛ-o mʋ.
Kʋ na maŋɩ sɩ a yagɩ a ma cɛ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ, kʋ yɩ abam ŋwaanɩ mʋ a kɩ kʋntʋ Zezi Krisi yigǝ nɩ.
Kʋ nan maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ duri nɔɔnʋ wʋm ŋwaŋa kʋntʋ, sɩ kʋ yɩ pa sʋtaanɩ na cwǝŋǝ dɩ wanɩ dɩbam.
Bɛŋwaanɩ dɩ́ maŋɩ dɩ́ ye dɩntʋ na bʋŋɩ sɩ dɩ pa dɩbam tusi te tɩn.
Liǝ na jaanɩ Pooli Trʋasɩ nɩ te tɩn Amʋ na ve a yi tɩʋ kʋlʋ yɩrɩ na yɩ Trʋasɩ sɩ a tɔɔlɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam a brɩ nɔɔna tɩn, a nɛ nɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ya pɛ-nɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ a tɔɔlɩ-ka.
Nan dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, a wʋ nɛ wʋ-zuru dɩ a na beeri dɩ́ ko-bu Titi je a ga tɩn.
A na wʋ nɛ-o tɩn, a ma banɩ nɔɔna bam yɩ a daarɩ a kɛ Masɩdʋanɩ.
Dɩ́ na nɛ wɔnɔ Zezi Krisi yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ te tɩn Nan pa-na dɩ́ taá kɩ Wɛ le.
Bɛŋwaanɩ dɩntʋ mʋ paɩ Zezi Krisi wɔnɔ, yɩ dɩ́ tɔgɩ o kwaga maŋa maama, sɩ dɩ́ taá paɩ nɔɔna lwarɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam je maama, nɩnɛɛnɩ woŋo kʋlʋ lwǝm na ywǝnǝ yɩ dɩ zaŋɩ dɩ jagɩ je maama te tɩn.
-Dɩbam nyɩ dɩ lwǝm dɩlʋ na ywǝnǝ tɩn mʋ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ, dɩ́ na brɩ nɔɔna Zezi Krisi cɩga kam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩbam nyɩ dɩ lwǝm dɩm kʋntʋ mʋ nɔɔna maama tee nɩ.
Kʋ na yɩ balʋ na lagɩ ba ga ba ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn, lwǝm dɩm kʋntʋ maa paɩ ba ye nɩ tʋʋnɩ wʋ́ ja-ba.
Kʋ nan na yɩ balʋ Wɛ na vrɩ ba ŋwɩa tɩn, lwǝm dɩm wʋ́ ta jɩgɩ ywǝǝni ba tee nɩ, dɩ pa ba ye nɩ baá na Wɛ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam.
Wɔɔ mʋ yi sɩ o tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋ-kamunu kʋm kʋntʋ?
Nɔɔna zanzan na brɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam te tɩn, ba paɩ kʋ nyɩ dɩ pipiu mʋ sɩ ba na nyɔɔrɩ kʋ baŋa nɩ.
Dɩbam nan daɩ kʋntʋ doŋ.
Wɛ na tʋŋɩ dɩbam tɩn, dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ kwe dɩ́ wʋ maama mʋ dɩ́ maa brɩ DƖ cɩga kam, bɛŋwaanɩ dɩ́ zɩgɩ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ mʋ dɩ́ ŋɔɔna, dɩ́ na yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋna tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ ni-dʋʋrɩ dɩlʋ DƖ na goni tɩn na jɩgɩ dam kʋ gaalɩ te tɩn Abam badaara nan daa ta wʋ́ bʋŋɩ nɩ dɩ́ lagɩ dɩ́ brɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ mʋ dɩ dɩ́ na ŋɔɔnɩ te tɩn.
Abam nan maŋɩ á ye dɩbam na yɩ te, yɩ á daa wʋ maŋɩ sɩ á joŋi twaanʋ tɩlʋ na brɩ dɩbam cɩga na yɩ te tɩn nɔɔna badaara tee nɩ.
Abam nan wʋ maŋɩ sɩ á pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋlʋ na brɩ dɩbam na yɩ te tɩn á pa nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ.
Nɔɔna badonnǝ nan mʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba kɩ kʋntʋ, sɩ kʋ daɩ dɩbam.
Abam tɩtɩ nan mʋ brɩ dɩbam cɩga na yɩ te tɩn.
Abam nyɩ dɩ tɔnɔ mʋ te kʋ na pʋpʋnɩ dɩbam bɩcarɩ nɩ, yɩ nɔɔna maama wʋ́ wanɩ ba karɩmɩ yɩ ba kwǝri ba lwarɩ tɩn.
Abam na jɩgɩ á ŋwɩa te tɩn nyɩ dɩ tɔnɔ mʋ Zezi Krisi na tɔgɩ dɩbam ŋwaanɩ o pʋpʋnɩ.
O nan na pʋpʋnɩ te tɩn, o mɛ Ŋwɩa Tu Baŋa-Wɛ Joro kʋm mʋ o pʋpʋnɩ, sɩ kʋ daɩ bǝrǝ mʋ o mɛ o pʋpʋnɩ.
Pʋpʋnɩm dɩm kʋntʋ nan wʋ kɩ kandwa-pɩlɛ baŋa nɩ, o pʋpʋnɩ-dɩ nabiinǝ bɩcara nɩ mʋ.
Dɩ́ ye nɩ kʋntʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ, dɩ Zezi Krisi na pɛ dɩ́ lwarɩ nɩ Wɛ mʋ tʋŋɩ dɩbam tɩn.
Kʋ nan daɩ dɩ dɩbam tɩtɩ dam mʋ dɩ́ wʋ́ wanɩ dɩ́ ma tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam.
Kʋ yɩ Wɛ mʋ paɩ dɩbam dam yɩ dɩ́ maa tʋŋa.
DƖ ma pa dɩ́ yɩ DƖ tɩntʋŋna kʋntʋ, sɩ dɩ́ taá brɩ nɔɔna DƖ ni-dʋʋrɩ dɩm DƖ na goni tɩn na yɩ te tɩn.
DƖ ni-dʋʋrɩ dɩm kʋntʋ nan ba tɔgɩ cullu tɩlʋ ba dɛɛn na pʋpʋnɩ tɩn.
Dɩntʋ nan tɔgɩ dɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm dam mʋ.
Cullu tɩm nan paɩ tʋʋnɩ mʋ naɩ cwǝŋǝ dɩ jaanɩ nabiinǝ.
Kʋ daarɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm nan mʋ paɩ nabiinǝ na ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ.
Kʋ na yɩ Wɛ na kwe DƖ cullu tɩm DƖ kɩ Moyisi jɩŋa nɩ sɩ o pa DƖ nɔɔna bam tɩn, DƖ dɛɛn pʋpʋnɩ-tɩ DƖ kɩ kandwa-pɩlɛ baŋa nɩ mʋ.
Wɛ dɛɛn na kwe-tɩ DƖ kɩ Moyisi jɩŋa nɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, DƖ paarɩ-zulǝ yam maa tiini ya wʋra, yɩ kʋ pa Moyisi yibiyǝ tiini ka nyɩɩna.
O yibiyǝ kam nyɩɩnɩm dɩm na pɩpɩlɩ Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam yiǝ dɩ pa ba warɩ ba nii o seeni tɩn wʋ́ ba kɛ.
Nan dɩ cullu tɩm na jaanɩ tʋʋnɩ mʋ tɩ ba tɩn, tɩ daa ta jɩgɩ Wɛ paarɩ-zulǝ.
Kʋ daarɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm nan na wǝli nɔɔna te tɩn laan wʋ́ pa Wɛ paarɩ-zulǝ yam tiini ya ja gaalɩ.
Wɛ cullu tɩm na brɩ nɩ nɔɔna wʋ́ ga bʋra DƖ tee nɩ yɩ tɩ ta jɩgɩ paarɩ-zulǝ te tɩn, Wɛ na wǝli nɔɔna sɩ ba na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ te tɩn laan wʋ́ ta tiini kʋ jɩgɩ paarɩ-zulǝ kʋ ja gaalɩ.
Kʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn, woŋo kʋlʋ ya na jɩgɩ zulǝ tɩn daa ba jɩgɩ zulǝ, zɩm woŋo kʋm na tiini kʋ jɩgɩ paarɩ-zulǝ kʋ ja gaalɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ cullu tɩm dɛɛn wʋra dɩ DƖ paarɩ-zulǝ yam, yɩ tɩntʋ ba tɩ kɛ.
Kʋ daarɩ DƖ zǝnǝ yalʋ na wʋ́ ta wʋra maŋa maama tɩn wʋ́ pa DƖ paarɩ-zulǝ yam tiini ya ta wʋra ya ja gaalɩ.
Dɩ́ na jɩgɩ tɩɩna dɩ Wɛ kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn mʋ te dɩ́ waɩ dɩ́ brɩ DƖ cɩga kam jaja.
Dɩbam nan bá sǝgi kʋlʋkʋlʋ nɩnɛɛnɩ Moyisi dɛɛn na kwe gɔrɔ o ma kwǝli o yiǝ tɩn.
O dɛɛn kɩ kʋntʋ sɩ Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam mʋ yɩ taa naɩ o yibiyǝ kam nyɩɩnɩm dɩm na wʋra dɩ ti tɩn.
Bantʋ wʋbʋŋa ma tɩ, yɩ kʋ pa ba na karɩmɩ twaanʋ tɩlʋ na brɩ Wɛ dɛɛn na goni ni DƖ pa Moyisi tɩn, ba warɩ ba lwarɩ DƖ cɩga kam kuri.
Kʋ yɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ gɔrɔ kʋm daa ta mʋ kwǝli ba yiǝ dɩ zɩm maama.
Kʋ nan yɩ Zezi Krisi mʋ wʋ́ pa gɔrɔ kʋm kʋntʋ dwanɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na sɛ-o tɩn yiǝ nɩ.
Nan dɩ zɩm maama dɩ, bantʋ na karɩmɩ Moyisi twaanʋ tɩm, ba ba ni kʋ kuri, gɔrɔ kʋm kʋntʋ na kwǝli ba yiǝ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Nɔɔnʋ nan na lǝni o wʋ o sɛ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm, kʋʋ́ pa gɔrɔ kʋm dwanɩ kʋntʋ tu yiǝ nɩ.
Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋlʋ dɩ́ na ŋɔɔnɩ o woŋo yo seeni tɩn, kʋ lagɩ kʋ ta nɩ Wɛ Joro mʋ.
Wɛ Joro kʋm nan na wʋ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ tee nɩ tɩn, o laan te o tɩtɩ mʋ.
Dɩbam balʋ maama na sɛ Zezi tɩn daa ba jɩgɩ gɔrɔ kʋlʋ na kwǝli dɩ́ yiǝ tɩn.
Kʋ maa paɩ dɩ́ waɩ dɩ́ nii dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm paarɩ-zulǝ yam jaja.
Dɩ́ na nii-o kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ maa paɩ dɩ́ laan lǝni dɩ́ nyɩ nɩ o tɩtɩ te, sɩ dɩ́ taá waɩ dɩ́ brɩ o paarɩ-zulǝ yam na yɩ te tɩn, sɩ ya taa fɔgɩ ya pulǝ ya wǝli da.
Dɩ́ Yuutu Joro kʋm tɩtʋŋa yam mʋ tɩntʋ.
Dɩbam na bwǝnǝ yɩ Wɛ zǝni dɩbam te tɩn Dɩbam bá ga baarɩ, bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ lanyɩranɩ kǝm dɩm ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ pɛ dɩbam tɩtʋŋɩ dɩm kʋntʋ.
Dɩbam nan jɩgɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ mʋ dɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ nɔɔna na sǝgi ba kɩ yɩ tɩ jɩgɩ cavɩɩra tɩn.
Dɩ́ nan ba ganɩ nɔɔna dɩ swan, naa dɩ́ lǝni Wɛ taanɩ dɩm.
Dɩ́ yɔɔrɩ dɩ́ brɩ Wɛ cɩga kam mʋ jaja, sɩ kʋ pa nɔɔna maama lwarɩ nɩ dɩ́ na kɩ te tɩn tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ.
Dɩ́ na brɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam te tɩn kuri na sǝgi nɔɔna tee nɩ, kʋ yɩ balʋ na lagɩ ba ga ba ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn yɩranɩ má mʋ ka sǝgi ba tee nɩ.
Bantʋ ba sɛ Wɛ cɩga kam, bɛŋwaanɩ sʋtaanɩ dɩlʋ na di dam lʋgʋ kʋntʋ baŋa nɩ tɩn mʋ pɛ ba wʋbʋŋa vugimi.
Dɩ kɩ kʋntʋ, sɩ ba yɩ wanɩ ba na pooni dɩlʋ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam na lagɩ ka pa-ba tɩn mʋ.
Kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ brɩ Zezi Krisi paarɩ-zulǝ na yɩ te tɩn mʋ.
Wʋntʋ mʋ nyɩ dɩ Baŋa-Wɛ fasɩ.
Dɩbam na yǝni dɩ́ tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam te tɩn, kʋ daɩ nɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ mʋ dɩ́ jɩgɩ dɩ́ brɩ nɔɔna.
Dɩ́ nan brɩ nɔɔna nɩ Zezi Krisi mʋ yɩ nabiinǝ Yuutu, yɩ dɩbam yɩ balʋ na tʋŋɩ dɩ́ pa abam o ŋwaanɩ tɩn mʋ.
Baŋa-Wɛ mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na maŋɩ o ta o wɩ: «Pooni zǝŋi lim wʋnɩ».
Dɩntʋ nan ta mʋ yɩ dɩlʋ na pɛ pooni ba dɩ zǝŋi dɩ́ bɩcara nɩ tɩn, sɩ dɩ́ lwarɩ DƖ paarɩ-zulǝ yam na yɩ te, yɩ yantʋ mʋ dɩ́ naɩ Zezi Krisi yibiyǝ nɩ.
Wɛ na pɛ dɩbam tɩtʋŋɩ dɩm kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ nyɩ dɩ DƖ kwe wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na yɩ lʋnnɩ nyɩm tɩn mʋ DƖ kɩ kamɔrʋ kɔɔra wʋnɩ.
Dɩ́ na nyɩ dɩ kɔɔra kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ kʋ daɩ dɩbam tɩtɩ dam, kʋ yɩ Wɛ dam-fɔrɔ kʋm ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Yaara zanzan yǝni ya yi dɩbam, yɩ ya warɩ dɩ́ yigǝ ya cɩ.
Liǝ yǝni ya tiini ya ja dɩbam, yɩ ya warɩ dɩbam wʋbʋŋa ya cɔgɩ.
Nɔɔna yǝni ba bɛɛsɩ dɩbam, Wɛ nan ba fɔgɩ DƖ yagɩ dɩbam.
Dɩ́ dʋna yǝni ba magɩ dɩbam ba dɩ tɩga nɩ, yɩ ba ba fɔgɩ ba gʋɩ dɩbam.
Dɩbam jɩgɩ Zezi tʋʋnɩ dɩm yaara yam doŋ mʋ dɩ́ ŋwɩa wʋnɩ maŋa maama, sɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ Zezi ŋwɩa kam mʋ wʋ dɩbam wʋnɩ.
Dɩbam ŋwɩa kam wʋnɩ maŋa maama dɩ́ wʋ tʋʋnɩ ni nɩ mʋ, dɩ́ na sɛ Zezi tɩn ŋwaanɩ, sɩ kʋ pa Zezi ŋwɩa kam taa wʋ dɩ́ yɩra yalʋ na wʋ́ ba ya tɩ tɩn wʋnɩ.
Kʋntʋ, dɩbam zɩgɩ tʋʋnɩ yigǝ nɩ mʋ maŋa maama, sɩ abam wanɩ á na ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ.
Kʋ maŋɩ kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Amʋ na kɩ a wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn mʋ pɛ a ŋɔɔna.» Dɩbam dɩ na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn mʋ paɩ dɩ́ ŋɔɔnɩ DƖ cɩga kam.
Dɩbam ye nɩ Wɛ mʋ bi dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi DƖ pa o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ, yɩ DƖ ta wʋ́ bi dɩbam dɩ, sɩ dɩ́ na ŋwɩa DƖ tee nɩ dɩ́ na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ Wɛ wʋ́ pa dɩbam dɩ abam maama tɔgɩ daanɩ dɩ́ vu dɩ́ zɩgɩ DƖ yigǝ nɩ.
Dɩ́ na kɩ te maama tɩn yɩ abam zǝnǝ ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
