Kʋ na yɩ cɔgɩm-ŋwɛ dɩ bɩtar-jwǝǝru dɩ bɩtar-digiru dwi maama, tɩntʋ wʋ maŋɩ dɩ abam.
Á nan maŋɩ sɩ á taá kɩ Wɛ le mʋ maŋa maama.
Nan taá ye-na nɩ, nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ maama na kɩ wo-zɔɔna naa boorim, naa wʋlʋ na yɩ wo-swǝn-nyɩm tɩn, kʋntʋ tu bá fɔgɩ o na kʋlʋkʋlʋ Zezi Krisi dɩ Baŋa-Wɛ paarɩ dɩm wʋnɩ.
Nɔɔnʋ na yɩ wo-swǝn-nyɩm, kʋ brɩ nɩ o pa tɩntʋ mʋ zulǝ, yɩ o daarɩ Wɛ o yagɩ.
Nan yɩ pa-na nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ ganɩ abam dɩ bɩtar-yɔɔrʋ.
Kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩm kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ lagɩ tɩ pa Wɛ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋm sɩɩnɩ kʋ ba kʋ cɔgɩ balʋ na vɩn DƖ ni tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ ja-na á tɩtɩ dɩ balʋ na kɩ kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn.
Abam dɛɛn ya yǝri Wɛ, yɩ kʋ pa á wʋ lim wʋnɩ.
Abam nan na tu á ŋwɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi tɩn, kʋ pɛ pooni laan wʋ á tee nɩ.
Á taá ŋwɩ-na sɩ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ balʋ na ve pooni wʋnɩ tɩn na ŋwɩ te tɩn.
Bɛŋwaanɩ kǝnǝ yalʋ maama na yɩ pooni nyɩm tɩn mʋ yɩ lanyɩranɩ, dɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama na jɩgɩ cɩga tɩn.
Á nan kwaanɩ sɩ á lwarɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama na sui dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi wʋbʋŋa tɩn.
Ja-na á tɩtɩ sɩ á yɩ tɔgɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ na yɩ lim nyɩm tɩn, sɩ á daarɩ á pa nɔɔna lwarɩ jaja nɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ ba lana.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, wǝǝnu tɩlʋ nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ na yǝni ba sǝgi ba kɩ tɩn tiini tɩ jɩgɩ cavɩɩra sɩ dɩ́ ŋɔɔnɩ-tɩ.
Abam nan na pɛ Wɛ pooni dɩm brɩ woŋo maama kuri jaja, nɔɔna laan wʋ́ lwarɩ nɩ tɩ yɩ balɔrɔ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ woŋo kʋlʋ maama kuri na lwarɩ jaja tɩn laan wʋ pooni yigǝ nɩ mʋ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ kʋ tagɩ kʋ wɩ: «Wʋlʋ na dɔ tɩn zaŋɩ wɛɛnɩ, sɩ n bi n yagɩ tʋʋnɩ, sɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwɩa kam pooni taa wʋ nmʋ tee nɩ.» Á nan fɔgɩ á cɩ á tɩtɩ dɩ á na tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ kalʋ tɩn, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-ŋʋna, sɩ á yɩ taá yɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ balʋ na wʋ lwarɩ Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn te.
Dɩbam na ŋwɩ maŋa kalʋ wʋnɩ zɩm tɩn jɩgɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ zanzan.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, Wɛ na pɛ abam pwǝlǝ sɩ á tʋŋɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, kɩ-na-kʋ lanyɩranɩ.
Á yɩ taá tɔgɩ-na jwǝrim cwǝŋǝ, á nan kwaanɩ á lwarɩ kʋlʋ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na lagɩ sɩ á taá kɩ tɩn.
Yɩ taá yɩ nɔɔna balʋ na nyɔ sana ba su ba bugi tɩn, sɩ kʋntʋ paɩ á ŋwɩa cɔgɩ mʋ.
Á nan za pa-na Wɛ Joro kʋm su á bɩcara lanyɩranɩ.
Á taá leeni Wɛ lǝŋ-ŋwɩ dɩ Wɛ tiǝ le dɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm na pɛ abam le sɩlʋ tɩn á brɩ daanɩ.
Taá leeni-na zulǝ le sɩm kʋntʋ á pa dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi dɩ á wʋ maama, sɩ á taá kɩ dɩ́ Ko Wɛ le maŋa maama dɩ woŋo kʋlʋ maama DƖ na pɛ abam tɩn dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ.
Baara dɩ ba kaana na maŋɩ sɩ ba taa soe daanɩ te tɩn Á taá sɛ daanɩ á na kwarɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kaana maŋɩ sɩ ba taa sɛ ba banna, nɩ ba na sɛ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi te tɩn.
Bɛŋwaanɩ kaanɩ barʋ mʋ yɩ o yuutu, nɩ Zezi Krisi dɩ na yɩ o kɔgɔ kʋm Yuutu te tɩn.
O kɔgɔ kʋm nyɩ dɩ o yɩra mʋ, yɩ wʋntʋ mʋ vrɩ-ba lwarɩm wʋnɩ.
Kʋntʋ, kaana dɩ maŋɩ sɩ ba sɛ ba banna mʋ woŋo maama wʋnɩ, nɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm nɔɔna bam na sɛ o ni te tɩn.
Kʋ daarɩ abam banna-ba, á maŋɩ sɩ á taá soe á kaana, nɩ Zezi Krisi dɩ na soe o kɔgɔ kʋm nɔɔna bam yɩ o sɛ o tɩ ba ŋwaanɩ te tɩn.
O nan tɩgɩ sɩ o pa ba taa yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna mʋ.
O ma kwɛ-ba dɩ o taanɩ dɩm sɩ ba ji lanyɩranɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ ba na zarɩ woŋo dɩ na te tɩn.
O fɔgɩ o kwɛ-ba kʋntʋ, sɩ o laan pa o kɔgɔ kʋm wanɩ kʋ ba kʋ zɩgɩ o yigǝ nɩ dɩ paarɩ-zulǝ mʋ, sɩ kʋ taa jɩgɩ lam, yɩ digiru dɩ cɔgɩm tǝri kʋ tee nɩ dɩ fɩnfɩɩn dɩ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, o nɔɔna bam wʋ́ ta jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo o yigǝ nɩ, yɩ tusim tǝrǝ.
Kʋntʋ, kan-banna maŋɩ sɩ ba taa soe ba kaana, nɩnɛɛnɩ ba na soe ba tɩtɩ yɩra yam te tɩn.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na soe o kaanɩ tɩn soe o tɩtɩ mʋ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ nɔɔnʋ tǝrǝ o na vaɩ o yɩra kwɛɛm.
O nan nii o yɩra yam baŋa nɩ mʋ, yɩ o di wʋdiu o ma kɔnɩ-ya.
Kʋ nan yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ dɩ Zezi Krisi na nii dɩbam balʋ na yɩ o kɔgɔ kʋm baŋa nɩ te tɩn, dɩ́ na nyɩ dɩ o yɩra yam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm nan tagɩ kʋ wɩ: «Nɔɔnʋ na di kaanɩ, o maŋɩ sɩ o pɔɔrɩ o tɩtɩ o ko dɩ o nu tee nɩ, sɩ o daarɩ o jǝni dɩ o kaanɩ wʋm, sɩ ba laan ji nɔɔnʋ dɩdʋa.» Taanɩ dɩm kʋntʋ yɩ ta-ŋʋm mʋ, yɩ dɩ kuri ya sǝgi.
Amʋ nan kwe-dɩ a ma maŋɩ Zezi Krisi dɩ o kɔgɔ kʋm woŋo mʋ.
Kʋ nan yɩ cɩga mʋ dɩ abam dɩ, kan-barʋ maama maŋɩ sɩ o taa soe o kaanɩ nɩ o na soe o tɩtɩ te tɩn.
Kaanɩ maama dɩ maŋɩ sɩ o taa zuli o barʋ mʋ.
Biǝ dɩ ba tiinǝ na maŋɩ sɩ ba taa ŋwɩ daanɩ te tɩn Biǝ-ba, abam na sɛ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á taá sɛ á tiinǝ ni, sɩ kʋ maŋɩ kʋntʋ mʋ.
«Ta n zuli n ko dɩ n nu.» Wɛ niǝ yam maama wʋnɩ, mʋ dayigǝ ni dɩlʋ DƖ na goni ni DƖ wǝli da DƖ wɩ: «Nmʋ na zuli n ko dɩ n nu, nń na ywǝǝni dɩ mʋmwɛ-dɛɛrɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ.» Kʋ daarɩ abam balʋ na yɩ biǝ kwǝ tɩn, sɩ á yɩ taá tiini á fɩ-ba á paɩ ba bana zaŋɩ.
Nan taá kɔnɩ á biǝ bam lanyɩranɩ, sɩ á taá kwe-ba nɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi cɩga kam na brɩ te tɩn.
Yum tiinǝ dɩ ba gambɛ na maŋɩ sɩ ba taa ŋwɩ daanɩ te tɩn Kʋ na yɩ abam balʋ na yɩ gambɛ tɩn, á taá tʋŋɩ á tɔgɩ á yum tiinǝ wʋbʋŋa.
Taá kwarɩ-na-ba sɩ á tʋŋɩ dɩ yawala, nɩnɛɛnɩ á na wʋ́ tʋŋɩ á pa dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi te tɩn.
Kʋ nan daɩ ba na zɩgɩ ba nii abam maŋa kalʋ tɩn yɩranɩ mʋ á wʋ́ ta tʋŋɩ kʋntʋ sɩ ba tee abam.
Taá tʋŋɩ-na dɩ á wʋ maama, sɩ á taá tɔgɩ Wɛ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn nɩnɛɛnɩ á yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩtɩ gambɛ mʋ te.
Taá tʋŋɩ-na dɩ wʋpolo nɩnɛɛnɩ á tʋŋɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ mʋ te, sɩ kʋ daɩ nabiinǝ ŋwaanɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ abam ye nɩ nɔɔnʋ maama wʋ́ na ŋwɩɩrʋ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tee nɩ dɩ kǝm-laarʋ tɩlʋ maama o na kɩ tɩn, kʋ na yɩ gambaa naa nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na te o tɩtɩ tɩn dɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ abam balʋ na yɩ gambɛ sɩm yum tiinǝ tɩn, á taá kɩ á gambɛ sɩm lanyɩranɩ dɩ kʋntʋ doŋ, sɩ á yɩ taá fugi-ba, bɛŋwaanɩ abam ye nɩ á maama jɩgɩ Yuutu dɩdʋa mʋ o na wʋ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ nɩ, yɩ wʋntʋ mʋ te abam dɩ á gambɛ sɩm maama.
Wʋntʋ nan tɔgɩ cɩga mʋ, o ba kuri nɔɔna daanɩ.
Wɛ na wʋ́ zǝni dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ taá zɩgɩ dɩ baarɩ te tɩn Amʋ na lagɩ a ta kʋlʋ a ma a kweeli tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ á taá zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ dɩ á na ŋwɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn, sɩ á joŋi o dam-fɔrɔ kʋm.
Kwaanɩ-na á joŋi Wɛ zǝnǝ yam maama nɩnɛɛnɩ jara zɩla te, sɩ á wanɩ á fɔgɩ á cɩ á tɩtɩ, sɩ sʋtaanɩ yɩ wanɩ abam dɩ dɩ sɩsɩɩna yam maama.
Jara yam kʋntʋ nan daɩ dɩbam dɩ nabiinǝ jara.
Kʋ yɩ dɩdaanɩ ciciri sɩlʋ maama na jɩgɩ dam wɛyuu tɩlampolo nɩ tɩn mʋ.
Sɩntʋ mʋ yɩ sʋtaanɩ jɩŋa dɩdɛɛra, yɩ sɩ jɩgɩ dam lʋgʋ kʋntʋ na yɩ lim tɩn baŋa nɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, joŋi-na Wɛ zǝnǝ yam maama á ma fɔgɩ á cɩ á tɩtɩ, sɩ á wanɩ á vɩn sʋtaanɩ sɩ á zɩgɩ dɩ baarɩ maŋa kalʋ na cana tɩn wʋnɩ, sɩ á na wanɩ jara yam, sɩ á ta taá zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ á zɩga kam je nɩ.
Nan fɔgɩ-na á zɩgɩ dɩ baarɩ, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ Wɛ cɩga kam, nɩ á na vɔgɩ á gwaarʋ dɩ kili te tɩn, sɩ á daarɩ á taá kɩ lanyɩranɩ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ, sɩ kʋ wanɩ kʋ cɩ abam dɩ wo-lwaanʋ, nɩnɛɛnɩ á na zʋ luguru gwaarʋ á ma kwǝli á nyɔɔna jara wʋnɩ te tɩn.
Á nan maŋɩ sɩ á kwaanɩ á tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kalʋ na paɩ nɔɔna dɩ Wɛ fɔgɩ daanɩ tɩn, nɩnɛɛnɩ á na zʋ natra sɩ kʋ zǝni á vǝŋǝ jara wʋnɩ te tɩn.
Á taá jɩgɩ-na wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ maŋa maama, nɩnɛɛnɩ á na ze tɔn-tɩʋ kʋm ba na ma kɔŋɩ cɩna tɩn, sɩ á cɩ á tɩtɩ dɩ wo-lwaanʋ tu sʋtaanɩ cɩ-dɛɛra yam ya na jɩgɩ minǝ tɩn, sɩ á wanɩ á pa ya maama dwe.
Ma-na Wɛ na vrɩ abam ŋwɩa te tɩn á ma cɩ á tɩtɩ, nɩ luguru yu-kwǝli mʋ á pugǝ á yuu nɩ jara wʋnɩ te.
Á ma-na Wɛ taanɩ dɩm á ma wǝli á tɩtɩ, nɩ sʋ-zɔɔ te, Wɛ Joro kʋm na kɩ abam jɩŋa nɩ tɩn.
Á kɩ-na wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ maama dɩ Wɛ-loro sɩ Wɛ zǝni abam.
Á taá warɩ Wɛ maŋa maama nɩ DƖ Joro kʋm na pɛ abam dam te tɩn.
Taá jɩgɩ-na á tɩtɩ, sɩ á vɔ á wʋ lanyɩranɩ, sɩ á taá loori Wɛ DƖ nɔɔna bam maama ŋwaanɩ.
Taá loori-na Wɛ á pa amʋ dɩ, sɩ a na puri a ni sɩ a ta taanɩ, sɩ DƖ pa-nɩ taanɩ dɩlʋ a na wʋ́ ŋɔɔnɩ tɩn, sɩ a daarɩ a na baarɩ a brɩ nɔɔna DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam, sɩ a pa ba lwarɩ DƖ cɩga kalʋ ya na sǝgi tɩn.
Kʋ yɩ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ Wɛ tʋŋɩ-nɩ sɩ a taa brɩ nɔɔna.
Ba nan kɩ-nɩ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ a na brɩ-ka tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Nan taá loori-na Wɛ sɩ DƖ zǝni-nɩ, sɩ a taa waɩ a tɔɔlɩ-ka dɩ baarɩ nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ sɩ a taa kɩ te tɩn.
Tiim kwǝrǝ Amʋ nan lagɩ sɩ abam lwarɩ amʋ labaarɩ dɩ a na wʋra a kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ a lagɩ a tʋŋɩ dɩ́ ko-bu-sono Tisiki sɩ o ba abam te, sɩ o fɔgɩ o ta amʋ labaarɩ maama dɩ abam.
Wʋntʋ tʋŋɩ o pa dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi dɩ yawala mʋ.
Amʋ lagɩ sɩ o pa abam lwarɩ dɩbam labaarɩ, sɩ kʋ pa á bɩcara pǝni tɩga nɩ.
Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa dɩ́ ko-biǝ bam maama yazurǝ, sɩ ba taa jɩgɩ da-sono dɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa.
Wɛ wʋ́ pa balʋ maama na jɩgɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi sono kʋlʋ na ba ti tɩn yu-yoŋo.
Tɔnɔ kʋlʋ Pooli na pʋpʋnɩ o pa Filipi tiinǝ tɩn na brɩ dɩbam kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ Pooli dɛɛn pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋm kʋntʋ o pa Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ Filipi nɩ tɩn mʋ.
Bantʋ mʋ yɩ balʋ na dɛ yigǝ ba kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Ɛrɔpɩ nɩ tɩn.
Filipi yɩ Masɩdʋanɩ lʋgʋ kʋm tɩʋ dɩdʋa mʋ, yɩ Rom tiinǝ dɛɛn mʋ te-ba.
Maŋa kalʋ Pooli na wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ tɩn, mʋ o pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋm kʋntʋ.
O wʋ dɛɛn ma cɔgɩ dɩ nɔɔna badaara na jaanɩ vwan zaasɩm ba zʋ Filipi Wɛ nɔɔna bam wʋnɩ tɩn.
Nan dɩ kʋntʋ maama dɩ, Pooli tɔnɔ kʋm ta brɩ o na jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ baarɩ tɩte, o na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Maŋa kalʋ Pooli na wʋra o pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋm tɩn, o dɛɛn guli o kɩ Filipi Wɛ nɔɔna bam le, ba na zǝn-o dɩ pɛɛra yalʋ maama o cam dɩm maŋa nɩ tɩn.
O ma daarɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ dɩ ba sɩ ba na pu-dɩa dɩ baarɩ, nɩ wʋm dɩ na nɛ cam yɩ o zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ te tɩn.
O ma ta dɩ ba sɩ ba taa jɩgɩ tu-n-tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa, nɩ Zezi dɛɛn na tu o tɩtɩ te tɩn, sɩ ba yɩ taa beeri ba tɩtɩ yɩranɩ zǝnǝ .
Pooli ma ta o brɩ-ba nɩ, ba na nɛ cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn, kʋ yɩ pɛɛrɩ mʋ Baŋa-Wɛ na pɛ-ba zaanɩ, ba na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn ŋwaanɩ, sɩ kʋ daɩ nɩ ba na sɛ Zwifǝ cullu tɩm tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
O ma kaanɩ-ba sɩ ba yɩ sɛ vwan karanyɩna tiinǝ bam, yɩ o loori-ba sɩ ba taa lwǝni wʋm na kɩ te tɩn, sɩ ba taa kwaanɩ ba ŋwɩ nɩ Zezi tɩtɩ dɛɛn na ŋwɩ te tɩn .
O ma pʋpʋnɩ o brɩ-ba Wɛ na pɛ balʋ maama na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi tɩn jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ wʋ-zuru te .
Tɔnɔ kʋm kʋntʋ brɩ nɩ Pooli soe Filipi tiinǝ bam zanzan.
Amʋ Pooli mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ yɩ Timoti wʋ a tee nɩ.
Dɩbam yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋna mʋ.
Dɩ́ pʋpʋnɩ sɩ dɩ́ pa abam balʋ maama na wʋ Filipi nɩ yɩ á tɔgɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ á ji Wɛ nɔɔna tɩn, dɩ á kɔgɔ kʋm yigǝ tiinǝ bam dɩ ba zǝnzǝnnǝ bam dɩ.
Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo.
Pooli na loori Wɛ te tɩn Maŋa maama amʋ na guli abam gulǝ, a yǝni a kɩ a Tu Wɛ le mʋ abam ŋwaanɩ.
Maŋa maama a na loori Wɛ a pa abam maama, a jɩgɩ wʋpolo mʋ, dɩ abam na tɔgɩ á wǝli-nɩ dɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩtʋŋa yam kʋ zɩgɩ pulim nɩ kʋ ba kʋ yi zɩm tɩn.
Amʋ ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ, Wɛ dɩlʋ na maŋɩ DƖ puli tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna yam kʋntʋ abam bɩcara nɩ tɩn, dɩntʋ daa ta wʋ́ pa ya vu ya guri dɛ dɩm Zezi Krisi na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn.
Amʋ tiini a soe abam dɩ a bɩcarɩ maama.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ paɩ kʋ maŋɩ sɩ amʋ taa jɩgɩ á wʋbʋŋa a wʋnɩ kʋntʋ doŋ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ abam maama tɔgɩ á na yu-yoŋo kʋm nɩ amʋ dɩ na nɛ te tɩn, lele kʋntʋ ba na kɩ-nɩ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ tɩn, dɩ maŋa kalʋ a ya na kaagɩ a beeri je maama a ŋɔɔnɩ cɩga a pa Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam jɩgɩ kuri tɩn.
Abam fra jɩgɩ amʋ, nɩ Zezi Krisi tɩtɩ na soe abam te tɩn mʋ.
Wɛ tɩtɩ ye nɩ a na tagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn yɩ cɩga mʋ.
A na loori Wɛ a pa abam kʋlʋ ŋwaanɩ tɩn yɩ sɩ abam sono kʋm mʋ fɔgɩ kʋ puli zanzan, kʋ wǝli dɩ yǝno sɩ kʋ pa á taá waɩ á lwarɩ kʋlʋ maama na yɩ cɩga tɩn.
Kʋntʋ mʋ á wʋ́ wanɩ á kuri kʋlʋ na lamma tɩn á kɩ, sɩ Zezi Krisi dɛ dɩm na yiǝ, sɩ digiru yɩ taa wʋ á bɩcara nɩ, sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o na á wo-lɔŋɔ o ta.
Kʋlʋ na wǝli da tɩn, á pa á kǝm maama taa tɔgɩ cɩga lanyɩranɩ nɩ Zezi Krisi na zǝni abam te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ wʋ́ pa Wɛ na zulǝ dɩ tiǝ.
Zezi mʋ yɩ ŋwɩa cɩga cɩga A ko-biǝ-ba, a lagɩ sɩ á lwarɩ nɩ yaara yalʋ na yi amʋ tɩn nan pɛ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam jagɩ ka yi yigǝ mʋ.
Kʋ na kɩ amʋ te tɩn pɛ pamaŋna balʋ na nii pɛ wʋm sɔŋɔ kʋm tɩn dɩ balʋ maama na wʋra tɩn lwarɩ nɩ, kʋ yɩ amʋ na tɔgɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ ba kɩ-nɩ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ.
Kʋlʋ na wǝli da tɩn, amʋ na wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ tɩn pɛ dɩ́ ko-biǝ bam zanzan tiini ba kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm, kʋ pa ba jɩgɩ baarɩ zanzan ba maa brɩ Wɛ taanɩ dɩm yɩ ba ba kwarɩ fʋʋnɩ.
Kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ sɩ nɔɔna badaara tɔɔlɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝrǝ kam dɩ wʋ-gʋʋ dɩ kantɔgɔ mʋ amʋ ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ badaara nan tɔɔlɩ-ka dɩ ba wʋbʋŋ-laarʋ mʋ.
Bantʋ tɔɔlɩ dɩ sono mʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ ba ye nɩ Wɛ mʋ pɛ-nɩ ni sɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ cɩga a pa DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam ja kuri.
Badonnǝ bam nan tɔɔlɩ Zezi kwǝrǝ kam sɩ kʋ pa ba tɩtɩ mʋ kamunni, sɩ ba ba jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo.
Ba nan bʋŋɩ sɩ ba pa amʋ yaara yam mʋ tiini ya puli, a na wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ nan ba cɔga.
A ta jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ ba maama na jɩgɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝrǝ kam ba tɔɔlɩ ba brɩ nɔɔna te tɩn.
Ba na tɔɔlɩ-ka dɩ wʋbʋŋ-laarʋ naa wʋbʋŋ-balwaarʋ dɩ, kʋ yɩ Zezi kwǝrǝ kam mʋ ba tɔɔla.
Amʋ nan ta tiini a jɩgɩ wʋpolo, bɛŋwaanɩ amʋ ye nɩ Wɛ wʋ́ joŋi-nɩ DƖ yagɩ, abam na loori-DƖ á pa-nɩ yɩ Zezi Krisi Joro kʋm dɩ zǝni-nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Amʋ nan tiini a jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ a bá kɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na wʋ́ pa a na a cavɩɩra tɩn.
Kʋ na yɩ lele kʋntʋ dɩ maŋa maama, aá ta jɩgɩ pu-dɩa, sɩ a na ŋwɩ naa a na tɩga, sɩ Zezi Krisi na zulǝ a ŋwɩa kam maama wʋnɩ.
Kʋ na yɩ amʋ, a ŋwɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
A nan na tɩgɩ dɩ, kʋʋ́ ta jɩgɩ nyɔɔrɩ kʋ pa-nɩ.
Amʋ nan ta na ŋwɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ, a tɩtʋŋɩ dɩm wʋ́ wanɩ dɩ wǝli nɔɔna lanyɩranɩ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, a yǝri a na wʋ́ twǝri kʋlʋ sɩ a daarɩ kʋlʋ.
Wǝǝnu tɩntʋ tɩle mʋ jɩgɩ-nɩ tɩ pa a yǝri a na wʋ́ lɩ kʋlʋ tɩn.
Kʋlʋ na jɩgɩ fra kʋ pa-nɩ tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ a yagɩ lʋgʋ baŋa, sɩ a daarɩ a vu Zezi Krisi te a taa wʋra.
Kʋntʋ wʋ́ tiini kʋ taa lana.
Kʋ daarɩ, a ta na wʋ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ, kʋʋ́ ta jɩgɩ zǝnǝ zanzan kʋ pa abam.
A ye nɩ kʋntʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ, yɩ kʋ pɛ a lwarɩ nɩ kʋ maŋɩ sɩ a ta wʋ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ.
Amʋ wʋ́ ta wʋ abam maama tee nɩ, sɩ kʋ pa á fɔgɩ á tɔgɩ Wɛ cɩga kam, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋpolo ka ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, amʋ na joori a ba a wʋ abam tee nɩ, kʋʋ́ pa á tiini á taá zuli Zezi Krisi dɩ wʋpolo amʋ yagɩm dɩm ŋwaanɩ.
Woŋo kʋlʋ yɩranɩ na jɩgɩ kuri tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ á pa á tɩtʋŋa maama taa tɔgɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam na brɩ te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ, amʋ na nɛ cwǝŋǝ sɩ a ba abam te, naa a na wʋ nɛ, a ta wʋ́ lwarɩ nɩ abam zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ dɩ wʋbʋŋ-dɩdwɩ, yɩ á wǝli daanɩ á kwaana á tʋŋa, sɩ kʋ pa nɔɔna kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam.
Á yɩ sɛ sɩ á dʋna bam pa fʋʋnɩ zʋ abam dɩ fɩnfɩɩn dɩ.
Á na jɩgɩ baarɩ, kʋʋ́ brɩ nɩ bantʋ wʋ́ ba ba cɔgɩ yɩ abam na vrɩm.
Wɛ tɩtɩ mʋ wʋ́ pa kʋ kɩ kʋntʋ.
Wɛ na pɛ abam yu-yoŋo kʋlʋ tɩn, kʋ daɩ sɩ á sɛ Zezi Krisi dɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa yɩranɩ má, kʋ yɩ sɩ á kwǝri á na yaara dɩ mʋ o ŋwaanɩ.
Abam dɛɛn nɛ amʋ na yǝni a yaarɩ te a tʋŋɩ Wɛ ŋwaanɩ, yɩ á ta kwǝri á ni nɩ kʋ yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ dɩ zɩm maama.
Abam dɩ laan nan wǝli dɩ amʋ á wʋ yantʋ yaara yam wʋnɩ mʋ.
Zezi Krisi na tu o tɩtɩ te tɩn Abam na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn mʋ paɩ á jɩgɩ baarɩ.
O sono kʋm maa paɩ á jɩgɩ wʋ-zuru.
Wɛ Joro kʋm mʋ wʋ abam wʋnɩ, nɩ kʋ na wʋ Zezi nɔɔna bam maama wʋnɩ te tɩn.
Á maa jɩgɩ da-ŋwaŋa dɩ sono.
Kʋ na sɩɩnɩ kʋ yɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, a loori abam sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-dɩdwɩ mʋ daanɩ dɩ sono dɩdʋa, sɩ á daarɩ á taá jɩgɩ ni-dɩdʋa dɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa.
Abam na kɩ kʋntʋ, kʋʋ́ pa a taa tiini a jɩgɩ wʋpolo.
Á yɩ zaŋɩ á kɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ dɩ kamunni sɩ kʋ pa á tɩtɩ na zulǝ.
Nan tu-na á tɩtɩ á pa daanɩ, sɩ á taá nii nɩ nɔɔnʋ maama dwe abam.
Nɔɔnʋ maama maŋɩ sɩ o bʋŋɩ o na wʋ́ zǝni o doŋ te tɩn mʋ, kʋ daɩ sɩ o taa beeri o tɩtɩ zǝnǝ yɩranɩ.
Á wʋbʋŋa yam maŋɩ sɩ ya taa yɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ Zezi Krisi wʋbʋŋa yam mʋ.
Wʋntʋ nan maŋɩ o jɩgɩ Wɛ nyɩnyʋgʋ mʋ.
O dɩdaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ, yɩ o wʋ bʋŋɩ nɩ kʋntʋ yɩ woŋo kʋlʋ o na maŋɩ sɩ o ja-kʋ kǝŋkǝŋ sɩ o dɩ Wɛ taa maɩ daanɩ tɩn.
O nan tiŋi wǝǝnu tɩntʋ maama daa nɩ mʋ, yɩ o daarɩ o ba o ji nabiinu.
O yɩ tɩntʋŋnʋ.
O na tu o ŋwɩ dɩ nabiinǝ kʋntʋ tɩn, o dɛɛn tu o tɩtɩ yɩ o sɛ Wɛ ni o ba o tɩ.
Kʋ nan daɩ tʋʋnɩ dɩ tʋʋnɩ, kʋ yɩ ba pag-o tʋʋn-dagara baŋa nɩ mʋ ba gʋ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ Wɛ laan pɛ Zezi yuu tiini kʋ zaŋɩ wɛɛnɩ dɩ zulǝ, yɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ pa-o yɩrɩ dɩlʋ na dwe yɩra maama tɩn.
Mʋ kʋ kuri maŋa wʋ́ ba, yɩ balʋ maama na wʋ wɛyuu nɩ naa tɩga baŋa nɩ naa tɩga kuri nɩ tɩn maŋɩ sɩ ba kuni doonǝ ba zuli Zezi o yɩrɩ dɩm ŋwaanɩ.
Ba maama wʋ́ ta dɩ ba niǝ jaja nɩ, Zezi Krisi mʋ yɩ ba Yuutu.
Kʋntʋ wʋ́ pa o Ko Wɛ na zulǝ lanyɩranɩ.
Dɩ́ na maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ pa pooni taa wʋ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ te tɩn Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, a cilon-sonnu-ba, abam dɛɛn na maŋɩ á sɛ amʋ zaasɩm dɩm maŋa kalʋ amʋ ya na wʋ á tee nɩ tɩn, á nan ta maŋɩ sɩ á sɛ á dwǝni lele kʋntʋ a daa na tǝri abam tee nɩ dɩ tɩn.
Taá kwarɩ-na Wɛ lanyɩranɩ dɩ ya-sɩʋ, sɩ á kwaanɩ á tʋŋɩ á pa vrɩm dɩlʋ á na nɛ tɩn ja kuri.
Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ mʋ yǝni DƖ tʋŋɩ abam bɩcara nɩ, DƖ pa á beeri kǝnǝ yalʋ na wʋ́ poli DƖ wʋ, yɩ DƖ pa á wanɩ-ya á kɩ.
Woŋo kʋlʋ maama á na lagɩ á kɩ tɩn, sɩ á yɩ taá pʋʋna naa á magɩ kantɔgɔ kʋ baŋa nɩ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ á wʋ́ ta jɩgɩ cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ, yɩ á jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo.
Á wʋ́ ta yɩ Wɛ biǝ balʋ na ba jɩgɩ wo-lɔŋɔ, yɩ á zʋʋrɩ nɔn-balwaarʋ tɩlʋ wʋbʋŋa na ba tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ tɩn tɩtarɩ nɩ.
Á wʋ́ ta yɩ nɩ pooni á pa lʋgʋ baŋa nɔɔna nɩ calɩcwɩ te, dɩ á na ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ taanɩ dɩlʋ na paɩ ŋwɩa á brɩ nɔɔna tɩn.
Á na kɩ kʋntʋ doŋ, kʋʋ́ brɩ nɩ a na cɛ a tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam abam ŋwaanɩ te tɩn wʋ jigi kafɛ, yɩ aá ta jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ abam dɛ dɩm Zezi Krisi na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn.
Abam na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa á sɛ Zezi tɩn nyɩ dɩ á kwe woŋo mʋ á ma kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ yɩ kʋ poli DƖ wʋ.
Amʋ na maŋɩ a lagɩ a ga a ŋwɩa mʋ dɩ, aá sɛ sɩ ka wǝli abam kaanɩm dɩm nɩ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ.
Dɩ kʋ dɩ, aá ta jɩgɩ wʋpolo, yɩ abam dɩ wʋ́ wǝli dɩ amʋ á taá jɩgɩ wʋpolo.
Kʋntʋ, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ abam dɩ ta jɩgɩ wʋpolo lanyɩranɩ, sɩ amʋ dɩ wǝli dɩ abam a kɩ wʋpolo.
Pooli lagɩ o tʋŋɩ Timoti dɩ Epafroditi Filipi tiinǝ tee nɩ Dɩbam Yuutu Zezi na sɛ, amʋ bʋŋɩ sɩ a tʋŋɩ Timoti sɩ o ba abam te lele.
Kʋntʋ, o na joori o ba amʋ te, oó pa-nɩ abam labaarɩ sɩ a daa yɩ ta jɩgɩ liǝ.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ daa tǝri amʋ tee nɩ, o na jɩgɩ a wʋbʋŋa yam doŋ, sɩ o sɩɩnɩ o taa ye abam zǝnǝ ni nɩ, kʋ na daɩ Timoti yɩranɩ.
Balʋ maama na daarɩ tɩn beeri ba tɩtɩ wǝǝnu yɩranɩ mʋ, yɩ ba yigǝ tǝrǝ dɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na yɩ Zezi Krisi nyɩm tɩn.
Kʋ nan na yɩ Timoti, abam maŋɩ á ye o wʋ na tɔgɩ cɩga te tɩn.
O dɛɛn tɔgɩ dɩ amʋ o tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam, nɩnɛɛnɩ bu na tɔgɩ dɩ o ko o tʋŋɩ te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ mʋ a bʋŋɩ sɩ a tʋŋ-o abam tee nɩ maŋa kalʋ a na wʋ́ lwarɩ ba na wʋ́ di a taanɩ dɩm te tɩn.
Amʋ nan jɩgɩ tɩɩna dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nɩ baá pʋrɩ-nɩ ba yagɩ lele, yɩ a laan ba abam te.
Amʋ bʋŋɩ nɩ kʋ maŋɩ sɩ a tʋŋɩ dɩ́ ko-bu Epafroditi sɩ o joori o ba abam te.
O tɔgɩ dɩ amʋ yɩ dɩ́ tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa, yɩ dɩ́ kwǝri dɩ́ na cam ya baŋa nɩ.
Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ abam tɩntʋŋnʋ wʋlʋ á na lɩ sɩ o ja zǝnǝ o ba o pa-nɩ a yaara yam wʋnɩ tɩn.
Abam fra maa jɩg-o yɩ o lagɩ sɩ o daa na abam.
O wʋ ya cɔgɩ dɩ á na ni nɩ o ya ba jɩgɩ yazurǝ tɩn.
Kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ nɩ o ya ba jɩgɩ yazurǝ, yɩ o ga fɩɩn sɩ o tɩ.
Wɛ nan duri o ŋwaŋa.
Kʋ nan daɩ wʋntʋ yɩranɩ ŋwaŋa mʋ DƖ duri.
Wɛ duri amʋ dɩ ŋwaŋa, dɩ DƖ na pɛ o wǝri yɩ a wʋ daa wʋ cɔgɩ zanzan tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ a tiini a kwaanɩ a lagɩ sɩ o yi abam te lɩla, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ á na wʋ́ joori á na-o tɩn, sɩ amʋ dɩ liǝ yam laan ti.
O na tuǝ, sɩ á jeer-o lanyɩranɩ dɩ wʋpolo zanzan, o na yɩ dɩ́ ko-bu dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á taá zuli nɔɔna balʋ na nyɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ wʋntʋ te tɩn.
Bɛŋwaanɩ o ya gɛ fɩɩn mʋ sɩ o tɩ Zezi Krisi tɩtʋŋa yam ŋwaanɩ.
O dɛɛn lagɩ o ga o ŋwɩa dɩ o na lǝni abam yuu nɩ sɩ o taa tʋŋɩ o wǝli-nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Wɛ na wʋ́ pa n na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ te tɩn A ko-biǝ-ba, kʋlʋ na daarɩ sɩ a ta a wǝli da tɩn, á taá jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ á na ŋwɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩn.
A na maŋɩ a pʋpʋnɩ kʋlʋ a ma brɩ abam tɩn, kʋ ba camma sɩ a ta joori a brɩ-kʋ abam, sɩ kʋ wanɩ kʋ cɩ abam wo-lwaanʋ wʋnɩ.
Fɔgɩ-na á cɩ á tɩtɩ dɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tiinǝ balʋ na kwaanɩ sɩ ba taa goni nɔɔna yɩra ba yagɩ tɩn.
Bantʋ nyɩ dɩ kakuri mʋ.
Dɩbam nan mʋ yɩ balʋ na yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna cɩga cɩga, yɩ kʋ daɩ nɩ dɩ́ na goni dɩ́ bǝkǝri tɩn ŋwaanɩ, nɩ bantʋ na brɩ te tɩn.
Dɩbam maɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm dam mʋ dɩ́ zuli Wɛ, yɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ Zezi Krisi na kɩ kʋlʋ o pa dɩbam tɩn, yɩ dɩ́ bá tɩɩgɩ cullu tɩlʋ na brɩ nɩ nɔɔna yɩra gonim mʋ jɩgɩ kuri kʋ pa Wɛ tɩn.
Lʋgʋ baŋa cullu tɩm ya na jɩgɩ kuri, amʋ tɩtɩ ya wʋ́ wanɩ a tɩɩgɩ-tɩ.
Nɔɔnʋ nan na bʋŋɩ nɩ o jɩgɩ bʋra sɩ o tɩɩgɩ lʋgʋ baŋa cullu tɩm, amʋ ya jɩgɩ bʋra a dwe.
Amʋ dɛɛn na yi da nana tɩn, mʋ ba goni-nɩ nɩ dɩbam Zwifǝ cullu tɩm na brɩ te tɩn.
A yɩ Yisɩrayɛlɩ tu mʋ, yɩ a nuŋi Bɛnzamɛn dwi dɩm wʋnɩ.
Amʋ sɩɩnɩ a yɩ Zwifu mʋ.
Zwifǝ bam mʋ lʋgɩ-nɩ.
Kʋ nan na yɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm tɔgɩm, amʋ dɛɛn wʋ Farizɩan tiinǝ kɔgɔ kʋm wʋnɩ mʋ.
Kʋ na yɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam laŋa nɩ, amʋ dɛɛn kwaanɩ a tʋŋɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ a na bɛɛsɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm nɔɔna bam te tɩn.
Kʋ nan daa na yɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm sɛɛm, a dɛɛn sɛ-tɩ dɩ cɩga yɩ tusim tǝrǝ.
A dɛɛn paɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ maama jɩgɩ kuri mʋ tɩ pa-nɩ.
A laan nan bʋŋɩ a lwarɩ nɩ tɩ yɩ kafɛ mʋ a yigǝ nɩ, dɩ a na sɛ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ sɩɩnɩ kʋ yɩ cɩga, woŋo kʋlʋ maama a na jɩgɩ tɩn, a nii-kʋ nɩ kʋ yɩ kafɛ mʋ a yigǝ nɩ, a laan na lwarɩ Zezi Krisi wʋlʋ na yɩ a Yuutu tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋntʋ tiini kʋ jɩgɩ kuri kʋ pa-nɩ kʋ dwe woŋo maama.
Wʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ a kwe woŋo maama a yagɩ daa nɩ.
A nii tɩ maama nɩ weeru mʋ a yigǝ nɩ, sɩ a wanɩ a sɛ Zezi Krisi sɩ a taa tɔg-o dɩ a wʋ maama, sɩ kʋ pa a taa yɩ o nɔɔnʋ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, amʋ wʋ́ na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ a na kɩ a wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ, kʋ daa daɩ a tɩtɩ tɩtʋŋa dɩ a na tɔgɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ nan yɩ Wɛ tɩtɩ mʋ paɩ a jɩgɩ cɩga dɩ a na kɩ a wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Woŋo kʋlʋ amʋ na tiini a lagɩ tɩn yɩ sɩ a lwarɩ Zezi Krisi mʋ, sɩ a kwǝri a lwarɩ dam-fɔrɔ kʋlʋ Wɛ na mɛ DƖ bi-o DƖ pa o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ tɩn, sɩ a daarɩ a tɔgɩ a na o yaara yam doŋ, sɩ a taa nyɩ dɩd-o o na sɛ o tɩ nabiinǝ ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, amʋ dɩ jɩgɩ tɩɩna sɩ Wɛ wʋ́ pa a bi a yagɩ tʋʋnɩ.
Dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ kwaanɩ dɩ́ vu yigǝ mʋ sɩ dɩ́ joŋi pɛɛrɩ Wɛ tee nɩ Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ a maŋɩ a yi wǝǝnu tɩlʋ a na lagɩ sɩ a yi tɩn.
Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ a bɩcarɩ fɔgɩ dɩ kwɛ fasɩ yɩ lwarɩm daa tǝrǝ.
Amʋ nan kwaanɩ a jaŋɩ mʋ a ve yigǝ, sɩ a laan wanɩ a joŋi pɛɛrɩ Zezi Krisi tee nɩ.
Kʋ yɩ kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ o joŋi-nɩ sɩ a taa yɩ o nɔɔnʋ.
A ko-biǝ-ba, a ba bʋŋɩ nɩ a maŋɩ a yi sɩ a joŋi pɛɛrɩ dɩm.
A nan na kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, a yǝni a lɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na maŋɩ tɩ kɛ tɩn mʋ a wʋbʋŋa nɩ, yɩ a daarɩ a kwaanɩ sɩ a vu a yi wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na wʋ a yigǝ nɩ tɩn.
Kʋntʋ, amʋ kwaana sɩ a yɔɔrɩ a duri a vu a yi kweelim je mʋ, sɩ a joŋi pɛɛrɩ dɩm Wɛ tee nɩ.
Pɛɛrɩ dɩm kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ ŋwɩa kalʋ Wɛ na bǝŋi-nɩ sɩ a ba a joŋi DƖ sɔŋɔ nɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Kʋ na yɩ dɩbam balʋ wʋbʋŋa na bɩgɩ dɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩbam maama sɛ nɩ amʋ na tagɩ te tɩn yɩ cɩga mʋ.
Abam badaara wʋbʋŋa nan na daɩ kʋntʋ doŋ, Wɛ wʋ́ pa á lwarɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn.
Dɩ kʋ dɩ, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ yɔɔrɩ dɩ́ taá tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ kalʋ dɩ́ na maŋɩ dɩ́ lwarɩ nɩ ka yɩ cɩga tɩn mʋ.
A ko-biǝ-ba, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á taá lwǝni amʋ na kɩ te tɩn mʋ, sɩ á fɔgɩ á nii balʋ na tɔgɩ cwǝ-laa nɩnɛɛnɩ dɩ́ na brɩ abam sɩ á taá tɔgɩ te tɩn.
A lagɩ sɩ a joori a brɩ abam wǝǝnu tɩlʋ a na maŋɩ a ta dɩ abam kuni zanzan tɩn mʋ.
Kʋ maa paɩ a yi-na nuŋǝ dɩ liǝ yalʋ a na jɩgɩ abam ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Kʋ yɩ nɩ nɔɔna zanzan mʋ wʋ abam wʋnɩ ba tɩtʋŋa na brɩ nɩ ba culi Zezi Krisi tʋʋn-dagara kam mʋ.
Ba yǝni ba lagɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ fra na jɩgɩ-ba tɩn mʋ kʋ dwe Wɛ.
Ba maa jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ kʋlʋ na yɩ ba cavɩɩra tɩn, yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wo-yɔɔrʋ wʋbʋŋa jɩgɩ-ba.
Ba kweelim je nɩ Wɛ wʋ́ cɔgɩ-ba mʋ.
Kʋ nan na yɩ dɩbam, dɩ́ kugu je wʋ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ nɩ mʋ.
Dɩbam cǝgi dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi sɩ o nuŋi dáanɩ mʋ o ba.
Wʋntʋ mʋ vrɩ dɩbam lwarɩm wʋnɩ.
O na tuǝ, o laan wʋ́ pa dɩbam lʋgʋ baŋa yɩra yalʋ na bwǝmmǝ tɩn lǝni ya taa nyɩ dɩ o tɩtɩ yɩra yam te.
Yantʋ yɩ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ nyɩm mʋ, yɩ ya jɩgɩ paarɩ-zulǝ.
Oó ma o dam-fɔrɔ kʋlʋ na paɩ o waɩ woŋo maama tɩn o ma kɩ kʋntʋ.
Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm nɔɔna na maŋɩ sɩ ba kɩ te tɩn A ko-biǝ-ba, a soe abam lanyɩranɩ yɩ á fra jɩgɩ-nɩ.
Abam paɩ a jɩgɩ wʋpolo, yɩ á ta wʋ́ pa a yuu zǝŋi Wɛ yigǝ nɩ.
A cilon-sonnu-ba, kwaanɩ-na á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ dɩ́ Yuutu tɔgɩm dɩm wʋnɩ.
A nan loori Evodi dɩ Sintisi lanyɩranɩ, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-dɩdwɩ á na sɛ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
A loori nmʋ dɩ, wʋlʋ na yɩ a doŋ tɩntʋŋnʋ cɩga cɩga tɩn, sɩ n zǝni kaana bantʋ sɩ ba taa sɛ daanɩ, bɛŋwaanɩ ba dɛɛn tɔgɩ dɩ amʋ yɩ dɩ́ tiini dɩ́ tʋŋɩ dɩ́ tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam, dɩ Klɩman dɩ balʋ maama na tɔgɩ dɩ amʋ ba tʋŋɩ tɩn.
Wɛ maŋɩ DƖ pʋpʋnɩ bantʋ yɩra DƖ ŋwɩa tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ.
Taá kɩ-na wʋpolo maŋa maama á na ŋwɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
A ta lagɩ a joori a ta nɩ, á taá kɩ wʋpolo.
Pa-na nɔɔna maama lwarɩ á lanyɩranɩ wʋm ni nɩ, sɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm maa bɩɩnɩ lele.
Yɩ zaŋɩ-na á taá liǝ dɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ.
Woŋo maama wʋnɩ sɩ á taá warɩ Wɛ, á brɩ-DƖ kʋlʋ á na lagɩ tɩn sɩ DƖ zǝni abam, sɩ á kwǝri á taá kɩ DƖ le maŋa maama.
Kʋntʋ mʋ Wɛ wʋ́ pa á bɩcara taa zurǝ, sɩ kʋ dwǝni nabiinǝ na wʋ́ wanɩ kʋlʋ ba lwarɩ tɩn.
Kʋ maa pa kʋlʋkʋlʋ bá wanɩ kʋ cɔgɩ á bɩcara dɩ á wʋbʋŋa maama, abam na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
A ko-biǝ-ba, kʋlʋ a na lagɩ a ma a guri tɩn, á taá jɩgɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na lana yɩ tɩ maŋɩ dɩ zulǝ tɩn wʋbʋŋa: kʋ na yɩ woŋo kʋlʋ maama na yɩ cɩga tɩn, naa woŋo kʋlʋ na jɩgɩ zulǝ tɩn, naa woŋo kʋlʋ na maŋɩ tɩn, naa woŋo kʋlʋ na ba jɩgɩ tusim tɩn, naa woŋo kʋlʋ na poli nɔɔna wʋrʋ tɩn, naa woŋo kʋlʋ na jɩgɩ tiǝ nɔɔna tee nɩ tɩn, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ-na wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ wʋbʋŋa.
Á taá kɩ-na wǝǝnu tɩlʋ amʋ na brɩ abam yɩ á sɛ-tɩ tɩn, kʋ na yɩ á na ni kʋlʋ a na taga, yɩ á na kʋlʋ a na kɩ tɩn.
Á na sɩɩnɩ á kɩ kʋntʋ, Wʋ-zuru Tu Baŋa-Wɛ wʋ́ ta wʋ á tee nɩ.
Pooli kɩ Filipi tiinǝ bam le ba na zǝn-o tɩn ŋwaanɩ A na ŋwɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn, amʋ tiini a jɩgɩ wʋpolo, bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ daanɩ zanzan yɩ abam daa wʋ guli a gulǝ sɩ á wǝli-nɩ, yɩ lele kʋntʋ á laan zǝni-nɩ.
Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ abam ba jɩgɩ a wʋbʋŋa mʋ ya, kʋ yɩ á wʋ nɛ cwǝŋǝ mʋ sɩ á wǝli-nɩ.
A na tagɩ kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn, kʋ daɩ nɩ a na gɛ woŋo tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Woŋo maama wʋnɩ, amʋ mɩ sɩ a taa jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ kʋlʋ a na jɩgɩ tɩn.
Yinigǝ na jɩgɩ-nɩ, amʋ ye a na wʋ́ ja a tɩtɩ te.
A jɩjɩgɩrʋ nan na daga dɩ, a ta ye a na wʋ́ kɩ te.
Woŋo maama wʋnɩ, amʋ ye a na wʋ́ kɩ te sɩ a taa jɩgɩ wʋpolo.
A na jɩgɩ a di a wʋbʋŋa naa kana na jɩgɩ-nɩ, a jɩjɩgɩrʋ na daga naa tɩ na muri, amʋ ta ye a na wʋ́ kɩ te sɩ a taa jɩgɩ wʋpolo.
Amʋ waɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ maama a kɩa, Zezi Krisi na pa-nɩ dam tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, á kɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ á na zǝni-nɩ a yaara yam wʋnɩ tɩn.
Abam Filipi tiinǝ tɩtɩ dɩ ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ, maŋa kalʋ a na puli a wʋra a tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam a brɩ abam yɩ a laan nuŋi Masɩdʋanɩ nɩ tɩn, kʋ yɩ abam yɩranɩ mʋ wǝli-nɩ.
Zezi kɔgɔ kʋdoŋ daa tǝrǝ kʋ dɩ na pɛ amʋ woŋo, kʋ na daɩ abam yɩranɩ.
A dɛɛn na wʋ Tesaloniki nɩ tɩn, abam tʋŋɩ a na lagɩ zǝnǝ yalʋ tɩn á pa-nɩ, yɩ kʋ daɩ kuni bɩdwɩ yɩranɩ.
Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ amʋ lagɩ sɩ a taa joŋi abam pɛɛra yam má mʋ, kʋ yɩ nyɔɔrɩ dɩlʋ abam na wʋ́ na Wɛ tee nɩ ya ŋwaanɩ tɩn mʋ pɛ a jɩgɩ wʋpolo.
Amʋ joŋi pɛɛra yalʋ maama abam na pɛ amʋ tɩn kʋ ja gaalɩ.
A joŋi pɛɛra yalʋ á na kɩ Epafroditi jɩŋa nɩ sɩ o ja ba o pa-nɩ tɩn, yɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ daa wʋ muri-nɩ.
Abam pɛɛra yam nyɩ dɩ woŋo kʋlʋ á na mɛ á kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ yɩ kʋ lwǝm ywǝmmǝ tɩn mʋ.
Wɛ nan joŋi á kaanɩm dɩm dɩ wʋpolo.
Amʋ Tu Wɛ wʋ́ pa abam kʋlʋ maama á na gɛ tɩn Zezi yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ, DƖ na jɩgɩ wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ na tiini tɩ dagɩ yɩ tɩ jɩgɩ paarɩ-zulǝ tɩn.
Wɛ dɩlʋ na yɩ dɩbam Ko tɩn maŋɩ dɩ zulǝ mʋ maŋa maama.
Amina.
Jɔɔnɩ-na Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn maama á pa-nɩ.
Dɩ́ ko-biǝ balʋ na wʋ amʋ tee nɩ tɩn dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam.
Wɛ nɔɔna bam maama jɔɔnɩ abam, kʋ na fɔgɩ kʋ dwe dɩdɩ balʋ na zʋʋrɩ Rom Pa-farʋ wʋm sɔŋɔ nɩ tɩn.
Dɩbam Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam maama yu-yoŋo.
Tɔnɔ kʋlʋ Pooli na pʋpʋnɩ o pa Kolɔsɩ tiinǝ tɩn na brɩ dɩbam kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ Pooli dɛɛn pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋm kʋntʋ o pa Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ na zʋʋrɩ Kolɔsɩ nɩ tɩn mʋ.
Kolɔsɩ dɛɛn yɩ lʋgʋ kʋlʋ ba na bǝi nɩ Azi-balaŋa tɩn wʋ tɩʋ dɩdʋa mʋ.
Kʋ yɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ kilomɛtra biǝ-yale mʋ te dɩ Efɛɛzɩ.
Kʋ nan daɩ Pooli tɩtɩ mʋ tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ dɩ ba, kʋ yɩ Epafrasɩ wʋlʋ na yɩ Kolɔsɩ tu tɩn mʋ tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ dɩ ba, yɩ ba sɛ Zezi Krisi .
Maŋa kalʋ Pooli na wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ Rom nɩ tɩn , mʋ Epafrasɩ ve o te o ta o brɩ-o nɔɔna badaara na jaanɩ vwan zaasɩm ba zʋ Kolɔsɩ tiinǝ bam wʋnɩ, yɩ ba brɩ nɩ, nɔɔnʋ na lagɩ sɩ o na vrɩm lwarɩm wʋnɩ, o maŋɩ sɩ o taa zuli wo-yɔɔrʋ sɩ o daarɩ o sɛ tɩ ni mʋ.
Ba ta ma wɩ, kʋ yɩ fɩfɩʋn mʋ sɩ ba sɛ cullu tɩdaara mɩʋ, sɩ ba daarɩ ba pa ba go-ba nɩ Zwifǝ cullu tɩm na brɩ te tɩn, sɩ ba kwǝri ba sɛ cullu tɩlʋ na brɩ nɩ n wʋ maŋɩ sɩ n di kʋntʋ naa n nyɔ kʋntʋ tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ Pooli pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋm o pa-ba, sɩ o maa brɩ-ba kwǝrǝ kalʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn, sɩ ba yɩ sɛ vwan karanyɩna tiinǝ bam.
O ma ta dɩ ba nɩ, Zezi na vrɩ-ba tɩn, ba sɩɩnɩ ba na vrɩm fasɩ mʋ, sɩ cullu mɩʋ bá wanɩ tɩ vrɩ nɔɔna tɩ yagɩ.
Kʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ mʋ Baŋa-Wɛ kɩ lʋgʋ, wʋm mʋ yɩ woŋo maama yigǝ tu, yɩ kʋ yɩ wʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ Wɛ ta wʋ́ vrɩ nabiinǝ DƖ yagɩ.
Kʋ yɩ n na kɩ n wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi mʋ nń na vrɩm .
Pooli ma daarɩ o pʋpʋnɩ o brɩ-ba, ba na wʋ́ ta ŋwɩ te ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kalʋ Wɛ na pɛ-ba Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ tɩn wʋnɩ, sɩ kʋlʋ maama ba na wʋ́ kɩ tɩn taa yɩ ba Yuutu Zezi yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ .
Pooli dɛɛn tʋŋɩ Tisiki dɩ Onisim mʋ, yɩ ba ja tɔnɔ kʋm kʋntʋ ba vu ba pa Kolɔsɩ tiinǝ bam.
Amʋ Pooli wʋlʋ Wɛ na kuri dɩ DƖ tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ a taa yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ tɩn mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ, yɩ dɩ́ ko-bu Timoti tɔgɩ o wǝli-nɩ.
Dɩ́ pʋpʋnɩ sɩ dɩ́ pa abam balʋ na yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna yɩ á zʋʋrɩ Kolɔsɩ nɩ tɩn.
Abam mʋ yɩ dɩ́ ko-biǝ balʋ na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn.
Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ wʋ́ pa abam yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo.
Pooli na kɩ Wɛ le ba ŋwaanɩ te tɩn Maŋa maama dɩbam na yǝni dɩ́ loori Wɛ dɩ́ pa abam, dɩ́ taá kɩ DƖ le mʋ abam ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩntʋ mʋ yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi Ko.
Bɛŋwaanɩ dɩbam ni abam na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi yɩ á kwǝri á soe Wɛ nɔɔna bam maama te tɩn.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, abam na dɛ yigǝ á ni Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩn mʋ pɛ á jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ á wʋ́ na wǝǝnu tɩlʋ Wɛ na tiŋi DƖ sɔŋɔ nɩ abam ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ kalʋ na sɩɩnɩ ka yɩ cɩga tɩn.
DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ laan jagɩ ka yi lʋgʋ baŋa je maama yɩ ka kwɛ nɔɔna lanyɩranɩ, nɩ ka na jagɩ ka yi abam te yɩ ka kwɛ abam te tɩn.
Kʋ zɩgɩ maŋa kalʋ á na puli á ni Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam yɩ á lwarɩ Wɛ zaanɩ dɩm na sɩɩnɩ dɩ yɩ cɩga te tɩn.
Kʋ yɩ Epafrasɩ dɛɛn mʋ brɩ abam Wɛ cɩga kam kʋntʋ.
Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ dɩbam ko-bu-sono, yɩ o tɔgɩ dɩ dɩbam o tʋŋɩ dɩ o wʋ maama o pa Zezi Krisi abam ŋwaanɩ.
Wʋntʋ ta mʋ tagɩ o brɩ dɩbam Wɛ Joro kʋm na pɛ abam jɩgɩ da-sono te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ warɩ Wɛ maŋa maama dɩ́ pa abam, kʋ na puli maŋa kam dɩ́ na ni á woŋo kʋntʋ tɩn.
Dɩ́ loori-DƖ sɩ DƖ pa á taá ye DƖ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, sɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ pa á na swan dɩ yǝno maama nɩ DƖ Joro kʋm na paɩ te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ, abam laan wʋ́ wanɩ á tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm na lagɩ te tɩn, sɩ kʋ pa o wʋ poli á tɩtʋŋa maama ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩ́ loori Wɛ sɩ DƖ wǝli abam sɩ á taá kɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna dwi tǝri tǝri lanyɩranɩ, sɩ á fɔgɩ á lwarɩ Wɛ á wǝli da.
Dɩ́ nan ta loori Wɛ, sɩ DƖ ma DƖ dam-fɔrɔ kʋlʋ na dwe maama tɩn DƖ wǝli abam sɩ á wanɩ á fɔgɩ á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ, sɩ á kwǝri á taá jɩgɩ wʋ-zuru, sɩ á taá kwaanɩ á ve yigǝ woŋo maama wʋnɩ.
Á taá kɩ dɩ́ Ko Wɛ le dɩ wʋpolo, bɛŋwaanɩ dɩntʋ mʋ pɛ abam cwǝŋǝ, sɩ á tɔgɩ á na wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ DƖ na tiŋi sɩ DƖ pa DƖ nɔɔna bam tɩn jǝgǝ kalʋ na yɩ pooni tɩn wʋnɩ.
Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ mʋ lɩ dɩbam lim wʋnɩ, sɩ wo-lwaanʋ daa yɩ taa waɩ dɩbam.
DƖ ma daarɩ DƖ pa dɩ́ zʋ DƖ tɩtɩ Bu-sono kʋm paarɩ dɩm wʋ.
Kʋ nan yɩ DƖ Bu Zezi mʋ kwe o ŋwɩa o ma ŋwɩ dɩ́ lwarɩm jɩnɩ, o pa Wɛ yagɩ-dɩ DƖ ma cɛ dɩbam.
Zezi na yɩ wʋlʋ dɩ o na tʋŋɩ kʋlʋ tɩn Zezi yɩ Baŋa-Wɛ dɩlʋ nabiinǝ na ba naɩ tɩn nyɩnyʋgʋ mʋ.
O yɩ Wɛ Bu-dʋa mʋ.
Wʋntʋ maŋɩ o wʋra mʋ kʋ loori wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama Wɛ na kɩ tɩn.
Wɛ dɛ wʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ kɩ wǝǝnu maama, wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama na wʋ wɛyuu nɩ dɩ tɩga baŋa nɩ tɩn, tɩlʋ nɔɔna na naɩ dɩ tɩlʋ ba na warɩ ba naɩ tɩn, kʋ na yɩ malɛsɩ dɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama na jɩgɩ dam yɩ tɩ di paarɩ nabiinǝ baŋa nɩ tɩn.
Wɛ dɛ Zezi ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ kɩ tɩ maama, sɩ kʋ pa o na zulǝ tɩ baŋa nɩ.
Zezi maŋɩ o wʋra mʋ pulim nɩ yɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ daa ta tǝrǝ.
Kʋ yɩ wʋntʋ mʋ paɩ woŋo maama zɩgɩ kʋ jǝgǝ nɩ lanyɩranɩ.
Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ o nɔɔna bam yuutu, yɩ ba kɔgɔ kʋm nyɩ dɩ o yɩra yam.
Wʋm mʋ puli o kɔgɔ kʋm kuri.
Kʋ yɩ Zezi mʋ dɛ yigǝ o bi o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ.
Kʋ ma pa o yɩ yigǝ tu woŋo maama wʋnɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ yɩ Wɛ tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa mʋ lagɩ sɩ DƖ Bu Zezi taa nyɩ dɩ DƖ tɩtɩ fasɩ.
Wɛ lɩ wʋbʋŋa mʋ, sɩ DƖ da DƖ Bu wʋm ŋwaanɩ DƖ pa wǝǝnu maama joori tɩ fɔgɩ daanɩ dɩ DƖ.
DƖ Bu Zezi na tɩgɩ tʋʋn-dagara kam baŋa nɩ yɩ o jana nuŋi tɩn mʋ pɛ wǝǝnu maama joori tɩ fɔgɩ daanɩ dɩ Wɛ, kʋ na yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wǝǝnu dɩ wɛyuu wǝǝnu maama.
Kʋ nan na yɩ abam, abam dɛɛn baŋwɛ dɩ Wɛ, á yɩ Wɛ dʋna mʋ.
Abam wʋbʋŋa dɩ á tɩtʋŋa maama dɛɛn lagɩ wo-lwaanʋ yɩranɩ mʋ sɩ á taá kɩa.
Kʋ daarɩ lele kʋntʋ, Wɛ laan pɛ á fɔgɩ daanɩ dɩ DƖ, DƖ Bu wʋm na jigi nabiinu yɩ o daarɩ o tɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ kɩ kʋntʋ sɩ á wanɩ á ba á zɩgɩ DƖ yigǝ nɩ dɩ wʋ-poŋo mʋ, sɩ á taá yɩ nɔn-ŋʋna balʋ na ba jɩgɩ wo-lɔŋɔ tɩn.
Abam nan maŋɩ sɩ á taá tɔgɩ Wɛ cɩga kam dɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa, sɩ á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ.
Á wʋ maŋɩ sɩ á pa á wʋbʋŋa lǝni dɩ tɩɩna yalʋ á na jɩgɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ kwǝrǝ kalʋ abam na maŋɩ á ni yɩ ba tɔɔlɩ-ka ba brɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nɔɔna maama tɩn.
Amʋ Pooli nan yɩ Wɛ tɩntʋŋnʋ sɩ a taa tɔɔlɩ DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ mʋ.
Pooli na tʋŋɩ Zezi nɔɔna bam ŋwaanɩ te tɩn Amʋ jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ a na yaarɩ te abam ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Kʋ na cɛ a yɩra nɩ te tɩn, kʋ nyɩ nɩ Zezi Krisi na yaarɩ te tɩn mʋ.
A yaarɩ yaara yalʋ na daarɩ sɩ dɩ́ yaarɩ Zezi tɩtʋŋa yam ŋwaanɩ tɩn mʋ, sɩ kʋ zǝni o nɔn-kɔgɔ kʋm na nyɩ dɩ o yɩra yam tɩn lanyɩranɩ.
Wɛ tʋŋɩ-nɩ sɩ a taa tʋŋa a pa-ba mʋ.
Tɩtʋŋɩ dɩm kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ sɩ a kwaanɩ a tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam maama a brɩ abam.
Kʋ na zɩgɩ pulim nɩ tɩn, Wɛ cɩga kam kʋntʋ dɛɛn sǝgi mʋ nabiinǝ tee nɩ, yɩ Wɛ laan pa balʋ na yɩ DƖ nɔɔna tɩn ba ba lwarɩ-ka.
Kʋ yɩ Wɛ tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa mʋ lagɩ sɩ DƖ pa ba lwarɩ DƖ cɩga kam kʋntʋ.
DƖ lagɩ sɩ lʋgʋ baŋa dwi maama tiinǝ mʋ lwarɩ DƖ cɩga kam na tiini ka jɩgɩ lam dɩ zulǝ te tɩn.
Wɛ cɩga kalʋ dɛɛn na sǝgi yɩ ka laan ba ka lwarɩ jaja tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ Zezi Krisi wʋ abam bɩcara nɩ, yɩ kʋ pa á jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ á wʋ́ na paarɩ-zulǝ Wɛ tee nɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ dɩbam yǝni dɩ́ tɔɔlɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝrǝ mʋ dɩ́ brɩ nɔɔna maama, yɩ dɩ́ kaanɩ-ba dɩ swan yalʋ Wɛ na pɛ dɩbam tɩn, sɩ dɩ́ pa ba maama laan wanɩ ba ba ba zɩgɩ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ, nɩ balʋ wʋbʋŋa na bɩga dɩ Zezi Krisi tɔgɩm dɩm tɩn.
Kʋntʋ mʋ amʋ nan tiini a kwaanɩ a tʋŋa.
Kʋ nan yɩ Zezi dam-fɔrɔ kʋm o na pɛ-nɩ tɩn mʋ paɩ a jɩgɩ dam a ma a tʋŋɩ kʋntʋ.
Amʋ lagɩ sɩ abam lwarɩ a na tiini a tʋŋɩ te abam ŋwaanɩ, kʋ wǝli dɩ Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ Lawodise nɩ, dɩ nɔɔna zanzan balʋ yi ta na wʋ nɛ amʋ tɩn dɩ ŋwaanɩ.
Amʋ tiini a kwaanɩ kʋntʋ, sɩ kʋ pa Wɛ nɔɔna bam maama wanɩ ba taa jɩgɩ baarɩ mʋ, sɩ ba daarɩ ba taa ŋwɩ daanɩ dɩ sono.
Kʋntʋ wʋ́ pa ba zɩgɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ ba na tiini ba lwarɩ Wɛ cɩga kam te tɩn, sɩ ba lwarɩ Wɛ cɩga kalʋ ya na sǝgi tɩn, yɩ cɩga kam kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩtɩ.
Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na paɩ nɔɔna lwarɩ swan dɩ yǝno kʋlʋ maama na yɩ Wɛ nyɩm, tɩ na jɩgɩ kuri zanzan yɩ tɩ sǝgi tɩn.
A nan tagɩ kʋntʋ a brɩ abam, sɩ á yɩ pa nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ ganɩ abam, dɩ o na maŋɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ swan taanɩ te maama dɩ.
Kʋ nan na yɩ amʋ na tǝri abam tee nɩ tɩn dɩ, a wʋbʋŋa maama wʋra dɩ abam.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ kʋ pɛ-nɩ wʋpolo dɩ a na lwarɩ nɩ á tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ yɩ á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ, á na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kalʋ dɩ́ na jɩgɩ Zezi ŋwaanɩ tɩn Abam nan na sɛ sɩ Zezi Krisi taa yɩ abam Yuutu tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á taá ŋwɩ dɩd-o mʋ.
Nan fɔgɩ-na á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ nɩ tiu bʋnnʋ na zʋ tɩga te tɩn, sɩ á daarɩ á kwaanɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩd-o nɩ ba na maŋɩ ba zaasɩ abam te tɩn, sɩ á taá kɩ Wɛ le zanzan maŋa maama.
Á nan cʋ á tɩtɩ, sɩ á yɩ pa nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ ganɩ abam dɩ o swan yalʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri tɩn.
Yantʋ yɩ nabiinǝ wʋbʋŋa yalʋ na tɔgɩ ba nabaara mɩʋ tɩn mʋ.
Ya yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nyɩm mʋ, sɩ ya daɩ Krisi nyɩm.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, Baŋa-Wɛ na yɩ tɩte maama tɩn, Zezi Krisi dɩ yɩ kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ fasɩ.
Abam na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi tɩn, á maŋɩ á na Wɛ wo-laarʋ tɩm maama á joŋi o tee nɩ.
Wʋntʋ mʋ te woŋo kʋlʋ maama na jɩgɩ dam nabiinǝ baŋa nɩ tɩn.
Abam na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn, o lɩ á wʋbʋŋ-lwaanʋ tɩm maama mʋ, sɩ tɩ daa yɩ taa jɩgɩ dam á baŋa nɩ.
O na fɔgɩ o kwɛ abam kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ nyɩ dɩ ba na goni bǝkǝri te tɩn mʋ.
Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ nabiinǝ na goni te tɩn, kʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, ba na miisi abam na wʋnɩ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ ba ya kɩ abam dɩ, nɩnɛɛnɩ Zezi Krisi na tɩgɩ yɩ ba kɩ-o te tɩn mʋ.
Kʋ kwǝri kʋ brɩ nɩ á joori á bi á na Wɛ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam, bɛŋwaanɩ á jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ na mɛ DƖ dam dɩm DƖ bi Zezi DƖ pa o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ tɩn.
Abam dɛɛn ya ba jɩgɩ ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ á na kɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Abam dɛɛn ya tɔgɩ á daɩ Wɛ nɔɔna á na daɩ Zwifǝ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ laan nan pɛ á na DƖ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam á na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ nan yagɩ dɩbam lwarɩm maama DƖ ma cɛ dɩbam.
Ba na pagɩ Zezi Krisi tʋʋn-dagara baŋa nɩ tɩn, kʋ yɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ ba pagɩ cullu tɔnɔ kʋlʋ na brɩ nɩ dɩbam kɩ dɩ́ cɔgɩ tɩn mʋ.
Wɛ brɩ nɩ tɔnɔ kʋm kʋntʋ daa ba jɩgɩ kuri, yɩ dɩbam lwarɩm dɩm maama ti.
Zezi mʋ wanɩ woŋo kʋlʋ maama na jɩgɩ dam nabiinǝ baŋa nɩ tɩn, yɩ o cɔgɩ tɩ maama dam.
O tʋʋnɩ dagara kam baŋa nɩ mʋ Wɛ mɛ DƖ brɩ nɔɔna jaja nɩ o jɩgɩ dam wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ maama baŋa nɩ, nɩ nɔɔnʋ na wanɩ o dʋna yɩ o ja-ba o vɔ te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, abam yɩ sɛ sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ pa abam culu dɩ á na di kʋlʋ naa á na nyɔ kʋlʋ tɩn.
Á yɩ pa nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ brɩ abam á na wʋ́ lɩ da yalʋ sɩ ya taa yɩ candiǝ da naa can-dʋŋa dɛ naa siun dɛ ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Cullu tɩm kʋntʋ daa ba jɩgɩ kuri.
Tɩ dɛɛn yɩ luluŋu mʋ, sɩ tɩ brɩ cɩga kalʋ na lagɩ ka ba tɩn.
Cɩga kam kʋntʋ nan mʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi.
Á yɩ sɛ á pa nɔɔna balʋ na yaarɩ ba tɩtɩ yɩ ba zuli malɛsɩ dɩ vwan tu-n-tɩtɩ tɩn ganɩ abam.
Ba yǝni ba tɛ ba wɩ, Wɛ mʋ brɩ-ba kʋntʋ woŋo, yɩ ba wʋbʋŋa nan daɩ Wɛ nyɩm.
Kʋ yɩ ba zǝŋi-n-tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋ-kamunǝ mʋ ba jɩga, kʋ nan yɩ kafɛ mʋ.
Bantʋ nan daa ba ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi.
Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ dɩbam Yuutu, yɩ dɩ́ ŋwɩ dɩd-o nɩnɛɛnɩ nɔɔnʋ yɩra na toŋi dɩ o yuu te tɩn.
Zezi ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ wǝli daanɩ dɩ́ tʋŋa, nɩ nɔɔnʋ yɩra na jɩgɩ pɔɔrɩm dwi tǝri tǝri yɩ ya tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋɩ dɩdʋa te tɩn.
Wʋntʋ mʋ zǝni dɩbam yɩ dɩ́ ve yigǝ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ nɩ Wɛ na lagɩ te tɩn.
Abam na sɛ Zezi Krisi tɩn, kʋ nyɩ dɩ á tɔgɩ dɩd-o á tɩ mʋ te.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wʋbʋŋ-yɔɔrʋ tɩm daa ba jɩgɩ dam abam baŋa nɩ.
Bɛɛ mʋ yɩ á nan ta kɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ á yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nyɩm mʋ te?
Bɛɛ mʋ yɩ á sɛ cullu tɩlʋ na brɩ nɩ yɩ kwe kʋntʋ naa yɩ ta n di kʋntʋ naa yɩ dwe kʋntʋ tɩn?
Cullu tɩm kʋntʋ nan wʋra wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na wʋ́ ba tɩ cɔgɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Cullu tɩlʋ ba na brɩ abam kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn yɩ nabiinǝ wʋbʋŋa mʋ.
Tɩ wʋ nuŋi Wɛ te.
Wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ nyɩ nɩ swan mʋ ba na maɩ ba tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa ba ma zuli-tɩ.
Ba ma tu ba tɩtɩ yɩ ba bɛɛsɩ ba yɩra.
Cullu tɩm kʋntʋ yɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ tɩ jɩgɩ kuri mʋ te, tɩ nan yɩ kafɛ mʋ.
Tɩ warɩ tɩ wǝli nɔɔna sɩ ba ja ba tɩtɩ dɩ wo-zɔɔna yalʋ ba fra na zʋʋrɩ tɩn.
Abam na nɛ Wɛ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam tɩn, kʋ nyɩ dɩ á tɔgɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi mʋ á joori á bi á yagɩ tʋʋnɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, pa-na Wɛ-sɔŋɔ wǝǝnu tɩm taa jɩgɩ fra dɩ abam, sɩ dáanɩ mʋ Zezi Krisi je Baŋa-Wɛ jazɩm nɩ.
Pa-na á wʋbʋŋa tiini ya zʋ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ wo-laarʋ tɩm, sɩ kʋ yɩ taa yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩm.
Abam na yagɩ lwarɩm cwǝŋǝ tɩn, kʋ nyɩ dɩ á tɩgɩ mʋ te, yɩ á laan na ŋwɩ-dʋŋa dɩ Zezi Krisi, yɩ á ŋwɩa kam sǝgi Wɛ tee nɩ.
Abam ŋwɩa kam cɩga cɩga mʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, o na joori o ba o brɩ o tɩtɩ jaja dɩ o paarɩ-zulǝ yam, abam dɩ wʋ́ tɔgɩ dɩd-o á na paarɩ-zulǝ.
Wɛ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam na yɩ te tɩn Abam nan maŋɩ sɩ á lɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wʋbʋŋ-lwaanʋ tɩm mʋ á bɩcara nɩ, sɩ á yɩ zaŋɩ á sɛ-tɩ.
Kʋ na yɩ boorim naa wo-zɔɔna kikiǝ naa ka-laga, naa kʋ na yɩ á fra na zʋʋrɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ tɩn, naa á na pa á yi sui wǝǝnu tɩlʋ tɩn, á yɩ sɛ wʋbʋŋa yam kʋntʋ doŋ.
Nmʋ na paɩ n yi sui wǝǝnu, kʋ brɩ nɩ n paɩ tɩntʋ mʋ zulǝ yɩ n daarɩ Wɛ n yagɩ.
Wo-balwaarʋ tɩntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ Wɛ banɩ wʋ́ zaŋɩ [dɩ nabiinǝ balʋ maama na vɩn DƖ ni tɩn].
Abam dɩ ŋwɩa kam maama dɛɛn yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ.
Kʋ daarɩ lele kʋntʋ, á maŋɩ sɩ á lɩ wo-balwaarʋ tɩm kʋntʋ maama mʋ á bɩcara nɩ.
Kʋ na yɩ ban-zɔŋɔ dɩ ka-culi-daanɩ dɩ pu-sɩŋa.
Á yɩ taá twɩ nɔɔna.
Á yɩ taá maɩ á niǝ á ŋɔɔnɩ wo-zɔɔna ŋwɛ.
Á yɩ zaŋɩ á fɔ vwan á pa daanɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ abam yagɩ á ŋwɩ-doŋǝ kam dɩ ka kikiǝ maama, yɩ á laan daarɩ á jɩgɩ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa mʋ.
Wɛ mʋ pɛ abam ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam kʋntʋ.
DƖ maa kwɛ-ka sɩ ka taa nyɩ dɩ DƖ tɩtɩ ŋwɩa, sɩ á wanɩ á fɔgɩ á lwarɩ DƖ na yɩ te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, balʋ na jɩgɩ Wɛ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam tɩn, kampwara daa tǝri ba wʋnɩ.
Zwifǝ dɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ maama yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ.
Balʋ na goni ba bǝkǝri dɩ balʋ na wʋ goni tɩn maama yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ.
Balʋ yi na wʋ pʋʋrɩ dɩ balʋ ba na ba nɩgɩ tɩn, kʋ wǝli dɩ gambɛ dɩ balʋ na te ba tɩtɩ tɩn maama yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ.
Ba maama wʋra Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ mʋ, yɩ o ŋwɩ dɩ ba maama.
Wɛ mʋ kuri abam sɩ á taá yɩ DƖ nɔɔna, yɩ DƖ soe abam.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, taá jɩgɩ-na da-ŋwaŋa, sɩ á taá kɩ-da lanyɩranɩ.
Taá tu-na á tɩtɩ da-tee nɩ, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋ-bono dɩ wʋ-zuru.
Á taá jɩgɩ-na wʋ-zuru da-ŋwaanɩ.
Abam wʋlʋ na jɩgɩ jʋʋ dɩ o doŋ, sɩ á yagɩ á ma cɛ daanɩ, nɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na yagɩ á lwarɩm o ma cɛ abam te tɩn.
Kʋlʋ na dwe maama tɩn, taá soe-na daanɩ, sɩ kʋ pa á wanɩ á taá jɩgɩ ni dɩdʋa lanyɩranɩ.
Pa-na wʋ-zuru kʋlʋ Zezi Krisi na pɛ abam tɩn taa te á wʋbʋŋa maama.
Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ kuri abam sɩ á ji woŋo dɩdʋa mʋ, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋ-zuru kʋntʋ doŋ.
Maŋa maama sɩ á taá kɩ Wɛ le.
Pa-na Zezi Krisi taanɩ dɩm tiini dɩ zʋ á bɩcara, sɩ á taá maɩ swan yalʋ Wɛ na pɛ abam tɩn á kwe daanɩ, sɩ á daarɩ á taá kaanɩ daanɩ.
Taá leeni-na Wɛ lǝŋ-ŋwɩ dɩ Wɛ tiǝ le dɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm na pɛ abam le sɩlʋ tɩn.
Á taá leeni kʋntʋ á zuli Wɛ, sɩ á taá kɩ DƖ le.
Woŋo kʋlʋ maama abam na wʋ́ kɩ tɩn, kʋ na yɩ á ni-ŋwaŋa naa á jɩŋa tɩtʋŋɩ, sɩ á pa kʋ taa yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ, sɩ á daarɩ á taá kɩ dɩ́ Ko Wɛ le Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ.
Nɔɔnʋ maama na maŋɩ sɩ o taa ŋwɩ te ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam wʋnɩ tɩn Kaana-ba, á maŋɩ sɩ á taá sɛ á banna, bɛŋwaanɩ kʋntʋ yɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na maŋɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi wʋbʋŋa tɩn mʋ.
Kʋ daarɩ kan-banna-ba, á dɩ maŋɩ sɩ á taá soe á kaana, sɩ á yɩ taá kɩ cɩa dɩ ba.
Biǝ-ba, á na sɛ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á sɛ á tiinǝ ni woŋo maama wʋnɩ, sɩ kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na poli Wɛ wʋ tɩn.
Kʋ daarɩ abam balʋ na yɩ biǝ kwǝ tɩn, á yɩ taá tiini á fɩ-ba, sɩ kʋntʋ wʋ́ pa ba wʋrʋ cɔgɩ yɩ ba ga baarɩ.
Kʋ na yɩ abam balʋ na yɩ gambɛ tɩn, á taá tʋŋɩ á tɔgɩ á yum tiinǝ wʋbʋŋa woŋo maama wʋnɩ.
Kʋ nan daɩ ba na zɩgɩ ba nii abam maŋa kalʋ yɩranɩ tɩn mʋ á wʋ́ kɩ kʋntʋ sɩ ba tee abam.
Nan taá tʋŋɩ-na dɩ á wʋ maama, á na kwarɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Woŋo kʋlʋ maama á na wʋ́ tʋŋɩ tɩn, á taá tʋŋɩ dɩ á wʋ maama.
Pa-na á na kɩ te tɩn taa yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ, sɩ kʋ taa daɩ nabiinǝ ŋwaanɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ abam ye nɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam pɛɛrɩ dɩlʋ o na tiŋi sɩ o pa o nɔɔna bam Wɛ-sɔŋɔ nɩ tɩn.
Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ á yuutu wʋlʋ á na tʋŋɩ á pa-o tɩn.
Kʋ daarɩ wʋlʋ maama na kɩ balɔrɔ tɩn wʋ́ joŋi balɔrɔ ŋwɩɩrʋ mʋ, sɩ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ o tɩtʋŋa yam na yɩ te tɩn.
Wɛ nan tɔgɩ cɩga mʋ DƖ maɩ DƖ di nabiinǝ taanɩ, sɩ DƖ ba kuri nɔɔna daanɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ abam balʋ na yɩ gambɛ sɩm yum tiinǝ tɩn, á taá kɩ cɩga dɩ kʋlʋ na maŋɩ tɩn dɩ ba.
Á nan taá ye nɩ abam dɩ jɩgɩ yuutu o na te abam Wɛ-sɔŋɔ nɩ.
Á tiini á kwaanɩ á taá loori Wɛ, sɩ á cɩ á tɩtɩ lanyɩranɩ, sɩ á taá kɩ DƖ le.
Á nan taá loori Wɛ á pa dɩbam dɩ, sɩ DƖ pa dɩ́ na cwǝŋǝ dɩ́ taá tɔɔlɩ Zezi Krisi cɩga kalʋ na sǝgi tɩn kwǝrǝ dɩ́ brɩ nɔɔna.
Kʋ nan yɩ amʋ na tɔɔlɩ Zezi kwǝrǝ kam tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ pɛ a wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ.
Loori-na Wɛ á pa-nɩ, sɩ a wanɩ a pa nɔɔna lwarɩ cɩga kam kʋntʋ maama fasɩ.
Mʋ tɩtʋŋɩ dɩlʋ Wɛ na pɛ amʋ sɩ a tʋŋɩ tɩn.
Á cʋ-na á tɩtɩ dɩ á na ŋwɩ te dɩ balʋ na ba tɔgɩ Zezi tɩn tɩtarɩ nɩ, á taá kɩ lanyɩranɩ sɩ ba yɩ na á wo-lɔŋɔ.
Wɛ na pɛ abam pwǝlǝ sɩ á kɩ kʋlʋ, sɩ á pa kʋ ja kuri lanyɩranɩ.
Pa-na á ni-taanɩ taa lana, sɩ dɩ taa jɩgɩ ywǝǝni, sɩ á daarɩ á taá ye á na wʋ́ lǝri nɔɔnʋ maama taanɩ te tɩn.
Tiim kwǝrǝ A lagɩ a tʋŋɩ dɩ́ ko-bu-sono Tisiki sɩ o ba abam te.
Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na tʋŋɩ o pa dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi dɩ cɩga tɩn.
Dɩbam maama wǝli daanɩ mʋ dɩ́ tʋŋɩ dɩ́ paɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm.
Amʋ yɔɔrɩ a tʋŋ-o sɩ o ba o ta amʋ labaarɩ maama na yɩ te tɩn o brɩ abam, sɩ á bɩcara pǝni tɩga nɩ dɩ á na wʋ́ lwarɩ dɩbam woŋo na yɩ te tɩn.
Dɩbam ko-bu-sono Onisim dɩ wʋ́ tɔgɩ o ba.
Wʋntʋ nuŋi abam kɔgɔ kʋm wʋnɩ mʋ, yɩ o tɔgɩ Zezi dɩ cɩga.
Bantʋ bale mʋ wʋ́ ta woŋo kʋlʋ maama na wʋra kʋ kɩ yo seeni tɩn ba brɩ abam.
Arisarɩkɩ wʋlʋ na tɔgɩ o wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ dɩ amʋ tɩn jɔɔnɩ abam.
Marɩkɩ wʋlʋ na yɩ Banabasɩ cʋrʋ tɩn dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam.
Abam maŋɩ á joŋi ni nɩ, o na tuǝ, á wʋ́ jeer-o lanyɩranɩ.
Zusitu wʋlʋ yɩrɩ dɩdoŋ na yɩ Zezi tɩn dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam.
Kʋ na yɩ Zwifǝ balʋ na tu ba sɛ Zezi tɩn, nɔɔna bantʋ batɔ yɩranɩ mʋ yɩ balʋ na tɔgɩ ba tʋŋɩ Wɛ paarɩ dɩm tɩtʋŋa ba wǝli amʋ tɩn.
Ba tiini ba paɩ a wʋ zurǝ.
Epafrasɩ wʋlʋ na nuŋi abam kɔgɔ kʋm wʋnɩ yɩ o tʋŋɩ o pa Zezi Krisi tɩn dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam.
O kwaanɩ o loori Wɛ mʋ maŋa maama o pa abam, sɩ á wanɩ á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ dɩ baarɩ, sɩ á wʋbʋŋa bɩ dɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam tɔgɩm, sɩ á taá kɩ DƖ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ kʋlʋ maama tɩn.
Amʋ tɩtɩ wʋ́ wanɩ a ta a brɩ abam nɩ o sɩɩnɩ o tiini o tʋŋɩ o wǝli abam, kʋ wǝli dɩ nɔɔna balʋ na zʋʋrɩ Lawodise dɩ Yɩrapolisi nɩ tɩn.
Dɩbam badoŋ-sono Luki wʋlʋ na yɩ dɔgɩta tu tɩn dɩdaanɩ Demasɩ dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam.
Jɔɔnɩ-na dɩ́ ko-biǝ balʋ na tɔgɩ Zezi yɩ ba zʋʋrɩ Lawodise nɩ tɩn á pa dɩbam, kʋ wǝli dɩ Nimfa dɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋlʋ na yǝni kʋ jeeri daanɩ o sɔŋɔ nɩ tɩn.
Abam na joŋi amʋ tɔnɔ kʋm yɩ á na karɩmɩ á ti, sɩ á laan pa-kʋ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋlʋ na zʋʋrɩ Lawodise nɩ tɩn, sɩ ba dɩ karɩmɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ sɩ abam dɩ joŋi amʋ tɔnɔ kʋdoŋ bantʋ dɩ tee nɩ á dɩ karɩmɩ.
Ta-na á brɩ Arisipi sɩ o kwaanɩ o tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋɩ dɩlʋ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na pɛ-o sɩ o tʋŋɩ tɩn o ti.
Amʋ Pooli mʋ jɔɔnɩ abam.
A tɩtɩ laan mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɩntʋ dɩ a jɩŋa.
Á yɩ zaŋɩ á swe a na wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ tɩn ni nɩ.
Wɛ wʋ́ pa abam yu-yoŋo.
Dayigǝ tɔnɔ kʋlʋ Pooli na pʋpʋnɩ o pa Tesaloniki tiinǝ tɩn na brɩ dɩbam kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ Tesaloniki ya yɩ Masɩdʋanɩ pa-tɩʋ mʋ.
Maŋa kam Pooli na nuŋi Filipi nɩ tɩn, o ve dáanɩ mʋ o puli Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam.
Kʋ nan wʋ daanɩ, yɩ kʋ ba kʋ ji fɩfɩʋn sɩ o duri o nuŋi Tesaloniki nɩ, Zwifǝ badaara na jɩgɩ wʋ-gʋʋ dɩd-o tɩn ŋwaanɩ .
Kʋ kwaga nɩ, Pooli na wʋ Korɛntɩ nɩ tɩn, Timoti wʋlʋ na tɔgɩ dɩd-o o tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa tɩn tu o te, yɩ o brɩ-o Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ Tesaloniki tɩn labaarɩ na yɩ te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ mʋ Pooli pʋpʋnɩ o dayigǝ tɔnɔ kʋm o pa-ba.
Pooli dɛ yigǝ o kɩ Wɛ le mʋ, o na ni nɩ ba ta jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi yɩ ba jɩgɩ da-sono tɩn ŋwaanɩ .
O laan ma guli-ba o na tʋŋɩ ba tɩtarɩ nɩ te tɩn, dɩ o na lagɩ sɩ o joori o na-ba te tɩn .
O ma pa ba na baarɩ sɩ ba taa ve yigǝ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ dɩ wʋ-poŋo .
O daarɩ o lǝri bwiǝ yalʋ ba na bwe-o twa biim laŋa nɩ, dɩ Zezi na wʋ́ joori o ba dɩ paarɩ-zulǝ te tɩn laŋa nɩ dɩ .
O ta ma kwe-ba dɩ kwiǝ yadaara o ma guri o tɔnɔ kʋm .
Tɔnɔ kʋntʋ zǝni balʋ maama na liǝ lʋgʋ tiim ŋwaanɩ tɩn mʋ.
Kʋ brɩ nɩ Wɛ nɔɔna maŋɩ sɩ ba kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa mʋ dɩ Wɛ, sɩ ba daarɩ ba taa ve yigǝ ba tʋŋɩ dɩ wʋ-zuru sɩ ba taa cǝgi Zezi tum dɩm.
Amʋ Pooli dɩdaanɩ Silasɩ dɩ Timoti mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ sɩ dɩ́ pa abam Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ Tesaloniki nɩ yɩ á yɩ dɩ́ Ko Baŋa-Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi nɔɔna tɩn.
Wɛ wʋ́ pa abam yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo.
Tesaloniki tiinǝ na tɔgɩ Wɛ te tɩn Maŋa maama dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ kɩ Wɛ le mʋ abam maama ŋwaanɩ, yɩ dɩ́ kwǝri dɩ́ loori-DƖ dɩ́ pa abam.
Dɩ́ na wʋ dɩ́ Ko Wɛ yigǝ nɩ, dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ guli abam na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi yɩ kʋ paɩ á tʋŋɩ lanyɩranɩ te tɩn mʋ, dɩ́ guli abam sono kʋm na paɩ á tiini á tʋŋɩ te tɩn.
Á na jɩgɩ tɩɩna dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi tɩn mʋ paɩ á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ.
Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ ye nɩ Wɛ mʋ soe abam yɩ DƖ kuri abam sɩ á taá yɩ DƖ nɔɔna.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, dɩbam dɛɛn na tu dɩ́ tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam dɩ́ brɩ abam tɩn, kʋ daɩ dɩ ni-taanɩ má.
Wɛ dam dɩm mʋ wʋ dɩbam tee nɩ dɩ DƖ Joro kʋm, yɩ dɩ́ brɩ Wɛ cɩga kam dɩ dɩ́ wʋ maama.
Dɩbam dɛɛn na wʋ á tee nɩ tɩn, á nɛ dɩbam na yɩ tɩte sɩ kʋ ma zǝni abam.
Abam lwǝni dɩbam dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm na kɩ te tɩn.
Á na joŋi Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩn, kʋ pɛ á na yaara zanzan.
Á nan ta joŋi-ka dɩ wʋpolo Wɛ Joro kʋm na zǝni abam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ ma pa á jɩgɩ nyɩnyʋgʋ kʋlʋ na lamma tɩn, sɩ Zezi nɔɔna balʋ maama na zʋʋrɩ Masɩdʋanɩ tɩɩnɩ dɩm nɩ dɩ Akayi tɩɩnɩ dɩm nɩ tɩn dɩ lwǝni abam.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, abam na tɔɔlɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm kwǝrǝ kam á brɩ nɔɔna te tɩn, ka jagɩ Masɩdʋanɩ dɩ Akayi nɩ ka gaalɩ ka kɛ ka yi je maama, yɩ nɔɔna maama lwarɩ á na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ te.
Mʋ kʋ kuri kʋ daa daɩ fɩfɩʋn sɩ dɩ́ ta kʋlʋkʋlʋ kantʋ laŋa nɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ nɔɔna bam maama tɛ á na jeeri dɩbam lanyɩranɩ te maŋa kalʋ dɩ́ na tu abam te tɩn, dɩ á na yagɩ jwǝnǝ kaanɩm yɩ á daarɩ á tɔgɩ Wɛ, sɩ á laan taá tʋŋɩ á pa Wɛ dɩlʋ na yɩ cɩga tu dɩ ŋwɩa tu te tɩn, yɩ á kwǝri á cǝgi DƖ Bu wʋm tum dɩm.
Wɛ bi-o DƖ pa o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ mʋ, yɩ oó zɩgɩ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ nɩ o ba lʋgʋ baŋa.
Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ Zezi wʋlʋ na wʋ́ vrɩ dɩbam Wɛ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋlʋ na wʋ́ ba nɔɔna baŋa nɩ ba lwarɩm ŋwaanɩ tɩn wʋnɩ.
Pooli na wǝli Tesaloniki tiinǝ te tɩn Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, abam tɩtɩ ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ, dɩ́ na tu abam te tɩn, kʋ daɩ kafɛ.
Abam ye ba na maŋɩ ba bɛɛsɩ dɩbam yɩ ba twɩ dɩbam te Filipi nɩ yɩ dɩ́ laan ba abam te tɩn.
Nɔɔna dɛɛn kwaanɩ sɩ ba cɩ dɩbam cwǝŋǝ.
Nan dɩ kʋ dɩ, dɩ́ Tu Wɛ pɛ dɩbam pu-dɩa sɩ dɩ́ tɔɔlɩ DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam dɩ́ brɩ abam dɩ baarɩ.
Kwiǝ yalʋ dɩ́ na yǝni dɩ́ kwe abam tɩn, kʋ daɩ dɩ tusim, naa dɩ́ jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-balwaarʋ mʋ.
Kʋ nan daɩ swan mʋ dɩ́ kɩa, sɩ dɩ́ ma dɩ́ ganɩ abam.
Awo.
Dɩbam yǝni dɩ́ ŋɔɔnɩ nɩ Wɛ na lagɩ te tɩn mʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ dɩntʋ mʋ kuri dɩbam yɩ DƖ kwe DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam DƖ kɩ dɩ́ jɩŋa nɩ.
Dɩbam na ŋɔɔnɩ te tɩn, kʋ daɩ sɩ dɩ́ ma dɩ́ poli nabiinǝ wʋrʋ, kʋ yɩ sɩ dɩ́ pa Wɛ dɩlʋ na maŋɩ dɩbam bɩcara DƖ nii tɩn wʋ mʋ poli.
Á ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ dɩ́ wʋ tu dɩ́ ŋɔɔnɩ ni-sʋŋɩ ŋwaŋa dɩ abam.
Dɩ́ nan wʋ ŋɔɔnɩ bɩtar-kamunǝ sɩ dɩ́ ma pri nɔɔna swan, sɩ dɩ́ joŋi wǝǝnu ba tee nɩ.
Wɛ ye nɩ dɩbam na tagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn yɩ cɩga mʋ.
Kʋ na yɩ abam naa nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ maama dɩ, dɩ́ wʋ kɩ dɩ́ wʋbʋŋa nɩ sɩ nabiinǝ taa zuli dɩbam.
Dɩ́ na yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋna tɩn, dɩ́ ya jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ dɩ́ pa á taá nii dɩbam nɩ nɔn-kamunǝ te.
Dɩ́ nan wʋ kɩ kʋntʋ.
Dɩ́ dɛɛn tu dɩ́ tɩtɩ mʋ nɩ biǝ te, yɩ dɩ́ laan nii abam lanyɩranɩ nɩ kaanɩ na jɩgɩ o biǝ o nii te tɩn.
Dɩ́ na tiini dɩ́ soe abam tɩn, dɩ́ sɛ sɩ dɩ́ kwe Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam dɩ́ maŋɩ dɩ́ brɩ abam, yɩ dɩ́ kwe dɩ́ ŋwɩa maama dɩ mʋ dɩ́ wǝli da dɩ́ pa abam, á na tiini á tigi dɩ́ wʋbʋŋa nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, abam wʋ́ wanɩ á guli dɩbam dɛɛn na tʋŋɩ dɩ́ bwǝni zanzan abam ŋwaanɩ te maŋa kalʋ dɩ́ na wʋra dɩ́ tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam dɩ́ brɩ abam tɩn.
Dɩ́ dɛɛn ba lagɩ sɩ dɩ́ yaarɩ abam dɩ fɩnfɩɩn dɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ ta yǝni dɩ́ tiini dɩ́ tʋŋɩ wɩa dɩ tɩtɩɩ maama sɩ dɩ́ ma na dɩ́ ni-wʋdiu.
Dɩ́ dɛɛn tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ mʋ dɩ wʋ-poŋo abam balʋ na sɛ Zezi Krisi tɩn tɩtarɩ nɩ, yɩ dɩ́ tɩtʋŋa maama jɩgɩ cɩga, yɩ dɩ́ wʋ jaanɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ dɩ́ cɔgɩ.
Abam wʋ́ wanɩ á ta nɩ kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ.
Wɛ dɩ nan ye nɩ kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ.
Á ye nɩ dɩ́ dɛɛn jɩgɩ abam maama dɩ jɩ sɩle mʋ, nɩ ko na yǝni o jɩgɩ o biǝ te tɩn.
Dɩ́ kwe abam dɩ kwiǝ yalʋ na paɩ á bɩcara zurǝ tɩn mʋ.
Dɩ́ ma daarɩ dɩ́ tiini dɩ́ kaanɩ abam, sɩ á taá tɔgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ sɩ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ Wɛ na lagɩ te tɩn.
Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ mʋ kuri abam sɩ á zʋ DƖ paarɩ dɩm wʋ sɩ á na paarɩ-zulǝ DƖ tee nɩ.
Dɩ́ na jaanɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam dɩ́ ba dɩ́ tɔɔlɩ dɩ́ brɩ abam tɩn, á sɛ yɩ á joŋi-ka lanyɩranɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ kɩ Wɛ le maŋa maama abam ŋwaanɩ.
Á sɛ nɩ kʋ yɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ mʋ sɩ kʋ daɩ nabiinǝ nyɩm.
Kʋ yɩ cɩga, kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam sɩɩnɩ ka yɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ mʋ, yɩ ka zǝni abam balʋ na sɛ Zezi tɩn wʋbʋŋa dɩ dam.
Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, abam na nɛ yaara yalʋ tɩn, Zezi kɔgɔ kʋlʋ na wʋ Zude tɩɩnɩ dɩm nɩ tɩn dɩ nɛ yaara yantʋ doŋ mʋ.
Abam dwi tiinǝ bam yaarɩ abam nɩnɛɛnɩ Zwifǝ bam dɩ na yaarɩ Zwifǝ balʋ na sɛ Zezi te tɩn mʋ.
Kʋ nan yɩ Zwifǝ bam kʋntʋ mʋ gʋ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi dɩ faŋa faŋa Wɛ nijoŋnǝ bam, yɩ ba kwǝri ba bɛɛsɩ dɩbam dɩ.
Ba maa paɩ Wɛ wʋ cɔgɩ dɩ ba, yɩ ba yɩ nɔɔna maama dʋna.
Ba dɛɛn kwaanɩ sɩ ba cɩ dɩbam, sɩ dɩ́ yɩ tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam dɩ́ brɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ sɩ ba na vrɩm ba lwarɩm wʋnɩ.
Ba na vɩn Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ ma pa ba na kɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩlʋ maŋa maama tɩn fɔgɩ tɩ puli tɩ wǝli da.
Wɛ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋm laan nan tu ba baŋa.
Pooli na lagɩ sɩ o joori o na Tesaloniki tiinǝ bam te tɩn Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ na pɔɔrɩ dɩ abam maŋa fɩnfɩɩn yɩranɩ tɩn, kʋ daɩ nɩ dɩ́ wʋbʋŋa mʋ pɔɔrɩ daanɩ, kʋ yɩ dɩ́ yiǝ na warɩ ya na daanɩ tɩn mʋ.
Abam fra tiini ya jɩgɩ dɩbam, yɩ dɩ́ kwaanɩ sɩ dɩ́ joori dɩ́ na abam.
Dɩ́ ma lagɩ sɩ dɩ́ ba abam te.
Amʋ Pooli ya kwaanɩ sɩ a ba abam te, kʋ daɩ kuni bɩdwɩ yɩranɩ.
Kʋ nan yɩ sʋtaanɩ mʋ cɩgɩ dɩbam.
Kʋ yɩ abam wʋbʋŋa mʋ tiini ya jɩgɩ dɩbam.
Kʋ yɩ abam ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ jɩgɩ tɩɩna Wɛ tee nɩ dɩ wʋpolo.
Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na joori o ba, dɩ́ wʋ́ taa jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ́ na wʋ́ wanɩ dɩ́ brɩ nɩ abam dɛ dɩbam jɩŋa á na vrɩm tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ, abam mʋ sɩɩnɩ á paɩ dɩbam na zulǝ dɩ wʋpolo.
-Dɩbam na warɩ sɩ dɩ́ na daanɩ yɩ abam fra tiini ya jɩgɩ dɩbam kʋ ja gaalɩ tɩn mʋ pɛ dɩbam lɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ dɩ́ tʋŋɩ dɩ́ ko-bu Timoti sɩ o ba abam te, sɩ dɩbam tɩtɩ daarɩ dɩ́ maŋɩ Atɛɛnɩ nɩ.
Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na tɔgɩ dɩ dɩbam o tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam yɩ o tɔɔlɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩn.
Dɩ́ tʋŋ-o abam tee nɩ sɩ o ba o wǝli abam, sɩ á na dam dɩ baarɩ á taá tɔgɩ Zezi dɩ á wʋ maama, sɩ yaara yalʋ á na nɛ tɩn yɩ pa á wʋlʋwʋlʋ joori kwaga.
Abam tɩtɩ maŋɩ á ye nɩ dɩbam maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ na yaara yam kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ.
Dɩbam dɛɛn ta na wʋ abam tee nɩ maŋa kalʋ tɩn, dɩ́ maŋɩ dɩ́ ta dɩ́ brɩ abam nɩ nɔɔna wʋ́ bɛɛsɩ dɩbam.
Kʋ nan sɩɩnɩ kʋ kɩ nɩ abam na maŋɩ á ye kʋ ni nɩ te tɩn.
Abam liǝ na tiini ya jɩgɩ-nɩ tɩn mʋ pɛ a tʋŋɩ Timoti abam tee nɩ, sɩ o ba o nii á daa ta tɔgɩ Zezi dɩ á wʋ maama na, a na kwarɩ fʋʋnɩ sɩ sʋtaanɩ wʋ́ zɩgɩ dɩ ba dɩ ganɩ abam sɩ á ywǝri Wɛ cwǝŋǝ nɩ sɩ kʋ pa dɩ́ tɩtʋŋa yam maama ji kafɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Lele kʋntʋ, Timoti laan joori o ba dɩbam te, yɩ o pa dɩ́ wʋbʋŋa pǝni tɩga nɩ.
O tagɩ o wɩ, á ta tɔgɩ Zezi dɩ á wʋ maama dɩ sono.
O daa ta tagɩ o wɩ, á tiini á jɩgɩ dɩbam wʋbʋŋa dɩ wʋpolo, yɩ á lagɩ sɩ á na dɩbam nɩ dɩbam dɩ na lagɩ sɩ dɩ́ na abam te tɩn.
Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ na ni nɩ á tɔgɩ Zezi dɩ á wʋ maama tɩn, kʋ pɛ dɩ́ bɩcara pǝni tɩga nɩ, yɩ dɩ́ na baarɩ dɩ́ yaara dɩ dɩ́ cana yam maama wʋnɩ.
Lele kʋntʋ, dɩ́ laan ŋwɩ dɩ wʋpolo á na zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɔgɩm dɩm wʋnɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩ́ bá wanɩ dɩ́ kɩ dɩ́ Tu Wɛ le dɩ́ ti abam ŋwaanɩ, dɩdaanɩ dɩ́ na nɛ wʋpolo kʋlʋ zanzan DƖ yigǝ nɩ abam ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Maŋa maama wɩa dɩ tɩtɩɩ dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ loori Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ wʋ maama mʋ, sɩ DƖ pa dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ na daanɩ, sɩ dɩ́ fɔgɩ dɩ́ brɩ kʋlʋ daa ta na muri abam tɩn, sɩ á wanɩ á fɔgɩ á taá tɔgɩ Zezi dɩ á wʋ maama.
Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi nan wʋ́ pa dɩbam cwǝŋǝ sɩ dɩ́ ba dɩ́ na abam.
Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm wʋ́ pa á sono kʋm puli zanzan kʋ ja gaalɩ, sɩ á taá soe á donnǝ dɩ nɔɔna maama lanyɩranɩ, nɩ dɩbam dɩ na soe abam te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ, oó pa á bɩcara kɩ dam, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo fasɩ dɩ́ Ko Wɛ yigǝ nɩ maŋa kalʋ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na wʋ́ joori o ba dɩ o kɔgɔ kʋm maama tɩn.
Dɩ́ na wʋ́ taá yɩ tɩte sɩ kʋ poli Wɛ wʋ tɩn Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, kʋlʋ na daarɩ tɩn, dɩ́ loori abam dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi ŋwaanɩ sɩ á da cwǝŋǝ sɩ kʋ poli Wɛ wʋ.
Dɩ́ maŋɩ dɩ́ brɩ abam cwǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ, yɩ á tɔgɩ-ka dɩ zɩm maama.
Dɩ́ nan ta tiini dɩ́ loori abam sɩ á kwaanɩ sɩ kʋ dwǝni á na maŋɩ á kɩ te tɩn.
Abam ye wǝǝnu tɩlʋ dɩ́ na brɩ abam yɩ tɩ yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi nyɩm tɩn.
Wɛ na lagɩ sɩ á taá yɩ te tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ: DƖ lagɩ sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo mʋ DƖ yigǝ nɩ, sɩ á yɩ taá boorǝ.
Abam nɔɔnʋ maama maŋɩ sɩ o lwarɩ, o na wʋ́ ja o tɩtɩ te sɩ o ma di o kaanɩ sɩ kʋ taa jɩgɩ zulǝ yɩ digiru tǝri kʋ wʋnɩ tɩn.
Á nan yɩ pa boorim wʋbʋŋa wanɩ abam, nɩ nɔɔna balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn.
Kadiri laŋa nɩ, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o kɩ kʋlʋ na wʋ́ cɔgɩ o ko-bu wʋ tɩn, naa o joŋi kʋlʋ na yɩ o ko-bu nyɩm tɩn.
Dɩ́ maŋɩ dɩ́ kaanɩ abam lanyɩranɩ nɩ, nɔɔnʋ na kɩ wo-zɔɔna yantʋ doŋ, dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm wʋ́ pa o na cam.
Wɛ na kuri dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ taá tɔgɩ-DƖ tɩn, kʋ daɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá kɩ wo-zɔɔna.
DƖ nan kuri dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo mʋ DƖ yigǝ nɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na vɩn dɩ́ na brɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, kʋ daɩ nabiinǝ mʋ o vɩa, kʋ yɩ Wɛ dɩlʋ na kɩ DƖ Joro kʋm abam bɩcara nɩ tɩn mʋ o vɩa.
Kʋ nan na yɩ á na wʋ́ ta soe á ko-biǝ te tɩn, kʋ daa daɩ fɩfɩʋn sɩ dɩ́ pʋpʋnɩ dɩ́ brɩ abam.
Wɛ tɩtɩ maŋɩ DƖ brɩ abam á na wʋ́ ta soe daanɩ te.
Kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ, á sɩɩnɩ á soe á ko-biǝ balʋ maama na zʋʋrɩ Masɩdʋanɩ tɩɩnɩ dɩm nɩ tɩn.
Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ nan ta loori abam sɩ á tiini á taá soe daanɩ kʋ dwǝni faŋa.
Kwaanɩ-na sɩ á taá zʋʋrɩ daanɩ dɩ wʋ-zuru.
Á taá nii á tɩtɩ baŋa nɩ.
Nɔɔnʋ maama kwaanɩ o tʋŋɩ sɩ o na o ni-wʋdiu, nɩ dɩ́ na maŋɩ dɩ́ ta abam te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ mʋ wʋ́ pa balʋ na daɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm nɔɔna tɩn taa nɩgɩ abam lanyɩranɩ, yɩ kʋʋ́ pa á daa bá tɩɩgɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ.
Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm na wʋ́ joori o ba te tɩn Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, kʋ na yɩ nɔɔna balʋ na tɩgɩ tɩn, dɩ́ lagɩ sɩ á lwarɩ cɩga mʋ sɩ á daa yɩ taá bwɛa, sɩ á wʋ daa yɩ cɔgɩ tʋʋnɩ ŋwaanɩ, nɩ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn na ba jɩgɩ tɩɩna te tɩn.
Dɩbam sɛ nɩ Zezi tɩgɩ mʋ, yɩ o laan joori o bi o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, kʋ na yɩ balʋ na sɛ-o yɩ ba tɩ tɩn, dɩ́ ye nɩ Wɛ wʋ́ pa ba taa wʋ Zezi tee nɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ dɩ́ na brɩ abam kʋlʋ tɩn yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm kwǝrǝ mʋ.
Dɛ dɩm dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn, dɩbam balʋ na daarɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ yɩ dɩ́ ta ŋwɩ tɩn bá loori balʋ na maŋɩ ba tɩ tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ.
Dɩ́ wʋ́ ba dɩ́ ni kwǝrǝ na bagɩ wɛyuu nɩ, dɩ malɛsɩ pɛ wʋm kwǝrǝ, dɩdaanɩ Wɛ nabɔn-zɔŋɔ kʋm wum, yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩtɩ zɩgɩ wɛyuu nɩ o tu.
Balʋ na sɛ Zezi Krisi yɩ ba tɩ tɩn wʋ́ da yigǝ ba bi ba yagɩ tʋʋnɩ.
Wɛ laan wʋ́ pa dɩbam balʋ na daarɩ yɩ dɩ́ daa ta ŋwɩ tɩn la daanɩ dɩ bantʋ, yɩ DƖ zǝŋi dɩbam kunkwǝǝnu wʋnɩ sɩ dɩ́ vu dɩ́ jeeri dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm wɛyuu nɩ.
Kʋntʋ, dɩ́ wʋ́ ta wʋ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tee nɩ maŋa maama.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, á taá maɩ cɩga kam kʋntʋ á kwe daanɩ, sɩ á bɩcara taa tigi jǝgǝ dɩdʋa.
Dɩ́ na wʋ́ ta cʋ dɩ́ tɩtɩ te sɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm laan joori o ba tɩn Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, abam daa ba taá lagɩ sɩ dɩ́ pʋpʋnɩ dɩ́ ta dɩ́ brɩ abam maŋa kalʋ wǝǝnu tɩntʋ na wʋ́ kɩ tɩn.
Bɛŋwaanɩ abam tɩtɩ maŋɩ á ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm dɛ dɩm lagɩ dɩ ba dɩ darɩ nɔɔna mʋ, nɩ ŋwɩɩnʋ na yǝni o ba tɩtɩɩ nɩ te tɩn.
Maŋa kalʋ nɔɔna na tɛ ba wɩ yazurǝ wʋra yɩ ywǝǝni wʋra tɩn, kantʋ maŋa kam nɩ mʋ cam wʋ́ da dɩ ba ba baŋa, yɩ ba bá lu.
Kʋʋ́ ta nyɩ dɩ kaanɩ pugǝ na dɛ ka vri yɩ ka wɔɛ te tɩn mʋ.
Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, abam nan daa tǝri lim wʋnɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm dɛ dɩm bá ba dɩ darɩ abam nɩ ŋwɩɩnʋ te.
Abam maama wʋ Wɛ pooni wʋnɩ mʋ, yɩ á tɩtʋŋa maama kɩ wɩa nɩ jaja.
Dɩbam daɩ tɩtɩɩ nɔɔna, dɩ́ tɩtʋŋa dɩ nan daɩ lim tɩtʋŋa.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, dɩ́ yɩ pa dɔɔm taa jɩgɩ dɩbam nɩ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn.
Pa-na dɩ́ fɔgɩ dɩ́ cɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ sɩ dɩ́ yiǝ waarɩ.
Tɩtɩɩ nɩ mʋ nɔɔna yǝni ba dɔa, yɩ badonnǝ nyɔ ba bugǝ.
Dɩbam nan yɩ wɩa nɔɔna mʋ.
Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá cʋ dɩ́ tɩtɩ.
Pa-na dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi, sɩ dɩ́ taá soe daanɩ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ wʋ́ cɩ dɩbam lwarɩm wʋnɩ, nɩ nɔɔnʋ na maa ve jara yɩ o kwe luguru gɔrɔ o lɛ o ma cɩ o nyɔɔnɩ te tɩn.
Pa-na dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ Wɛ wʋ́ vrɩ dɩbam ŋwɩa, nɩnɛɛnɩ nɔɔnʋ na kwe luguru yu-kwǝli o pu sɩ o ma kwǝli o yuu jara wʋnɩ te tɩn.
Wɛ na kuri dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ taá yɩ DƖ nɔɔna tɩn, kʋ daɩ sɩ DƖ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋm ba kʋ cɔgɩ dɩbam.
Kʋ nan yɩ sɩ DƖ vrɩ dɩbam ŋwɩa mʋ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ.
Wʋntʋ mʋ tɩgɩ dɩbam ŋwaanɩ, sɩ dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ tɔgɩ dɩd-o dɩ́ na ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ.
O na joori o ba, yɩ dɩ́ na ŋwɩ naa dɩ́ na tɩga, dɩ́ ta wʋ́ na ŋwɩa dɩd-o Wɛ tee nɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, á taá kwe daanɩ sɩ kʋ pa á bɩcara taa tigi jǝgǝ dɩdʋa, sɩ á fɔgɩ á zǝni daanɩ dɩ baarɩ nɩ á na maŋɩ á kɩ te tɩn.
Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ nan loori abam sɩ á taá nɩgɩ nɔɔna balʋ na tʋŋɩ dɩ abam yɩ ba nii abam baŋa nɩ yɩ ba kwe abam dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ tɩn.
Á taá zuli-ba lanyɩranɩ dɩ sono ba tɩtʋŋa yam ŋwaanɩ.
Á pa ywǝǝni ta wʋ á tɩtarɩ nɩ.
Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ loori abam sɩ á taá kaanɩ yawɔrɩ-nyɩna, sɩ á pa balʋ na kwarɩ fʋʋnɩ tɩn na baarɩ, sɩ á taá zǝni nabwǝnǝ, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋ-zuru dɩ nɔɔna maama.
Á taá yɩrɩ á tɩtɩ, sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ ma lwarɩm o joori o ma o ŋwɩ o doŋ lwarɩm.
Maŋa maama sɩ á kwaanɩ á taá kɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ á ko-biǝ dɩ nɔɔna maama.
Á taá jɩgɩ wʋpolo maŋa maama.
Á taá loori Wɛ maŋa maama.
Kʋlʋ maama na kɩa, sɩ á taá kɩ Wɛ le.
Mʋ Wɛ na lagɩ sɩ á taá kɩ te, á na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Yɩ cʋ-na Wɛ Joro kʋm tɩtʋŋa.
Wɛ Joro kʋm na pɛ nɔɔnʋ ŋɔɔnɩ yiyiu-ŋwɛ, á yɩ zaŋɩ á gooni-sɩ.
Á nan maanɩ-na woŋo maama á nii.
Kʋlʋ na lana tɩn sɩ á sɛ-kʋ.
Á nan fɔgɩ á cɩ á tɩtɩ dɩ wo-balwaarʋ dwi maama.
Baŋa-Wɛ dɩlʋ na paɩ nɔɔna wʋ-zuru tɩn wʋ́ pa á taá yɩ DƖ tɩtɩ nɔɔna, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo fasɩ, sɩ á ŋwɩa maama taa jɩgɩ cɩga, kʋ na yɩ á yɩra dɩ á jwǝǝru dɩ á wʋbʋŋa maama.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi na tuǝ, á bá ta jɩgɩ digiru Wɛ yigǝ nɩ dɩ fɩnfɩɩn dɩ.
Wɛ dɩlʋ na bǝŋi abam sɩ á taá yɩ DƖ nɔɔna tɩn yɩ cɩga tu mʋ.
DƖ nan wʋ́ sɩɩnɩ DƖ zǝni abam kʋntʋ mʋ.
Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, á taá loori Wɛ á pa dɩbam dɩ.
Jɔɔnɩ-na dɩ́ ko-biǝ bam maama lanyɩranɩ dɩ sono.
A nan lagɩ a loori abam dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ sɩ á karɩmɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ á brɩ dɩ́ ko-biǝ bam maama.
Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam yu-yoŋo.
Tɔnɔ kʋlʋ Pooli na pʋpʋnɩ o pa Tesaloniki tiinǝ o kɩ bɩle tɩn na brɩ dɩbam kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ Maŋa kam Pooli na pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋm kʋntʋ o pa Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ Tesaloniki nɩ tɩn, ba daa ta wʋ lwarɩ Zezi tum dɩm na lagɩ dɩ kɩ te tɩn fasɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ pɛ vuvugǝ jǝni ba kɔgɔ kʋm wʋnɩ.
Nɔɔna badonnǝ dɛɛn bʋŋɩ nɩ Zezi tum dɩm maŋɩ dɩ ba dɩ kɛ mʋ.
Badaara dɩ maa vɩn sɩ ba ta tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋa Zezi tum dɩm na twɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ, yɩ ba laan daarɩ ba kwe ba tɩtɩ ba palɩ nɔɔna badonnǝ baŋa nɩ.
Pooli laan ma pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋm kʋntʋ o pa-ba sɩ o maa kwe-ba.
O dɛ yigǝ o kɩ Wɛ le ba na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ yɩ ba jɩgɩ sono tɩn ŋwaanɩ, yɩ o loori Wɛ sɩ ba zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam wʋnɩ .
O laan ma kwe-ba Zezi Krisi tum laŋa nɩ, o brɩ-ba nɩ wʋlʋ ba na bǝ nɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tu tɩn maŋɩ sɩ o da yigǝ o ba mʋ, sɩ Krisi laan ba .
Pooli nan kwe Wɛ nɔɔna bam sɩ ba zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ, dɩ lwarɩm na maŋɩ dɩ puli zanzan yɩ cam yi-ba te tɩn dɩ, sɩ ba daarɩ ba taa warɩ Wɛ .
O ma kaanɩ yawɔrɩ-nyɩna bam sɩ ba taa tʋŋɩ ba ma naɩ ba ni-wʋdiu, nɩ Pooli dɩ balʋ dɛɛn na tɔgɩ dɩd-o ba tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam tɩn na tʋŋɩ te tɩn .
Amʋ Pooli dɩdaanɩ Silasɩ dɩ Timoti mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ sɩ dɩ́ pa abam Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ Tesaloniki nɩ yɩ á yɩ dɩ́ Ko Baŋa-Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi nɔɔna tɩn.
Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo.
Tesaloniki tiinǝ na tɔgɩ Wɛ te tɩn Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ kɩ Wɛ le maŋa maama abam ŋwaanɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ kʋ na maŋɩ te tɩn, bɛŋwaanɩ á kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi kʋ ja gaalɩ, yɩ á maama tiini á soe daanɩ lanyɩranɩ, yɩ á sono kʋm wʋra kʋ puli zanzan.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ tɛ á taanɩ dɩ́ brɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm na wʋ jǝgǝ kalʋ maama nɩ tɩn, yɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ wʋpolo abam ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩ́ tɛ dɩ ba nɩ, nɔɔna bɛɛsɩ abam yɩ ba yaarɩ abam zanzan, yɩ á daa ta zɩgɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ pu-dɩa, yɩ á kwǝri á tɔgɩ Zezi dɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa.
Kʋntʋ mʋ pɛ dɩ́ lwarɩ jaja nɩ, Wɛ wʋ́ di nabiinǝ sarɩya dɩ cɩga mʋ.
DƖ wʋ́ pa á na cɩga, yɩ á maŋɩ sɩ á tɔgɩ á wǝli DƖ paarɩ dɩm wʋnɩ, bɛŋwaanɩ abam sɩɩnɩ á na yaara Wɛ paarɩ dɩm kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ nan wʋ́ kɩ abam cɩga, yɩ DƖ wʋ́ pa balʋ na yaarɩ abam tɩn joori ba na cam.
DƖ ma wʋ́ daarɩ DƖ pa abam balʋ na yaarɩ tɩn dɩ dɩbam maama na siun, maŋa kalʋ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na wʋ́ joori o ba sɩ nabiinǝ maama na-o tɩn.
Wʋntʋ wʋ́ nuŋi Wɛ-sɔŋɔ dɩ o malɛsɩ dɩdɛɛra bam, yɩ min-vwɩ zaŋɩ sɩ kaagɩ-ba.
Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi wʋ́ pa balʋ na vɩn Wɛ yɩ ba wʋ sɛ wʋm kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩn na cam.
Nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ wʋ́ na cam nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ dɩ ba te tɩn.
Baá na lɛɛrʋ tɩlʋ na ba ti tɩn.
Baá pɔɔrɩ-ba ba yɩra, yɩ ba taa baŋwɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm, yɩ ba daa bá na o paarɩ dam-fɔrɔ zulǝ yam.
Kʋntʋ maama wʋ́ ba kʋ kɩ maŋa kalʋ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn.
Dɛ dɩm kʋntʋ nɩ, oó na zulǝ o tɩtɩ nɔɔna bam tee nɩ.
Balʋ maama na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩd-o tɩn wʋ́ pa-o tiǝ zanzan.
Abam nan wʋ́ ta wʋ bantʋ wʋnɩ dɩ á na sɛ Wɛ cɩga kalʋ dɩ́ na brɩ abam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ yɩ kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ loori dɩ́ Tu Wɛ maŋa maama dɩ́ pa abam, sɩ DƖ pa á maŋɩ dɩ DƖ cwǝŋǝ kam tɔgɩm, nɩ DƖ na kuri abam sɩ á taá yɩ te tɩn.
Dɩ́ loori-DƖ sɩ DƖ pa abam dam, sɩ á wanɩ á kɩ lanyɩranɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ á wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn maama, sɩ á taá kɩ tɩtʋŋa yalʋ maama na lana tɩn, á na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ wʋ́ pa dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi taa naɩ zulǝ abam tee nɩ, yɩ abam dɩ wʋ́ na zulǝ, dɩ́ Tu Baŋa-Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi na pɛ abam yu-yoŋo tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kǝm-balwaarʋ maŋa na wʋ́ ba te tɩn Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, á ye nɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ joori o ba, yɩ Wɛ wʋ́ la dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ taá wʋ o tee nɩ.
Dɩ́ nan lagɩ dɩ́ loori abam sɩ á yɩ pa á bɩcara taa di kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ.
Á yɩ zaŋɩ á pa á wʋbʋŋa vugimi, dɩ nɔɔna balʋ na tɛ ba wɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi dɛ dɩm maŋɩ dɩ yi tɩn.
Nɔɔna na tɛ dɩ abam ba wɩ, Wɛ Joro kʋm mʋ brɩ kʋntʋ, naa ba na wɩ kʋ yɩ dɩbam taanɩ mʋ, naa ba na pɛ abam tɔnɔ yɩ ba wɩ kʋ nuŋi dɩbam tee mʋ, sɩ á yɩ sɛ á pa nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ ganɩ abam dɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ dwi.
Bɛŋwaanɩ maŋa kalʋ nɔɔna zanzan na wʋ́ ba ba ywǝri Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ tɩn wʋ́ da yigǝ kʋ kɩ mʋ, sɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm dɛ dɩm laan ba dɩ yi.
Kʋlʋ na wǝli da tɩn, kǝm-balwaarʋ tu wʋm wʋ́ da yigǝ mʋ o ba.
Wʋntʋ gurim je nan wʋ́ ta yɩ cɔgɩm mʋ.
Oó brɩ nɩ wʋm dwe wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama nɔɔna na zuli dɩ kʋlʋ maama ba na bǝ nɩ ba wa tɩn, yɩ oó dʋnɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ maama.
O ma wʋ́ vu o zʋ o jǝni Baŋa-Wɛ tɩtɩ digǝ kam wʋnɩ, yɩ o brɩ nɩ wʋm tɩtɩ mʋ yɩ Wɛ.
A ya na wʋ abam tee nɩ maŋa kalʋ tɩn, a maŋɩ a brɩ abam wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ.
Á nan wʋ guli-tɩ na?
Woŋo kʋdoŋ nan mʋ cɩgɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ cwǝŋǝ sɩ tɩ ta yɩ kɩ lele, yɩ á ye kʋ ni nɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ maŋa kam na sɩɩnɩ ka yi, kǝm-balwaarʋ tu wʋm laan wʋ́ ba sɩ nabiinǝ lwar-o jaja.
Kǝm-lwaanʋ dam dɩlʋ na sǝgi nɔɔna yiǝ nɩ tɩn maŋɩ dɩ wʋra dɩ cɔgɩ nabiinǝ.
Kʋ nan na yɩ wʋlʋ na wʋra o cʋ kǝm-lwaanʋ tɩm cwǝŋǝ lele sɩ tɩ yɩ kɩ tɩn, kʋntʋ tu wʋ́ ba o viiri.
Maŋa kam kʋntʋ nɩ mʋ, kǝm-balwaarʋ tu wʋm laan wʋ́ brɩ o tɩtɩ jaja.
Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na wʋ́ joori o ba maŋa kalʋ tɩn, o laan wʋ́ ma o ni-viu o cɔgɩ wʋntʋ fasɩ.
Zezi na wʋ́ joori o ba dɩ dam-fɔrɔ tɩn, mʋ o laan wʋ́ cɔgɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tu wʋm.
Maŋa kam kǝm-balwaarʋ tu wʋm na wʋ́ ba tɩn, oó joŋi dam-fɔrɔ sʋtaanɩ tee nɩ o ma kɩ wo-kɩnkagɩla dwi tǝri tǝri ya na daɩ cɩga tɩn.
O ma wʋ́ kɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ dwi maama o ma ganɩ balʋ na wʋ́ ga ba ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn.
Kʋʋ́ kɩ-ba kʋntʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ ba ba sɛ sɩ ba joŋi Wɛ cɩga kam dɩ sono, sɩ kʋ pa DƖ vrɩ-ba ba lwarɩm wʋnɩ.
Ba na vɩn Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn ŋwaanɩ, DƖ laan wʋ́ pa ba wʋbʋŋa daa yǝri cɩga, yɩ ba sɛ ba tɔgɩ kʋlʋ na yɩ vwan tɩn.
Balʋ maama na wʋ sɛ DƖ cɩga kam yɩ ba daarɩ ba soe kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩn, Wɛ wʋ́ di ba taanɩ yɩ ba na cam.
Wɛ na kuri dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ taá yɩ DƖ nɔɔna te tɩn Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ kɩ Wɛ le maŋa maama abam ŋwaanɩ, á na yɩ balʋ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm na soe tɩn.
Kʋ zɩgɩ pulim nɩ mʋ Wɛ kuri abam sɩ DƖ vrɩ abam DƖ yagɩ.
DƖ mɛ DƖ Joro kʋm dam mʋ DƖ pa á ji DƖ tɩtɩ nɔɔna, dɩ á na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ cɩga kam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ na bǝŋi abam sɩ á taá yɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ dɛ dɩ DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam dɩ́ na tɔɔlɩ dɩ́ brɩ abam tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ, sɩ DƖ pa á tɔgɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi á na zulǝ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, fɔgɩ-na á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ, sɩ á yɩ yagɩ cɩga kalʋ dɩ́ na maŋɩ dɩ́ brɩ abam tɩn, kʋ na yɩ dɩ́ na maŋɩ dɩ́ wʋ abam tee nɩ yɩ dɩ́ ŋɔɔnɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, dɩ dɩ́ na pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋlʋ dɩ́ pa abam tɩn dɩ.
Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi dɩdaanɩ dɩ́ Ko Wɛ soe dɩbam yɩ DƖ pa dɩbam yu-yoŋo, dɩ DƖ na pɛ dɩ́ jɩgɩ baarɩ dɩlʋ na bá fɔgɩ dɩ ti tɩn, dɩdaanɩ tɩɩna yalʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn.
Dɩntʋ wʋ́ zǝni abam dɩ wʋbʋŋ-ŋʋna sɩ á taá jɩgɩ dam, sɩ á wanɩ á taá kɩ lanyɩranɩ á tɩtʋŋa dɩ á ni-taanɩ maama wʋnɩ.
Á taá loori Wɛ dɩbam ŋwaanɩ Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, kʋlʋ na daarɩ tɩn, á taá loori Wɛ á pa dɩbam, sɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam jagɩ ka yi je maama, sɩ nɔɔna sɛ-ka lanyɩranɩ nɩ abam dɩ na sɛ-ka te tɩn.
Loori-na Wɛ sɩ DƖ joŋi dɩbam nɔn-balwaarʋ jɩa nɩ, bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ daɩ nɔɔna bam maama mʋ sɛ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam.
Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nan yɩ cɩga tu mʋ, oó wǝli abam dɩ dam, yɩ o cɩ abam sʋtaanɩ jɩŋa nɩ sɩ dɩ yɩ cɔgɩ abam.
Á na yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nɔɔna tɩn mʋ dɩ́ jɩgɩ abam cɩga sɩ á tɔgɩ dɩ́ na maŋɩ dɩ́ brɩ abam kʋlʋ tɩn, yɩ á ta wʋ́ ta kɩ kʋntʋ nɩ dɩ́ na maŋɩ dɩ́ ta te tɩn.
Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm wʋ́ pa á wʋbʋŋa tiini ya zʋ Wɛ sono kʋm, yɩ o daarɩ o pa á zɩgɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ pu-dɩa nɩ Zezi Krisi tɩtɩ na zɩgɩ te tɩn.
Yawɔrɩ-nyɩna kweǝ Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ kaanɩ abam dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi yɩrɩ mʋ, sɩ á cɩ á tɩtɩ dɩ á ko-bu wʋlʋ maama na yɩ yawɔrɩ-nyɩm yɩ o ba tɔgɩ zaasɩm dɩlʋ dɩ́ na brɩ abam tɩn.
Abam nan ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ á maŋɩ sɩ á lwǝni dɩbam tɩtʋŋa na yɩ te tɩn mʋ.
Dɩ́ dɛɛn na wʋ á tee nɩ tɩn, dɩ́ ba jɩgɩ yawɔrɔ.
Dɩ́ wʋ joŋi wʋdiu nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ tee nɩ kafɛ.
Dɩ́ nan tiini dɩ́ tʋŋɩ mʋ yɩ kʋ cɛ dɩ́ yɩra wɩa dɩ tɩtɩɩ, sɩ dɩ́ yɩ yaarɩ abam wʋlʋwʋlʋ wʋdiu ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ dɩ́ ya ba jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ dɩ́ joŋi zǝnǝ abam tee nɩ.
Dɩ́ dɛɛn nan kɩ kʋntʋ sɩ kʋ pa á wanɩ á lwǝni dɩbam na kɩ te tɩn mʋ.
Dɩ́ na wʋ abam tee nɩ maŋa kalʋ tɩn, dɩ́ pɛ abam ni nɩ, nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na ba lagɩ tɩtʋŋa tɩn, kʋntʋ tu wʋ maŋɩ sɩ o di wʋdiu dɩ.
Dɩ́ tagɩ kʋntʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ dɩ́ ni nɩ abam badonnǝ yɩ yawɔrɩ-nyɩna mʋ.
Ba ba lagɩ tɩtʋŋa, yɩ ba karɩ je maama ba kɩkarɩ ba donnǝ yiǝ.
Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ tɛ nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ, yɩ dɩ́ kaanɩ-ba sɩ ba ja ba tɩtɩ cɩm ba tʋŋɩ, sɩ ba wanɩ ba nii ba tɩtɩ baŋa nɩ dɩ ba ni-wʋdiu.
Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, abam tɩtɩ nan yɩ zaŋɩ á bwǝni dɩ lanyɩranɩ kǝm.
Abam wʋlʋ na wʋ sɛ dɩ́ na pʋpʋnɩ te tɔnɔ kʋntʋ wʋnɩ dɩ́ brɩ abam tɩn, sɩ á taá ye kʋntʋ tu, sɩ á wanɩ á ja á tɩtɩ dɩd-o, sɩ kʋ pa cavɩɩra ja-o.
Á nan yɩ pa o ji á dʋm.
Á taá kaan-o nɩ á ko-bu te.
Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm yɩ wʋ-zuru tu mʋ, yɩ oó pa abam taá jɩgɩ wʋ-zuru maŋa maama woŋo maama wʋnɩ.
Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm wʋ́ ta wʋra dɩ abam maama.
Amʋ Pooli mʋ jɔɔnɩ abam.
A tɩtɩ laan mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɩntʋ dɩ a jɩŋa.
A yǝni a kɩ kʋntʋ mʋ a twaanʋ tɩm maama wʋnɩ, sɩ á lwarɩ nɩ kʋ yɩ amʋ mʋ pʋpʋnɩ.
A yǝni a pʋpʋnɩ tɩntʋ mʋ.
Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam maama yu-yoŋo.
Dayigǝ tɔnɔ kʋlʋ Pooli na pʋpʋnɩ o pa Timoti tɩn na brɩ dɩbam kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ Timoti nu yɩ Zwifu mʋ o na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi, o ko ma yɩ Grɛkɩ tu.
Pooli dɛɛn jeeri Timoti maŋa kalʋ o na maa ve Lisitri o tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam o brɩ nɔɔna tɩn mʋ .
Timoti laan ma tɔgɩ dɩ Pooli o tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam .
Pooli nan pʋpʋnɩ twaanʋ tɩle mʋ o pa Timoti.
Twaanʋ tɩntʋ wʋnɩ o kwe Wɛ kɔgɔ kʋm yigǝ tiinǝ bam mʋ.
Dayigǝ tɔnɔ kʋlʋ o na pʋpʋnɩ o pa Timoti tɩn wʋnɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ wǝǝnu tɩtɔ woŋo mʋ: O kaanɩ Wɛ nɔɔna bam sɩ ba cɩ ba tɩtɩ mʋ dɩ vwan zaasɩm dɩlʋ na zʋ ba tɩtarɩ tɩn.
Vwan zaasɩm tiinǝ bam dɛɛn brɩ nɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wǝǝnu tɩm yɩ balɔrɔ mʋ, yɩ n bá n wanɩ n na vrɩm, kʋ na daɩ nɩ n jɩgɩ yǝno kʋlʋ na sǝgi tɩn, yɩ nɔɔna fɩnfɩɩn yɩranɩ nan mʋ ye yǝno kʋm kʋntʋ.
Ba ma kwǝri ba kwe nɔɔna sɩ ba ja ba tɩtɩ dɩ wʋdiiru tɩdonnǝ dim, sɩ ba yagɩ kadri.
Pooli nan pʋpʋnɩ o brɩ-ba nɩ kʋntʋ yɩ vwan mʋ.
Pooli daa ta brɩ Zezi kɔgɔ na maŋɩ sɩ kʋ zuli Wɛ te tɩn.
O ma kwǝri o brɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm dɩ kʋ nakwa bam dɩ kʋ zǝnzǝnnǝ bam na maŋɩ sɩ ba taa yɩ te tɩn.
Pooli laan ma daarɩ o brɩ Timoti o na maŋɩ sɩ o kɩ te dɩ Wɛ nɔɔna bam dwi tǝri tǝri tɩn, sɩ o ma wanɩ o tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam lanyɩranɩ.
Amʋ Pooli wʋlʋ na yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ tɩn mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ sɩ a pa nmʋ Timoti.
Baŋa-Wɛ dɩlʋ na yɩ dɩbam Vɩrnʋ dɩ Zezi Krisi wʋlʋ dɩbam na jɩgɩ o tɩɩna tɩn mʋ pɛ-nɩ ni sɩ a taa yɩ o tɩntʋŋnʋ.
Nmʋ yɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ amʋ tɩtɩ bu mʋ te, n na sɛ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa nmʋ yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo, yɩ o daarɩ o duri nmʋ ŋwaŋa.
Cʋ-na á tɩtɩ dɩ vwan karanyɩna tiinǝ bam zaasɩm dɩm Maŋa kam amʋ dɛɛn na maa ve Masɩdʋanɩ tɩn, a loori nmʋ sɩ n maŋɩ Efɛɛzɩ nɩ sɩ n kaanɩ nɔɔna balʋ na brɩ kʋlʋ na daɩ cɩga tɩn sɩ ba yagɩ.
Nmʋ maŋɩ sɩ n ta-ba sɩ ba yagɩ ba wʋbʋŋa sɩnswalɩ sɩlʋ na daɩ cɩga tɩn, sɩ ba daarɩ ba yagɩ ba kwǝ dwi natɔga kalʋ na ba jɩgɩ gurim je tɩn.
Bɛŋwaanɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ paɩ nɔɔna magɩ kantɔgɔ mʋ kafɛ.
Tɩ ba wǝli nɔɔna sɩ ba kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ sɩ ba taa tɔgɩ-DƖ.
Nmʋ maŋɩ sɩ n kaanɩ-ba mʋ dɩdaanɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ sɩ ba yagɩ-tɩ, sɩ ba taa jɩgɩ sono kʋlʋ na yɩ cɩga cɩga na nuŋi bɩcarɩ-ŋʋna wʋnɩ tɩn, yɩ ba na kɩ kʋlʋ maama ba na ye nɩ kʋ lamma tɩn, yɩ ba na sɩɩnɩ ba kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ, kʋʋ́ pa ba taa jɩgɩ sono kʋm kʋntʋ.
Nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ nan ywǝri cɩga kam kʋntʋ wʋnɩ mʋ, yɩ ba daarɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ bɩtarɩ sɩlʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri tɩn.
Ba lagɩ sɩ ba taa yɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm karanyɩna tiinǝ mʋ.
Ba tɩtɩ nan ba ni ba na tɛ kʋlʋ tɩn kuri, yɩ ba yǝri ba na ŋɔɔnɩ kʋlʋ dɩ ba wʋ maama tɩn dɩ.
Dɩ́ ye nɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm lana dɩ wʋlʋ na ni tɩ kuri nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ te tɩn.
Dɩbam nan ye nɩ, Wɛ na pɛ DƖ cullu tɩm tɩn, DƖ wʋ pɛ-tɩ nɔn-ŋʋna ŋwaanɩ.
DƖ nan pɛ-tɩ balʋ na yɩ cullu cɔgɩna tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ, dɩdaanɩ vɩnvɩɩna dɩ balʋ yigǝ na tǝrǝ dɩ DƖ tɩn, dɩ wo-lwaanʋ kǝrǝ dɩ nɔn-balwaarʋ, dɩ balʋ na ba nɩgɩ-DƖ tɩn, dɩ balʋ dɩ na gʋ ba kwǝ naa ba niinǝ naa ba donnǝ tɩn mʋ, dɩ balʋ na boori tɩn, dɩ baara balʋ na maɩ ba donnǝ ba jiri kaana tɩn, dɩdaanɩ balʋ na cʋ ba jaanɩ nɔɔna dɩ dam ba yǝgi tɩn, dɩdaanɩ balʋ na fɔ vwan tɩn, dɩ balʋ na du dɩ Wɛ yɩ kʋ yagɩ kʋ daɩ cɩga tɩn.
DƖ nan pɛ DƖ cullu tɩm balʋ maama na cɔgɩ zaasɩm dɩlʋ na yɩ cɩga yɩ dɩ tɔgɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam na brɩ te tɩn dɩ mʋ.
Kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ nuŋi Wʋpolo Tu Baŋa-Wɛ dɩlʋ na jɩgɩ paarɩ-zulǝ tɩn te mʋ, yɩ dɩntʋ kɩ-ka amʋ jɩŋa nɩ sɩ a taa tɛa.
Pooli na kɩ Wɛ le DƖ zǝnǝ ŋwaanɩ te tɩn Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi mʋ pɛ amʋ dam sɩ a taa tʋŋɩ a pa-o.
A kɩ o le dɩdaanɩ o na nɛ nɩ amʋ jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa yɩ o lɩ-nɩ sɩ a taa tʋŋɩ a pa-o tɩn.
Faŋa tɩn, a dɛɛn yǝni a ŋɔɔnɩ a cɔgɩ Zezi yɩrɩ, yɩ a kwǝri a twɩ-o, yɩ a ta yaarɩ o nɔɔna bam.
Dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, o nan ta duri a ŋwaŋa, bɛŋwaanɩ amʋ ya wʋ sɛ-o yɩ kʋ pa a yǝri woŋo kʋlʋ a na jɩgɩ a kɩ tɩn.
Nan dɩ kʋ dɩ, dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi mʋ kɩ-nɩ yu-yoŋo zanzan kʋ ja gaalɩ, yɩ o daarɩ o pa a taa jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩd-o dɩ sono, a na ŋwɩ dɩd-o tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Taanɩ dɩntʋ yɩ cɩga yɩ dɩ maŋɩ sɩ nɔɔna maama sɛ-dɩ mʋ: «Zezi Krisi tu lʋgʋ baŋa sɩ o vrɩ nɔn-cɩcɔgɩrʋ mʋ ba lwarɩm wʋnɩ.» Amʋ nan mʋ kɩ lwarɩm a dwǝni nɔɔna maama, yɩ Wɛ ta duri a ŋwaŋa sɩ kʋ pa Zezi Krisi brɩ o wʋ-zuru kʋm na yɩ te dɩ amʋ.
O na tiini o kɩ wʋ-zuru dɩ amʋ wʋlʋ na yɩ nɔn-cɩcɔgɩrʋ tɩm yigǝ tu tɩn, kʋ yɩ maana mʋ kʋ paɩ nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ́ da a kwaga ba ba ba sɛ-o, sɩ ba daarɩ ba na ŋwɩa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ.
Baŋa-Wɛ yɩ pɛ wʋlʋ paarɩ na bá ti maŋa dɩ maŋa tɩn mʋ.
DƖ yɩ ŋwɩa tu mʋ, ba ba na-DƖ dɩ yiǝ, yɩ DƖ ba jɩgɩ doŋ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ zulǝ dɩ tiǝ taa wʋ DƖ tee nɩ sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.
Amina.
A bu Timoti, a lagɩ a ta dɩ nmʋ sɩ n ta n tʋŋɩ n pa Wɛ, nɩ Wɛ nijoŋnǝ bam dɛɛn na tagɩ nmʋ taanɩ te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, kwaanɩ n guli ba na tagɩ te tɩn sɩ n tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa lanyɩranɩ, nɩnɛɛnɩ n na lagɩ n magɩ jara cɩga cɩga te tɩn.
Ta n jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ, sɩ n daarɩ n ta n kɩ kʋlʋ maama n na ye n bɩcarɩ nɩ nɩ kʋ lamma tɩn.
Nɔɔna badonnǝ wʋra, ba ba sɛ sɩ ba taa kɩ kʋlʋ ba na ye nɩ kʋ lamma tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ma pa ba daa warɩ ba da Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam.
Yimene dɩ Alɛsandrɩ mʋ tɔgɩ ba wʋ nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ wʋnɩ.
Amʋ nan yagɩ-ba sʋtaanɩ jɩŋa nɩ sɩ ba na cam, sɩ ba daa yɩ ŋɔɔnɩ ba cɔgɩ Wɛ yɩrɩ.
Wɛ nɔɔna na maŋɩ sɩ ba taa zuli-DƖ te tɩn Woŋo kʋlʋ a na lagɩ a da yigǝ a ta tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ.
Á maŋɩ sɩ á taá loori Wɛ á pa nɔɔna maama.
Loori-na Wɛ sɩ DƖ taa nii ba baŋa nɩ, sɩ á daarɩ á taá kɩ DƖ le ba ŋwaanɩ.
Á taá loori Wɛ á paɩ pwa dɩdaanɩ dɩdɛɛra balʋ maama na jɩgɩ dam nɔɔna baŋa nɩ tɩn, sɩ kʋ pa dɩ́ taá zʋʋrɩ dɩ yazurǝ dɩ ni-ywǝm, sɩ dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ taá tɔgɩ Wɛ lanyɩranɩ, sɩ dɩ́ taá ŋwɩ nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na lamma yɩ kʋ poli Wɛ dɩlʋ na yɩ dɩ́ Vɩrnʋ tɩn wʋ.
Dɩntʋ mʋ lagɩ sɩ nɔɔna maama na vrɩm, sɩ ba kwǝri ba lwarɩ kʋlʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn.
Wɛ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ wʋra.
Wʋlʋ dɩ na fɔgɩ nabiinǝ dɩ Wɛ daanɩ tɩn dɩ yɩ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ.
Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi wʋlʋ na yɩ nabiinu tɩn.
Wʋm mʋ sɛ o tɩ o ma ŋwɩ nɔɔna maama lwarɩm jɩnɩ, yɩ ba pa o maana maŋa kalʋ Wɛ na lɩ tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ Wɛ pɛ a ji DƖ tɩntʋŋnʋ, sɩ a tɔɔlɩ DƖ kwǝrǝ kam a brɩ nɔɔna.
Cɩga mʋ a ŋɔɔna, sɩ kʋ daɩ vwan.
Wɛ sɩɩnɩ DƖ tʋŋɩ-nɩ mʋ sɩ a taa brɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ, sɩ ba sɛ DƖ cɩga kam ba kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ.
Amʋ lagɩ sɩ jǝgǝ maama baara taa warɩ Wɛ.
Ba na zǝŋi ba jɩa wɛɛnɩ sɩ ba warɩ Wɛ, sɩ ba taa jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo mʋ, sɩ ba yɩ taa jɩgɩ ban-zɔŋɔ naa kantɔgɔ dɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ.
Amʋ nan ta lagɩ sɩ kaana dɩ ja ba tɩtɩ dɩ ba gwaarʋ vɔɔm, sɩ ba taa kwarɩ cavɩɩra ba zʋʋrɩ gwaarʋ tɩlʋ na maŋɩ dɩ ba tɩn.
Ba wʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba tiini ba kwɛ ba yum ba ja gaalɩ, naa ba zuli ba tɩtɩ dɩ nɩnwaŋa wǝǝnu, kʋ na yɩ sǝbu-sɩŋa naa kandwa-ŋʋna naa gwaarʋ tɩlʋ sǝbiǝ na damma tɩn.
Ba nan maŋɩ sɩ ba taa kɩ kǝm-laarʋ mʋ, sɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ ba yɩ kaana balʋ na sɛ Wɛ cɩga cɩga tɩn.
Kaana maŋɩ sɩ ba taa je cɩm mʋ ba cǝgi balʋ na brɩ-ba Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɩn, sɩ ba daarɩ ba taa sɛ-ba.
Amʋ wʋ sɛ sɩ kaana taa brɩ baara naa ba taa te-ba.
Ba maŋɩ sɩ ba taa je cɩm mʋ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, Wɛ dɛɛn na kɩ nabiinǝ tɩn, DƖ kɩ Adam mʋ yigǝ, yɩ DƖ laan daarɩ DƖ kɩ Awa.
Kʋ dɛɛn daɩ Adam mʋ sʋtaanɩ ganɩ, kʋ yɩ kaanɩ wʋm mʋ dɩ ganɩ dɩ pa o vɩn Wɛ ni.
Kʋntʋ mʋ te kaana lʋrɩ dɩ cam, Wɛ nan wʋ́ vrɩ-ba, dɩ ba na sɛ ba tɔgɩ Wɛ dɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ sono dɩ wʋ-poŋo yɩ ba jɩgɩ ba tɩtɩ tɩn.
Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm yigǝ tiinǝ na maŋɩ sɩ ba taa yɩ te tɩn Taanɩ dɩntʋ sɩɩnɩ dɩ yɩ cɩga mʋ: «Nɔɔnʋ na lagɩ sɩ o ji Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm yigǝ tu, kʋntʋ tu lagɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋm mʋ.» Kʋntʋ, Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm yigǝ tu maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ nɔn-ŋʋm mʋ nɔɔna maama tee nɩ.
O nan maŋɩ sɩ o taa jɩgɩ kaanɩ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ.
O ta maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩrɩ o tɩtɩ, sɩ o taa waɩ o tɩtɩ o jaana nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ te tɩn.
O maŋɩ sɩ o taa jeeri vǝrǝ lanyɩranɩ o sɔŋɔ nɩ.
O maŋɩ sɩ o taa ye nɔɔna zaasɩm.
O nan wʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ sa-nyɔrʋ naa najajarʋ naa nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ banɩ na lʋmma tɩn.
Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ nɔn-yoŋo mʋ dɩ nɔɔnʋ maama.
O nan wʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ sǝbu-swǝn-nyɩm.
O maŋɩ sɩ o taa waɩ o nii o sɔŋɔ tiinǝ baŋa nɩ mʋ lanyɩranɩ, sɩ o daarɩ o pa o biǝ sɛ-o dɩ zulǝ yalʋ na maŋɩ tɩn.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, nɔɔnʋ na warɩ o nii o tɩtɩ sɔŋɔ tiinǝ baŋa nɩ, oó kɩ ta mʋ o nii Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm baŋa nɩ?
Kʋ wʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ wʋlʋ na yɩ nɔn-dʋʋrʋ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ tɩn, sɩ o yɩ zaŋɩ o ba o zǝŋi o tɩtɩ, sɩ Wɛ di o taanɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ DƖ na di sʋtaanɩ taanɩ te tɩn.
Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm yigǝ tu maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ nɔn-ŋʋm mʋ dɩ balʋ na ba tɔgɩ Wɛ tɩn dɩ.
Kʋ na daɩ kʋntʋ, nɔɔna wʋ́ goon-o yɩ o na cavɩɩra, yɩ o tʋ sʋtaanɩ cɩgɩrʋ tɩm wʋnɩ.
Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm zǝnzǝnnǝ bam na maŋɩ sɩ ba taa yɩ te tɩn Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm zǝnzǝnnǝ bam dɩ maŋɩ sɩ ba taa yɩ balʋ nɔɔna na nɩgɩ tɩn mʋ.
Ba wʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba taa yɩ niǝ yale yale tiinǝ, naa ba taa yɩ sa-nyɔra, naa ba taa kɩ kampinǝ sɩ ba ma na wǝǝnu.
Ba nan maŋɩ sɩ ba taa tɔgɩ cɩga kalʋ ya na sǝgi yɩ Wɛ laan vɩɩrɩ-ba DƖ taanɩ dɩm wʋnɩ tɩn, ba na ye ba bɩcarɩ nɩ nɩ kʋ lamma tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Nɔɔnʋ na lagɩ sɩ o ji Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm zǝnzǝnnu, ba maŋɩ sɩ ba da yigǝ ba maan-o mʋ ba nii, o na ba jɩgɩ wo-lɔŋɔ, sɩ ba laan pa o puli o tɩtʋŋa.
Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba kaana dɩ taa yɩ balʋ nɔɔna na nɩgɩ tɩn mʋ, sɩ ba yɩ taa yɩ bɩbarɩ-nyɩna.
Ba maŋɩ sɩ ba taa yɩrɩ ba tɩtɩ mʋ, sɩ nɔɔna taa jɩgɩ ba cɩga woŋo maama baŋa nɩ.
Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm zǝnzǝnnu maŋɩ sɩ o taa jɩgɩ kaanɩ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ, sɩ o daarɩ o taa waɩ o nii o biǝ dɩ o sɔŋɔ tiinǝ maama baŋa nɩ lanyɩranɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ zǝnzǝnnu wʋlʋ maama na tʋŋɩ o tɩtʋŋa lanyɩranɩ tɩn wʋ́ na zulǝ zanzan nɔɔna tee nɩ, yɩ o daarɩ o na baarɩ dɩ wʋpolo o na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Amʋ bʋŋɩ sɩ a ba nmʋ te lele.
A nan pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ a pa nmʋ sɩ, a na daanɩ fɩnfɩɩn, sɩ n wanɩ n lwarɩ n na wʋ́ ja Baŋa-Wɛ nɔɔna bam te.
Bantʋ mʋ yɩ Zezi nɔɔna yɩ ba tɔgɩ Ŋwɩa Tu Baŋa-Wɛ.
Bantʋ mʋ yɩ balʋ na kwaanɩ ba wǝli ba nii zaasɩm dɩlʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn baŋa nɩ, nɩnɛɛnɩ ywǝ na wǝli digǝ sɩ ka yɩ vi te tɩn.
Dɩ́ lwarɩ nɩ Wɛ tɔgɩm yɩ wo-kamunu mʋ.
Wɛ cɩga kam kʋntʋ dɛɛn ya sǝgi mʋ, yɩ DƖ laan pa dɩ́ lwarɩ wʋlʋ wʋm DƖ na tʋŋɩ tɩn: Wʋntʋ mʋ jigi nabiinu o ba lʋgʋ baŋa.
Wɛ Joro kʋm ma brɩ nɩ o yɩ cɩga tu.
Wɛ malɛsɩ sɩm ma na o zulǝ.
Nɔɔna ma ja o kwǝrǝ ba zʋ dwi maama wʋ ba tɔɔlɩ.
Lʋgʋ baŋa nabiinǝ ma sɛ-o.
O ma zaŋɩ dɩ zulǝ o di Wɛ-sɔŋɔ.
Dɩ́ na maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ cɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ dɩ vwan zanzaasa bam te tɩn -Wɛ Joro kʋm brɩ dɩbam fasɩ nɩ, maŋa tiim nɩ nɔɔna badaara wʋ́ zaŋɩ ba yagɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm.
Pipiri-nyɩna balʋ na fɔ vwan tɩn mʋ wʋ́ ganɩ-ba ba pa ba yagɩ zaasɩm dɩlʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn.
Bantʋ wʋbʋŋa mʋ tɩga, kʋ pa ba yǝri nɩ ba na kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn ba lamma.
Baá pa nɔɔna sɛ vwan yam ciciri na fɔɛ tɩn, yɩ ba daarɩ ba taa tɔgɩ sʋtaanɩ zaasɩm na yɩ te tɩn.
Nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ mʋ yǝni ba brɩ nɩ kʋ culǝ sɩ baarʋ di kaanɩ naa kaanɩ zʋ barʋ.
Wʋdiiru tɩdonnǝ dɩ maa wʋra ba na brɩ nɩ kʋ culǝ sɩ nɔɔna di-tɩ.
Nmʋ nan ye nɩ Wɛ mʋ kɩ wʋdiiru tɩm kʋntʋ, sɩ dɩbam balʋ na tɔgɩ-DƖ yɩ dɩ́ lwarɩ DƖ cɩga kam tɩn taá kɩ DƖ le tɩ ŋwaanɩ, sɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ taá di-tɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama Wɛ na kɩ tɩn lamma.
Woŋo kʋlʋ Wɛ na pɛ dɩbam tɩn, dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ kɩ DƖ le mʋ kʋ ŋwaanɩ, dɩ́ wʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ culi-kʋ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ taanɩ dɩm dɩ dɩbam Wɛ-loro kʋm mʋ kwɛ woŋo maama kʋ pa kʋ lana Wɛ yigǝ nɩ.
Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋ-ŋʋm na maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ te tɩn Nmʋ maŋɩ sɩ n ta wǝǝnu tɩntʋ mʋ n brɩ n ko-biǝ bam.
N na kɩ kʋntʋ, kʋʋ́ pa n ta n yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋ-ŋʋm.
N na sɩɩnɩ n sɛ Wɛ cɩga kam taanɩ dɩm dɩ zaasɩm dɩlʋ na yɩ cɩga yɩ n maŋɩ n tɔgɩ-dɩ tɩn, nń bɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ.
Yɩ zaŋɩ n cǝgi sɩnswalɩ sɩlʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri yɩ sɩ ba wǝli Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam tɩn.
Nan tiini n kwaanɩ n ta n tɔgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ.
