Dɩ́ ye nɩ, n na waarɩ n yɩra, kʋ jɩgɩ zǝnǝ fɩnfɩɩn.
Kʋ daarɩ, n nan na kwaanɩ n tɔgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ, kʋntʋ mʋ tiini kʋ jɩgɩ zǝnǝ woŋo maama wʋnɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ kʋʋ́ pa n na zǝnǝ zɩm ŋwɩa kam wʋnɩ, yɩ n daarɩ n na ŋwɩa kalʋ na lagɩ ka ba tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ.
Taanɩ dɩntʋ yɩ cɩga yɩ dɩ maŋɩ sɩ nɔɔna sɛ-dɩ mʋ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ paɩ dɩ́ kwaanɩ dɩ́ tʋŋa, bɛŋwaanɩ dɩbam jɩgɩ tɩɩna dɩ Ŋwɩa Tu Baŋa-Wɛ.
Dɩntʋ mʋ yɩ nɔɔna maama Vɩrnʋ, kʋ na fɔgɩ kʋ dwe dɩdɩ balʋ na sɛ-DƖ tɩn.
Ta n brɩ nɔɔna bam wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ sɩ n zaasɩ-ba.
Yɩ zaŋɩ n pa nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ gooni-m n na yɩ bu tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
N maŋɩ sɩ n ma n tɩtɩ mʋ n brɩ Zezi nɔɔna bam ba na wʋ́ ta kɩ te.
Kʋ na yɩ nmʋ ni-ŋwaŋa dɩ n tɩtʋŋ-naga, dɩ n sono dɩ n na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ te tɩn, dɩ n wʋ-poŋo maama mʋ n maŋɩ sɩ n ma n brɩ-ba.
Ta n kwaanɩ n karɩmɩ Wɛ taanɩ dɩm dɩ nɔɔna bam, sɩ n daarɩ n brɩ-ba Wɛ cɩga kam, sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kam a na wʋ́ ba tɩn.
Yɩ zaŋɩ n yagɩ pɛɛrɩ dɩlʋ Wɛ na pɛ nmʋ, maŋa kalʋ DƖ nijoŋnǝ bam dɛɛn na tagɩ nmʋ taanɩ te yɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm nakwa bam dɩ daŋɩ ba jɩa nmʋ baŋa nɩ ba warɩ Wɛ n ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ n tiini n kwaanɩ n ta n tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋɩ dɩm kʋntʋ dɩ n wʋ maama mʋ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ wʋ́ pa nɔɔna maama taa naɩ nmʋ na ve yigǝ te tɩn.
Ta n yɩrɩ n tɩtɩ, sɩ n daarɩ n ta n yɩrɩ n zaasɩm dɩm na yɩ te tɩn dɩ.
Kwaanɩ n zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ wʋnɩ, sɩ nmʋ tɩtɩ wʋ́ na vrɩm, yɩ n ta wʋ́ pa balʋ na cǝgi-m tɩn dɩ na vrɩm.
N na maŋɩ sɩ n kwe Wɛ nɔɔna bam te tɩn Yɩ zaŋɩ n bagɩ nankwɩan dɩ baarɩ.
N maŋɩ sɩ n kwe-o nɩ n ko mʋ te.
Kʋ na yɩ nɔn-dʋnnʋ, n maŋɩ sɩ n kwe-ba nɩ n nyaana mʋ te.
Kʋ na yɩ kazɩna, n maŋɩ sɩ n kwe-ba nɩ n niinǝ mʋ te.
Kʋ na yɩ ka-bwǝnǝ, n maŋɩ sɩ n kwe-ba nɩ n nakwa mʋ te dɩ wʋ-poŋo.
Dɩ́ na maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá zǝni kadǝnǝ te tɩn Ta n zuli kadǝnǝ balʋ na sɩɩnɩ ba ba jɩgɩ nɔɔnʋ tɩn, sɩ n ta n nii ba baŋa nɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ, kadǝm na jɩgɩ biǝ naa naarʋ, bantʋ mʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba taa nii-o, ba na yɩ o tɩtɩ sɔŋɔ tiinǝ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Mʋ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ zaasɩm dɩm na yɩ te tɩn.
Kadǝm biǝ na zǝn-o kʋntʋ, kʋʋ́ pa ba joori ba ŋwɩ ba tiinǝ jɩnɩ dɩ ba na yaarɩ ba ŋwaanɩ te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ nan mʋ poli Wɛ wʋ.
Kaanɩ wʋlʋ na sɩɩnɩ o yɩ kadǝm yɩ o ba jɩgɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ sɩ o taa nii o baŋa nɩ tɩn tiŋi o tɩɩna Wɛ baŋa nɩ mʋ.
Tɩtɩɩ dɩ wɩa maama o tiini o warɩ Wɛ mʋ yɩ o loori zǝnǝ DƖ tee nɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ kadǝm wʋlʋ na lagɩ sɩ o taa ŋwɩ paweeni wʋnɩ tɩn maŋɩ o tɩ mʋ yɩ o ta beerǝ.
Nan pa ba maama lwarɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ ni nɩ, sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ wanɩ o na ba wo-lɔŋɔ o ta.
Nɔɔnʋ yigǝ na tǝrǝ dɩ o sɔŋɔ tiinǝ, kʋ na tiini kʋ dwe dɩdɩ dɩ o tɩtɩ digǝ tiinǝ, kʋntʋ tu yagɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ mʋ.
O nan tiini o yɩ nɔn-balɔrɔ o dwe balʋ na maŋɩ ba ba tɔgɩ Wɛ tɩn dɩ.
Yɩ zaŋɩ n pa ba pʋpʋnɩ kadǝm wʋlʋ na wʋ yi bɩna fusɩrdʋ tɩn n kɩ kadǝnǝ bam tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ.
Wʋlʋ na maŋɩ sɩ o wǝli da tɩn maŋɩ sɩ o ban-zʋrɩ taa yɩ bɩdwɩ yɩranɩ mʋ.
O maŋɩ sɩ nɔɔna taa ye o tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna ni nɩ lanyɩranɩ.
O na nii o biǝ baŋa nɩ lanyɩranɩ, naa o na jeeri vǝrǝ lanyɩranɩ, naa o na tu o tɩtɩ o zarɩ Wɛ nɔɔna bam nɛ, naa o na zǝni balʋ na wʋ cam wʋnɩ tɩn, yɩ o na kwaanɩ o tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna dwi maama, abam waɩ á gar-o á wǝli da.
Kʋ daarɩ kadǝnǝ balʋ na yɩ ka-bwǝnǝ tɩn, abam wʋ maŋɩ sɩ á ga-ba á wǝli da.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, bantʋ wʋbʋŋa daa na lǝni yɩ ba warɩ ba tɩtɩ ba ja, baá yagɩ ni dɩlʋ ba na goni dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn, yɩ ba daarɩ ba daa zʋ banna.
Ba na kɩ kʋntʋ, ba bá na bʋra, bɛŋwaanɩ ba cɔgɩ ba dayigǝ ni dɩlʋ ba na goni dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn mʋ.
Kʋlʋ na wǝli da tɩn, á na pʋpʋnɩ kadǝnǝ balʋ na yɩ ka-bwǝnǝ tɩn á wǝli da, baá ji yawɔrɩ-nyɩna yɩ ba ta tʋlɩ sam.
Kʋ nan daɩ kʋntʋ yɩranɩ, baá ji bɩbarɩ-nyɩna dɩ ŋwaŋ-yɔɔrʋ tiinǝ, yɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na daɩ sɩ ba ya ŋɔɔnɩ tɩn.
Mʋ kʋ kuri amʋ bʋŋɩ nɩ kʋʋ́ ta lamma sɩ kadǝnǝ balʋ na yɩ ka-bwǝnǝ tɩn taa zʋʋrɩ banna sɩ ba lʋ biǝ, sɩ ba daarɩ ba taa nii ba tɩtɩ sam baŋa nɩ.
Ba na kɩ kʋntʋ, kʋʋ́ pa dɩbam dʋna daa bá na cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ wo-lwaanʋ ba pa dɩbam.
Bɛŋwaanɩ kadǝnǝ badaara maŋɩ ba ywǝri Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ, yɩ ba daarɩ ba tɔgɩ sʋtaanɩ.
Baarʋ naa kaanɩ wʋlʋ na tɔgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ yɩ kadǝnǝ wʋ o sɔŋɔ nɩ tɩn, wʋntʋ mʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa nii ba baŋa nɩ.
Kʋ daɩ sɩ o yagɩ-ba o pa Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm.
O na yagɩ-ba kʋntʋ, kʋʋ́ yaarɩ Zezi nɔɔna bam kʋ pa ba daa bá wanɩ ba nii kadǝnǝ balʋ na ba jɩgɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ tɩn baŋa nɩ.
Kʋ na maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ kɩ nakwa tiinǝ bam te tɩn Kʋ daarɩ, kʋ na yɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm nakwa balʋ na yɩ yigǝ tiinǝ yɩ ba nii Zezi nɔɔna bam baŋa nɩ lanyɩranɩ tɩn, ba maŋɩ sɩ ba na zulǝ kuni bɩle mʋ, kʋ na dwe dɩdɩ balʋ na kwaanɩ ba tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ yɩ ba brɩ nɔɔna Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn.
Bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Nmʋ na jɩgɩ nabɩa n ma n nwanɩ wo-vaalʋ, yɩ kɩ tampɔgɔ ka ni nɩ.» Kʋ ta tagɩ kʋ wɩ: «Tɩntʋŋnʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa joŋi o ŋwɩɩrʋ mʋ.» Nɔɔnʋ na tagɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm nakwa bam wʋ nɔɔnʋ bɩtar-lwaŋa dɩ nmʋ, yɩ zaŋɩ n sɛ, kʋ na daɩ nɩ nɔɔna bale naa batɔ yi mʋ nɛ o kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩm.
Kʋ daarɩ nakwa balʋ na sɩɩnɩ ba kɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩn, sɩ n kaanɩ-ba ba maama yigǝ nɩ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ wʋ́ pa fʋʋnɩ ja badaara bam dɩ.
A nan lagɩ a kaanɩ-m mʋ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi yigǝ nɩ dɩ Wɛ tɩtɩ malɛsɩ sɩm yigǝ nɩ, sɩ n yɔɔrɩ n sɛ kʋlʋ a na tagɩ tɩn.
Yɩ kuri nɔɔna daanɩ, kɩ nɔɔnʋ maama te na maŋɩ tɩn.
Yɩ lɔgɩrɩ n daŋɩ n jɩa nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ baŋa nɩ sɩ n pa o ji Wɛ tɩntʋŋnʋ.
Yɩ zaŋɩ n pa nɔɔna kǝm-lwaanʋ loŋi-m. Fɔgɩ n ja n tɩtɩ dɩ wʋ-poŋo.
A lagɩ a ta dɩ nmʋ sɩ, n wʋ kʋm na yǝni kʋ wɔɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ, sɩ n ta n nyɔ sana fɩnfɩɩn sɩ kʋ wanɩ kʋ zǝni-m, sɩ n yɩ ta n nyɔ na yɩranɩ.
Nɔɔna badaara wo-lwaanʋ tiini tɩ naɩ dɩ yi mʋ jaja, yɩ ba daa ta wʋ di bantʋ taanɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ babam wo-lwaanʋ nan wʋ́ ba tɩ na kʋ kwaga nɩ mʋ.
Kʋ nan ta yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ dɩ kǝm-laarʋ dɩ.
Tɩ dɩ yɔɔrɩ tɩ naɩ dɩ yi mʋ jaja.
Nan dɩ kʋ dɩ, tɩlʋ na ba naɩ lanyɩranɩ tɩn dɩ bá wanɩ tɩ sǝgi.
Gambɛ na maŋɩ sɩ ba taa kɩ te tɩn Balʋ maama na yɩ gambɛ yɩ ba tɔgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɩn maŋɩ sɩ ba taa paɩ ba yum tiinǝ bam zulǝ zanzan mʋ.
Kʋntʋ wʋ́ pa nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ bá wanɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ o cɔgɩ Wɛ yɩrɩ dɩdaanɩ dɩbam zaasɩm dɩm.
Gambɛ sɩlʋ na tʋŋɩ ba paɩ ba yum tiinǝ balʋ dɩ na tɔgɩ Wɛ tɩn, kʋ wʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba taa gooni-ba ba na yɩ ba ko-biǝ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Ba nan maŋɩ sɩ ba taa tʋŋɩ lanyɩranɩ mʋ ba pa-ba, bɛŋwaanɩ ba yum tiinǝ balʋ ba na tʋŋɩ ba paɩ tɩn dɩ yɩ ba ko-bu-sonnu mʋ ba na tɔgɩ Zezi tɩn ŋwaanɩ, yɩ ba nii ba baŋa nɩ lanyɩranɩ.
Dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ cɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ dɩ vwan zaasɩm dɩ sǝbu-swǝnǝ Nii wǝǝnu tɩlʋ n na maŋɩ sɩ n brɩ nɔɔna bam sɩ ba taa kɩ tɩn.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ maama na brɩ zaasɩm dɩdoŋ, yɩ o wʋ sɛ sɩ o tɔgɩ dɩbam Yuutu Zezi Krisi kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam dɩdaanɩ Wɛ cwǝ-laa zaasɩm dɩm, kʋntʋ tu kɩ fɔŋɔ mʋ yɩ o yǝri kʋlʋkʋlʋ.
Wʋntʋ doŋ tiini o lagɩ sɩ o taa magɩ kantɔgɔ mʋ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri tɩn baŋa nɩ.
Kǝm dɩm kʋntʋ dwi mʋ pa nɔɔna wʋrʋ gwɩɩna dɩ ba donnǝ, yɩ kʋ pa nɔɔna jaanɩ daanɩ yɩ ba twɩ daanɩ, yɩ ba ta bʋŋɩ lwarɩm ba pa daanɩ, yɩ ba niǝ dɩ ba maŋɩ daanɩ.
Ba yǝni ba kɩ kʋntʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ ba jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-balwaarʋ mʋ, yɩ ba daa ba tɔgɩ cɩga cwǝŋǝ.
Kʋ maa paɩ ba bʋŋɩ nɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm yɩ woŋo kʋlʋ ba na wʋ́ na nadunni ka wʋnɩ tɩn mʋ.
Kʋ nan sɩɩnɩ kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ, Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm jɩgɩ nadunni zanzan kʋ paɩ balʋ na kɩ wʋpolo dɩ kʋlʋ ba na jɩgɩ tɩn.
Ba na lʋgɩ dɩbam tɩn, dɩ́ wʋ jaanɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ dɩ́ ba lʋgʋ baŋa.
Dɩ́ nan ta bá wanɩ dɩ́ ja kʋlʋkʋlʋ dɩ dɩ́ viiri.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, dɩ́ na jɩgɩ dɩ́ ni-wʋdiu dɩ́ di yɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ gwaarʋ dɩ́ zʋʋra, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taa jɩgɩ wʋpolo sɩ tɩntʋ maŋɩ dɩbam.
Kʋ daarɩ balʋ na lagɩ sɩ ba ji nadunǝ tɩn, sǝbu-laga mʋ yǝni ka ganɩ-ba kʋ pa ba tʋ maŋɩm wʋnɩ.
Kʋ maa paɩ ba fra zʋʋrɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ zanzan tɩlʋ na wʋ́ cɔgɩ-ba tɩn.
Kǝm dɩm kʋntʋ mʋ yǝni kʋ paɩ ba yáalɩ ba cɔgɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ sǝbu-swǝnǝ mʋ yɩ lwarɩm dwi maama pulim je.
Nɔɔna badaara wʋra ba na pɛ ba wʋbʋŋa zʋ sǝbu-lagɩ yɩ ba yagɩ Wɛ cɩga kam, kʋ pa ba jɩgɩ ba tɩtɩ ba yaarɩ zanzan.
Kʋ daarɩ nmʋ Timoti na yɩ Wɛ nɔɔnʋ tɩn, n maŋɩ sɩ n ja n tɩtɩ mʋ dɩdaanɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ.
Kɩ n tɩtɩ n kɩ daanɩ sɩ n ta n tɔgɩ cɩga, sɩ n sɛ Wɛ ni, sɩ n kɩ n wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ, sɩ n ta n jɩgɩ sono dɩ pu-dɩa dɩ wʋ-bono.
Pʋʋrɩ n yɩra n ta n tɔgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ lanyɩranɩ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ nmʋ wʋ́ joŋi ŋwɩa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ.
Ŋwɩa kam kʋntʋ mʋ Wɛ bǝŋi-m sɩ n ba n joŋi, dɩ nmʋ dɛɛn na zaŋɩ n zɩgɩ nɔn-kɔgɔ kʋm yigǝ nɩ n pa ba lwarɩ nɩ nmʋ tɔgɩ cɩga cwǝŋǝ kam tɩn.
Zezi Krisi tɩtɩ dɛɛn zɩgɩ Pɔnsɩ Pilatɩ yigǝ nɩ o pa o lwarɩ nɩ wʋm tɔgɩ cɩga cwǝŋǝ kam mʋ.
A nan lagɩ a ta dɩ nmʋ Zezi yigǝ nɩ, dɩdaanɩ Wɛ dɩlʋ na paɩ woŋo dwi maama ŋwɩa tɩn yigǝ nɩ, nɩ n maŋɩ sɩ n sɛ cɩga kam kʋntʋ sɩ n yɩ yagɩ-ka dɩ fɩnfɩɩn dɩ, sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ wanɩ o na n wo-lɔŋɔ o ta, sɩ kʋ vu kʋ yi dɛ dɩm dɩbam Yuutu Zezi Krisi na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn.
Maŋa kalʋ na maŋɩ tɩn na yiǝ, Wʋpolo Tu Baŋa-Wɛ dɩlʋ yɩranɩ na yɩ dam-fɔrɔ tu tɩn laan wʋ́ pa Zezi Krisi joori o ba.
Wɛ mʋ yɩ pwa maama Pɛ dɩ yum tiinǝ maama Yuutu.
Dɩntʋ yɩranɩ mʋ ŋwɩ maŋa kalʋ na ba jɩgɩ pulim dɩ gurim tɩn.
DƖ nan zʋʋrɩ pooni dɩlʋ na tiini dɩ daga tɩn wʋnɩ mʋ, yɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ bá wanɩ o twɛ da.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ tǝrǝ o na nɛ-DƖ, yɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ nan daa ta bá wanɩ o na-DƖ.
Dɩntʋ mʋ maŋɩ tiǝ dɩ zulǝ dɩ dam dɩlʋ na ba ti tɩn.
Amina.
Kʋ na yɩ balʋ na yɩ nadunǝ lʋgʋ kʋntʋ baŋa nɩ tɩn, n maŋɩ sɩ n kaanɩ-ba sɩ ba yɩ taa bʋŋɩ kamunni ba pa ba tɩtɩ.
Ba wʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba tɩɩgɩ ba jɩjɩgɩrʋ tɩm, bɛŋwaanɩ tɩ nyɩ dɩ viu mʋ.
Ba nan maŋɩ sɩ ba kwe ba wʋbʋŋa maama ba pa Wɛ mʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ dɩntʋ mʋ yǝni DƖ pa dɩbam woŋo maama yɩ kʋ yi dɩbam, sɩ dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ́ di ywǝǝni.
Kaanɩ-ba sɩ ba taa kɩ lanyɩranɩ, sɩ ba tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna ji ba nadunni, sɩ ba taa jɩgɩ wʋ-yoŋo sɩ ba taa ma ba wǝǝnu tɩm ba zǝni daanɩ.
Ba na kɩ kʋntʋ, kʋ brɩ nɩ ba tiŋi ba nadunni cɩga cɩga mʋ ba pa ba tɩtɩ jwa ŋwaanɩ, yɩ kʋʋ́ pa ba na ŋwɩa kalʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ.
A bu Timoti, fɔgɩ n ta n nii kʋlʋ maama Wɛ na kwe DƖ kɩ nmʋ jɩŋa nɩ tɩn baŋa nɩ.
Ja n tɩtɩ dɩdaanɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ nɔɔna na bʋŋɩ nɩ tɩ yɩ yi-pʋrʋ yɩ tɩ daɩ tɩn.
Tɩntʋ mʋ yɩ bɩtar-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ na ba wǝli Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɩn dɩdaanɩ taana yalʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri tɩn.
Nɔɔna badaara mʋ wʋra ba na paɩ ba jɩgɩ yi-pʋrʋ kʋm kʋntʋ, yɩ kʋ laan pa ba ywǝri Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ.
Wɛ wʋ́ pa abam yu-yoŋo.
Tɔnɔ kʋlʋ Pooli na pʋpʋnɩ o pa Timoti o kɩ bɩle tɩn na brɩ dɩbam kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ Pooli na pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ o pa Timoti maŋa kalʋ nɩ tɩn, o wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ mʋ Rom nɩ.
Kʋ dɛɛn cana zanzan kʋ pa-o , yɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ tǝrǝ o na zǝn-o .
Pooli ŋwɩa kam laan na twɛ ka tiim jǝgǝ tɩn, o ma kwe wʋlʋ na tɔgɩ dɩd-o o tʋŋɩ yɩ o so-o lanyɩranɩ tɩn.
Pooli dɛ yigǝ o kɩ Wɛ le Timoti ŋwaanɩ.
O laan ma kaanɩ Timoti sɩ o taa zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ sɩ o taa kwaanɩ o tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam lanyɩranɩ, dɩ nɔɔna na maŋɩ ba yaar-o Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam ŋwaanɩ dɩ .
Pooli ta ma kaan-o sɩ o cɩ nɔɔna balʋ na magɩ kantɔgɔ kafɛ yɩ kʋ ba zǝni Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam tɩn.
O ma ta dɩ Timoti sɩ o lwǝni wʋm kikiǝ na yɩ te tɩn, sɩ o taa tɔgɩ cɩga dɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ sono dɩ wʋ-zuru, sɩ o yɩ swe zaasɩm-ŋʋm dɩlʋ o na nɛ tɩn .
Tɔnɔ kʋm tiim nɩ o laan ma brɩ o tɩtɩ na yaarɩ te dɩ Wɛ na zǝn-o te tɩn .
Amʋ Pooli na yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ tɩn mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ a pa nmʋ Timoti.
Wɛ tɩtɩ mʋ kuri-nɩ dɩ DƖ wʋbʋŋa sɩ a taa yɩ DƖ tɩntʋŋnʋ, sɩ a pa nɔɔna lwarɩ nɩ Wɛ goni ni sɩ DƖ pa-ba ŋwɩa, ba na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Nmʋ Timoti yɩ a bu-sono mʋ.
Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa nmʋ yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo, yɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ duri nmʋ ŋwaŋa.
Pooli na kɩ Wɛ le yɩ o pa Timoti na baarɩ te tɩn Amʋ nan kɩ Wɛ dɩlʋ a na tʋŋɩ a pa-DƖ yɩ a ye a bɩcarɩ nɩ nɩ kʋ lamma tɩn le, nɩ a nabaara bam dɩ dɛɛn na tʋŋɩ ba pa-DƖ te tɩn.
A maa yǝni a loori-DƖ maŋa maama wɩa dɩ tɩtɩɩ, yɩ a guli nmʋ gulǝ a Wɛ-loro kʋm wʋnɩ.
A guli nmʋ yi-na bam woŋo dɩbam na pwɛ da-tee nɩ maŋa kalʋ tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ a tiini a lagɩ sɩ a joori a ba a na nmʋ, sɩ a wanɩ a taa jɩgɩ wʋpolo lanyɩranɩ.
Amʋ wʋ swe nɩ n kɩ n wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi cɩga cɩga, nɩ n nu-nakwɩ Loyisi dɩ n nu Yunisi dɩ dɛɛn na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi te tɩn.
A ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ nmʋ dɩ yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ a lagɩ sɩ n guli a dɛɛn na daŋɩ a jɩa nmʋ baŋa nɩ yɩ Wɛ pa nmʋ zǝnǝ yalʋ tɩn.
Nan fɔgɩ n nii pɛɛrɩ dɩm kʋntʋ baŋa nɩ, sɩ n ta n ma n tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam lanyɩranɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ dɩ́ daa bá ta kwarɩ fʋʋnɩ, Wɛ na zǝni dɩbam dɩ DƖ Joro kʋm tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ paɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ baarɩ dɩ sono, yɩ dɩ́ waɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ dɩ́ jaana.
Yɩ ta n kwarɩ cavɩɩra sɩ n ta dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi cɩga kam n brɩ nɔɔna.
Yɩ pa fʋʋnɩ zʋ-m dɩ ba na kɩ amʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ Zezi cɩga kam ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Kʋ nan maŋɩ sɩ n dɩ sɛ yaara mʋ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam zaasɩm dɩm ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ wʋ́ pa-m baarɩ yaara yam wʋnɩ.
Dɩntʋ mʋ vrɩ dɩbam yɩ DƖ bǝŋi dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ taá yɩ DƖ nɔɔna, sɩ kʋ daɩ dɩbam tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ yɩ DƖ tɩtɩ mʋ maŋɩ DƖ lɩ wʋbʋŋa kʋ loori lʋgʋ pulim, sɩ DƖ pa dɩ́ tɔgɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ dɩ́ na vrɩm zaanɩ.
Wɛ laan mʋ nan pɛ dɩ́ na DƖ zaanɩ dɩm kʋntʋ dɩ́ Vɩrnʋ Zezi Krisi na tu lʋgʋ baŋa tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wʋntʋ mʋ cɔgɩ tʋʋnɩ dam, yɩ o daarɩ o tɔgɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam ŋwaanɩ o pa dɩ́ lwarɩ nɩ dɩ́ wʋ́ na ŋwɩa kalʋ na bá ti tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ.
Wɛ nan mʋ pɛ a ji DƖ tɩntʋŋnʋ sɩ a taa tɔɔlɩ DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ, sɩ a brɩ nɔɔna DƖ cɩga kam.
Kʋ yɩ kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ a nɛ yaara yam kʋntʋ.
A nan ba kwarɩ cavɩɩra.
Bɛŋwaanɩ amʋ ye nɩ a kɩ a wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi mʋ, yɩ a ye nɩ wʋntʋ wʋ́ wanɩ o nii kʋlʋ maama Wɛ na kwe DƖ kɩ a jɩŋa nɩ tɩn baŋa nɩ, sɩ kʋ taa ve dɛ dɩm o na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn.
Nan fɔgɩ n ta n tɔgɩ cɩga kalʋ a na maŋɩ a brɩ nmʋ tɩn sɩ n ma n zaasɩ nɔɔna, sɩ n kwǝri n ta n jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ sono n na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Fɔgɩ n ta n nii cɩga kalʋ Wɛ na kwe DƖ kɩ nmʋ jɩŋa nɩ tɩn baŋa nɩ dɩ Wɛ Joro kʋlʋ na ŋwɩ dɩbam wʋnɩ tɩn dam, sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ cɔgɩ-ka.
Nmʋ maŋɩ n ye nɩ Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ maama na zʋʋrɩ Azi tɩɩnɩ dɩm nɩ tɩn joori amʋ kwaga nɩ, kʋ wǝli dɩ Fizɛɛlɩ dɩ Ɛrmɔzɛnɩ.
Wɛ nan wʋ́ duri Onisifɔɔrɩ dɩ o sɔŋɔ tiinǝ maama ŋwaŋa, bɛŋwaanɩ wʋntʋ mʋ yǝni o paɩ a jɩgɩ wʋ-zuru.
Ba na kɩ-nɩ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ tɩn, o wʋ kwarɩ cavɩɩra sɩ o zǝni-nɩ.
O nan na tu o yi Rom maŋa kalʋ tɩn, o tiini o kwaanɩ o beeri amʋ je mʋ taan, yɩ o laan ba o na-nɩ.
Wɛ nan wʋ́ duri o ŋwaŋa sarɩya dɛ dɩm nɩ.
Nmʋ maŋɩ n ye lanyɩranɩ Onisifɔɔrɩ na tiini o zǝni amʋ te Efɛɛzɩ nɩ tɩn.
Zezi Krisi tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋm na maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ te tɩn A bu Timoti, ta n zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ Zezi Krisi na pɛ nmʋ yu-yoŋo yɩ n ŋwɩ dɩd-o tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Cɩga kalʋ maama a na yǝni a brɩ nmʋ nɔn-kɔgɔ kʋm maama yigǝ nɩ tɩn, n dɩ ma-ka n brɩ nɔɔna balʋ na tɔgɩ cɩga tɩn, sɩ ba dɩ daa wanɩ ba maa brɩ nɔɔna badonnǝ ba wǝli da.
Nmʋ na tʋŋɩ n pa Zezi Krisi tɩn, n maŋɩ sɩ n dɩ sɛ yaara mʋ, nɩnɛɛnɩ pamaŋ-ŋʋm na sɛ yaara te tɩn.
Nɔɔnʋ na yɩ pamaŋnʋ yɩ o lagɩ sɩ o poli o yuutu wʋ, o daa wʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa kɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na daɩ pamaŋna tɩtʋŋa tɩn.
Kʋ ta nyɩ dɩ nɔɔnʋ na kwaanɩ o duri o di yigǝ te tɩn mʋ.
O na maŋɩ o duri o di yɩ o wʋ dɛ durim dɩm cwǝŋǝ cɩga cɩga, ba bá pa-o yigǝ tu pɛɛrɩ dɩm.
Kʋ ta nyɩ dɩ nɔɔnʋ na yɩ valʋ yɩ o tiini o tʋŋɩ te tɩn mʋ.
Wʋntʋ mʋ maŋɩ sɩ o da yigǝ o na o wo-vaalʋ tɩm biǝ.
Bʋŋɩ n nii a na tɛ kʋlʋ tɩn.
Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi wʋ́ pa n lwarɩ woŋo maama kuri n ti.
Ta n guli Zezi Krisi na yɩ Pɛ Davidi dwi tu tɩn gulǝ.
Wʋntʋ mʋ bi o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ, nɩ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kalʋ a na yǝni a tɔɔlɩ tɩn na brɩ te tɩn.
Amʋ na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ tɩn mʋ pɛ a wʋ yaara wʋnɩ, yɩ ba vɔ-nɩ dɩ capʋnnʋ nɩ a yɩ ŋwɩɩnʋ mʋ te.
Ba nan bá wanɩ ba cɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam sɩ ka yɩ jagɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ a sɛ yaara dwi maama, sɩ kʋ wanɩ kʋ wǝli nɔɔna balʋ Wɛ na kuri sɩ ba taa yɩ DƖ nɔɔna tɩn, sɩ ba tɔgɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ ba na vrɩm dɩ zulǝ yalʋ na bá ti tɩn.
Taanɩ dɩlʋ a na lagɩ a ta tɩn yɩ cɩga mʋ: Dɩ́ na tɔgɩ dɩ Zezi dɩ́ tɩ, dɩ́ ta wʋ́ tɔgɩ dɩd-o dɩ́ na ŋwɩa.
Dɩ́ na fɔgɩ dɩ́ zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ cam wʋnɩ, dɩ́ wʋ́ tɔgɩ dɩd-o dɩ́ di paarɩ.
Dɩ́ nan na vɩ-o, o dɩ wʋ́ vɩn dɩbam mʋ.
Dɩbam nan na maŋɩ dɩ́ ba jɩgɩ cɩga, wʋntʋ ta yɩ cɩga tu mʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ wʋm ba joori o kwanɩ o ni.
Dɩ́ na wʋ́ ta tʋŋɩ te sɩ kʋ poli Wɛ wʋ tɩn Ta n guli amʋ zaasɩm dɩm n brɩ Zezi nɔɔna bam, sɩ n daarɩ n kaanɩ-ba lanyɩranɩ dɩ Wɛ yɩrɩ, sɩ ba yɩ taa magɩ kantɔgɔ kʋlʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri tɩn bɩtarɩ baŋa nɩ, sɩ kʋ cɔgɩ balʋ dɩ na cǝgi tɩn wʋbʋŋa mʋ.
Kwaanɩ n tʋŋɩ dɩ yawala sɩ kʋ poli Wɛ wʋ, sɩ cavɩɩra yɩ ja-m DƖ yigǝ nɩ dɩ kʋlʋ n na tʋŋɩ tɩn, sɩ n kwaanɩ n ta n brɩ nɔɔna Wɛ cɩga kam lanyɩranɩ.
Ja n tɩtɩ dɩ bɩtar-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ na ba wǝli Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɩn.
Balʋ na ŋɔɔnɩ-sɩ tɩn paɩ nɔɔna fɔgɩ ba joori ba maŋɩ kwaga nɩ mʋ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ.
Ba na karɩ ba brɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩm kʋntʋ tɩn, tɩ wʋ́ loŋi tɩ jagɩ je maama, nɩnɛɛnɩ nɔɔnʋ na jɩgɩ nasɩncɔgɔ yɩ kʋ woori kʋ wǝli da te tɩn.
Yimene dɩ Filɛtɩ mʋ tɔgɩ ba wʋ nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ wʋnɩ.
Ba tusi cɩga cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ yɩ ba tɛ ba wɩ, Wɛ daa bá bi nɔɔna DƖ pa ba yagɩ tʋʋnɩ, sɩ twa biim maŋɩ kʋ kɛ.
Ba zaasɩm dɩm kʋntʋ ma pa balʋ na sɛ Wɛ tɩn badonnǝ wʋbʋŋa joori ya lǝni.
Kʋ daarɩ balʋ na yɔɔrɩ ba tɔgɩ Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn wʋbʋŋa ba zaɩ.
Bantʋ nyɩ dɩ digǝ kuri mʋ Wɛ na fɔgɩ DƖ cwi lanyɩranɩ.
Kuri dɩm kʋntʋ ba gɔɛ, yɩ kʋ pʋpʋnɩ da kʋ wɩ: «Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ye balʋ na yɩ o nɔɔna tɩn.» Kʋ ta pʋpʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Wʋlʋ maama na sɛ nɩ o yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nɔɔnʋ tɩn maŋɩ sɩ o yagɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ mʋ.» Kʋ nyɩ dɩ sɔ-fɔrɔ wʋnɩ kabǝli dɩ zwɩ dwi tǝri tǝri na wʋra te tɩn mʋ.
Sɩdonnǝ yɩ can-na mʋ ba mɛ ba kɩ, dɩ sǝbu-sɩŋa.
Sɩntʋ yɩ lʋnnɩ nyɩm mʋ.
Sɩdonnǝ maa yɩ dɛ naa dɔgɔ mʋ ba mɛ ba kɩ, yɩ ba maɩ sɩntʋ mʋ ba tʋŋa.
Kʋ brɩ nɩ, nɔɔnʋ na jɩgɩ o tɩtɩ dɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩm kʋntʋ, kʋ tu wʋ́ ta yɩ lʋnnɩ nyɩm mʋ Wɛ tee nɩ.
O yɩ wʋlʋ na kwe o tɩtɩ o kɩ o yuutu wʋm jɩŋa nɩ yɩ o jɩgɩ kuri o pa-o tɩn mʋ.
O maŋɩ sɩ o taa tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna yalʋ maama o yuutu wʋm na lagɩ tɩn mʋ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, cʋ n tɩtɩ dɩ kǝm-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ nɔn-dʋnnʋ wʋbʋŋa na yǝni ya zʋʋrɩ tɩn, sɩ n daarɩ n kwaanɩ n tɔgɩ cɩga cwǝŋǝ dɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ sono dɩ wʋ-zuru, sɩ n ta n tɔgɩ dɩ balʋ bɩcara na lana yɩ ba sɛ nɩ ba yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nɔɔna tɩn.
Fɔgɩ n cɩ n tɩtɩ dɩ jwǝri kantɔgɔ kʋlʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri tɩn.
Bɛŋwaanɩ nmʋ ye nɩ kʋ tui kʋ guri dɩ najara mʋ.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ nan na yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩntʋŋnʋ tɩn wʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ najajarʋ.
O maŋɩ sɩ o taa nɩgɩ nɔɔna maama lanyɩranɩ, sɩ o daarɩ o brɩ-ba cɩga dɩ wʋ-zuru.
O nan maŋɩ sɩ o zaasɩ balʋ na vɩn Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn dɩ wʋ-bono mʋ, sɩ kʋ waɩ kʋ kɩ sɩ Wɛ pa ba lǝni ba wʋbʋŋa sɩ ba joori ba sɛ DƖ cɩga kam.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, ba swan laan wʋ́ joori yɩ ba wanɩ ba vrɩ ba tɩtɩ sʋtaanɩ jɩŋa nɩ, dɩ ya na jaanɩ-ba nɩ cɩkʋ te yɩ dɩ pa ba kɩ dɩ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn.
Lɛɛrʋ na wʋ́ ba lʋgʋ baŋa tiim maŋa nɩ te tɩn Ta n ye nɩ lʋgʋ tiim maŋa nɩ lɛɛrʋ zanzan wʋ́ ba lʋgʋ baŋa.
Kantʋ maŋa kam nɩ nɔɔna wʋ́ ta wʋra ba na lagɩ wǝǝnu ba tɩtɩ zǝnǝ yɩranɩ má ŋwaanɩ, yɩ baá ta yɩ sǝbu-swǝn-nyɩna dɩ kamun-nyɩna, yɩ baá ta tee ba tɩtɩ.
Nɔɔna wʋ́ ta twɩ daanɩ yɩ ba ba sɛ ba tiinǝ niǝ, yɩ ba bá zuli balʋ na kɩ-ba lanyɩranɩ tɩn.
Baá ta yɩ nɔn-balwaarʋ yɩ ba ba nɩgɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na yɩ Wɛ nyɩm.
Nɔɔna bá ta soe daanɩ, yɩ ba bá ta jɩgɩ da-ŋwaŋa.
Baá ta yɩ bɩbarɩ-nyɩna yɩ ba ba lagɩ sɩ ba ja ba tɩtɩ, baá ta yɩ wʋ-lʋn-nyɩna, yɩ baá ta culi wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na lamma tɩn.
Nɔɔna wʋ́ ta tusi ba cilonnǝ, yɩ ba bá ta zuri ba yɩra dɩ lwarɩm kǝm.
Baá ta magɩ ba nyɔɔna ba brɩ ba tɩtɩ kamunni.
Baá ta soe ba wʋbʋŋa wǝǝnu ba dwe Baŋa-Wɛ.
Nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ wʋ́ ta kɩ nɩ ba tɔgɩ Wɛ cɩga kam mʋ te, yɩ Wɛ dam nan tǝri ba tee nɩ.
Fɔgɩ n cɩ n tɩtɩ dɩ nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ.
Nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ badaara yǝni ba sǝgi ba zʋʋrɩ sam mʋ ba ganɩ kaana balʋ na yɩ ka-kayɛ tɩn ba pa ba wʋbʋŋa cɔga.
Kaana bam kʋntʋ wʋ cɔgɩ dɩ ba kǝm-balwaarʋ zanzan, yɩ ba wʋbʋŋa paɩ ba tɔgɩ woŋo kʋlʋ maama ba fra na zʋ tɩn.
Kaana bam kʋntʋ tiini ba kwaanɩ ba zaasɩ mʋ maŋa maama, yɩ ba nan ba fɔgɩ ba lwarɩ cɩga.
Nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ kǝm dɩm nyɩ dɩ Zanɛsɩ dɩ Zambrɛsɩ dɛɛn na vɩn Moyisi ni faŋa faŋa te tɩn mʋ.
Ba dɩ vɩn Wɛ cɩga kam mʋ.
Ba jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-balwaarʋ mʋ, yɩ ba Wɛ tɔgɩm dɩm yɩ kafɛ.
Ba nan daa bá wanɩ ba vu yigǝ dɩ ba gana yam.
Bɛŋwaanɩ nɔɔna maama wʋ́ ba lwarɩ ba jwǝrim dɩm jaja, nɩnɛɛnɩ kʋ dɛɛn na kɩ Zanɛsɩ dɩ Zambrɛsɩ te tɩn.
Wɛ cɩga kam na jɩgɩ zǝnǝ lanyɩranɩ te tɩn Kʋ nan na yɩ nmʋ Timoti, n maŋɩ n ye amʋ zaasɩm dɩm dɩ a ŋwɩa dɩ a wʋbʋŋa na yɩ te tɩn.
Nmʋ nan ta ye a na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ te tɩn, yɩ n ta ye a na jɩgɩ wʋ-zuru dɩ sono dɩ pu-dɩa dɩ te tɩn.
Nmʋ nan ta ye nɔɔna na bɛɛsɩ-nɩ yɩ a yaarɩ te tɩn.
Nmʋ ye wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama na kɩ amʋ Antɩɔsɩ nɩ dɩ Yikon dɩ Lisitri nɩ, yɩ dɩ kʋ dɩ, a ta wʋ yagɩ Wɛ cɩga kam.
Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nan mʋ vrɩ-nɩ yaara yam kʋntʋ maama wʋnɩ.
Kʋntʋ, balʋ maama na lagɩ sɩ ba taa tɔgɩ Zezi Krisi dɩ cɩga tɩn dɩ wʋ́ na bɛɛsɩm.
Kʋ daarɩ, kʋ na yɩ nɔn-balwaarʋ dɩ kampin-nyɩna bam, bantʋ lwarɩm dɩm wʋ́ tiini dɩ puli kʋ ja gaalɩ.
Baá ta ganɩ nɔɔna, yɩ baá ganɩ ba tɩtɩ dɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ kʋ na yɩ nmʋ, yɔɔrɩ n ta n tɔgɩ cɩga kalʋ nmʋ na maŋɩ n lwarɩ yɩ n kɩ n wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ ka tɩn, bɛŋwaanɩ nmʋ ye balʋ dɛɛn na brɩ-m wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ tɩn wʋ lanyɩranɩ.
N biini nɩ mʋ n maŋɩ n ye Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm na brɩ kʋlʋ tɩn.
Zaasɩm dɩm kʋntʋ wʋ́ wanɩ dɩ vɩɩrɩ-m yɩ n na swan yalʋ na wʋ́ pa n na vrɩm, n na kɩ n wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋlʋ maama na pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn, kʋ yɩ Wɛ Joro mʋ pɛ dɩbam yɩ kʋ jɩgɩ kuri kʋ pa dɩbam, sɩ kʋ taa brɩ nɔɔna cɩga, naa kʋ brɩ-ba nɩ ba tusi, naa kʋ kwe-ba sɩ ba da cwǝŋǝ, naa kʋ zaasɩ-ba ba na wʋ́ ta tɔgɩ cɩga cwǝŋǝ te tɩn, sɩ dɩbam balʋ na yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna tɩn laan yɔɔrɩ dɩ́ maŋɩ fasɩ, sɩ dɩ́ taá tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna dwi maama.
Timoti na maŋɩ sɩ o tʋŋɩ dɩ cɩga te tɩn Timoti, a lagɩ a ta nmʋ Wɛ dɩ Zezi Krisi yigǝ nɩ, sɩ n kwaanɩ n ta n tɔɔlɩ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam.
Zezi mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na wʋ́ ba o di naŋʋna dɩ twa maama sarɩya tɩn.
Oó joori o ba o di paarɩ nɔɔna tɩtarɩ nɩ.
Kʋntʋ, n maŋɩ sɩ n ta n tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam.
Nɔɔna na cǝgi naa ba zɩ ba cǝgi dɩ, sɩ n ta n kwaanɩ n brɩ-ba Wɛ cɩga kam.
Nan pa ba lwarɩ nɩ ba tusi mʋ sɩ ba joori ba tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ, sɩ n kaanɩ-ba, sɩ n daarɩ n pa ba taa jɩgɩ baarɩ, sɩ n ta n brɩ-ba lanyɩranɩ dɩ wʋ-zuru zanzan.
Bɛŋwaanɩ maŋa wʋ́ ba, yɩ nɔɔna daa bá sɛ ba taa cǝgi zaasɩm dɩlʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn.
Ba laan wʋ́ daarɩ ba taa tɔgɩ ba tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn mʋ, yɩ baá kikili vwan karanyɩna tiinǝ zanzan sɩ ba taa brɩ-ba wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama ba na lagɩ sɩ ba taa ni tɩn.
Ba laan wʋ́ sɩn ba zwa sɩ ba yɩ taa cǝgi Wɛ cɩga kam, yɩ ba daarɩ ba sɛ nabiinǝ sɩnswalɩ sɩlʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri tɩn.
Kʋ daarɩ nmʋ nan maŋɩ sɩ n ja n tɩtɩ mʋ wǝǝnu maama wʋnɩ.
Vɔ n wʋ yaara wʋnɩ.
Kwaanɩ n ta n tʋŋɩ sɩ n pa nɔɔna lwarɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam.
Tɩtʋŋɩ dɩlʋ maama Wɛ na kɩ nmʋ jɩŋa nɩ tɩn, sɩ n tʋŋɩ-dɩ lanyɩranɩ.
Kʋ nan na yɩ amʋ, amʋ ŋwɩa kam nyɩ nɩ ba na logi mun-na ba ma kɩ kaanɩm te tɩn mʋ.
Kʋ lagɩ kʋ ta nɩ maŋa kam yiǝ sɩ a vu Wɛ te.
A na tʋŋɩ a pa Wɛ te tɩn nyɩ dɩ a kwaanɩ a duri sɩ a di yigǝ mʋ te.
Amʋ kwaanɩ mʋ a pɩɩnɩ a tɩtɩ a duri taan a vu a yi kweelim je, yɩ a daa ta wʋ yagɩ Wɛ cɩga kam.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, amʋ pɛɛrɩ laan tigi Wɛ tee nɩ dɩ cǝgi-nɩ.
Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na wʋ́ tɔgɩ cɩga o ma di nabiinǝ taanɩ tɩn.
O ma wʋ́ kwe a pɛɛrɩ dɩm kʋntʋ o pa-nɩ sarɩya dɛ dɩm nɩ.
Kʋ nan daɩ amʋ yɩranɩ mʋ oó pa pɛɛrɩ dɩm kʋntʋ.
Oó pa balʋ maama dɩ na so-o yɩ ba jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ oó joori o ba tɩn mʋ.
Nan kwaanɩ lanyɩranɩ sɩ n ba amʋ te lɩla.
Bɛŋwaanɩ Demasɩ yagɩ amʋ, o fra na tiini ya zʋ zɩm lʋgʋ baŋa wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩm tɩn ŋwaanɩ, yɩ o daarɩ o vu Tesaloniki mʋ.
Kresan ma kɛ Galatɩ.
Titi dɩ ma kɛ Dalɩmatɩ.
Luki yɩranɩ mʋ wʋ a tee nɩ.
Nmʋ nan na maa n bɩɩna, sɩ n pa Marɩkɩ tɔgɩ o ba, bɛŋwaanɩ wʋntʋ wʋ́ wanɩ o wǝli-nɩ dɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam.
Kʋ daarɩ amʋ tʋŋɩ Tisiki Efɛɛzɩ nɩ mʋ.
Nmʋ na maa n bɩɩna, sɩ n kwe a gɔrɔ kʋm a na yagɩ Trʋasɩ nɩ Karɩpusi tee nɩ tɩn n ja n ba, dɩdaanɩ twaanʋ tɩm dɩ, kʋ na dwe dɩdɩ vara twaanʋ tɩlʋ ba na pʋpʋnɩ tɩ wʋnɩ ba pri tɩn.
Alɛsandrɩ wʋlʋ na yɩ yarʋ tɩn tiini o kɩ amʋ lwarɩm kʋ ja gaalɩ.
Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nan wʋ́ pa o na cam o kǝnǝ yam kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ.
N dɩ nan cʋ n tɩtɩ dɩd-o, bɛŋwaanɩ o kwaanɩ sɩ o cɔgɩ dɩbam na yǝni dɩ́ brɩ cɩga kalʋ tɩn mʋ.
Maŋa kalʋ a na puli sɩ a tʋlɩ a taanɩ dɩm sarɩya yam jǝgǝ kam nɩ tɩn, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ wʋ tu o zɩgɩ amʋ kwaga nɩ.
Ba maama duri mʋ ba daarɩ amʋ yɩranɩ.
Wɛ nan yɩ kwe ba taalɩ kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nan mʋ zǝni-nɩ, yɩ o pa-nɩ dam yɩ a ma wanɩ a tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam, yɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ maama ni-ka.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, Wɛ mʋ vrɩ amʋ tʋʋnɩ jɩŋa nɩ DƖ yagɩ.
Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nan wʋ́ vrɩ amʋ wo-lwaanʋ maama wʋnɩ, yɩ o daarɩ o ja-nɩ o vu o zʋ Wɛ paarɩ dɩm wʋnɩ dɩ yazurǝ.
Wʋntʋ mʋ maŋɩ dɩ zulǝ maŋa maama.
Amina.
Tiim kwǝrǝ Jɔɔnɩ Prisili dɩ Akwila n pa-nɩ, dɩdaanɩ Onisifɔɔrɩ dɩ o sɔŋɔ tiinǝ bam maama.
Erasɩtɩ maŋɩ Korɛntɩ nɩ mʋ.
Kʋ daarɩ amʋ yagɩ Trofim Mileti nɩ, o na ba jɩgɩ yazurǝ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kwaanɩ n kɩ lɩla n ba kʋ loori waarʋ mɩmaŋa.
Yubulusi dɩ Pudan dɩ Linusi dɩ Kloodɩa dɩ dɩ́ ko-biǝ bam maama jɔɔnɩ-m lanyɩranɩ.
Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm wʋ́ ta wʋra dɩ nmʋ.
Wɛ wʋ́ pa abam yu-yoŋo.
Tɔnɔ kʋlʋ Pooli na pʋpʋnɩ o pa Titi tɩn na brɩ dɩbam kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ Titi yɩ Zezi karabu mʋ o na daɩ Zwifu.
O dɛɛn tɔgɩ dɩ Pooli o tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam.
Maŋa kalʋ Pooli na pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ o pa-o tɩn, o wʋ Krɛtɩ nɩ mʋ, mɛ o na maŋɩ sɩ o nii Zezi nɔɔna bam baŋa nɩ sɩ woŋo maama taa yɩ lanyɩranɩ tɩn.
Pooli dɛ yigǝ o brɩ Wɛ nɔɔna yigǝ tiinǝ na maŋɩ sɩ ba taa yɩ te tɩn .
O ma ta brɩ Titi, o na wʋ́ kwe Wɛ nɔɔna bam dwi tǝri tǝri te tɩn, kʋ na yɩ nankwɩn dɩ kazɩna (sɩ bantʋ dɩ zaasɩ ka-dʋnnʋ tɩm), kʋ na yɩ bu-dʋnnʋ dɩ gambɛ maama .
O laan ma brɩ Wɛ nɔɔna bam na maŋɩ sɩ ba taa kɩ te tɩn, sɩ ba wanɩ ba taa zʋʋrɩ daanɩ dɩ ywǝǝni, sɩ kantɔgɔ dɩ kampwara yɩ zʋ ba tɩtarɩ .
Amʋ Pooli wʋlʋ na yɩ Wɛ gamba-sono dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ tɩn mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ sɩ a pa nmʋ Titi.
Wɛ mʋ pɛ sɩ a pa balʋ DƖ na kuri sɩ ba taa yɩ DƖ nɔɔna tɩn taa jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ, sɩ ba kwǝri ba lwarɩ DƖ cɩga kam.
Cɩga kam kʋntʋ nan mʋ paɩ nɔɔna ŋwɩ nɩ Wɛ na lagɩ te tɩn, sɩ ba wanɩ ba taa jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ baá na ŋwɩa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ.
Kʋ na loori lʋgʋ pulim tɩn, mʋ Wɛ maŋɩ DƖ go ni sɩ DƖ pa dɩbam ŋwɩa kam kʋntʋ, yɩ DƖ bá kwanɩ DƖ ni.
Kʋ daarɩ ka maŋa kam na yi tɩn, Wɛ ma pa dɩ́ lwarɩ DƖ taanɩ dɩm kʋntʋ kuri jaja.
Kʋ yɩ kwǝrǝ kam kʋntʋ mʋ Wɛ na yɩ dɩbam Vɩrnʋ tɩn pɛ amʋ ni sɩ a taa tɔɔlɩ a brɩ nɔɔna.
Nmʋ Titi yɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ amʋ tɩtɩ bu mʋ te, dɩ́ maama na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Vɩrnʋ Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa nmʋ yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo.
Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm nakwa na maŋɩ sɩ ba taa yɩ te tɩn Amʋ dɛɛn na yagɩ nmʋ Krɛtɩ nɩ tɩn, kʋ yɩ sɩ n kwaanɩ n kɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na daarɩ sɩ n kɩ tɩn mʋ.
Zezi nɔɔna bam na wʋ tɩʋ kʋlʋ maama nɩ tɩn, sɩ n lɩ nakwa tiinǝ da, nɩnɛɛnɩ a na maŋɩ a ta dɩ nmʋ te tɩn.
Nmʋ na lɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ tɩn, o maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ wʋlʋ nɔɔna na bá ta jɩgɩ o yɩra taanɩ tɩn mʋ.
O nan maŋɩ sɩ o taa jɩgɩ kaanɩ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ.
Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ o biǝ dɩ sɛ Wɛ, sɩ ba yɩ taa yɩ nɔn-kayɛ dɩ banɩ-nyɩna.
Bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ maŋɩ sɩ wʋlʋ na nii Zezi nɔɔna bam tɩn taa yɩ wʋlʋ nɔɔna na bá ta jɩgɩ o yɩra taanɩ tɩn mʋ, Wɛ na kɩ DƖ nɔɔna bam wʋntʋ jɩŋa nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
O wʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ bɩyɩrɩ-nyɩm, naa nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ banɩ na lʋmma tɩn, naa sa-nyɔrʋ naa najajarʋ, naa wʋlʋ na kɩ kampinǝ sɩ o ma na wǝǝnu tɩn.
Kʋ nan maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na jeeri vǝrǝ lanyɩranɩ tɩn.
O maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ nɔn-ŋʋm wʋlʋ na cʋ o tɩtɩ yɩ o tɔgɩ Wɛ dɩ cɩga yɩ o waɩ o tɩtɩ o jaana tɩn.
O maŋɩ sɩ o yɔɔrɩ o taa tɔgɩ taanɩ dɩlʋ na yɩ cɩga, nɩ dɩbam na maŋɩ dɩ́ brɩ abam te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ, oó wanɩ o brɩ nɔɔna badonnǝ sɩ ba taa tɔgɩ Wɛ cɩga kam kʋntʋ, yɩ o daarɩ o pa balʋ na vɩn Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn lwarɩ nɩ ba tusi mʋ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ banɩ-nyɩna zanzan mʋ wʋ abam tee nɩ, ba na yǝni ba ŋɔɔnɩ bɩtarɩ sɩlʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri tɩn ba ma ganɩ nɔɔna.
Ba zanzan mʋ yɩ balʋ na tiini ba sɛ ba Zwifǝ bam cullu tɩm tɩn.
Abam nan maŋɩ sɩ á pa ba pu ba niǝ mʋ dɩ ba zaasɩm dɩm kʋntʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ ba zaasɩm dɩm yǝni dɩ paɩ nɔɔna dɩ ba sɔŋɔ tiinǝ maama mʋ tusi Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ.
Ba yǝni ba brɩ kʋlʋ na wʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba brɩ nɔɔna tɩn mʋ, ba ma ganɩ-ba ba joŋi sǝbu.
Krɛtɩ tiinǝ bam tɩtɩ yiyǝn-yeenu dɛɛn mʋ tagɩ o wɩ: «Krɛtɩ tiinǝ yǝni ba fɔ vwan mʋ maŋa maama.
Ba nyɩ dɩ varɩ-balwaarʋ mʋ te, yɩ ba ta yɩ yawɔrɩ-nyɩna dɩ nɔn-kwǝǝlu dɩ.» O nan na tagɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ o taga.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ n maŋɩ sɩ n tiini n kaanɩ Krɛtɩ tiinǝ bam, sɩ kʋ pa ba yɔɔrɩ ba taa tɔgɩ Wɛ cɩga kam lanyɩranɩ, sɩ ba daa yɩ sɛ Zwifǝ bam sɩnswalɩ sɩlʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri tɩn, naa ba sɛ nabiinǝ tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa cullu tɩm ba na yagɩ cɩga kam yɩ ba daarɩ ba tɔgɩ tɩn.
Wʋlʋ maama na jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo tɩn, kʋlʋkʋlʋ ba jɩgɩ digiru wʋntʋ tee nɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ wʋlʋ na vɩn Wɛ yɩ o ba jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo tɩn, kʋlʋkʋlʋ tǝrǝ kʋ na lana wʋntʋ tee nɩ.
Kʋntʋ tu wʋbʋŋa cɔgɩ mʋ, yɩ o daa yǝri kʋlʋ na maŋɩ tɩn.
Nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ donnǝ nan tɛ ba wɩ, ba ye Wɛ mʋ, yɩ ba tɩtʋŋa laan yagɩ ya ba tɔgɩ Wɛ wʋbʋŋa.
Ba yɩ banɩ-nyɩna mʋ, yɩ ba tiini ba kɩ lwarɩm kʋ ja gaalɩ.
Ba warɩ kʋlʋ na lana tɩn ba kɩ.
Zaasɩm dɩlʋ na yɩ cɩga yɩ dɩ wǝli nɔɔna tɩn Kʋ daarɩ kʋ na yɩ nmʋ Titi, ta n brɩ nɔɔna bam kʋlʋ na maŋɩ dɩ cɩga zaasɩm dɩm tɩn.
Nmʋ maŋɩ sɩ n brɩ nankwɩn sɩ ba taa yɩrɩ ba tɩtɩ mʋ, sɩ ba kwǝri ba taa yɩ balʋ nɔɔna na nɩgɩ-ba tɩn, sɩ ba taa cʋ ba tɩtɩ, sɩ ba yɔɔrɩ ba sɛ Zezi dɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ sono dɩ pu-dɩa.
Nan brɩ kazɩna sɩ ba taa jɩgɩ ba tɩtɩ sɩ kʋ pa Wɛ na zulǝ ba tee nɩ, sɩ ba yɩ taa yɩ bɩbarɩ-nyɩna naa sa-nyɔra.
Ba nan maŋɩ sɩ ba taa kwe nɔɔna kwiǝ yalʋ na lana tɩn mʋ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ baá wanɩ ba brɩ ka-bwǝnǝ ba na wʋ́ ta soe ba banna dɩ ba biǝ te tɩn, sɩ ba daarɩ ba taa cʋ ba tɩtɩ, sɩ ba yɩ taa kɩ digiru, sɩ ba kwǝri ba taa yɩ ka-yʋʋrʋ tɩlʋ na tʋŋɩ sɔŋɔ tɩtʋŋa lanyɩranɩ yɩ ba sɛ ba banna ni tɩn.
Kʋntʋ, nɔɔna daa bá wanɩ ba yáalɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam.
Kʋ zɩ na yɩ nɔn-dʋnnʋ, sɩ n kwe-ba sɩ ba dɩ taa cʋ ba tɩtɩ woŋo maama wʋnɩ.
Kʋ nan na yɩ nmʋ tɩtɩ, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ n tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna yalʋ na wʋ́ brɩ nɔɔna sɩ ba dɩ tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ lanyɩranɩ tɩn, sɩ n daarɩ n brɩ-ba Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam lanyɩranɩ dɩ cɩga.
Pa n ni-taanɩ taa jɩgɩ cɩga, sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ wanɩ o yáalɩ-dɩ.
Kʋntʋ wʋ́ pa dɩbam dʋna na cavɩɩra, ba daa na bá na woŋo sɩ ba maa ŋɔɔnɩ ba cɔgɩ dɩbam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
N daarɩ n kwe gambɛ nɩ kʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba sɛ ba tiinǝ woŋo maama wʋnɩ, sɩ kʋ pa ba tiinǝ bam wʋ poli.
Ba yɩ vɩn ba tiinǝ bam ni.
Ba nan wʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba ŋɔ-ba.
Ba maŋɩ sɩ ba tʋŋɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ cɩga mʋ woŋo maama wʋnɩ, sɩ kʋ pa nɔɔna lwarɩ nɩ dɩbam Wɛ dɩlʋ na yɩ dɩ́ Vɩrnʋ tɩn zaasɩm dɩm lamma.
Bɛŋwaanɩ, Wɛ pɛ dɩ́ lwarɩ DƖ sono kʋm na dagɩ zanzan te, sɩ kʋ pa nɔɔna maama wanɩ ba na vrɩm DƖ tee nɩ.
DƖ ma daarɩ DƖ brɩ dɩbam nɩ kʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ yagɩ lwarɩm tɩtʋŋa maama dɩ lʋgʋ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ dɩ́ fra na zʋʋrɩ tɩn, sɩ dɩ́ taá cʋ dɩ́ tɩtɩ, sɩ dɩ́ taá tɔgɩ cɩga cwǝŋǝ, sɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ taá kwarɩ Wɛ lanyɩranɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ.
Kʋ nan maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ, sɩ dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ tɩɩna dɩ wʋpolo, sɩ dɩ́ cǝgi Zezi Krisi sɩ o joori o ba dɩ paarɩ zulǝ.
Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ dɩbam Wɛ dɩlʋ na yɩ kamunu yɩ o yɩ dɩ́ Vɩrnʋ tɩn.
Wʋntʋ mʋ sɛ o tɩ dɩbam ŋwaanɩ, sɩ o ma vrɩ dɩbam lwarɩm dwi maama wʋnɩ, sɩ o daarɩ o fɔgɩ o kwɛ dɩ́ bɩcara sɩ dɩ́ taá yɩ o tɩtɩ nɔɔna, sɩ dɩ́ taá kwaanɩ dɩ́ tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna.
Nan ta n brɩ nɔɔna wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ, sɩ n daarɩ n kwe-ba, sɩ n kwǝri n kaanɩ-ba, nɩ Wɛ na pɛ nmʋ ni sɩ n kɩ te tɩn.
Nan yɩ sɛ sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ gooni-m.
Wɛ nɔɔna na maŋɩ sɩ ba taa yɩ te tɩn Guli n brɩ nɔɔna bam nɩ ba maŋɩ sɩ ba taa nɩgɩ ba tɩʋ kʋm yigǝ tiinǝ dɩ balʋ na yɩ dɩdɛɛra tɩn, sɩ ba taa sɛ ba ni.
Ba nan maŋɩ sɩ ba taa tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna dwi maama mʋ.
Ba nan yɩ zaŋɩ ba twɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ, naa ba taa yɩ najajara.
Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba taa zuli nɔɔna mʋ, sɩ ba daarɩ ba taa jɩgɩ wʋ-bono dɩ nɔɔna maama.
Bɛŋwaanɩ dɩbam maama dɛɛn yɩ nayǝri-nyɩna mʋ, yɩ dɩ́ tusi, yɩ dɩ́ vɩn Wɛ ni.
Dɩbam fra dɛɛn mʋ te dɩbam, yɩ dɩ́ tɔgɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ maama dɩ́ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ tɩn.
Dɩ́ maa yǝni dɩ́ jɩgɩ pu-sɩŋa dɩ wʋ-gʋʋ yɩ dɩ́ culi daanɩ.
Nan dɩ kʋ dɩ, Wɛ dɩlʋ na yɩ dɩbam Vɩrnʋ tɩn brɩ jaja nɩ DƖ soe nabiinǝ lanyɩranɩ, yɩ DƖ vrɩ dɩbam lwarɩm wʋnɩ DƖ yagɩ.
Kʋ nan daɩ dɩbam na kɩ kǝm-laarʋ tɩn ŋwaanɩ, kʋ yɩ Wɛ na yɩ ŋwaŋa tu tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
DƖ ma pa DƖ Joro kʋm zarɩ wo-digiru tɩlʋ na wʋ dɩ́ bɩcara nɩ tɩn, yɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ pa dɩbam wʋbʋŋ-dʋʋra, sɩ dɩ́ na ŋwɩ-dʋŋa DƖ tee nɩ.
Kʋ maa yɩ dɩbam Vɩrnʋ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ mʋ Wɛ tʋŋɩ DƖ Joro kʋm DƖ pa dɩbam zaanɩ, sɩ dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ DƖ zaanɩ dɩm ŋwaanɩ, sɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ na Wɛ wo-laarʋ tɩm dɩ́ na yɩ DƖ biǝ yɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ dɩ́ wʋ́ na ŋwɩa kalʋ na ba ti DƖ tee nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
A na tagɩ taanɩ dɩlʋ tɩn yɩ cɩga mʋ.
Kʋntʋ, a lagɩ sɩ n kwaanɩ n brɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ lanyɩranɩ, sɩ kʋ pa balʋ na sɛ Wɛ tɩn tiini ba taa kɩ kǝm-laarʋ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ lana yɩ kʋ jɩgɩ kuri kʋ paɩ nɔɔna maama.
Kʋ daarɩ n maŋɩ sɩ n cɩ n tɩtɩ dɩ kantɔgɔ dwi maama, kʋ na yɩ bɩtar-yɔɔrʋ baŋa nɩ dɩ dɩ́ kwǝ dwi natɔga kam baŋa nɩ dɩ Zwifǝ bam cullu tɩm baŋa nɩ, sɩ tɩ ba jɩgɩ nyɔɔrɩ tɩ yɩ kafɛ mʋ.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na jaanɩ kampwara o tui nɔɔna tɩtarɩ nɩ tɩn, sɩ n kaanɩ kʋntʋ tu nɩnɛɛnɩ kuni bɩle te.
O ta na wʋ sɛ nmʋ taanɩ dɩm, sɩ á cɩ á tɩtɩ dɩd-o.
Bɛŋwaanɩ nmʋ ye nɩ, nɔɔnʋ na yɩ kʋntʋ doŋ, o daa ba lagɩ sɩ o tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ.
O tusim dɩm mʋ brɩ nɩ o bá na bʋra Wɛ tee nɩ.
A lagɩ a tʋŋɩ Aritimasɩ naa Tisiki mʋ nmʋ tee nɩ.
Ba wʋlʋ na yi nmʋ te tɩn, sɩ n kwaanɩ n ba amʋ te lɩla Nikopolisi nɩ, bɛŋwaanɩ a lɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ a maŋɩ dáanɩ mʋ sɩ waarʋ tɩm maŋa kɛ.
Nan kwaanɩ n wǝli Zenasɩ wʋlʋ na yɩ bɩtar-yeenu tɩn dɩ Apolɔsɩ ba cwǝŋǝ kam vǝŋǝ ŋwaanɩ, sɩ n pa-ba kʋlʋ maama na muri-ba tɩn.
Pa dɩ́ ko-biǝ bam taa ye nɩ kʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba tiini ba kwaanɩ ba taa kɩ kǝm-laarʋ mʋ, sɩ ba wanɩ ba zǝni balʋ na maŋɩ zǝnǝ tɩn.
Kʋntʋ mʋ wʋ́ pa ba ŋwɩa taa jɩgɩ kuri nɔɔna maama tee nɩ.
Dɩ́ ko-biǝ balʋ na wʋ amʋ tee nɩ tɩn maama jɔɔnɩ nmʋ.
Jɔɔnɩ balʋ maama na sɛ Zezi yɩ ba yɩ dɩbam cilon-sonnu tɩn n pa dɩbam.
Wɛ wʋ́ pa abam maama yu-yoŋo.
Tɔnɔ kʋlʋ Pooli na pʋpʋnɩ o pa Filimɔn tɩn na brɩ dɩbam kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ Filimɔn dɛɛn yɩ nɔn-kamunu mʋ, o na tu o kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi.
O yɩ Kolɔsɩ Wɛ kɔgɔ kʋm wʋ nɔɔnʋ dɩdʋa mʋ, o maa yɩ Pooli ciloŋ.
Kʋ yɩ Pooli dɛɛn mʋ brɩ-o Wɛ cɩga kam yɩ o sɛ.
Filimɔn dɛɛn ma jɩgɩ gambaa, ka yɩrɩ mʋ Onisim, yɩ o gambaa kam duri ka viiri ka daar-o.
Pooli na wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ maŋa kalʋ tɩn, mʋ Onisim ve o te.
Pooli maa ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ taanɩ dɩd-o, yɩ o kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi.
Pooli laan ma tʋŋ-o sɩ o joori o vu o yuutu wʋm te.
Pooli ma pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋm o pa o ciloŋ Filimɔn, o ma loor-o sɩ o yagɩ kʋlʋ maama Onisim na kɩ tɩn o maa cɛ-o.
Kantʋ maŋa kam nɩ, gambaa na duri ka viiri yɩ ka yuutu wʋm na joori o na-o, oó pa ka na cam zanzan mʋ kʋ ja gaalɩ.
Pooli laan ma loori Filimɔn sɩ o daa yɩ joŋ-o nɩ o gambaa má te, o laan nan taa nii-o nɩ o yɩ o ko-bu mʋ te Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ.
Amʋ Pooli wʋlʋ na wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ Zezi Krisi cɩga kam ŋwaanɩ tɩn mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ, yɩ dɩ́ ko-bu Timoti wʋ amʋ tee nɩ.
Dɩ́ pʋpʋnɩ dɩ́ pa nmʋ Filimɔn, n na yɩ dɩbam ciloŋ-sono yɩ n tɔgɩ dɩ dɩbam n tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa tɩn mʋ.
Dɩ́ jɔɔnɩ-m, yɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ jɔɔnɩ dɩ́ ko-bu-kana Apɩa, dɩ Arisipi wʋlʋ na wǝli dɩ dɩbam o na cam Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ jɔɔnɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋlʋ na yǝni kʋ jeeri daanɩ nmʋ sɔŋɔ nɩ tɩn maama.
Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo.
Maŋa maama amʋ na yǝni a loori Wɛ, a guli nmʋ gulǝ DƖ yigǝ nɩ, yɩ a kɩ DƖ le nmʋ ŋwaanɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ amʋ ni nɩ n jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi yɩ n soe Wɛ nɔɔna bam maama lanyɩranɩ.
Wɛ wʋ́ pa nmʋ na jɩgɩ wǝl-dɔnɔ kʋlʋ dɩ dɩbam n na kɩ n wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn pa n wanɩ n lwarɩ wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ maama Wɛ na kɩ DƖ pa dɩbam Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
A ko-bu-sono, nmʋ na soe Wɛ nɔɔna bam te tɩn mʋ paɩ a wʋ poli zanzan, yɩ kʋ pa a jɩgɩ baarɩ, bɛŋwaanɩ n wǝli Wɛ nɔɔna bam yɩ n pa ba na baarɩ dɩ wʋpolo.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ amʋ lagɩ a loori nmʋ sɩ n kɩ kʋlʋ na maŋɩ sɩ n kɩ tɩn mʋ.
Amʋ ya jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ a da Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ a pa nmʋ ni, sɩ n lwarɩ n na wʋ́ kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn.
A nan lagɩ sɩ a loori-m dɩ sono mʋ.
Amʋ Pooli wʋlʋ na yɩ nankwɩan yɩ ba kɩ-nɩ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ lele kʋntʋ Zezi Krisi cɩga kam ŋwaanɩ tɩn, a lagɩ a loori-m nmʋ gambaa Onisim ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
A na wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ tɩn, o tu amʋ te, yɩ a brɩ-o Wɛ cɩga kam yɩ o sɛ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, wʋntʋ laan nyɩ nɩ a tɩtɩ bu mʋ te.
O dɛɛn na tʋŋɩ o pa nmʋ maŋa kalʋ tɩn, o wʋ pɛ n na nyɔɔrɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ lele kʋntʋ, o laan jɩgɩ nyɔɔrɩ o pa amʋ dɩ nmʋ maama.
A lagɩ a tʋŋ-o sɩ o joori o ba nmʋ te, wʋntʋ yɩ a tɩtɩ bɩcarɩ mʋ.
Amʋ na wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam ŋwaanɩ tɩn, a yaá ta lagɩ sɩ o maŋɩ a tee nɩ mʋ, sɩ o lǝni nmʋ yuu nɩ o taa tʋŋɩ o pa-nɩ.
A nan ba lagɩ sɩ a kɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ yɩ nmʋ na wʋ sɛ.
A na kɩ kʋntʋ, kʋʋ́ ta yɩ nɩ a fɩn nmʋ sɩ n wǝli-nɩ, sɩ kʋ daɩ n tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa.
Onisim na duri o yagɩ nmʋ tɩn, dɛ doŋ kʋ yɩ sɩ o pɔɔrɩ dɩ nmʋ maŋa fɩnfɩɩn yɩranɩ mʋ, sɩ o laan joori o ba o taa wʋ nmʋ tee nɩ maŋa maama.
O na duri o yagɩ nmʋ tɩn, o dɛɛn yɩ gambaa mʋ.
O na joori o ba, yɩ zaŋɩ n nii-o nɩ gambaa te, sɩ o laan dwe gambaa o na jigi nmʋ ko-bu dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Amʋ tiini a so-o.
Nmʋ dɩ nan wʋ́ ta n tiini n so-o kʋ ja gaalɩ, o na yɩ n gambaa yɩ o kwǝri o yɩ n ko-bu dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Nmʋ na sɛ nɩ dɩbam sɩɩnɩ dɩ́ yɩ ciloŋo daanɩ, sɩ n kwaanɩ n jeeri Onisim lanyɩranɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ amʋ tɩtɩ te.
O dɛɛn na maŋɩ o kɩ woŋo kʋlʋ o cɔgɩ dɩ, naa o na jɩgɩ nmʋ jɩnɩ, sɩ n yagɩ kʋ maama dɩ amʋ.
Amʋ Pooli tɩtɩ mʋ mɛ a jɩŋa a pʋpʋnɩ tɩntʋ nɩ: Amʋ wʋ́ ŋwɩ jɩnɩ dɩm.
(Kʋ daarɩ nmʋ nan maŋɩ n ye nɩ, n jɩgɩ amʋ jɩnɩ zanzan, dɩ nmʋ na nɛ ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ amʋ na brɩ nmʋ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.)
A ko-bu, kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ, a lagɩ sɩ n kɩ woŋo kʋlʋ a na loori-m tɩn mʋ dɩ́ Yuutu sono kʋm ŋwaanɩ, sɩ n pa a taa jɩgɩ wʋpolo Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ.
Amʋ na pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ a pa nmʋ tɩn, a ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ nmʋ wʋ́ sɛ a wʋbʋŋa yam.
A ta ye nɩ nmʋ wʋ́ kɩ n dwǝni a na loori kʋlʋ tɩn.
Kʋlʋ na wǝli da tɩn, a loori-m sɩ n kwaanɩ n lagɩ digǝ, sɩ a na tuǝ, sɩ a taa tigi da.
Bɛŋwaanɩ a jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ Wɛ wʋ́ sɛ abam na loori-DƖ amʋ ŋwaanɩ te tɩn, yɩ DƖ wʋ́ pʋrɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ a joori a ba abam te.
Epafrasɩ dɩ jɔɔnɩ-m. Wʋntʋ dɩdaanɩ amʋ mʋ wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ Zezi Krisi cɩga kam ŋwaanɩ.
Marɩkɩ dɩ Arisarɩkɩ dɩ Demasɩ dɩ Luki maama dɩ jɔɔnɩ-m. Bantʋ dɩ amʋ mʋ tɔgɩ daanɩ dɩ́ tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam.
Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam yu-yoŋo.
Tɔnɔ kʋlʋ ba na pʋpʋnɩ ba pa Ebru tiinǝ tɩn na brɩ dɩbam kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ Ebru tiinǝ yɩ Zwifǝ bam yɩrɩ dɩdoŋ mʋ.
Dɩ́ yǝri wʋlʋ na pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ tɩn.
O nan pʋpʋnɩ o pa Zezi nɔɔna balʋ na nɛ yaara zanzan tɩn mʋ.
O ma pʋpʋnɩ sɩ ba yɩ yagɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm.
O ma pa ba na baarɩ sɩ ba taa zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ, dɩ ba na lwarɩ nɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn na dwe woŋo maama te tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Tɔnɔ kʋm dɛ yigǝ kʋ brɩ nɩ Wɛ tɔgɩ DƖ Bu Zezi ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ brɩ DƖ tɩtɩ dɩ nabiinǝ, yɩ Wɛ daa bá wǝli kʋlʋkʋlʋ kʋntʋ baŋa nɩ.
Zezi nan dwe Wɛ nijoŋnǝ balʋ dɛɛn na wʋra tɩn, o dwe Wɛ malɛsɩ sɩm, o dwe Moyisi dɩ Zozwe dɩ .
Zezi dwe Wɛ kaanɩm tiinǝ balʋ dɛɛn na wʋra tɩn, o yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm tu wʋlʋ na wʋra maŋa maama tɩn mʋ.
Zezi na dwe Wɛ kaanɩm tiinǝ bam maama tɩn mʋ paɩ nɔɔna naɩ vrɩm cɩga cɩga lwarɩm dɩ tʋʋnɩ wʋnɩ.
Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ dɛɛn na yǝni ba ma varɩm ba kaanɩ ba pa Wɛ tɩn, kʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi tʋʋnɩ dɩm nyɩnyʋgʋ mʋ .
Tɔnɔ kʋm tiim jǝgǝ nɩ kʋ pɛ nɔɔna bam baarɩ mʋ, sɩ ba taa ve yigǝ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ.
Kʋ brɩ faŋa faŋa Wɛ nɔɔna bam na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ te tɩn, yɩ kʋ kwe balʋ na wʋ́ karɩmɩ-kʋ tɩn sɩ ba tɩɩgɩ Zezi yɩranɩ, sɩ ba taa nii Zezi sɩ ba taa tɔg-o dɩ ba wʋ maama, sɩ ba sɛ cam dɩ yaara, sɩ ba zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ sɩ kʋ vu kʋ yi kweelim dɛ .
Wɛ tɔgɩ DƖ Bu Zezi ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ ŋɔɔnɩ dɩ dɩbam Faŋa faŋa tɩn, Wɛ dɛɛn ŋɔɔnɩ dɩ dɩbam nabaara bam kuni zanzan mʋ.
DƖ dɛɛn yǝni DƖ pa DƖ nijoŋnǝ bam mʋ ŋɔɔnɩ wǝǝnu dwi tǝri tǝri dɩ ba.
Kʋ daarɩ lele kʋntʋ na yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa kweelim maŋa tɩn, Wɛ laan pɛ DƖ Bu mʋ ba o ŋɔɔnɩ DƖ taanɩ dɩ dɩbam.
Wɛ dɛ wʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ kɩ lʋgʋ baŋa dɩ wɛyuu wǝǝnu maama, yɩ DƖ pa-o ni sɩ o ba o taa te wǝǝnu maama.
Wɛ Bu wʋm mʋ jɩgɩ pooni dɩlʋ na brɩ Wɛ paarɩ-zulǝ yam na yɩ te tɩn.
O maa jɩgɩ o Ko Wɛ nyɩnyʋgʋ fasɩ.
O ni-taanɩ maa jɩgɩ dam yɩ dɩ paɩ wǝǝnu maama fɔgɩ tɩ zɩga.
O ma ba o saarɩ nɔɔna lwarɩm o fɔgɩ-ba o pa ba ji lanyɩranɩ, yɩ o laan joori o di Baŋa-Wɛ te o vu o jǝni DƖ jazɩm nɩ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, Baŋa-Wɛ Bu dwe Wɛ malɛsɩ sɩm, dɩ Wɛ na pɛ-o yɩrɩ dɩlʋ na daga dɩ dwe sɩntʋ na jɩgɩ yɩra yalʋ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Zezi Krisi dwe Wɛ malɛsɩ sɩm maama Kʋ na yɩ malɛsɩ sɩm, Wɛ wʋ fɔgɩ DƖ ta dɩ malɛka DƖ wɩ: «Nmʋ mʋ yɩ amʋ Bu, yɩ zɩm amʋ dɩ jigi nmʋ Ko.» Wɛ nan wʋ tagɩ malɛka kalʋkalʋ taanɩ DƖ wɩ: «Amʋ wʋ́ ta yɩ ka Ko, sɩ ka dɩ taa yɩ amʋ bu.» Kʋ daarɩ maŋa kalʋ Wɛ na lagɩ DƖ tʋŋɩ DƖ Bu-dʋa kam sɩ o ba lʋgʋ baŋa tɩn, DƖ tagɩ DƖ wɩ: «Malɛsɩ sɩm maama maŋɩ sɩ sɩ kuni doonǝ mʋ sɩ zul-o.» Kʋ nan na yɩ malɛsɩ sɩm, Wɛ tagɩ sɩ taanɩ DƖ wɩ: Sɩ yɩ dɩntʋ tɩntʋŋna mʋ, yɩ DƖ pa sɩ nyɩ nɩ viu dɩ min-vwɩ te, sɩ sɩ taa tʋŋɩ sɩ pa-DƖ.
Kʋ daarɩ kʋ na yɩ Wɛ Bu wʋm, DƖ tagɩ o taanɩ DƖ wɩ: «Nmʋ yɩ Wɛ mʋ, n paarɩ dɩm wʋ́ ta wʋra sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.
Nmʋ wʋ́ ta n te n nɔɔna bam dɩ cɩga.
Nmʋ soe cɩga cwǝŋǝ, yɩ n daarɩ n culi balɔrɔ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ n Ko Baŋa-Wɛ pɛ nmʋ na wʋpolo lanyɩranɩ dɩ zulǝ n dwǝni balʋ maama na wʋra dɩ nmʋ tɩn.» Wɛ ta tagɩ DƖ wɩ: «Nmʋ wʋlʋ na yɩ wǝǝnu maama Yuutu tɩn mʋ kɩ lʋgʋ baŋa pulim nɩ, yɩ n ta kwǝri n ma n jɩa n kɩ wɛyuu wǝǝnu maama.
Wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ maama wʋ́ ba tɩ cɔgɩ, kʋ daarɩ nmʋ nan wʋra mʋ maŋa maama.
Wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ maama wʋ́ ba tɩ doori nɩ gɔrɔ na yǝni kʋ doori te tɩn.
Tɩ wʋ́ ba tɩ lɩɩrɩ, yɩ n kukuli-tɩ n tiŋi nɩ n na kukuli gwar-doŋo n tiŋi yɩ n daarɩ n lǝni gwar-dʋŋʋ n zʋ te tɩn.
Nmʋ nan ta wʋ́ ta n yɩ nɩ n na maŋɩ n yɩ te tɩn mʋ.
N ŋwɩa bá fɔgɩ ka ti.» Wɛ dɛɛn wʋ fɔgɩ DƖ ta dɩ DƖ malɛsɩ sɩm kalʋkalʋ DƖ wɩ: «Ba n jǝni a jazɩm nɩ, sɩ a kɩ n dʋna maama n nɛ kuri nɩ sɩ n nɔ-ba nɩ tɩga te.» Kʋ yɩ DƖ Bu wʋm yɩranɩ mʋ DƖ tagɩ kʋntʋ.
Malɛsɩ sɩm laŋa nan yɩ ta mʋ?
Sɩ nyɩ nɩ jwǝǝru mʋ te, sɩ ba jɩgɩ yɩra nɩ nabiinǝ te.
Sɩntʋ yɩ sɩlʋ na tʋŋɩ sɩ pa Wɛ tɩn mʋ.
Wɛ maa yǝni DƖ tʋŋɩ-sɩ, yɩ sɩ ve sɩ zǝni balʋ na wʋ́ na vrɩm tɩn.
Dɩ́ wʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ vɩn Wɛ vrɩm dɩm Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ kʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ kwaanɩ dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kalʋ dɩ́ na ni tɩn lanyɩranɩ, sɩ dɩ́ yɩ ywǝri Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ.
Wɛ na tɔgɩ DƖ malɛsɩ sɩm jɩŋa DƖ pa dɩ́ nabaara bam kwǝrǝ kalʋ tɩn jɩgɩ kuri lanyɩranɩ.
Nɔɔnʋ na wʋ sɛ-ka yɩ o na cɔgɩ DƖ niǝ yam, kʋntʋ tu maŋɩ sɩ o na cam mʋ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ o na kɩ te tɩn.
Kʋ laan nan na yɩ dɩbam balʋ Wɛ na dɛ DƖ Bu wʋm ŋwaanɩ DƖ pa dɩ́ lwarɩ DƖ kwǝrǝ kam tɩn, dɩ́ yigǝ na tǝrǝ dɩ o vrɩm dɩm kʋntʋ dɩ na dwe malɛsɩ sɩm na brɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, dɩ́ wʋ́ wanɩ dɩ́ lu na?
Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi mʋ dɛ yigǝ o ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ vrɩm dɩm kʋntʋ taanɩ o brɩ nɔɔna.
Balʋ na ni-dɩ kʋntʋ tɩn laan ma daarɩ ba ta ba brɩ dɩbam nɩ kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ.
Wɛ tɩtɩ dɩ ma brɩ nɩ kʋ yɩ cɩga, dɩ DƖ na pɛ ba kɩ wo-kɩnkagɩla dwi tǝri tǝri dɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na brɩ DƖ dam tɩn.
DƖ ma daarɩ DƖ pa ba maama DƖ Joro kʋm dam, sɩ ba ma tʋŋɩ te dɩ te DƖ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ tɩn.
Zezi mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na vrɩ dɩbam tɩn Lʋ-dʋŋʋ kʋlʋ na maa bɩɩnɩ yɩ dɩ́ tɛ kʋ taanɩ tɩn, kʋ daɩ nɩ malɛsɩ sɩm mʋ Wɛ pɛ dam sɩ sɩ taa te-kʋ.
Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋdoŋ tagɩ o wɩ: «Nabiinu yɩ bɛɛ mʋ, yɩ nmʋ Baŋa-Wɛ guli o gulǝ?
Nabiinu bu yɩ bɛɛ mʋ, yɩ nmʋ nii o baŋa nɩ kʋntʋ?
Nmʋ pɛ o ba maɩ dɩ malɛsɩ sɩm maŋa fɩnfɩɩn wʋnɩ mʋ, yɩ n laan pa o di paarɩ yɩ o na zulǝ.
N ma n daarɩ n kɩ wǝǝnu maama o nɛ kuri nɩ.» Kʋ na tagɩ kʋ wɩ, «Wɛ kɩ wǝǝnu maama o dam kuri nɩ» tɩn, kʋ lagɩ kʋ ta nɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ tǝrǝ o na ba te-kʋ.
Kʋ nan yɩ cɩga mʋ nɩ, lele kʋntʋ dɩ́ daa ta wʋ nɛ nɩ wǝǝnu maama wʋ nabiinǝ dam kuri nɩ.
Dɩ́ nan ye nɩ, kʋ yɩ Zezi mʋ Wɛ pɛ o tu o tɩtɩ o wʋ yi malɛsɩ sɩm maŋa fɩnfɩɩn wʋnɩ mʋ, yɩ o laan ba o na paarɩ-zulǝ dɩ tiǝ, o na sɛ o yaarɩ o tɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ Wɛ tɔgɩ DƖ zaanɩ dɩm ŋwaanɩ DƖ pa Zezi lǝni nabiinǝ maama yuu nɩ o tɩ ba vrɩm ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ maŋɩ dɩ Wɛ dɩlʋ na kɩ woŋo maama DƖ tɩtɩ ŋwaanɩ tɩn wʋbʋŋa mʋ, sɩ DƖ pa Zezi na yaara, sɩ o laan wanɩ o vrɩ nabiinǝ zanzan sɩ ba ji Wɛ biǝ, sɩ ba daarɩ ba na paarɩ-zulǝ.
Kʋ yɩ Zezi mʋ paɩ nɔɔna na vrɩm Wɛ tee nɩ.
Zezi ta mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na paɩ nabiinǝ jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo Wɛ yigǝ nɩ tɩn.
Wʋntʋ dɩ o na pɛ balʋ maama jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo tɩn yɩ ko dɩdʋa biǝ mʋ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ o bǝ-ba nɩ o ko-biǝ, yɩ kʋ ba jɩgɩ cavɩɩra dɩd-o.
Mʋ kʋ kuri o tagɩ dɩ Wɛ o wɩ: «Amʋ wʋ́ pa nmʋ yɩrɩ zaŋɩ a ko-biǝ bam tɩtarɩ nɩ, yɩ a zɩgɩ ba wʋnɩ a leeni a zuli nmʋ.» O daa ta maa wɩ: «Amʋ wʋ́ kwe a wʋ maama a pa Wɛ.» O ma daa ta ta o wɩ: «Nii-na amʋ dɩ biǝ balʋ Wɛ na kɩ amʋ jɩŋa nɩ tɩn.» Balʋ nan na yɩ Wɛ biǝ tɩn yɩ nabiinǝ mʋ, yɩ ba jɩgɩ yɩra dɩ jana.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ Zezi dɩ dɛɛn tɔgɩ o ji nabiinu, sɩ o wanɩ o tɔgɩ o tʋʋnɩ dɩm ŋwaanɩ o cɔgɩ wʋlʋ na paɩ tʋʋnɩ jaanɩ nɔɔna tɩn.
Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ sʋtaanɩ.
Zezi na wanɩ tʋʋnɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ pɛ o wanɩ o vrɩ balʋ na fʋna dɩ tʋʋnɩ tɩn o yagɩ.
Bantʋ ŋwɩa kam maama wʋnɩ ba yɩ nɩ gambɛ mʋ te, ba na kwarɩ tʋʋnɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩ́ laan nan lwarɩ nɩ kʋ daɩ malɛsɩ sɩm mʋ o tu sɩ o zǝni.
O tu sɩ o zǝni Abraham dwi tiinǝ bam mʋ.
Mʋ kʋ kuri o jigi nabiinu yɩ o sɩɩnɩ o nyɩ dɩ o ko-biǝ bam woŋo maama wʋnɩ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ pɛ-o cwǝŋǝ, sɩ o taa yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu wʋlʋ na jɩgɩ ba ŋwaŋa lanyɩranɩ yɩ o tʋŋɩ o pa Wɛ dɩ cɩga ba ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
Kʋntʋ mʋ pɛ o waɩ o saarɩ ba lwarɩm yɩ o pa ba fɔgɩ dɩ Wɛ.
Kʋntʋ, Zezi tɩtɩ na nɛ maŋɩm dɩ yaara tɩn, o laan wʋ́ wanɩ o zǝni balʋ na wʋ yaara dɩ maŋɩm wʋnɩ tɩn sɩ ba taa jɩgɩ pu-dɩa.
Zezi dwe Moyisi A ko-biǝ-ba, abam yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna mʋ.
DƖ ma bǝŋi abam sɩ á tɔgɩ á na ywǝǝni DƖ sɔŋɔ nɩ.
Nan lwarɩ-na nɩ Zezi mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ Wɛ na tʋŋɩ, sɩ o ba o ji DƖ kaanɩm yuutu dɩbam Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm dɩm ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ mʋ pɛ-o tɩtʋŋɩ dɩm kʋntʋ.
O maa tʋŋɩ o pa Wɛ dɩ cɩga.
Kʋ nan yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ dɩ Moyisi dɩ dɛɛn na nii Wɛ nɔɔna bam baŋa nɩ dɩ cɩga te tɩn.
Zezi nan sɩɩnɩ o maŋɩ sɩ o na zulǝ o dwǝni Moyisi, bɛŋwaanɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na lɔgɩ sɔŋɔ tɩn mʋ na zulǝ o dwe sɔŋɔ kʋm tɩtɩ.
Sɔŋɔ nan tǝrǝ yɩ kʋ daɩ nɔɔnʋ mʋ lɔgɩ-kʋ.
Wɛ nan mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na kɩ woŋo maama tɩn.
Moyisi dɛɛn yɩ tɩntʋŋnʋ mʋ, yɩ o tʋŋɩ dɩ cɩga Wɛ nɔɔna bam ŋwaanɩ.
O ma da yigǝ o brɩ-ba Wɛ cɩga kalʋ na wʋ́ ba ka lwarɩ jaja tɩn.
Kʋ daarɩ Zezi Krisi mʋ yɩ sɔŋɔ kʋm tɩtɩ bu cɩga cɩga, yɩ o te sɔŋɔ kʋm.
Dɩbam mʋ yɩ sɔŋɔ kʋm kʋntʋ, dɩ dɩ́ na zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ dɩ pu-dɩa yɩ dɩ́ brɩ dɩ wʋpolo nɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ tɩɩna Wɛ tee nɩ.
Wɛ na wʋ́ pa DƖ nɔɔna bam siun te tɩn Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ sɛ-na Wɛ Joro kʋm na tagɩ te kʋ wɩ: «Abam zɩm na ni Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam, á yɩ zaŋɩ á digili á bɩcara, nɩ á nabaara bam dɛɛn na vɩn Wɛ ni, yɩ ba kwǝri ba maŋɩ-DƖ ba nii te maŋa kalʋ ba na wʋ kagʋa kam wʋnɩ tɩn.» Wɛ maa wɩ: «Abam nabaara bam dɛɛn nɛ amʋ na kɩ kʋlʋ maama dɩ ba bɩna fiinna tɩn, yɩ ba daa ta tiini ba kwaanɩ ba maŋɩ amʋ sɩ ba nii.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ amʋ banɩ zaŋɩ dɩ nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ, yɩ a ta a wɩ: ‹Kʋ yɩ ba paalɩ ba ywǝri mʋ maŋa maama, yɩ ba vɩn sɩ ba tɔgɩ amʋ cwe sɩm.› Amʋ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋm ma pa a ta a du dɩ ba a wɩ: ‹Amʋ brɩ a bá pa-ba cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba zʋ amʋ woro kʋm wʋ ba na siun.› » A ko-biǝ-ba, cʋ-na á tɩtɩ sɩ abam wʋlʋwʋlʋ yɩ taá jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-lwaanʋ o bɩcarɩ nɩ, sɩ kʋ pa o yɩ kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Ŋwɩa Tu Wɛ, sɩ o daarɩ o yagɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm.
Nan taá zǝni-na daanɩ maŋa maama, sɩ kʋ pa á taá jɩgɩ pu-dɩa, nɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam ta na ŋɔɔnɩ dɩ dɩbam zɩm te tɩn, sɩ abam wʋlʋwʋlʋ yɩ pa lwarɩm gan-o sɩ o pa o bɩcarɩ digili dɩ Wɛ.
Dɩbam nan tɔgɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi dɩ́ ji Wɛ biǝ mʋ, dɩ dɩ́ na zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ, nɩ dɩ́ na puli dɩ́ kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ te tɩn, sɩ kʋ vu kʋ yi kweelim.
Kʋ yɩ nɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm na tagɩ te kʋ wɩ: «Abam zɩm na ni Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam, á yɩ zaŋɩ á digili á bɩcara, nɩ á nabaara bam dɛɛn na vɩn Wɛ ni te tɩn.» Balʋ dɛɛn na ni Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam yɩ ba vɩn DƖ ni tɩn yɩ bra mʋ?
Ba yɩ balʋ maama Moyisi dɛɛn na tɔgɩ ba yigǝ o ja-ba o nuŋi Ezipi tɩʋ kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn mʋ.
Wɛ banɩ dɛɛn zaŋɩ dɩ bra mʋ bɩna fiinna tɩn?
Kʋ yɩ nɔɔna balʋ na kɩ lwarɩm kagʋa kam wʋnɩ yɩ Wɛ pa ba tɩ da tɩn mʋ.
Wɛ na dugi DƖ wɩ, dɩntʋ brɩ DƖ bá pa-ba cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba zʋ DƖ woro kʋm wʋ ba na siun tɩn, kʋ yɩ bra mʋ DƖ tɛa?
Kʋ yɩ balʋ na wʋ sɛ DƖ ni tɩn mʋ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ pɛ dɩ́ lwarɩ nɩ, Wɛ na wʋ pɛ-ba cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba zʋ DƖ woro kʋm wʋ tɩn, kʋ yɩ ba na wʋ kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Wɛ na goni DƖ ni sɩ DƖ pa nɔɔna zʋ DƖ woro kʋm wʋ ba na siun tɩn daa ta wʋra.
Dɩbam nan maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá yɩrɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ mʋ, sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o ba o darɩ nɩ o wʋ zʋ Wɛ woro kʋm kʋntʋ wʋ.
Dɩbam maŋɩ dɩ́ ni Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam, nɩnɛɛnɩ dɩ́ nabaara bam dɛɛn dɩ na ni-ka te tɩn.
Bantʋ nan na ni-ka tɩn, ba wʋ pɛ ka ja kuri dɩ ba, bɛŋwaanɩ ba wʋ kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa sɩ ba tɔgɩ Wɛ na tagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn.
Dɩbam balʋ na kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn mʋ wʋ́ ba dɩ́ na siun DƖ woro kʋm wʋnɩ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ tagɩ bantʋ taanɩ DƖ wɩ: «Amʋ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋm pɛ a ta a du dɩ ba a wɩ: ‹Amʋ brɩ a bá pa-ba cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba zʋ amʋ woro kʋm wʋ ba na siun.› » Wɛ na tagɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ daɩ nɩ DƖ ba jɩgɩ siun jǝgǝ mʋ ba ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ zɩgɩ maŋa kalʋ Wɛ na kɩ lʋgʋ baŋa yɩ DƖ kɩ DƖ tɩtʋŋa yam maama DƖ ti tɩn, mʋ DƖ daarɩ DƖ sin.
Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm tagɩ da yarpɛ dɛ dɩm taanɩ kʋ wɩ: «Da yarpɛ dɛ nɩ mʋ Wɛ sin dɩ DƖ tɩtʋŋa yam maama.» Wɛ nan tagɩ DƖ siun kʋm taanɩ DƖ wɩ: «Amʋ brɩ a bá pa-ba cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba zʋ amʋ woro kʋm wʋ ba sin.» Kʋntʋ tɩn, dɩ́ nabaara balʋ na dɛ yigǝ ba ni Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩn wʋ wanɩ ba zʋ DƖ woro kʋm wʋ ba sin, ba na vɩn DƖ ni tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ kʋ laan daarɩ sɩ nɔɔna badaara mʋ na cwǝŋǝ ba zʋ.
Mʋ kʋ kuri Wɛ daa ta tiŋi dɛ dɩdoŋ, kʋ na lagɩ kʋ ta nɩ zɩm, sɩ nɔɔna wanɩ ba zʋ DƖ woro kʋm wʋ ba sin.
Kʋntʋ, bɩna zanzan na kɛ tɩn, Wɛ dɛɛn ta pɛ Davidi mʋ ta kʋlʋ dɩbam na maŋɩ dɩ́ ni tɩn o wɩ: «Abam zɩm na ni Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam, á yɩ zaŋɩ á digili á bɩcara.» Zozwe dɛɛn ya na sɩɩnɩ o ja dɩ́ nabaara bam o vu o zʋ Wɛ woro kʋm wʋ sɩ ba sin, Wɛ ya daa bá ŋɔɔnɩ siun dɛ dɩdoŋ taanɩ daga.
Kʋntʋ mʋ dɩ́ ye nɩ cwǝŋǝ daa ta wʋra zɩm, sɩ Wɛ nɔɔna na siun, nɩ DƖ tɩtɩ na sin da yarpɛ dɛ dɩm nɩ te tɩn.
Wʋlʋ maama na zʋ Wɛ woro kʋm wʋ tɩn, wʋntʋ wʋ́ sɩɩnɩ o na siun dɩ o tɩtʋŋa yam, nɩ Wɛ dɩ dɛɛn na sin dɩ DƖ tɩtʋŋa yam te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ kwaanɩ-na á pa dɩ́ zʋ Wɛ woro kʋm wʋ sɩ dɩ́ na siun.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o vɩn Wɛ ni sɩ o joori Wɛ kwaga nɩ, nɩ dɩ́ nabaara bam dɛɛn na kɩ te tɩn.
Wɛ taanɩ dɩm jɩgɩ ŋwɩa yɩ dɩ dana lanyɩranɩ.
Dɩ jɩgɩ ni dɩ dwe sʋ-lɔŋɔ kʋlʋ na jɩgɩ niǝ yale tɩn.
Dɩ maa waɩ dɩ zʋʋrɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋ dɩ pɔɔrɩ o joro dɩ o bɩcarɩ wǝǝnu maama daanɩ, yɩ dɩ daarɩ dɩ ye o swan dɩ o wʋbʋŋa maama na yɩ te tɩn.
Kʋlʋkʋlʋ bá wanɩ kʋ sǝgi Wɛ yigǝ nɩ.
Woŋo kʋlʋ maama na wʋra tɩn yɩ jaja mʋ DƖ yigǝ nɩ.
Kʋ yɩ dɩntʋ mʋ dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ ba dɩ́ zɩgɩ DƖ yigǝ nɩ dɩ́ ta kʋlʋ maama dɩ́ na kɩ tɩn.
Zezi Krisi dwe Wɛ kaanɩm yuu tiinǝ bam maama Dɩbam nan jɩgɩ Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu o na yɩ kamunu o diini o vu o yi Wɛ-sɔŋɔ.
Wʋm mʋ yɩ Wɛ Bu Zezi.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, pa-na dɩ́ sɛ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm lanyɩranɩ dɩ́ zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ.
Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu wʋm kʋntʋ nan daɩ wʋlʋ na ba jɩgɩ dɩbam balʋ na bwǝnǝ tɩn ŋwaŋa.
O tɩtɩ dɩ nan nɛ yaara dɩ maŋɩm woŋo maama wʋnɩ, nɩ dɩbam dɩ na nɛ maŋɩm te tɩn.
Nan dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, o ta wʋ kɩ lwarɩm.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, pa-na dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ baarɩ sɩ dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ yi Dam-fɔrɔ Tu Wɛ jǝŋǝ je, sɩ dɩ́ joŋi DƖ zaanɩ dɩm.
Kʋntʋ mʋ Wɛ wʋ́ duri dɩ́ ŋwaŋa yɩ DƖ pa dɩbam zaanɩ, sɩ kʋ wanɩ kʋ zǝni dɩbam maŋa kalʋ dɩ́ na lagɩ tɩn.
Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu maama yɩ ba yǝni ba lɩ-o o donnǝ nabiinǝ wʋnɩ mʋ, sɩ o taa tʋŋɩ o pa Wɛ ba ŋwaanɩ.
O nan maŋɩ sɩ o taa maɩ pɛɛra dɩ vara mʋ o kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ, sɩ DƖ yagɩ ba lwarɩm DƖ ma cɛ-ba.
O tɩtɩ dɩ nan na bwǝnǝ tɩn, o waɩ o jaanɩ o bɩcarɩ dɩ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ cɩga kam lanyɩranɩ yɩ ba tusi tɩn.
O nan na bwǝnǝ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ fɩn mʋ sɩ o kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ o tɩtɩ lwarɩm ŋwaanɩ, dɩ nɔɔna bam dɩ lwarɩm ŋwaanɩ.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ nan bá wanɩ o lɩ o tɩtɩ sɩ o taa yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu.
Kʋ yɩ Wɛ mʋ wʋ́ kur-o, nɩnɛɛnɩ DƖ dɛɛn na puli DƖ kuri Aarɔn te tɩn.
Kʋ nan yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ dɩ Zezi Krisi dɩ na yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu te tɩn.
Kʋ daɩ nɩ wʋm mʋ beeri zulǝ yam kʋntʋ o pa o tɩtɩ.
Wɛ nan mʋ tagɩ dɩd-o DƖ wɩ: «Nmʋ mʋ yɩ amʋ Bu, yɩ zɩm amʋ dɩ jigi nmʋ Ko.» Wɛ daa ta tagɩ DƖ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ jǝgǝ kadoŋ nɩ DƖ wɩ: «Nmʋ wʋ́ ta n yɩ amʋ kaanɩm tu sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn, nɩ Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ dɛɛn na yɩ te tɩn.» Zezi na wʋ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ maŋa kalʋ tɩn, o tiini o loori Wɛ dɩ baarɩ yɩ o yi-na nuŋǝ, o na ye nɩ Wɛ wʋ́ wanɩ DƖ joŋ-o tʋʋnɩ wʋnɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wɛ ma sɛ o loro kʋm, o na tu o tɩtɩ yɩ o sɛ-DƖ lanyɩranɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Nan dɩ o na maŋɩ o yɩ Wɛ Bu tɩn dɩ, o na yaarɩ te tɩn mʋ pɛ o lwarɩ Wɛ ni sɛɛm na yɩ te tɩn.
O nan na kɩ kʋlʋ maama Wɛ na lagɩ o ti tɩn, o laan waɩ o vrɩ balʋ maama na sɛ o ni tɩn o pa ba na ŋwɩa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ.
Wɛ ma brɩ nɩ o sɩɩnɩ o yɩ DƖ kaanɩm yuutu, nɩ Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ dɛɛn na yɩ te tɩn.
Cʋ-na á tɩtɩ sɩ á yɩ yagɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm Amʋ ya jɩgɩ wǝǝnu zanzan mʋ sɩ a ta a brɩ abam kʋntʋ laŋa nɩ, kʋ nan tiini kʋ cana sɩ a pa á ni kʋ kuri, bɛŋwaanɩ abam laan jɩgɩ yawɔrɔ mʋ yɩ á bá wanɩ á ni kʋ kuri lɩla.
Kʋ na daɩ kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, kantʋ maŋa kam nɩ abam laan ya wʋ́ ta yɩ balʋ na maŋɩ sɩ á taá jɩgɩ Wɛ nɔɔna á zaasɩ tɩn mʋ.
Kʋ nan na yɩ cɩga, kʋ fɩn mʋ sɩ nɔɔna mʋ joori ba brɩ abam Wɛ taanɩ dɩm dayigǝ wo-mwaalʋ tɩm.
Abam nyɩ dɩ biǝ balʋ ta na wʋ yi sɩ ba di wʋdiu kʋlʋ na duunǝ tɩn, yɩ á maŋɩ sɩ á taá ŋɔgɩ yɩla mʋ nɩ bu-balɛ te.
Balʋ na jɩgɩ bu-balɛ wʋbʋŋa kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ ba ta yǝri kʋlʋ na maŋɩ dɩ kʋlʋ na wʋ maŋɩ tɩn daanɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ balʋ wʋbʋŋa na bɩgɩ dɩ Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn mʋ di wʋdiu kʋlʋ na duunǝ tɩn.
Bantʋ mʋ yǝni ba tɔgɩ Wɛ cɩga kam, yɩ ba waɩ ba kuri wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na lana yɩ tɩ maŋɩ sɩ ba kɩ tɩn, ba daarɩ tɩlʋ na wʋ maŋɩ tɩn.
Nan pa-na dɩ́ kɛ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ ba na maŋɩ ba da yigǝ ba brɩ abam Zezi Krisi cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ tɩn, sɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ zaasɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na wʋ́ pa dɩ́ wʋbʋŋa bɩ Wɛ cɩga kam wʋnɩ tɩn.
Abam daa wʋ maŋɩ sɩ á joori á puli Wɛ taanɩ dɩm zaasɩm, bɛŋwaanɩ á maŋɩ á zaasɩ á na wʋ́ lǝni á wʋ á yagɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩlʋ na jɩgɩ abam tɩ ve tʋʋnɩ wʋnɩ tɩn, dɩ á na wʋ́ kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ te tɩn.
Á maŋɩ á zaasɩ ba na wʋ́ miisi nɔɔna na wʋnɩ te tɩn woŋo, kʋ wǝli dɩ ba na wʋ́ zi ba jɩa nɔɔna baŋa nɩ ba warɩ Wɛ ba ŋwaanɩ te tɩn, yɩ á kwǝri á zaasɩ twa na wʋ́ bi te tɩn, kʋ wǝli dɩ Wɛ na wʋ́ ba DƖ di nabiinǝ sarɩya DƖ ma kweeli te tɩn.
Á nan pa-na dɩ́ gaalɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ dɩ́ kɛ, sɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ kwaanɩ dɩ́ vu yigǝ, sɩ Wɛ wʋ́ zǝni dɩbam yɩ dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ vu yigǝ.
Kʋ na yɩ balʋ na maŋɩ ba sɛ Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn, ba na paalɩ ba yagɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ daa bá wanɩ o joori o dɩ-ba ka wʋnɩ.
Bantʋ maŋɩ ba na Wɛ pooni dɩm, yɩ ba lwarɩ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kalʋ Wɛ na pɛ tɩn na yɩ te tɩn.
Ba maŋɩ ba na Wɛ Joro kʋm dam.
Ba maŋɩ ba lwarɩ Wɛ taanɩ dɩm na ywǝmmǝ te tɩn, yɩ ba nɛ Wɛ paarɩ dɩlʋ na lagɩ dɩ ba tɩn dam na yɩ te tɩn.
Nɔɔna bantʋ dwi na yagɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ daa bá wanɩ o pa ba lǝni ba wʋ ba daa ta tɔgɩ Wɛ, bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ nyɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ bam tɩtɩ mʋ joori ba pa Wɛ Bu Zezi tʋʋn-dagara kam yuu nɩ ba gʋ yɩ ba paɩ nɔɔna mwan-o te.
Kʋ nyɩ dɩ dʋa na nɩa lanyɩranɩ nɔɔnʋ kara nɩ te tɩn mʋ.
Tɩga kam na nyɔgɩ dʋ-na bam yɩ ka daarɩ ka kɩ wʋdiiru lanyɩranɩ ka pa balʋ na dugi ka baŋa nɩ tɩn, Wɛ wʋ́ kɩ tɩga kam kʋntʋ lanyɩranɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ tɩga kam na nuŋi sabarɩ dɩ wo-kʋrrʋ yɩranɩ mʋ, kʋ brɩ nɩ ka yɩ kafɛ mʋ, yɩ fɩnfɩɩn na wǝli da Wɛ wʋ́ cɔgɩ-ka DƖ yagɩ, yɩ kʋ tiim nɩ baá zwɛ-ka dɩ mini mʋ.
A badon-sonnu-ba, dɩbam na maŋɩ dɩ́ ŋɔɔnɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, dɩ́ jɩgɩ abam cɩga nɩ á tɔgɩ cwǝ-ŋʋŋa kalʋ na wʋ́ pa á na vrɩm tɩn.
Wɛ yɩ cɩga tu mʋ.
DƖ nan bá swe á na maŋɩ á tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna yalʋ tɩn.
DƖ ta bá swe á na soe-DƖ lanyɩranɩ yɩ á tʋŋɩ á wǝli DƖ nɔɔna bam kʋ ba kʋ yi zɩm maama tɩn.
Amʋ nan na tiini a lagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ abam maama kwaanɩ á tɔgɩ Wɛ lanyɩranɩ kʋ vu kʋ yi kweelim, sɩ á laan na kʋlʋ maama á na jɩgɩ tɩɩna sɩ á na Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn.
Á nan yɩ pa yawɔrɔ zʋ abam.
Á lwǝni-na balʋ na fɔgɩ ba zɩgɩ dɩ pu-dɩa yɩ ba jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn.
Bantʋ laan mʋ wʋ́ ba ba joŋi wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ Wɛ na goni ni sɩ DƖ pa-ba tɩn.
Wɛ bá fɔgɩ DƖ lǝni DƖ na goni ni sɩ DƖ kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn Wɛ dɛɛn na goni DƖ ni dɩm dɩ Abraham tɩn, kʋ yɩ DƖ dugi dɩ DƖ tɩtɩ mʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ woŋo daa tǝrǝ kʋ na dwe-DƖ sɩ DƖ du dɩ kʋ.
Wɛ goni DƖ ni dɩm dɩd-o DƖ wɩ: «Amʋ wʋ́ kɩ nmʋ lanyɩranɩ, yɩ aá pa n dwi puli zanzan.» Wɛ na dugi kʋntʋ tɩn, Abraham dɛɛn ma vɔ pu-dɩa o cǝgi taan, yɩ o laan ba o na Wɛ na goni DƖ ni dɩm sɩ DƖ pa-o kʋlʋ tɩn.
Kʋ na yɩ nabiinǝ na yǝni ba du durǝ, baá ma kʋlʋ na dwe-ba tɩn yɩrɩ mʋ ba du, sɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ ba taanɩ dɩm yɩ cɩga, sɩ bʋbwɛa daa ta tǝrǝ.
Kʋ nan na yɩ Wɛ na goni DƖ ni dɩm dɩ balʋ tɩn, DƖ dɩ lagɩ sɩ ba lwarɩ lanyɩranɩ nɩ DƖ bá fɔgɩ DƖ yiri DƖ ni dɩm.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ dugi durǝ DƖ wǝli dɩ DƖ ni-gonim dɩm.
Wɛ na ba fɔɛ vwan tɩn ŋwaanɩ, wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ tɩle bá wanɩ tɩ lǝni.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩbam balʋ na kɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ Wɛ jɩŋa nɩ tɩn wʋ́ tiini dɩ́ zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ dɩ pu-dɩa, sɩ dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ dɩ́ wʋ́ na kʋlʋ Wɛ na tiŋi sɩ DƖ pa dɩbam tɩn.
Tɩɩna yam dɩ́ na jɩgɩ Wɛ tee nɩ kʋntʋ tɩn tiini ya dana, yɩ ya bá wanɩ ya cɔgɩ.
Ya maa paɩ dɩ́ wʋbʋŋa tigi jǝgǝ dɩdʋa, yɩ ya paɩ dɩ́ yi Wɛ tɩtɩ jǝŋǝ je mɛ na cɩgɩ dɩ gɔrɔ sɩ nabiinǝ yɩ zʋ tɩn.
Zezi nan mʋ maŋɩ o da yigǝ o zʋ jǝgǝ kam kʋntʋ dɩbam ŋwaanɩ.
Wʋntʋ mʋ jigi Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn, nɩ Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ dɛɛn na yɩ te tɩn.
Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ dɛɛn yɩ pɛ mʋ yɩ o ta yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm tu A laan lagɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ woŋo mʋ a brɩ abam.
Wʋntʋ dɛɛn yɩ Salɛm tiinǝ pɛ mʋ, yɩ o kwǝri o yɩ Yuutu Baŋa-Wɛ kaanɩm tu.
Abraham na kɩ jara o wanɩ pwa yɩ o laan ma joori maŋa kalʋ tɩn, mʋ Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ jeer-o cwǝŋǝ nɩ o sɔɔlɩ Wɛ o pa-o.
Abraham laan ma kwe wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama o na nɛ jara yam je nɩ tɩn o cɛ kuni fugǝ, o kwe kuni bɩdwɩ dɩm o pa Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ.
Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ yɩrɩ dɩm kuri mʋ yɩ pɛ wʋlʋ na yɩ Cɩga Tu tɩn.
Kʋ wǝli da, o na yɩ Salɛm pɛ tɩn, kʋ dɩ kuri mʋ yɩ Yazurǝ Pɛ.
Dɩbam nan wʋ ni Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ ko dɩ o nu ŋwa, yɩ dɩ́ yǝri o kuri na puli mɛ tɩn.
Dɩ́ nan yǝri o lʋra dɛ dɩ o tʋʋnɩ maŋa.
Kʋntʋ mʋ pɛ o nyɩ dɩ Wɛ Bu Zezi, yɩ o yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm tu sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.
Bʋŋɩ-na á nii Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ dɛɛn na yɩ kamunu te tɩn.
Dɩbam nabaarʋ Abraham dɛɛn ma cɛ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ o na nɛ jara yam je nɩ tɩn kuni fugǝ, yɩ o lɩ kuni bɩdwɩ o pa-o.
Kʋ na yɩ balʋ na nuŋi Leevi dwi dɩm wʋnɩ yɩ ba yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm tiinǝ tɩn, Wɛ ni dɩm pɛ-ba cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba joŋi kuni kuri fugǝ wʋnɩ kuni bɩdwɩ dɩm ba donnǝ Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam tee nɩ woŋo maama wʋnɩ, yɩ bantʋ dɩ nan yɩ Abraham dwi tiinǝ mʋ.
Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ nan wʋ nuŋi Leevi dwi dɩm wʋnɩ.
Nan dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, o ta joŋi o wǝǝnu tǝri Abraham tee nɩ.
O ma daarɩ o sɔɔlɩ Wɛ o pa Abraham, yɩ Abraham nan ya mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ Wɛ na goni DƖ ni dɩd-o tɩn.
Kʋ nan ba jɩgɩ bʋbwɛa nɩ, nɔɔnʋ na sɔɔlɩ Wɛ o pa o doŋ, wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ kamunu o dwe o na sɔɔlɩ o pa wʋlʋ tɩn.
Wɛ kaanɩm tiinǝ balʋ na nuŋi Leevi dwi dɩm wʋnɩ tɩn dɛɛn yǝni ba joŋi ba wǝǝnu tǝri mʋ, bantʋ nan yɩ balʋ na tʋ tɩn mʋ.
Kʋ daarɩ kʋ nan na yɩ Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ, wʋntʋ ŋwɩ mʋ taan, nɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm na tagɩ te tɩn.
-Abraham na cɛ o wǝǝnu yɩ o pa Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ o tǝri tɩn, ba ta wʋ lʋgɩ Leevi, yɩ o nan wʋ o nabaarʋ Abraham jana kam wʋnɩ.
Leevi nan mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ dwi tiinǝ na jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba joŋi ba wǝǝnu tǝri ba donnǝ Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam tee nɩ tɩn.
Nan dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, kʋ nyɩ dɩ Leevi tɔgɩ Abraham ŋwaanɩ mʋ o pa Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ o tǝri.
Wɛ dɛɛn tɔgɩ Leevi dwi tiinǝ kaanɩm dɩm ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ pa DƖ cullu tɩm Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ.
Bantʋ nan na yǝni ba kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ te tɩn ya na maŋɩ fasɩ, Wɛ ya daa bá kuri kaanɩm tu wʋdoŋ wʋlʋ na daɩ Leevi dwi tu tɩn.
Wɛ nan kuri wʋlʋ na yɩ kaanɩm tu nɩ Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ dɛɛn na yɩ te tɩn, yɩ o wʋ nuŋi Aarɔn dwi dɩm wʋnɩ.
Kʋntʋ, Wɛ na lǝni DƖ kaanɩm tu dwi dɩdoŋ wʋnɩ tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ DƖ cullu tɩm dɩ tɔgɩ tɩ lǝni mʋ.
-Taanɩ dɩntʋ maama nan brɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi woŋo mʋ.
Wʋntʋ daɩ Leevi dwi tu.
Dɩ́ ye nɩ ba lʋg-o Zuda dwi dɩm wʋnɩ mʋ.
Dwi dɩm kʋntʋ wʋnɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ nan wʋ fɔgɩ o ji Wɛ kaanɩm tu.
Kʋ na yɩ Wɛ cullu tɩlʋ DƖ na kɩ Moyisi jɩŋa nɩ tɩn, tɩ wʋ pɛ Zuda dwi tiinǝ cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba ji Wɛ kaanɩm tiinǝ.
Wɛ lǝni kaanɩm tu wʋdoŋ mʋ, sɩ o taa nyɩ nɩ Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ dɛɛn na yɩ te tɩn Dɩ́ nan sɩɩnɩ dɩ́ lwarɩ jaja nɩ Wɛ lǝni kaanɩm tu wʋdoŋ mʋ, o na nyɩ dɩ Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ dɛɛn na yɩ te tɩn.
Zezi na jigi Wɛ kaanɩm tu te tɩn wʋ tɔgɩ dwi dɩm cullu tɩm ŋwaanɩ, kʋ tɔgɩ o ŋwɩa kalʋ tʋʋnɩ na ba jɩgɩ dam ka baŋa nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Wɛ nan tagɩ o taanɩ DƖ wɩ: «Nmʋ mʋ wʋ́ ta n yɩ amʋ kaanɩm tu sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn, nɩ Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ dɛɛn na yɩ te tɩn.» Kʋ ma brɩ nɩ Wɛ yagɩ cwǝ-doŋǝ kam mʋ, ka na bwǝnǝ yɩ ka ba zǝni nɔɔna tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Cullu tɩlʋ Wɛ na kɩ Moyisi jɩŋa nɩ tɩn warɩ tɩ pa nɔɔna maŋɩ fasɩ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ.
Kʋ daarɩ lele kʋntʋ, dɩ́ laan jɩgɩ tɩɩna lanyɩranɩ dɩ Wɛ na tiŋi cwǝ-laa kalʋ DƖ pa dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ ma wanɩ dɩ́ tɔgɩ-ka dɩ́ vu dɩ́ yi DƖ te tɩn.
Wɛ nan dugi durǝ mʋ DƖ wǝli da.
Leevi dwi tiinǝ bam dɛɛn nan na jigi Wɛ kaanɩm tiinǝ tɩn, DƖ wʋ dugi durǝ kam kʋntʋ doŋ dɩ ba.
Kʋ daarɩ, Zezi nan na jigi Wɛ kaanɩm tu tɩn, Wɛ dugi durǝ mʋ dɩd-o DƖ wɩ: «Amʋ Yuutu Baŋa-Wɛ mʋ dugi a durǝ, yɩ a bá fɔgɩ a za a ni.
Nmʋ wʋ́ ta n yɩ amʋ kaanɩm tu sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.» Wɛ na dugi DƖ durǝ kam kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ Zezi ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ tiŋi cwǝ-laa DƖ pa dɩbam, yɩ kantʋ garɩ cwǝ-doŋǝ kam.
Kʋ na yɩ Leevi dwi tiinǝ balʋ dɛɛn na yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm tiinǝ tɩn, ba yɩ zanzan, tʋʋnɩ na yǝni dɩ jaanɩ-ba yɩ ba lǝni daanɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Kʋ daarɩ Zezi mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na jɩgɩ ŋwɩa sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.
Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ nan daa bá lǝni o yuu nɩ o ji Wɛ kaanɩm tu.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, o waɩ o vrɩ balʋ na tɔgɩ o ŋwaanɩ ba yi Wɛ te tɩn maŋa maama, o na jɩgɩ ŋwɩa kalʋ na ba ti yɩ o loori Wɛ o pa-ba tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Zezi nan mʋ yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu wʋlʋ na maŋɩ tɩn dɩbam ŋwaanɩ.
O jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo, o yɩ nɔn-ŋʋm Wɛ yigǝ nɩ, o ba jɩgɩ lwarɩm.
Wɛ ma lɩ-o nɔn-balwaarʋ tɩtarɩ nɩ, yɩ DƖ zǝŋ-o DƖ ja DƖ di wɛyuu DƖ sɔŋɔ nɩ.
Kʋ na yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm yuu tiinǝ bam dɛɛn na yɩ te tɩn, dɛ maama ba yǝni ba kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ mʋ sɩ DƖ yagɩ ba tɩtɩ lwarɩm DƖ ma cɛ-ba, yɩ ba laan daarɩ ba kaanɩ Wɛ ba donnǝ bam dɩ lwarɩm ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ nan na yɩ Zezi, wʋntʋ kwe o tɩtɩ mʋ o ma kaanɩ Wɛ kuni bɩdwɩ yɩranɩ, yɩ kʋntʋ jɩgɩ kuri sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.
Cullu tɩlʋ Wɛ na kɩ Moyisi jɩŋa nɩ tɩn pa nabiinǝ jiri Wɛ kaanɩm yuu tiinǝ yɩ ba daa ta bwǝnǝ mʋ.
Kʋ nan na yɩ Wɛ ni-gonim dɩlʋ DƖ na dugi durǝ dɩ ŋwaanɩ tɩn, dɩntʋ laan mʋ lǝni Moyisi cullu tɩm yuu nɩ, yɩ dɩ pa Wɛ tɩtɩ Bu wʋm ji DƖ kaanɩm yuutu wʋlʋ na maŋɩ fasɩ sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.
Zezi Krisi mʋ yɩ Wɛ ni-dʋʋrɩ dɩm kaanɩm yuutu Taana yantʋ maama wʋnɩ taanɩ dɩlʋ na yɩ kamunu tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ dɩbam jɩgɩ Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu wʋm kʋntʋ doŋ.
Wʋntʋ mʋ je Wɛ-sɔŋɔ nɩ, Dam-Paŋwa Tu Wɛ paarɩ jangɔŋɔ kʋm jazɩm nɩ.
O maa wʋ Wɛ di-laa cɩga cɩga wʋnɩ o tʋŋɩ o pa-DƖ.
Jǝgǝ kam kʋntʋ yɩ Yuutu Baŋa-Wɛ tɩtɩ sɔŋɔ mʋ, kʋ daɩ lʋgʋ baŋa vwe dɩlʋ nabiinǝ na pugi sɩ ba taa zuli-DƖ da tɩn.
Wʋlʋ maama na yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu tɩn tɩtʋŋɩ yɩ sɩ o taa maɩ pɛɛra dɩ vara mʋ o kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ.
Dɩbam Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu Zezi dɩ nan maŋɩ sɩ o taa jɩgɩ kʋlʋ o na wʋ́ pa Wɛ tɩn.
Zezi nan ya ta na wʋ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ, o bá ta yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm tu.
Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ kaanɩm tiinǝ maŋɩ ba wʋ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ, yɩ ba yǝni ba maɩ pɛɛra ba ma kaanɩ Wɛ, kʋ maŋɩ dɩ Moyisi cullu tɩm na brɩ te tɩn.
Bantʋ na yǝni ba tʋŋɩ ba pa Wɛ te tɩn yɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na wʋ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ nɩ tɩn nyɩnyʋgʋ dɩ tɩ luluŋu mʋ.
Moyisi dɛɛn na lagɩ o pu vwe dɩlʋ nɔɔna na wʋ́ ta paɩ Wɛ zulǝ dɩ wʋnɩ tɩn, Wɛ dɛɛn brɩ-o o na wʋ́ kɩ te, yɩ DƖ ta DƖ wɩ: «Kwaanɩ n kɩ wǝǝnu tɩm maama sɩ tɩ taa nyɩ nɩ amʋ na maŋɩ a brɩ-m piu kʋm yuu nɩ te tɩn.» Kʋ daarɩ lele kʋntʋ, Zezi na tʋŋɩ o pa Wɛ te tɩn tiini kʋ jɩgɩ kuri lanyɩranɩ kʋ dwe kaanɩm tiinǝ bam tɩtʋŋa yam maama, nɩ ni-dʋʋrɩ dɩlʋ Wɛ na tɔgɩ Zezi ŋwaanɩ DƖ go DƖ pa dɩbam tɩn na lana dɩ dwe dayigǝ ni-gonim dɩm na yɩ te tɩn.
Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ na goni ni-dʋʋrɩ dɩm sɩ DƖ pa dɩbam kʋlʋ tɩn tiini kʋ lana kʋ dwe DƖ ni-doori dɩm.
Dayigǝ ni dɩlʋ Wɛ na goni DƖ pa DƖ nɔɔna bam tɩn ya na maŋɩ fasɩ, DƖ ya daa bá go ni dɩdoŋ DƖ lǝni dɩntʋ yuu nɩ.
Wɛ dɛɛn nan brɩ nɩ DƖ nɔɔna bam kɩ ba tusi mʋ.
Kʋntʋ mʋ DƖ tagɩ DƖ wɩ: «Maŋa maa bɩɩna, yɩ amʋ wʋ́ go ni-dʋʋrɩ a pa a nɔɔna bam, kʋ nan yɩ Yisɩrayɛlɩ dwi tiinǝ dɩ Zuda dwi tiinǝ bam maama mʋ.
Ni-dʋʋrɩ dɩntʋ bá ta nyɩ dɩ dayigǝ ni dɩlʋ amʋ na goni a pa ba nabaara bam maŋa kalʋ a na jaanɩ ba jɩŋa a pa ba nuŋi Ezipi tɩʋ kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn.
Bantʋ dɛɛn wʋ sɛ ba tɔgɩ ni dɩlʋ amʋ na goni dɩ ba tɩn.
Kʋntʋ mʋ pa a yigǝ daa tǝri ba wʋnɩ.» Mʋ Yuutu Baŋa-Wɛ na tagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn.
DƖ daa ta ma ta DƖ wɩ: «Kantʋ maŋa kam na kɛ, amʋ wʋ́ go ni a pa Yisɩrayɛlɩ dwi tiinǝ bam nɩ: ‹Amʋ wʋ́ pa a ni-taana yam zʋ ba wʋbʋŋa, yɩ a pa ya pǝni ba bɩcara nɩ.
Amʋ wʋ́ ta yɩ ba Tu Wɛ, yɩ ba dɩ wʋ́ ta yɩ amʋ nɔɔna.
Bantʋ nabwǝnǝ dɩ ba dɩdɛɛra maama wʋ́ lwarɩ amʋ na yɩ wʋlʋ tɩn.
Ba wʋlʋwʋlʋ daa wʋ maŋɩ sɩ o brɩ o doŋ nɩ amʋ mʋ yɩ ba Yuutu.
Maŋa kam kʋntʋ nɩ amʋ wʋ́ duri ba ŋwaŋa dɩ ba lwarɩm dɩm, yɩ a daa bá guli ba kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩm.› » Wɛ na ŋɔɔnɩ DƖ ni-dʋʋrɩ dɩm taanɩ kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ DƖ dayigǝ ni dɩm laan jigi ni-doori mʋ.
Woŋo kʋlʋ nan na doori yɩ kʋ wʋra kʋ cɔgɩ tɩn lagɩ kʋ kɛ lele mʋ.
Nɔɔna na zuli Wɛ te lʋgʋ baŋa vwe dɩm wʋnɩ tɩn A lagɩ a ta dayigǝ ni-gonim dɩm dɩ nɔɔna na tɔgɩ dɩ ŋwaanɩ ba zuli Wɛ te tɩn woŋo mʋ.
Kʋ yɩ nabiinǝ mʋ pugi vwe lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ sɩ ba taa zuli Wɛ da, yɩ cullu brɩ ba na wʋ́ ta zuli-DƖ te tɩn.
Vwe dɩm kʋntʋ wʋ nan cɛ di sɩle mʋ.
Dɩ kwaga digǝ kam yɩrɩ mʋ Wɛ-di-laa, yɩ ka jɩgɩ min-zwǝn-kamunu.
Taabʋlʋ maa zɩgɩ da, yɩ dɩpɛ dɩlʋ na yɩ Wɛ nyɩm tɩn tigi kʋ baŋa nɩ.
Yigǝ digǝ dɩ maa wʋra, ka yɩrɩ mʋ Wɛ-di-laa cɩga cɩga, yɩ ba lǝ gar-jalɩ ba ma cɩ-ka.
Kaanɩm bimbim maa zɩgɩ da, dɩ yɩ sǝbu-sɩŋa mʋ ba mɛ ba zi, dáanɩ mʋ ba zwɛ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ lwǝm na ywǝmmǝ tɩn ba pa-DƖ.
Wɛ ni-gonim daka kam dɩ maa wʋra ba na mɛ sǝbu-sɩŋa ba ma zi-ka.
Ka wʋ kʋm maa jɩgɩ sǝbu-sɩŋa zʋŋa, ka dɩ wʋ na jɩgɩ wʋdiu kʋlʋ yɩrɩ na yɩ Maanɩ tɩn.
Nacǝgǝ kalʋ na yɩ Aarɔn nyɩm yɩ ka dɛɛn puli vɔɔrʋ tɩn dɩ maa wʋ daka kam wʋnɩ, kʋ wǝli dɩ kandwa-pɩlɛ sɩle Wɛ cullu tɩm na pʋpʋnɩ sɩ baŋa nɩ tɩn.
Ba dɛɛn ma kɩ malɛsɩ sɩle nyɩnyʋgʋ ba zɩgɩ da, yɩ sɩ vwana yam kwǝli daka kam baŋa, mʋ jǝgǝ kalʋ Wɛ na saarɩ nabiinǝ lwarɩm da tɩn.
Malɛsɩ sɩm nyɩnyʋgʋ kʋm brɩ nɩ Baŋa-Wɛ mʋ wʋ jǝgǝ kam kʋntʋ nɩ dɩ DƖ paarɩ-zulǝ yam.
Kʋ nan daɩ lele kʋntʋ mʋ a lagɩ sɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ taanɩ zanzan a brɩ abam.
Vwe dɩm dɩ dɩ wʋ wǝǝnu tɩm na fɔgɩ tɩ kwɛ kʋntʋ tɩn, Wɛ kaanɩm tiinǝ bam yǝni ba zʋʋrɩ kwaga digǝ kam wʋ dɛ maama mʋ ba tʋŋɩ ba paɩ Wɛ.
Kʋ nan na yɩ yigǝ digǝ kam, Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu wʋm yɩranɩ mʋ jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ o zʋ ka wʋ bɩdwɩ bɩm maama wʋnɩ.
Wʋntʋ nan na lagɩ o zʋ, o maŋɩ sɩ o ja varɩm jana mʋ o zʋ o ma kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ o tɩtɩ tusim dɩ nɔɔna bam dɩ tusim ŋwaanɩ, sɩ Wɛ yagɩ DƖ ma cɛ-ba.
Kʋntʋ, Wɛ Joro kʋm laan brɩ dɩbam nɩ, maŋa kalʋ dayigǝ vwe dɩm ya ta na zɩgɩ tɩn, cwǝŋǝ dɛɛn ya tǝrǝ sɩ nɔɔna wanɩ ba zʋ Wɛ-di-laa cɩga cɩga kam wʋnɩ.
Kʋ maa yɩ nyɩnyʋgʋ mʋ kʋ na brɩ dɩbam zɩm wǝǝnu tɩm na yɩ te tɩn.
Kʋ brɩ nɩ pɛɛra dɩ vara balʋ maama nabiinǝ na kwe ba ma kaanɩ Wɛ tɩn bá wanɩ ya pa wʋlʋ na mɛ-ya o ma zuli Wɛ tɩn bɩcarɩ kwɛ fasɩ dɩ Wɛ.
Ba zaasɩ-ba wǝǝnu tɩlʋ ba na wʋ́ di yɩ ba nyɔ tɩn, dɩ n na wʋ́ kɩ te sɩ n ta n yɩ lanyɩranɩ tɩn cullu mʋ.
Tɩ maama nan yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wǝǝnu cullu mʋ, yɩ tɩ jɩgɩ kuri sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kam Wɛ na wʋ́ fɔgɩ DƖ tiŋi DƖ cwǝ-dʋŋa kam tɩn yɩranɩ má mʋ.
Zezi Krisi na pɛ dɩ́ na cwǝŋǝ sɩ dɩ́ zuli Wɛ te tɩn Zezi Krisi laan mʋ nan tu o ji kaanɩm yuutu dɩbam ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋ ma pa dɩ́ joŋi o ŋwɩ-dʋŋa wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ na maŋɩ tɩ wʋra tɩn.
Zezi na zʋ Wɛ te dɩbam ŋwaanɩ tɩn, kʋ yɩ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ cɩga cɩga mʋ o zʋa, yɩ kʋntʋ tiini kʋ lana kʋ dwe lʋgʋ baŋa vwe dɩm.
O na zʋ mɛ tɩn daɩ vwe dɩlʋ nabiinǝ na pugi tɩn.
O ma vu o zʋ Wɛ-di-laa kʋm wʋnɩ.
Kʋ yɩ bɩdwɩ yɩranɩ mʋ o zʋa, maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
O nan wʋ mɛ bʋbalɩ naa nabalɩ jana o zʋ o ma kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ.
Kʋ yɩ o tɩtɩ jana mʋ o mɛ o ŋwɩ dɩbam lwarɩm jɩnɩ, yɩ o vrɩ dɩbam lwarɩm wʋnɩ sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.
Wɛ ni-doori dɩm brɩ nɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na cɔgɩ culu tɩn, ba maŋɩ sɩ ba ma bʋnɩ dɩ nabɛ jana mʋ dɩ na-pwala kalʋ ba na zwɛ tɩn tɩntwarɩm ba misi nɔɔnʋ wʋm yɩra nɩ.
Ba na kɩ kʋntʋ mʋ, kʋʋ́ kwɛ nɔɔnʋ wʋm sɩ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ cullu tɩm na brɩ te tɩn.
Vara jana na waɩ nɔɔna ka kwɛ tɩn, Zezi na tɩgɩ yɩ o jana kam nuŋi tɩn, kʋ bá tiini kʋ fɔgɩ nɔɔna kʋ kwɛ dɩ Wɛ kʋ dwǝni na?
Zezi tɔgɩ Wɛ Joro kʋlʋ na wʋra sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn ŋwaanɩ o ji kaanɩm dɩlʋ na lana fasɩ tɩn Wɛ yigǝ nɩ.
O na kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ dɩbam ŋwaanɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ ma pa dɩ́ bɩcara kwɛ fasɩ dɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩlʋ ya na jɩgɩ dɩbam tɩ ve tʋʋnɩ wʋnɩ tɩn, yɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ zuli Ŋwɩa Tu Baŋa-Wɛ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ Zezi mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ Wɛ na dɛ o ŋwaanɩ DƖ tiŋi DƖ ni-dʋʋrɩ dɩm dɩ nabiinǝ tɩn.
O na sɛ o tɩ o ma ŋwɩ ba lwarɩm jɩnɩ tɩn, o waɩ o vrɩ-ba dɩ ba na kɩ kʋlʋ ba cɔgɩ Wɛ dayigǝ ni-gonim dɩm tɩn.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ balʋ maama Wɛ na kuri sɩ ba taa yɩ DƖ biǝ tɩn waɩ ba joŋi DƖ wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ na ba ti tɩn, nɩ DƖ na goni ni sɩ DƖ pa-ba te tɩn.
-Kʋ nyɩ dɩ nɔɔnʋ na pɛ ni nɩ, o na tɩga o daarɩ, ba na wʋ́ cɛ o wǝǝnu te tɩn mʋ.
Maŋa kalʋ o ta na ŋwɩ tɩn, o ni dɩm kʋntʋ ba jɩgɩ kuri.
Kʋ daarɩ o nan na tɩga, ba laan wʋ́ cɛ o wǝǝnu tɩm sɩ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ o ni dɩm na tagɩ te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ, Wɛ na goni DƖ dayigǝ ni dɩm DƖ pa DƖ nɔɔna bam tɩn, ba mɛ vara jana mʋ ba ma brɩ nɩ DƖ ni-gonim dɩm jɩgɩ kuri.
Moyisi dɛɛn tɔɔlɩ Wɛ niǝ yam maama na yɩ te tɩn mʋ o brɩ Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam.
O laan ma kwe nabalɩ dɩ bʋbalɩ jana o wǝli dɩ na, yɩ o kwe daa, ka yɩrɩ mʋ Yisopi, o vɔ gungun-sʋŋʋ ka ni nɩ o lu jana kam wʋnɩ o ma misi tɔnɔ kʋlʋ Wɛ niǝ yam na pʋpʋnɩ kʋ wʋnɩ tɩn baŋa nɩ, yɩ o daarɩ o misi Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam maama yɩra nɩ.
O dɛɛn na kɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, o ma ta dɩ ba o wɩ: «Jana kantʋ brɩ nɩ Wɛ ni-gonim dɩm jɩgɩ kuri sɩ á taá tɔgɩ-dɩ.» Moyisi daa ta ma kwe jana kam o ma misi vwe dɩm dɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama na wʋ dɩ wʋnɩ yɩ ba ma zuli Wɛ tɩn.
Kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ, Wɛ cullu tɩm brɩ nɩ nɔɔna maŋɩ sɩ ba ma vara jana mʋ ba ma fɔgɩ ba kwɛ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama na jɩgɩ digiru Wɛ yigǝ nɩ tɩn.
Wǝǝnu tɩlʋ ba na ba maɩ jana ba kwɛ tɩn yɩ fɩnfɩɩn yɩranɩ mʋ.
Jana nan ya na wʋ nuŋi, Wɛ bá yagɩ nɔɔna lwarɩm DƖ ma cɛ-ba.
Zezi Krisi kaanɩm dɩm mʋ saarɩ nɔɔna lwarɩm Lʋgʋ baŋa vwe dɩm wǝǝnu yɩ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn nyɩnyʋgʋ mʋ, yɩ tɩ maŋɩ sɩ tɩ fɔgɩ tɩ kwɛ dɩ jana kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ.
Kʋ daarɩ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ wǝǝnu tɩm tɩtɩ na wʋ́ fɔgɩ tɩ kwɛ te tɩn, kʋ fɩn mʋ sɩ ba kɩ kaanɩm dɩlʋ na wʋ́ ta dwe faŋa nyɩm dɩm tɩn ba pa Wɛ.
Zezi Krisi nan na zʋ Wɛ te tɩn, kʋ daɩ vwe dɩlʋ nabiinǝ na pugi yɩ dɩ lwǝni Wɛ-sɔŋɔ na yɩ te cɩga cɩga tɩn mʋ o zʋa.
O nan sɩɩnɩ o zʋ Wɛ te DƖ sɔŋɔ nɩ mʋ, yɩ o zɩgɩ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ dɩbam zǝnǝ ŋwaanɩ.
Zwifǝ kaanɩm yuutu wʋm dɛɛn yǝni o maɩ vara jana mʋ o zʋ Wɛ-di-laa kʋm wʋ bɩnɩ maama o ma kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ.
Kʋ nan na yɩ Zezi, wʋntʋ na zʋ Wɛ te tɩn, o mɛ o tɩtɩ mʋ o kɩ kaanɩm kuni bɩdwɩ o pa-DƖ.
Kʋ ya na daɩ kʋntʋ, Zezi ya wʋ́ ta yaarɩ o tʋ kuni zanzan mʋ, kʋ na zɩgɩ lʋgʋ baŋa pulim nɩ sɩ kʋ ba kʋ yi zɩm.
Kʋ nan na yɩ te tɩn, o laan tu lʋgʋ baŋa kweelim maŋa nɩ mʋ.
O tu bɩdwɩ mʋ, yɩ o ba o tɩ o kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ sɩ kʋ pa nabiinǝ lwarɩm saarɩ sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.
Nɔɔnʋ maama maŋɩ sɩ o tɩ kuni bɩdwɩ mʋ, sɩ Wɛ laan di o sarɩya.
Kʋntʋ, Zezi Krisi dɩ nan tu o tɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ o ma kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ, sɩ o lɩ nɔɔna zanzan lwarɩm o yagɩ.
O nan ta wʋ́ joori o ba lʋgʋ baŋa.
Kʋ nan daa daɩ nɔɔna lwarɩm saarɩm ŋwaanɩ, kʋ laan yɩ sɩ o joŋi balʋ na jɩgɩ tɩɩna sɩ o joori o ba tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
Kʋ na yɩ Wɛ cullu tɩlʋ DƖ na kɩ Moyisi jɩŋa nɩ tɩn, tɩ lagɩ tɩ brɩ wo-laarʋ tɩm dɩ́ na wʋ́ ba dɩ́ joŋi Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn na yɩ te tɩn mʋ.
Tɩ nan yɩ lulunnu mʋ, tɩ daɩ nɩ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ wǝǝnu tɩm tɩtɩ na yɩ te tɩn.
Tɩ paɩ nɔɔna joori ba kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ mʋ bɩm maama taan taan.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ tɩ bá wanɩ tɩ pa balʋ na tɔgɩ tɩ ŋwaanɩ ba zuli Wɛ tɩn bɩcara kwɛ fasɩ.
Wɛ cullu tɩm ya na waɩ tɩ paɩ balʋ na zuli-DƖ tɩn lwarɩm saarɩ dɩ tiǝ, ba ya daa bá bʋŋɩ nɩ ba lwarɩm ta wʋ ba yuu nɩ, yɩ ba ya daa bá ta kaana.
Ba nan na kaanɩ Wɛ bɩm maama wʋnɩ tɩn, kʋ paɩ ba joori ba guli nɩ ba lwarɩm dɩm ta wʋ ba yuu nɩ mʋ.
Bɛŋwaanɩ nabiinǝ lwarɩm bá wanɩ dɩ saarɩ dɩ nabalɩ dɩ bʋbalɩ jana.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ Zezi dɛɛn na lagɩ o ba lʋgʋ baŋa maŋa kalʋ tɩn, o tagɩ dɩ o Ko Wɛ o wɩ: «Nmʋ ba lagɩ nabiinǝ na maɩ vara dɩ pɛɛra ba kaanɩ-m te tɩn.
Nmʋ nan pɛ amʋ nabiinu yɩra mʋ, sɩ a ma-ya a kɩ nmʋ wʋbʋŋa lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ.
Kʋ na yɩ nɔɔna na yǝni ba gʋ vara ba zwɛ ba ma kaanɩ-m te tɩn, naa ba na kaanɩ te sɩ kʋ ma saarɩ ba lwarɩm tɩn, kikiǝ yam kʋntʋ maama ba poli nmʋ wʋ.
Amʋ maa wɩ: ‹A Ko Wɛ, nii amʋ da, sɩ a kɩ nmʋ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn, nɩ kʋ na pʋpʋnɩ amʋ taanɩ nmʋ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ faŋa faŋa te tɩn.› » Zezi maŋɩ o da yigǝ o ta o wɩ: «Nmʋ ba lagɩ sɩ nabiinǝ ma vara dɩ pɛɛra ba ma kaanɩ nmʋ, naa ba gʋ vara ba zwɛ ba ma kaanɩ nmʋ, naa ba kaanɩ sɩ kʋ ma saarɩ ba lwarɩm.
Wǝǝnu tɩntʋ maama ba poli nmʋ wʋ.» Nan dɩ tɩ na maŋɩ tɩ tɔgɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm na brɩ te tɩn dɩ.
O laan ma daarɩ o ta o wɩ: «Nii amʋ da, sɩ a kɩ nmʋ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn.» Kʋntʋ brɩ nɩ Wɛ saarɩ DƖ dayigǝ kaanɩm ni dɩm DƖ yagɩ, yɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ lǝni kaanɩm dɩdoŋ mʋ.
Dɩntʋ mʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi na kɩ o Ko Wɛ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn maama, yɩ o ma o tɩtɩ yɩra o ma kaanɩ kuni bɩdwɩ, yɩ kʋ jɩgɩ kuri sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn, sɩ kʋ pa dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo Wɛ yigǝ nɩ.
Lʋgʋ baŋa kaanɩm tiinǝ yǝni ba zɩgɩ wɛɛnɩ mʋ ba tʋŋɩ dɛ maama, ba gʋ vara ba ma kaana maŋa maama, yɩ ba kaanɩm dɩm kʋntʋ nan warɩ lwarɩm dɩ saara.
Kʋ nan na yɩ Zezi, wʋntʋ kwe o tɩtɩ o ma kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ bɩdwɩ yɩranɩ má mʋ, yɩ kʋ saarɩ nabiinǝ lwarɩm sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.
O na kɩ kʋntʋ o ti tɩn, o ma vu o jǝni Baŋa-Wɛ jazɩm nɩ, yɩ o laan cǝgi maŋa kalʋ Wɛ na wʋ́ kɩ o dʋna maama o nɛ kuri nɩ sɩ o nɔ-ba nɩ tɩga te tɩn.
Kʋntʋ, o kaanɩ Wɛ kuni bɩdwɩ mʋ, sɩ kʋ pa nɔɔna taa jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo sɩ ba bɩcara kwɛ fasɩ sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.
Wɛ Joro kʋm dɩ nan brɩ dɩbam jaja nɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ.
Kʋ dɛ yigǝ kʋ ta kʋ wɩ: «Amʋ Yuutu Baŋa-Wɛ tagɩ a wɩ: ‹Kantʋ maŋa kam na kɛ, amʋ wʋ́ go ni a pa a nɔɔna bam nɩ: Amʋ wʋ́ pa a ni-taana yam zʋ ba bɩcara, yɩ a pa ya pǝni ba wʋbʋŋa nɩ.› » DƖ daa ta ma ta DƖ wɩ: «Amʋ daa bá guli ba lwarɩm dɩ ba kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩm.» Wɛ nan na yagɩ nabiinǝ kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩm DƖ ma cɛ-ba tɩn, kʋ daa wʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba gʋ vara ba ma kaanɩ-DƖ ba lwarɩm saarɩm ŋwaanɩ.
Dɩ́ na maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ zɩgɩ dɩ baarɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ te tɩn A ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ laan jɩgɩ ni sɩ dɩ́ zʋ Wɛ-di-laa cɩga cɩga kam wʋnɩ, Zezi Krisi na tɩga yɩ o jana nuŋi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Wʋntʋ nan mʋ pʋrɩ cwǝ-dʋŋa o pa dɩbam, yɩ kantʋ mʋ paɩ ŋwɩa.
O maa kaarɩ gar-jalɩ dɩm dɩ ya na wʋ dɩbam dɩ Wɛ laŋa nɩ tɩn, dɩ o na kwe o yɩra yam o kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Kʋntʋ, dɩbam jɩgɩ Wɛ kaanɩm tu cɩga cɩga o na nii Wɛ tɩtɩ nɔɔna bam baŋa nɩ.
Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, pa-na dɩ́ fʋfɔ dɩ́ twɛ Wɛ te dɩ wʋbʋŋ-ŋʋna dɩ baarɩ dɩlʋ na brɩ nɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa fasɩ dɩ Wɛ tɩn.
Wɛ kwɛ dɩ́ bɩcara kʋ pa dɩ́ daa ba bʋŋɩ nɩ dɩ́ lwarɩm ta wʋ dɩ́ yuu nɩ, yɩ DƖ zarɩ dɩbam dɩ na-ŋʋna.
Pa-na dɩ́ brɩ nɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ tɩɩna Wɛ tee nɩ yɩ bʋbwɛa tǝrǝ, DƖ na goni ni DƖ pa dɩbam yɩ DƖ bá fɔgɩ DƖ kwanɩ-dɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Pa-na dɩ́ taá ye da-ni nɩ, sɩ dɩ́ taá zǝni daanɩ, sɩ dɩ́ taá soe daanɩ, sɩ dɩ́ taá kɩ kǝm-laarʋ.
Á yɩ pa dɩ́ yagɩ da-kikilim Wɛ zulǝ ŋwaanɩ nɩ badaara na yagɩ te tɩn.
Nan kwaanɩ-na á tiini á taá wǝli daanɩ kʋntʋ, sɩ kʋ pa á na baarɩ, á na lwarɩ nɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm dɛ dɩm twɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na lwarɩ Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn, o ta na paalɩ o kɩ lwarɩm, kaanɩm daa tǝrǝ dɩ na wʋ́ pa o lwarɩm dɩm saarɩ.
Kʋ laan nan daarɩ sɩ fʋʋnɩ mʋ taa jɩgɩ kʋntʋ tu dɩ Wɛ na wʋ́ kɩ-o te tɩn.
Wɛ na di o sarɩya, DƖ laan wʋ́ pa o zʋ min-fɔrɔ kʋlʋ na wʋ́ cɔgɩ balʋ maama na vɩn Wɛ tɩn wʋ.
Kʋ na yɩ Wɛ cullu tɩlʋ DƖ na kɩ Moyisi jɩŋa nɩ tɩn, nɔɔnʋ na cɔgɩ-tɩ, yɩ nɔɔna bale naa batɔ na yɩ maana tiinǝ, baá gʋ kʋntʋ tu mʋ o kǝm-lɔŋɔ kʋm ŋwaanɩ yɩ ŋwaŋa bá ta wʋra.
Kʋ daarɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ nan na yáalɩ Wɛ tɩtɩ Bu wʋm tɩn, kʋntʋ tu bá tiini o na cɔgɩm kʋ gaalɩ Wɛ tee nɩ na?
Kʋntʋ tu paɩ Zezi jana kam Wɛ na dɛ ka ŋwaanɩ DƖ tiŋi DƖ ni-dʋʋrɩ dɩm tɩn yɩ kafɛ mʋ, yɩ kʋ nan yɩ jana kam kʋntʋ mʋ Wɛ mɛ DƖ fɔgɩ DƖ kwɛ nɔɔnʋ wʋm kʋntʋ bɩcarɩ.
Kʋntʋ tu daa ta twɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm kʋ na paɩ nɔɔna Wɛ zaanɩ dɩm tɩn mʋ.
Kʋntʋ tɩn, o bá tiini o na cam na?
Dɩbam nan maŋɩ dɩ́ ye wʋlʋ wʋm o na tagɩ o wɩ: «Amʋ mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na wʋ́ cɔgɩ nɔɔna dɩ ba kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩn.
Amʋ wʋ́ pa ba joori ba na kʋlʋ na maŋɩ dɩ ba tɩn.» Kʋ ta pʋpʋnɩ nɩ: «Baŋa-Wɛ wʋ́ di DƖ nɔɔna sarɩya.» Kʋ nan wʋ́ ta tiini kʋ yɩ lɛɛrʋ dɩ wʋlʋ na kɩ o cɔgɩ yɩ Ŋwɩa Tu Baŋa-Wɛ jɩŋa zʋ-o sɩ DƖ pa o na cam tɩn.
Nan guli-na abam dɛɛn na dɛ yigǝ á na Wɛ pooni dɩm cɩga cɩga yɩ á yaarɩ zanzan te tɩn.
Cam dɩm nan wʋ wanɩ abam á na vɔgɩ pu-dɩa tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Maŋa kadoŋ nɩ ba yǝni ba twɩ abam yɩ ba bɛɛsɩ abam nɔn-kɔgɔ yigǝ nɩ.
Maŋa kadoŋ nɩ dɩ, á yǝni á sɛ sɩ á tɔgɩ á wǝli balʋ dɩ na nɛ abam yaara yam doŋ tɩn, kʋ pɛ á tɔgɩ á na yaara dɩ balʋ na wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ tɩn.
Nɔɔna maa yǝni ba vrɩ abam wǝǝnu yɩ á cɩm dɩ wʋpolo, bɛŋwaanɩ á ye nɩ á maŋɩ á jɩgɩ kʋlʋ na tiini kʋ lana kʋ dwe, yɩ kʋʋ́ ta wʋ abam tee nɩ sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.
Á yɩ yagɩ á na jɩgɩ baarɩ te tɩn, sɩ kʋʋ́ pa á na nyɔɔrɩ zanzan Wɛ tee nɩ.
Á nan maŋɩ sɩ á taá jɩgɩ pu-dɩa, sɩ á taá ma kɩ Wɛ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn, sɩ á daarɩ á joŋi wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ DƖ na goni ni sɩ DƖ pa abam tɩn.
Kʋ nan pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Kʋ daarɩ fɩɩn mʋ sɩ wʋlʋ na lagɩ o ba tɩn laan ba.
O bá daanɩ.
Wʋlʋ maama na jɩgɩ cɩga amʋ Baŋa-Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ amʋ tɩn, oó na ŋwɩa cɩga cɩga.
O nan na joori kwaga, amʋ bá ta jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩd-o.» Dɩbam nan daɩ balʋ na joori kwaga yɩ ba ga ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn.
Dɩ́ yɩ balʋ na kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ yɩ dɩ́ wʋ́ na ŋwɩa DƖ tee nɩ tɩn mʋ.
Wʋ-dɩdʋa kǝm dɩ Wɛ na yɩ te tɩn Nmʋ na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ, kʋ kuri mʋ n ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ nmʋ wʋ́ sɩɩnɩ n na wǝǝnu tɩlʋ n na tɩɩnɩ tɩn.
Kʋ kuri mʋ n ta n jɩgɩ cɩga nɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ n na ba naɩ dɩ n yiǝ tɩn sɩɩnɩ tɩ wʋra.
Nɔɔna balʋ na dɛ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ faŋa faŋa tɩn, kʋ yɩ ba na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ pɛ ba yɩrɩ zaŋɩ.
Kʋ yɩ dɩbam dɩ na kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ paɩ dɩ́ lwarɩ nɩ, Wɛ mɛ DƖ ni-taanɩ mʋ DƖ kɩ lʋgʋ baŋa dɩ wɛyuu maama.
Kʋntʋ mʋ dɩ́ sɛ nɩ Wɛ kwe wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na ba naɩ dɩ yiǝ tɩn mʋ DƖ ma kɩ tɩlʋ dɩ́ na waɩ dɩ́ naɩ dɩ yiǝ tɩn.
Abɛlɩ dɛɛn na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ pɛ o kaanɩm dɩm ja kuri dɩ dwǝni Kayin nyɩm dɩm.
O wʋ-dɩdʋa kam mʋ pɛ Wɛ wɩ, o yɩ cɩga tu, Wɛ na sɛ o pɛɛra yam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
O daa tǝrǝ yɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa kam ŋwaanɩ nan paɩ o taanɩ ta wʋra.
Enɔkɩ dɩ na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ pɛ DƖ kwe-o DƖ ja DƖ di DƖ sɔŋɔ, yɩ tʋʋnɩ wʋ jaan-o.
Wɛ na kwe-o kʋntʋ tɩn, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ daa wʋ nɛ o je.
Kʋ nan na wʋ́ loori kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ kʋ ta Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ, o poli Wɛ wʋ.
Nɔɔnʋ nan na ba jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ, o bá wanɩ o pa Wɛ wʋ poli.
Wʋlʋ maama na twɛ Wɛ tɩn, kʋ fɩn mʋ sɩ kʋntʋ tu taa jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa o sɛ nɩ Wɛ sɩɩnɩ DƖ wʋra yɩ DƖ kɩ balʋ na lagɩ sɩ ba yi DƖ te tɩn lanyɩranɩ.
Nowe dɩ dɛɛn na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn mʋ pɛ o sɛ DƖ ni.
Wɛ dɛɛn tagɩ dɩd-o kʋlʋ na lagɩ kʋ ba kʋ kɩ yɩ nabiinǝ yiǝ ta wʋ nɛ-kʋ tɩn.
O ma sɛ Wɛ ni yɩ o pa naboro kamunu, yɩ o dɩ o sɔŋɔ tiinǝ zʋ kʋ wʋ, yɩ Wɛ pa ba lu na-fara bam.
O kǝm dɩm kʋntʋ ma brɩ nɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ sɛ Wɛ ni tɩn ba jɩgɩ bʋra.
Wɛ ma pa o na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ o na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Abraham dɛɛn na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn mʋ pɛ o nuŋi o tɩtɩ tɩʋ kʋm nɩ, o vu jǝgǝ kalʋ Wɛ na goni ni nɩ DƖ wʋ́ pa-o sɩ o dwi tiinǝ taa te tɩn.
Wɛ na bǝŋ-o nɩ o nuŋi kʋntʋ tɩn, o sɩɩnɩ o sɛ o maa ve, yɩ o maŋɩ o yǝri je sɩm o na ve tɩn.
O na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ pɛ o vu o zʋʋrɩ tɩʋ kʋm Wɛ ya na maŋɩ DƖ go ni sɩ DƖ wʋ́ pa-o tɩn wʋnɩ nɩ vǝru te.
O dɛɛn zʋʋrɩ vwe wʋnɩ mʋ.
Yizakɩ dɩ Zakɔbɩ balʋ Wɛ na goni DƖ ni dɩm kʋntʋ dɩ ba dɩ tɩn dɩ zʋʋrɩ vwǝ wʋnɩ mʋ.
Kʋ brɩ nɩ Abraham dɛɛn cǝgi sɩ o zʋ tɩʋ kʋlʋ kuri na fɔgɩ kʋ cwi lanyɩranɩ tɩn mʋ.
Kʋ yɩ Wɛ tɩtɩ mʋ bǝgi kʋ kuri, yɩ dɩntʋ mʋ yɩ kʋ lwarʋ.
Abraham kaanɩ Sara dɛɛn yɩ ka-dʋgʋ mʋ yɩ o kɛ lʋra.
Dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, o na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn mʋ pɛ o sɛ nɩ Wɛ bá kwanɩ DƖ ni dɩm DƖ na goni tɩn yɩ o wanɩ o lʋ bu.
Kʋntʋ, kʋ zɩgɩ nɔn-dʋa kalʋ na yɩ Abraham yɩ o tiini o kwɩn zanzan tɩn yɩra nɩ mʋ Wɛ pɛ o lʋ dwi tiinǝ kɔgɔ kɔgɔ, nɩ calɩcwɩ na dagɩ wɛyuu nɩ naa nɩnɩʋ ni kasʋlʋ-wɩa na dagɩ yɩ kʋ warɩ kʋ ga te tɩn.
Nɔɔna balʋ dɛɛn na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ kʋntʋ tɩn nan tɩgɩ yɩ ba wʋ nɛ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ Wɛ na goni ni sɩ DƖ pa-ba tɩn.
Ba dɛɛn maŋɩ ba maanɩ nɩ wǝǝnu tɩm dɛ wʋ́ daanɩ yɩ tɩ laan ba, yɩ ba nan ya ta jɩgɩ wʋpolo kʋ ŋwaanɩ.
Ba ma ta jaja nɩ ba yɩ vǝrǝ mʋ, ba kugu je tǝri lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ.
Balʋ maama na tɛ kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn brɩ nɩ ba daa ta jɩgɩ tɩɩna, sɩ baá na tɩʋ kʋlʋ na wʋ́ ta yɩ ba kugu je tɩn mʋ.
Ba daa ba jɩgɩ tɩʋ kʋlʋ ba na nuŋi kʋ wʋnɩ tɩn wʋbʋŋa ba yuu nɩ.
Ba ya na jɩgɩ kʋ wʋbʋŋa, ba ya wʋ́ wanɩ ba na cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba joori.
Kʋ nan na yɩ te tɩn, ba wʋbʋŋa tiini ya zʋ tɩʋ kʋlʋ na lana kʋ ja gaalɩ tɩn.
Kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ Wɛ tɩtɩ sɔŋɔ kʋm.
Kʋ ma pa Baŋa-Wɛ jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ ba na bǝ-DƖ nɩ ba Tu Wɛ tɩn.
DƖ nan maŋɩ DƖ jɩgɩ tɩʋ kʋlʋ DƖ na ti kʋ yigǝ sɩ DƖ pa-ba tɩn.
-Kʋ yɩ Abraham na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ te tɩn mʋ pɛ o dɛɛn sɛ o kwe o bu Yizakɩ sɩ o ma kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ maŋa kam DƖ na maŋ-o sɩ DƖ nii tɩn.
Wɛ nan maŋɩ DƖ go ni DƖ pa-o nɩ: «Kʋʋ́ zɩgɩ Yizakɩ yɩra nɩ mʋ sɩ n dwi tiinǝ ma puli.» Dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, o dɛɛn ta sɛ sɩ o ya ma o bu-dʋa kam o kaanɩ Wɛ, nɩ Wɛ na brɩ-o te tɩn.
O dɛɛn jɩgɩ cɩga nɩ Wɛ wʋ́ wanɩ DƖ bi Yizakɩ DƖ pa o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ.
Kʋ nan na sɩɩnɩ kʋ kɩ te tɩn nyɩ dɩ DƖ bi-o tʋʋnɩ wʋnɩ mʋ.
Yizakɩ dɩ na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn mʋ pɛ o sɔɔlɩ Wɛ o pa o biǝ Zakɔbɩ dɩ Ezayu wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na lagɩ tɩ ba tɩ kɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
Zakɔbɩ dɩ na tu o ga fɩɩn sɩ o tɩ tɩn, o na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn mʋ pɛ o sɔɔlɩ Wɛ o pa o bu Zʋzɛfʋ biǝ bam maama bale.
O dɛɛn ma zi o nacǝgǝ o zaŋɩ yɩ o zuli Wɛ.
Zʋzɛfʋ dɩ maŋa na twɛ sɩ o tɩ tɩn, o na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn mʋ pɛ o ta dɩ Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam nɩ baá nuŋi Ezipi tɩʋ nɩ.
O ma pa-ba ni nɩ, ba na ma nuŋǝ, sɩ ba guri o kwi sɩm Ezipi nɩ ba ja vu ba tɩtɩ tɩʋ.
Moyisi ko dɩ o nu dɩ dɛɛn na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn mʋ pɛ ba kwe-o ba sǝgi canɩ sɩtɔ ba na lʋg-o maŋa kalʋ tɩn.
Ba ma na nɩ bu wʋm yɩ bu-laa, yɩ ba wʋ kwarɩ fʋʋnɩ sɩ ba vɩn pa-farʋ wʋm ni.
Moyisi dɛɛn na kɩ nɔɔnʋ tɩn, kʋ yɩ o na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ pɛ o wʋ sɛ sɩ ba taa bǝ-o nɩ Pa-farʋ wʋm bukɔ bu.
